176 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
177 struct Event {
178  Agent<TSeq> * agent;
179  VirusPtr<TSeq> virus;
180  ToolPtr<TSeq> tool;
181  Entity<TSeq> * entity;
182  epiworld_fast_int new_state;
183  epiworld_fast_int queue;
184  EventFun<TSeq> call;
185  int idx_agent;
186  int idx_object;
187 public:
204  Event(
205  Agent<TSeq> * agent_,
206  VirusPtr<TSeq> & virus_,
207  ToolPtr<TSeq> & tool_,
208  Entity<TSeq> * entity_,
209  epiworld_fast_int new_state_,
210  epiworld_fast_int queue_,
211  EventFun<TSeq> & call_,
212  int idx_agent_,
213  int idx_object_
214  ) : agent(agent_), virus(virus_), tool(tool_), entity(entity_),
215  new_state(new_state_),
216  queue(queue_), call(call_), idx_agent(idx_agent_), idx_object(idx_object_) {
217  return;
218  };
219 };

261 #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
262  #define EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF printf_epiworld
263 
264  #define EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(etype, msg) \
265  (etype)("[[epi-debug]] (error) " + std::string(msg));
266 
267  #define EPI_DEBUG_NOTIFY_ACTIVE() \
268  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("DEBUGGING ON (compiled with EPI_DEBUG defined)%s\n", "");
269 
270  #define EPI_DEBUG_ALL_NON_NEGATIVE(vect) \
271  for (auto & v : vect) \
272  if (static_cast<double>(v) < 0.0) \
273  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "A negative value not allowed.");
274 
275  #define EPI_DEBUG_SUM_DBL(vect, num) \
276  double _epi_debug_sum = 0.0; \
277  for (auto & v : vect) \
278  { \
279  _epi_debug_sum += static_cast<double>(v);\
280  if (_epi_debug_sum > static_cast<double>(num)) \
281  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "The sum of elements not reached."); \
282  }
283 
284  #define EPI_DEBUG_SUM_INT(vect, num) \
285  int _epi_debug_sum = 0; \
286  for (auto & v : vect) \
287  { \
288  _epi_debug_sum += static_cast<int>(v);\
289  if (_epi_debug_sum > static_cast<int>(num)) \
290  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "The sum of elements not reached."); \
291  }
292 
293  #define EPI_DEBUG_VECTOR_MATCH_INT(a, b, c) \
294  if (a.size() != b.size()) {\
295  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("In '%s'", std::string(c).c_str()); \
296  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("Size of vector a: %lu\n", (a).size());\
297  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("Size of vector b: %lu\n", (b).size());\
298  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::length_error, "The vectors do not match size."); \
299  }\
300  for (int _i = 0; _i < static_cast<int>(a.size()); ++_i) \
301  if (a[_i] != b[_i]) {\
302  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("In '%s'", std::string(c).c_str()); \
303  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("Iterating the last 5 values%s:\n", ""); \
304  for (int _j = std::max(0, static_cast<int>(_i) - 4); _j <= _i; ++_j) \
305  { \
306  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF( \
307  "a[%i]: %i; b[%i]: %i\n", \
308  _j, \
309  static_cast<int>(a[_j]), \
310  _j, static_cast<int>(b[_j])); \
311  } \
312  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "The vectors do not match."); \
313  }
314 
315  #define EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(a,b) \
316  if (a) \
317  {\
318  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, b); \
319  }
320 
321  #define epiexception(a) std::logic_error
322 #else
323  #define EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF(fmt, ...)
324  #define EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(fmt, ...)
325  #define EPI_DEBUG_NOTIFY_ACTIVE()
326  #define EPI_DEBUG_ALL_NON_NEGATIVE(vect)
327  #define EPI_DEBUG_SUM_DBL(vect, num)
328  #define EPI_DEBUG_SUM_INT(vect, num)
329  #define EPI_DEBUG_VECTOR_MATCH_INT(a, b, c)
330  #define EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(a, b) \
331  if (a) \
332  return false;
333  #define epiexception(a) a
334 #endif
335 
336 #if defined(EPI_DEBUG_NO_THREAD_ID) || (!defined(__OPENMP) && !defined(_OPENMP))
337  #define EPI_GET_THREAD_ID() 0
338 #else
339  #define EPI_GET_THREAD_ID() omp_get_thread_num()
340 #endif
341 
342 #endif

372  std::shared_ptr<epiworld::Virus< tseq >> v, \

383  epiworld::Agent<tseq> * p, \
384  std::shared_ptr<epiworld::Virus<tseq>> v, \

431  [](epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p, \
432  epiworld::Virus<TSeq> & v, \
433  epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m) -> epiworld_double
434 
435 #define EPI_RUNIF() m->runif()

437 #define EPIWORLD_RUN(a) \
438  if (a.get_verbose()) \
439  { \
440  printf_epiworld("Running the model...\n");\
441  } \
442  for (epiworld_fast_uint niter = 0; niter < a.get_ndays(); ++niter)
443 
444 #define EPI_TOKENPASTE(a,b) a ## b
445 #define MPAR(num) *(m->EPI_TOKENPASTE(p,num))

448  (funname)(epiworld::Agent<tseq> * p, epiworld::Model<tseq> * m)

469 // Use this to make it more efficient for storage if the type is small
470 // and the pointer is not needed
471 #define EPI_TYPENAME_TRAITS(tseq, bound) typename std::conditional< \
472  sizeof( tseq ) <= sizeof( bound ), \
473  tseq, \
474  std::shared_ptr< tseq > \
475  >::type
476 
477 #define EPI_IF_TSEQ_LESS_EQ_INT(tseq) \
478  if constexpr (sizeof( tseq ) <= sizeof( int ))
479 
480 #define EPI_CHECK_COALESCE(proposed_, virus_tool_, alt_) \
481  if (static_cast<int>(proposed_) == -99) {\
482  if (static_cast<int>(virus_tool_) == -99) \
483  (proposed_) = (alt_);\
484  else (proposed_) = (virus_tool_);}
485 
486 #endif

506 #ifndef EPIWORLD_MISC_HPP
507 #define EPIWORLD_MISC_HPP
508 
509 template<typename TSeq>
510 class Model;
511 
512 template<typename TSeq>
513 class Agent;
514 
515 // Relevant for anything using vecHasher function ------------------------------
520 template <typename T>
521 struct vecHasher {
522  std::size_t operator()(std::vector< T > const& dat) const noexcept {
523 
524  std::hash< T > hasher;
525  std::size_t hash = hasher(dat[0u]);
526 
527  // ^ makes bitwise XOR
528  // 0x9e3779b9 is a 32 bit constant (comes from the golden ratio)
529  // << is a shift operator, something like lhs * 2^(rhs)
530  if (dat.size() > 1u)
531  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 1u; i < dat.size(); ++i)
532  hash ^= hasher(dat[i]) + 0x9e3779b9 + (hash<<6) + (hash>>2);
533 
534  return hash;
535 
536  }
537 };
538 
539 template<typename Ta = epiworld_double, typename Tb = epiworld_fast_uint>
540 using MapVec_type = std::unordered_map< std::vector< Ta >, Tb, vecHasher<Ta>>;
541 
554 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
555 inline TSeq default_sequence(int seq_count);
556 
557 // Making it 'static' so that we don't have problems when including the
558 // header. This is important during the linkage, e.g., in R.
559 // See https://en.cppreference.com/w/cpp/language/storage_duration#Linkage
560 // static int _n_sequences_created = 0;
561 
562 template<>
563 inline bool default_sequence(int seq_count) {
564 
565  if (seq_count == 2)
566  throw std::logic_error("Maximum number of sequence created.");
567 
568  return seq_count++ ? false : true;
569 }
570 
571 template<>
572 inline int default_sequence(int seq_count) {
573  return seq_count++;
574 }
575 
576 template<>
577 inline epiworld_double default_sequence(int seq_count) {
578  return static_cast<epiworld_double>(seq_count++);
579 }
580 
581 template<>
582 inline std::vector<bool> default_sequence(int seq_count) {
583 
584  if (seq_count == 2)
585  throw std::logic_error("Maximum number of sequence created.");
586 
587  return {seq_count++ ? false : true};
588 }
589 
590 template<>
591 inline std::vector<int> default_sequence(int seq_count) {
592  return {seq_count++};
593 }
594 
595 template<>
596 inline std::vector<epiworld_double> default_sequence(int seq_count) {
597  return {static_cast<epiworld_double>(seq_count++)};
598 }
600 
609 template<typename Ta>
610 inline bool IN(const Ta & a, const std::vector< Ta > & b) noexcept
611 {
612  for (const auto & i : b)
613  if (a == i)
614  return true;
615 
616  return false;
617 }
618 
632 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ, typename TDbl = epiworld_double >
633 inline int roulette(
634  const std::vector< TDbl > & probs,
635  Model<TSeq> * m
636  )
637 {
638 
639  // Step 1: Computing the prob on none
640  TDbl p_none = 1.0;
641  std::vector< int > certain_infection;
642  certain_infection.reserve(probs.size());
643 
644  for (epiworld_fast_uint p = 0u; p < probs.size(); ++p)
645  {
646  p_none *= (1.0 - probs[p]);
647 
648  if (probs[p] > (1 - 1e-100))
649  certain_infection.push_back(p);
650 
651  }
652 
653  TDbl r = static_cast<TDbl>(m->runif());
654  // If there are one or more probs that go close to 1, sample
655  // uniformly
656  if (certain_infection.size() > 0)
657  return certain_infection[std::floor(r * certain_infection.size())];
658 
659  // Step 2: Calculating the prob of none or single
660  std::vector< TDbl > probs_only_p(probs.size());
661  TDbl p_none_or_single = p_none;
662  for (epiworld_fast_uint p = 0u; p < probs.size(); ++p)
663  {
664  probs_only_p[p] = probs[p] * (p_none / (1.0 - probs[p]));
665  p_none_or_single += probs_only_p[p];
666  }
667 
668  // Step 3: Roulette
669  TDbl cumsum = p_none/p_none_or_single;
670  if (r < cumsum)
671  {
672  return -1;
673  }
674 
675  for (epiworld_fast_uint p = 0u; p < probs.size(); ++p)
676  {
677  // If it yield here, then bingo, the individual will acquire the disease
678  cumsum += probs_only_p[p]/(p_none_or_single);
679  if (r < cumsum)
680  return static_cast<int>(p);
681 
682  }
683 
684 
685  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
686  printf_epiworld("[epi-debug] roulette::cumsum = %.4f\n", cumsum);
687  #endif
688 
689  return static_cast<int>(probs.size() - 1u);
690 
691 }
692 
693 template<typename TSeq>
694 inline int roulette(std::vector< double > & probs, Model<TSeq> * m)
695 {
696  return roulette<TSeq, double>(probs, m);
697 }
698 
699 template<typename TSeq>
700 inline int roulette(std::vector< float > & probs, Model<TSeq> * m)
701 {
702  return roulette<TSeq, float>(probs, m);
703 }
704 
705 
706 template<typename TSeq>
707 inline int roulette(
708  epiworld_fast_uint nelements,
709  Model<TSeq> * m
710  )
711 {
712 
713  if ((nelements * 2) > m->array_double_tmp.size())
714  {
715  throw std::logic_error(
716  "Trying to sample from more data than there is in roulette!" +
717  std::to_string(nelements) + " vs " +
718  std::to_string(m->array_double_tmp.size())
719  );
720  }
721 
722  // Step 1: Computing the prob on none
723  epiworld_double p_none = 1.0;
724  epiworld_fast_uint ncertain = 0u;
725  // std::vector< int > certain_infection;
726  for (epiworld_fast_uint p = 0u; p < nelements; ++p)
727  {
728  p_none *= (1.0 - m->array_double_tmp[p]);
729 
730  if (m->array_double_tmp[p] > (1 - 1e-100))
731  m->array_double_tmp[nelements + ncertain++] = p;
732  // certain_infection.push_back(p);
733 
734  }
735 
736  epiworld_double r = m->runif();
737  // If there are one or more probs that go close to 1, sample
738  // uniformly
739  if (ncertain > 0u)
740  return m->array_double_tmp[nelements + std::floor(ncertain * r)]; // certain_infection[std::floor(r * certain_infection.size())];
741 
742  // Step 2: Calculating the prob of none or single
743  // std::vector< epiworld_double > probs_only_p;
744  epiworld_double p_none_or_single = p_none;
745  for (epiworld_fast_uint p = 0u; p < nelements; ++p)
746  {
747  m->array_double_tmp[nelements + p] =
748  m->array_double_tmp[p] * (p_none / (1.0 - m->array_double_tmp[p]));
749  p_none_or_single += m->array_double_tmp[nelements + p];
750  }
751 
752  // Step 3: Roulette
753  epiworld_double cumsum = p_none/p_none_or_single;
754  if (r < cumsum)
755  return -1;
756 
757  for (epiworld_fast_uint p = 0u; p < nelements; ++p)
758  {
759  // If it yield here, then bingo, the individual will acquire the disease
760  cumsum += m->array_double_tmp[nelements + p]/(p_none_or_single);
761  if (r < cumsum)
762  return static_cast<int>(p);
763 
764  }
765 
766  return static_cast<int>(nelements - 1u);
767 
768 }
769 
786 template <typename T>
787 inline std::map< std::string, T > read_yaml(std::string fn)
788 {
789 
790  std::ifstream paramsfile(fn);
791 
792  if (!paramsfile)
793  throw std::logic_error("The file " + fn + " was not found.");
794 
795  std::regex pattern("^([^:]+)\\s*[:]\\s*([-]?[0-9]+|[-]?[0-9]*\\.[0-9]+)?\\s*$");
796 
797  std::string line;
798  std::smatch match;
799  auto empty = std::sregex_iterator();
800 
801  // Making room
802  std::map<std::string, T> parameters;
803 
804  while (std::getline(paramsfile, line))
805  {
806 
807  // Is it a comment or an empty line?
808  if (std::regex_match(line, std::regex("^([*].+|//.+|#.+|\\s*)$")))
809  continue;
810 
811  // Finding the pattern, if it doesn't match, then error
812  std::regex_match(line, match, pattern);
813 
814  if (match.empty())
815  throw std::logic_error("Line has invalid format:\n" + line);
816 
817  // Capturing the number
818  std::string anumber = match[2u].str() + match[3u].str();
819  T tmp_num = static_cast<T>(
820  std::strtod(anumber.c_str(), nullptr)
821  );
822 
823  std::string pname = std::regex_replace(
824  match[1u].str(),
825  std::regex("^\\s+|\\s+$"),
826  "");
827 
828  // Adding the parameter to the map
829  parameters[pname] = tmp_num;
830 
831  }
832 
833  return parameters;
834 
835 }
836 
837 #endif
838 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
840 
841  End of -include/epiworld/misc.hpp-
842 
845 
846 
847 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
849 
850  Start of -include/epiworld/progress.hpp-
851 
854 
855 
856 #ifndef EPIWORLD_PROGRESS_HPP
857 #define EPIWORLD_PROGRESS_HPP
858 
859 #ifndef EPIWORLD_PROGRESS_BAR_WIDTH
860 #define EPIWORLD_PROGRESS_BAR_WIDTH 80
861 #endif
862 
866 class Progress {
867 private:
868  int width; ///< Total width size (number of bars)
869  int n; ///< Total number of iterations
870  epiworld_double step_size; ///< Size of the step
871  int last_loc; ///< Last location of the bar
872  int cur_loc; ///< Last location of the bar
873  int i; ///< Current iteration step
874 
875 public:
876  Progress() {};
877  Progress(int n_, int width_);
878  ~Progress() {};
879 
880  void start();
881  void next();
882  void end();
883 
884 };
885 
886 inline Progress::Progress(int n_, int width_) {
887 
888 
889  if (n_ < 0)
890  throw std::invalid_argument("n must be greater or equal than 0.");
891 
892  if (width_ <= 0)
893  throw std::invalid_argument("width must be greater than 0");
894 
895  width = std::max(7, width_ - 7);
896  n = n_;
897  step_size = n == 0? width : static_cast<epiworld_double>(width)/
898  static_cast<epiworld_double>(n);
899  last_loc = 0;
900  i = 0;
901 
902 }
903 
904 inline void Progress::start()
905 {
906 
907  #ifndef EPI_DEBUG
908  for (int j = 0; j < (width); ++j)
909  {
910  printf_epiworld("_");
911  }
912  printf_epiworld("\n");
913  #endif
914 }
915 
916 inline void Progress::next() {
917 
918  if (i == 0)
919  start();
920 
921  cur_loc = std::floor((++i) * step_size);
922 
923  #ifndef EPI_DEBUG
924  for (int j = 0; j < (cur_loc - last_loc); ++j)
925  {
926  printf_epiworld("|");
927  }
928  #endif
929 
930  last_loc = cur_loc;
931 
932 }
933 
934 inline void Progress::end() {
935 
936  #ifndef EPI_DEBUG
937  printf_epiworld(" done.\n");
938  #endif
939 
940 }
941 
942 #endif
943 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
945 
946  End of -include/epiworld/progress.hpp-
947 
950 
951 
952 
953 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
955 
956  Start of -include/epiworld/modeldiagram-bones.hpp-
957 
960 
961 
962 #ifndef EPIWORLD_MODELDIAGRAM_HPP
963 #define EPIWORLD_MODELDIAGRAM_HPP
964 
965 enum class DiagramType {
966  Mermaid, DOT
967 };
968 
969 class ModelDiagram {
970 private:
971 
972  std::map< std::pair< std::string, std::string >, int > data;
973  std::vector< std::string > states;
974  std::vector< epiworld_double > tprob;
975 
976  void draw_mermaid(std::string fn_output, bool self);
977  void draw_dot(std::string fn_output, bool self);
978 
979  void draw(
980  DiagramType diagram_type,
981  std::string fn_output = "",
982  bool self = false
983  );
984 
985 
986  int n_runs = 0; ///< The number of runs included in the diagram.
987 
1007  void read_transitions(
1008  const std::string & fn_transition
1009  );
1010 
1018  void read_transitions(
1019  const std::vector< std::string > & fns_transition
1020  );
1021 
1028  void transition_probability(bool normalize = true);
1029 
1030  void clear();
1031 
1032 public:
1033 
1034  ModelDiagram() {};
1035 
1036  void draw_from_data(
1037  DiagramType diagram_type,
1038  const std::vector< std::string > & states,
1039  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & tprob,
1040  const std::string & fn_output = "",
1041  bool self = false
1042  );
1043 
1044  void draw_from_file(
1045  DiagramType diagram_type,
1046  const std::string & fn_transition,
1047  const std::string & fn_output = "",
1048  bool self = false
1049  );
1050 
1051  void draw_from_files(
1052  DiagramType diagram_type,
1053  const std::vector< std::string > & fns_transition,
1054  const std::string & fn_output = "",
1055  bool self = false
1056  );
1057 
1058 };
1059 
1060 #endif
1061 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1063 
1064  End of -include/epiworld/modeldiagram-bones.hpp-
1065 
1068 
1069 
1070 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1072 
1073  Start of -include/epiworld/modeldiagram-meat.hpp-
1074 
1077 
1078 
1079 #ifndef EPIWORLD_MODELDIAGRAM_MEAT_HPP
1080 #define EPIWORLD_MODELDIAGRAM_MEAT_HPP
1081 
1082 inline void ModelDiagram::read_transitions(
1083  const std::string & fn_transition
1084 ) {
1085 
1086  // Checking if the file exists
1087  std::ifstream file(fn_transition);
1088 
1089  if (!file.is_open())
1090  throw std::runtime_error(
1091  "Could not open the file '" +
1092  fn_transition + "' for reading."
1093  );
1094 
1095  // Reading the data
1096  std::string line;
1097  int i = 0;
1098  while (std::getline(file, line))
1099  {
1100 
1101  // Skipping the first line
1102  if (i++ == 0)
1103  continue;
1104 
1105  std::istringstream iss(line);
1106  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
1107  int t;
1108  iss >> t;
1109  #endif
1110 
1111  int i_;
1112  std::string from_, to_;
1113  int counts_;
1114 
1115  iss >> i_;
1116 
1117  // Read the quoted strings
1118  iss >> std::quoted(from_) >> std::quoted(to_);
1119 
1120  // Read the integer
1121  iss >> counts_;
1122 
1123  if (counts_ > 0)
1124  {
1125  auto idx = std::make_pair(from_, to_);
1126  if (data.find(idx) == data.end())
1127  data[idx] = counts_;
1128  else
1129  data[idx] += counts_;
1130  }
1131 
1132  }
1133 
1134  // Incrementing the number of runs
1135  this->n_runs++;
1136 
1137 }
1138 
1139 inline void ModelDiagram::read_transitions(
1140  const std::vector< std::string > & fns_transition
1141 )
1142 {
1143 
1144  for (const auto & fn: fns_transition)
1145  this->read_transitions(fn);
1146 
1147  return;
1148 
1149 }
1150 
1151 inline void ModelDiagram::transition_probability(
1152  bool normalize
1153 )
1154 {
1155 
1156  // Generating the map of states
1157  std::set< std::string > states_set;
1158 
1159  for (const auto & d: data)
1160  {
1161  states_set.insert(d.first.first);
1162  states_set.insert(d.first.second);
1163  }
1164 
1165  // Generating the transition matrix
1166  states = std::vector< std::string >(states_set.begin(), states_set.end());
1167  size_t n_states = states.size();
1168  tprob.resize(n_states * n_states);
1169  std::fill(tprob.begin(), tprob.end(), 0.0);
1170 
1171  std::vector< epiworld_double > rowsum(n_states, 0.0);
1172  for (size_t i = 0; i < n_states; ++i)
1173  {
1174 
1175  for (size_t j = 0; j < n_states; ++j)
1176  {
1177 
1178  auto key = std::make_pair(states[i], states[j]);
1179  if (data.find(key) != data.end())
1180  tprob[i + j * n_states] = static_cast<epiworld_double>(
1181  data[key]
1182  );
1183 
1184  if (normalize)
1185  rowsum[i] += tprob[i + j * n_states];
1186 
1187  }
1188 
1189  if (normalize)
1190  {
1191  for (size_t j = 0; j < n_states; ++j)
1192  tprob[i + j * n_states] /= rowsum[i];
1193  }
1194 
1195  }
1196 
1197  return;
1198 
1199 
1200 }
1201 
1202 inline void ModelDiagram::clear()
1203 {
1204  data.clear();
1205  states.clear();
1206  tprob.clear();
1207  n_runs = 0;
1208  return;
1209 }
1210 
1211 inline void ModelDiagram::draw_mermaid(
1212  std::string fn_output,
1213  bool self
1214 ) {
1215  // Getting a sorting vector of indices from the states
1216  // string vector
1217  std::vector< size_t > idx(states.size());
1218  std::iota(idx.begin(), idx.end(), 0u);
1219 
1220  std::sort(
1221  idx.begin(),
1222  idx.end(),
1223  [&states = this->states](size_t i, size_t j) {
1224  return states[i] < states[j];
1225  }
1226  );
1227 
1228  std::vector< std::string > states_ids;
1229  for (size_t i = 0u; i < states.size(); ++i)
1230  states_ids.push_back("s" + std::to_string(i));
1231 
1232  std::string graph = "flowchart LR\n";
1233 
1234  // Declaring the states
1235  for (size_t i = 0u; i < states.size(); ++i)
1236  {
1237  graph += "\t" + states_ids[i] + "[" + states[idx[i]] + "]\n";
1238  }
1239 
1240  // Adding the transitions
1241  size_t n_states = states.size();
1242  for (size_t i = 0u; i < states.size(); ++i)
1243  {
1244  for (size_t j = 0u; j < states.size(); ++j)
1245  {
1246  if (!self && i == j)
1247  continue;
1248 
1249  if (tprob[idx[i] + idx[j] * n_states] > 0.0)
1250  {
1251  graph += "\t" + states_ids[i] + " -->|" +
1252  std::to_string(tprob[idx[i] + idx[j] * n_states]) +
1253  "| " + states_ids[j] + "\n";
1254  }
1255  }
1256  }
1257 
1258  if (fn_output != "")
1259  {
1260  std::ofstream file(fn_output);
1261 
1262  if (!file.is_open())
1263  throw std::runtime_error(
1264  "Could not open the file " +
1265  fn_output +
1266  " for writing."
1267  );
1268 
1269  file << graph;
1270  file.close();
1271 
1272  } else {
1273  printf_epiworld("%s\n", graph.c_str());
1274  }
1275 
1276  return;
1277 }
1278 
1279 inline void ModelDiagram::draw_dot(std::string fn_output, bool self) {
1280  std::vector<size_t> idx(states.size());
1281  std::iota(idx.begin(), idx.end(), 0u);
1282 
1283  std::sort(
1284  idx.begin(),
1285  idx.end(),
1286  [&states = this->states](size_t i, size_t j) {
1287  return states[i] < states[j];
1288  }
1289  );
1290 
1291  std::vector<std::string> states_ids;
1292  for (size_t i = 0u; i < states.size(); ++i)
1293  states_ids.push_back("s" + std::to_string(i));
1294 
1295  std::string graph = "digraph G {\n\trankdir=LR;\n";
1296 
1297  // Declaring the states
1298  for (size_t i = 0u; i < states.size(); ++i)
1299  {
1300  graph += "\t" + states_ids[i] + " [label=\"" + states[idx[i]] + "\"];\n";
1301  }
1302 
1303  // Adding the transitions
1304  size_t n_states = states.size();
1305  for (size_t i = 0u; i < states.size(); ++i)
1306  {
1307  for (size_t j = 0u; j < states.size(); ++j)
1308  {
1309  if (!self && i == j)
1310  continue;
1311 
1312  if (tprob[idx[i] + idx[j] * n_states] > 0.0)
1313  {
1314  graph += "\t" + states_ids[i] + " -> " + states_ids[j] +
1315  " [label=\"" +
1316  std::to_string(tprob[idx[i] + idx[j] * n_states]) +
1317  "\"];\n";
1318  }
1319  }
1320  }
1321 
1322  graph += "}\n";
1323 
1324  if (fn_output != "")
1325  {
1326  std::ofstream file(fn_output);
1327 
1328  if (!file.is_open())
1329  throw std::runtime_error(
1330  "Could not open the file " +
1331  fn_output +
1332  " for writing."
1333  );
1334 
1335  file << graph;
1336  file.close();
1337 
1338  } else {
1339  printf_epiworld("%s\n", graph.c_str());
1340  }
1341 
1342  return;
1343 }
1344 
1345 inline void ModelDiagram::draw(
1346  DiagramType diagram_type,
1347  std::string fn_output,
1348  bool self
1349 )
1350 {
1351  switch (diagram_type) {
1352  case DiagramType::Mermaid:
1353  return draw_mermaid(fn_output, self);
1354  case DiagramType::DOT:
1355  return draw_dot(fn_output, self);
1356  default:
1357  throw std::logic_error("Unknown how to dispatch DiagramType.");
1358  }
1359 }
1360 
1361 inline void ModelDiagram::draw_from_file(
1362  DiagramType diagram_type,
1363  const std::string & fn_transition,
1364  const std::string & fn_output,
1365  bool self
1366 ) {
1367 
1368  this->clear();
1369 
1370  // Loading the transition file
1371  this->read_transitions(fn_transition);
1372 
1373  // Computing the transition probability
1374  this->transition_probability();
1375 
1376  // Actually drawing the diagram
1377  this->draw(diagram_type, fn_output, self);
1378 
1379  return;
1380 
1381 }
1382 
1383 inline void ModelDiagram::draw_from_files(
1384  DiagramType diagram_type,
1385  const std::vector< std::string > & fns_transition,
1386  const std::string & fn_output,
1387  bool self
1388 ) {
1389 
1390  this->clear();
1391 
1392  // Loading the transition files
1393  this->read_transitions(fns_transition);
1394 
1395  // Computing the transition probability
1396  this->transition_probability();
1397 
1398  // Actually drawing the diagram
1399  this->draw(diagram_type, fn_output, self);
1400 
1401  return;
1402 }
1403 
1404 inline void ModelDiagram::draw_from_data(
1405  DiagramType diagram_type,
1406  const std::vector< std::string > & states,
1407  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & tprob,
1408  const std::string & fn_output,
1409  bool self
1410 ) {
1411 
1412  this->clear();
1413 
1414  this->states = states;
1415  this->tprob = tprob;
1416 
1417  this->draw(diagram_type, fn_output, self);
1418 
1419  return;
1420 
1421 }
1422 
1423 #endif
1424 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1426 
1427  End of -include/epiworld/modeldiagram-meat.hpp-
1428 
1431 
1432 
1433 
1434 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1436 
1437  Start of -include/epiworld/math/distributions.hpp-
1438 
1441 
1442 
1443 #ifndef EPIWORLD_MATH_DISTRIBUTIONS_HPP
1444 #define EPIWORLD_MATH_DISTRIBUTIONS_HPP
1445 
1446 // Implementing the factorial function
1454 inline double log_factorial(int n)
1455 {
1456  if (n == 0)
1457  return 0.0;
1458  return std::log(static_cast<double>(n)) + log_factorial(n-1);
1459 }
1460 
1471 inline double dpois(
1472  int k,
1473  double lambda,
1474  int max_n = 100,
1475  bool as_log = false
1476  )
1477 {
1478 
1479  if (max_n < k)
1480  throw std::runtime_error("max_n must be greater than k");
1481 
1482  double res = k * std::log(lambda) - lambda - log_factorial(
1483  std::min(k, max_n)
1484  );
1485 
1486  return as_log ? res : std::exp(res);
1487 }
1488 
1509 inline double dgenint(
1510  int g,
1511  double S,
1512  double p_c,
1513  double p_i,
1514  double p_r,
1515  double & p_0_approx,
1516  double & normalizing,
1517  int max_contacts = 200,
1518  int max_days = 200
1519  ) {
1520 
1521  if ((g < 1) || (g > max_days))
1522  return 0.0;
1523 
1524  if (p_0_approx < 0.0)
1525  {
1526 
1527  p_0_approx = 0.0;
1528  for (int i = 0; i < max_contacts; ++i)
1529  {
1530 
1531  p_0_approx += std::exp(
1532  dpois(i, S * p_c, max_contacts, true) +
1533  std::log(1.0 - p_i) * static_cast<double>(i)
1534  );
1535 
1536  }
1537  }
1538 
1539  double g_dbl = static_cast<double>(g);
1540 
1541  if (normalizing < 0.0)
1542  {
1543 
1544  normalizing = 1.0;
1545  double log1_p_r = std::log(1.0 - p_r);
1546  double log_p_r = std::log(p_r);
1547  double log_p_0_approx = std::log(p_0_approx);
1548  for (int i = 1; i <= max_days; ++i)
1549  {
1550 
1551  double i_dbl = static_cast<double>(i);
1552 
1553  normalizing -= std::exp(
1554  log1_p_r * (i_dbl - 1.0) +
1555  log_p_r +
1556  log_p_0_approx * (i_dbl - 1.0)
1557  );
1558  }
1559 
1560  }
1561 
1562 
1563  return std::exp(
1564  std::log(1 - p_r) * (g_dbl)+
1565  std::log(p_0_approx) * (g_dbl - 1.0) +
1566  std::log(1.0 - p_0_approx) -
1567  std::log(normalizing)
1568  );
1569 
1570 }
1571 
1572 // Mean of the generation interval
1584 inline double gen_int_mean(
1585  double S,
1586  double p_c,
1587  double p_i,
1588  double p_r,
1589  int max_days = 200,
1590  int max_n = 200
1591  ) {
1592 
1593  double mean = 0.0;
1594  double p_0_approx = -1.0;
1595  double normalizing = -1.0;
1596  for (int i = 1; i < max_days; ++i)
1597  {
1598  mean +=
1599  static_cast<double>(i) *
1600  dgenint(
1601  i, S, p_c, p_i, p_r, p_0_approx, normalizing, max_n, max_days
1602  );
1603 
1604  }
1605 
1606  return mean;
1607 
1608 }
1609 
1610 #endif
1611 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1613 
1614  End of -include/epiworld/math/distributions.hpp-
1615 
1618 
1619 
1620 
1621 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1623 
1624  Start of -include/epiworld/math/lfmcmc.hpp-
1625 
1628 
1629 
1630 #ifndef EPIWORLD_LFMCMC_HPP
1631 #define EPIWORLD_LFMCMC_HPP
1632 
1633 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1635 
1636  Start of -include/epiworld//math/lfmcmc/lfmcmc-bones.hpp-
1637 
1640 
1641 
1642 #ifndef EPIWORLD_LFMCMC_BONES_HPP
1643 #define EPIWORLD_LFMCMC_BONES_HPP
1644 
1645 #ifndef epiworld_double
1646  #define epiworld_double float
1647 #endif
1648 
1649 
1650 template<typename TData>
1651 class LFMCMC;
1652 
1653 template<typename TData>
1654 using LFMCMCSimFun = std::function<TData(const std::vector< epiworld_double >&,LFMCMC<TData>*)>;
1655 
1656 template<typename TData>
1657 using LFMCMCSummaryFun = std::function<void(std::vector< epiworld_double >&,const TData&,LFMCMC<TData>*)>;
1658 
1659 template<typename TData>
1660 using LFMCMCProposalFun = std::function<void(std::vector< epiworld_double >&,const std::vector< epiworld_double >&,LFMCMC<TData>*)>;
1661 
1662 template<typename TData>
1663 using LFMCMCKernelFun = std::function<epiworld_double(const std::vector< epiworld_double >&,const std::vector< epiworld_double >&,epiworld_double,LFMCMC<TData>*)>;
1664 
1672 template<typename TData>
1673 inline void proposal_fun_normal(
1674  std::vector< epiworld_double >& new_params,
1675  const std::vector< epiworld_double >& old_params,
1676  LFMCMC<TData>* m
1677 );
1678 
1691 template<typename TData>
1692 inline LFMCMCProposalFun<TData> make_proposal_norm_reflective(
1693  epiworld_double scale,
1694  epiworld_double lb = std::numeric_limits<epiworld_double>::min(),
1695  epiworld_double ub = std::numeric_limits<epiworld_double>::max()
1696 );
1697

1710 inline void proposal_fun_unif(
1711  std::vector< epiworld_double >& new_params,
1712  const std::vector< epiworld_double >& old_params,
1713  LFMCMC<TData>* m
1714 );

1727 inline epiworld_double kernel_fun_uniform(
1728  const std::vector< epiworld_double >& simulated_stats,
1729  const std::vector< epiworld_double >& observed_stats,
1730  epiworld_double epsilon,
1731  LFMCMC<TData>* m
1732 );
1733 
1745 template<typename TData>
1746 inline epiworld_double kernel_fun_gaussian(
1747  const std::vector< epiworld_double >& simulated_stats,
1748  const std::vector< epiworld_double >& observed_stats,
1749  epiworld_double epsilon,
1750  LFMCMC<TData>* m
1751 );
1752 
1758 template<typename TData>
1759 class LFMCMC {
1760 private:
1761 
1762  // Random number sampling
1763  std::shared_ptr< std::mt19937 > m_engine = nullptr;
1764 
1765  std::shared_ptr< std::uniform_real_distribution<> > runifd =
1766  std::make_shared< std::uniform_real_distribution<> >(0.0, 1.0);
1767 
1768  std::shared_ptr< std::normal_distribution<> > rnormd =
1769  std::make_shared< std::normal_distribution<> >(0.0);
1770 
1771  std::shared_ptr< std::gamma_distribution<> > rgammad =
1772  std::make_shared< std::gamma_distribution<> >();
1773 
1774  // Process data
1775  TData m_observed_data;
1776  std::vector< TData > * m_simulated_data = nullptr;
1777 
1778  // Information about the size of the process
1779  size_t m_n_samples;
1780  size_t m_n_stats;
1781  size_t m_n_params;
1782 
1783  epiworld_double m_epsilon;
1784 
1785  std::vector< epiworld_double > m_initial_params; ///< Initial parameters
1786  std::vector< epiworld_double > m_current_proposed_params; ///< Proposed parameters for the next sample
1787  std::vector< epiworld_double > m_current_accepted_params; ///< Most recently accepted parameters (current state of MCMC)
1788  std::vector< epiworld_double > m_current_proposed_stats; ///< Statistics from simulation run with proposed parameters
1789  std::vector< epiworld_double > m_current_accepted_stats; ///< Statistics from simulation run with most recently accepted params
1790 
1791  std::vector< epiworld_double > m_observed_stats; ///< Observed statistics
1792 
1793  std::vector< epiworld_double > m_all_sample_params; ///< Parameter samples
1794  std::vector< epiworld_double > m_all_sample_stats; ///< Statistic samples
1795  std::vector< bool > m_all_sample_acceptance; ///< Indicator if sample was accepted
1796  std::vector< epiworld_double > m_all_sample_drawn_prob; ///< Drawn probabilities (runif()) for each sample
1797  std::vector< epiworld_double > m_all_sample_kernel_scores; ///< Kernel scores for each sample
1798 
1799  std::vector< epiworld_double > m_all_accepted_params; ///< Posterior distribution of parameters from accepted samples
1800  std::vector< epiworld_double > m_all_accepted_stats; ///< Posterior distribution of statistics from accepted samples
1801  std::vector< epiworld_double > m_all_accepted_kernel_scores; ///< Kernel scores for each accepted sample
1802 
1803  // Functions
1804  LFMCMCSimFun<TData> m_simulation_fun;
1805  LFMCMCSummaryFun<TData> m_summary_fun;
1806  LFMCMCProposalFun<TData> m_proposal_fun = proposal_fun_normal<TData>;
1807  LFMCMCKernelFun<TData> m_kernel_fun = kernel_fun_uniform<TData>;
1808 
1809  // Misc
1810  std::vector< std::string > m_param_names;
1811  std::vector< std::string > m_stat_names;
1812 
1813  std::chrono::time_point<std::chrono::steady_clock> m_start_time;
1814  std::chrono::time_point<std::chrono::steady_clock> m_end_time;
1815 
1816  // Timing
1817  // std::chrono::milliseconds
1818  std::chrono::duration<epiworld_double,std::micro> m_elapsed_time =
1819  std::chrono::duration<epiworld_double,std::micro>::zero();
1820 
1821  inline void get_elapsed_time(
1822  std::string unit,
1823  epiworld_double * last_elapsed,
1824  std::string * unit_abbr,
1825  bool print
1826  ) const;
1827 
1828  void chrono_start();
1829  void chrono_end();
1830 
1831  // Progress
1832  bool verbose = true;
1833  Progress progress_bar;
1834 
1835 public:
1836 
1837  void run(
1838  std::vector< epiworld_double > params_init_,
1839  size_t n_samples_,
1840  epiworld_double epsilon_,
1841  int seed = -1
1842  );
1843 
1844  LFMCMC() {};
1845  LFMCMC(const TData & observed_data_) : m_observed_data(observed_data_) {};
1846  ~LFMCMC() {};
1847 
1848  // Setting LFMCMC variables
1849  void set_observed_data(const TData & observed_data_) {m_observed_data = observed_data_;};
1850 
1851  void set_proposal_fun(LFMCMCProposalFun<TData> fun);
1852  void set_simulation_fun(LFMCMCSimFun<TData> fun);
1853  void set_summary_fun(LFMCMCSummaryFun<TData> fun);
1854  void set_kernel_fun(LFMCMCKernelFun<TData> fun);
1855 
1856  void set_params_names(std::vector< std::string > names);
1857  void set_stats_names(std::vector< std::string > names);
1858 
1865  void set_rand_engine(std::shared_ptr< std::mt19937 > & eng);
1866  std::shared_ptr< std::mt19937 > & get_rand_endgine();
1867  void seed(epiworld_fast_uint s);
1868  void set_rand_gamma(epiworld_double alpha, epiworld_double beta);
1869  epiworld_double runif();
1870  epiworld_double rnorm();
1871  epiworld_double rgamma();
1872  epiworld_double runif(epiworld_double lb, epiworld_double ub);
1873  epiworld_double rnorm(epiworld_double mean, epiworld_double sd);
1874  epiworld_double rgamma(epiworld_double alpha, epiworld_double beta);
1876 
1877  // Accessing parameters of the function
1878  size_t get_n_samples() const {return m_n_samples;};
1879  size_t get_n_stats() const {return m_n_stats;};
1880  size_t get_n_params() const {return m_n_params;};
1881  epiworld_double get_epsilon() const {return m_epsilon;};
1882 
1883  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_initial_params() const {return m_initial_params;};
1884  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_current_proposed_params() const {return m_current_proposed_params;};
1885  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_current_accepted_params() const {return m_current_accepted_params;};
1886  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_current_proposed_stats() const {return m_current_proposed_stats;};
1887  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_current_accepted_stats() const {return m_current_accepted_stats;};
1888 
1889  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_observed_stats() const {return m_observed_stats;};
1890 
1891  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_all_sample_params() const {return m_all_sample_params;};
1892  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_all_sample_stats() const {return m_all_sample_stats;};
1893  const std::vector< bool > & get_all_sample_acceptance() const {return m_all_sample_acceptance;};
1894  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_all_sample_drawn_prob() const {return m_all_sample_drawn_prob;};
1895  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_all_sample_kernel_scores() const {return m_all_sample_kernel_scores;};
1896 
1897  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_all_accepted_params() const {return m_all_accepted_params;};
1898  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_all_accepted_stats() const {return m_all_accepted_stats;};
1899  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_all_accepted_kernel_scores() const {return m_all_accepted_kernel_scores;};
1900 
1901  std::vector< TData > * get_simulated_data() const {return m_simulated_data;};
1902 
1903  std::vector< epiworld_double > get_mean_params();
1904  std::vector< epiworld_double > get_mean_stats();
1905 
1906  // Printing
1907  LFMCMC<TData> & verbose_off();
1908  LFMCMC<TData> & verbose_on();
1909  void print(size_t burnin = 0u) const;
1910 
1911 };
1912 
1913 #endif

2060 template<typename TData>
2061 class LFMCMC {
2062 private:
2063 
2064  // Random number sampling
2065  std::shared_ptr< std::mt19937 > m_engine = nullptr;
2066 
2067  std::shared_ptr< std::uniform_real_distribution<> > runifd =
2068  std::make_shared< std::uniform_real_distribution<> >(0.0, 1.0);
2069 
2070  std::shared_ptr< std::normal_distribution<> > rnormd =
2071  std::make_shared< std::normal_distribution<> >(0.0);
2072 
2073  std::shared_ptr< std::gamma_distribution<> > rgammad =
2074  std::make_shared< std::gamma_distribution<> >();
2075 
2076  // Process data
2077  TData m_observed_data;
2078  std::vector< TData > * m_simulated_data = nullptr;
2079 
2080  // Information about the size of the process
2081  size_t m_n_samples;
2082  size_t m_n_stats;
2083  size_t m_n_params;
2084 
2085  epiworld_double m_epsilon;
2086 
2087  std::vector< epiworld_double > m_initial_params; ///< Initial parameters
2088  std::vector< epiworld_double > m_current_proposed_params; ///< Proposed parameters for the next sample
2089  std::vector< epiworld_double > m_current_accepted_params; ///< Most recently accepted parameters (current state of MCMC)
2090  std::vector< epiworld_double > m_current_proposed_stats; ///< Statistics from simulation run with proposed parameters
2091  std::vector< epiworld_double > m_current_accepted_stats; ///< Statistics from simulation run with most recently accepted params
2092 
2093  std::vector< epiworld_double > m_observed_stats; ///< Observed statistics
2094 
2095  std::vector< epiworld_double > m_all_sample_params; ///< Parameter samples
2096  std::vector< epiworld_double > m_all_sample_stats; ///< Statistic samples
2097  std::vector< bool > m_all_sample_acceptance; ///< Indicator if sample was accepted
2098  std::vector< epiworld_double > m_all_sample_drawn_prob; ///< Drawn probabilities (runif()) for each sample
2099  std::vector< epiworld_double > m_all_sample_kernel_scores; ///< Kernel scores for each sample
2100 
2101  std::vector< epiworld_double > m_all_accepted_params; ///< Posterior distribution of parameters from accepted samples
2102  std::vector< epiworld_double > m_all_accepted_stats; ///< Posterior distribution of statistics from accepted samples
2103  std::vector< epiworld_double > m_all_accepted_kernel_scores; ///< Kernel scores for each accepted sample
2104 
2105  // Functions
2106  LFMCMCSimFun<TData> m_simulation_fun;
2107  LFMCMCSummaryFun<TData> m_summary_fun;
2108  LFMCMCProposalFun<TData> m_proposal_fun = proposal_fun_normal<TData>;
2109  LFMCMCKernelFun<TData> m_kernel_fun = kernel_fun_uniform<TData>;
2110 
2111  // Misc
2112  std::vector< std::string > m_param_names;
2113  std::vector< std::string > m_stat_names;
2114 
2115  std::chrono::time_point<std::chrono::steady_clock> m_start_time;
2116  std::chrono::time_point<std::chrono::steady_clock> m_end_time;
2117 
2118  // Timing
2119  // std::chrono::milliseconds
2120  std::chrono::duration<epiworld_double,std::micro> m_elapsed_time =
2121  std::chrono::duration<epiworld_double,std::micro>::zero();
2122 
2123  inline void get_elapsed_time(
2124  std::string unit,
2125  epiworld_double * last_elapsed,
2126  std::string * unit_abbr,
2127  bool print
2128  ) const;
2129

2131  void chrono_end();
2132 
2133  // Progress
2134  bool verbose = true;
2135  Progress progress_bar;
2136 
2137 public:
2138 
2139  void run(
2140  std::vector< epiworld_double > params_init_,
2141  size_t n_samples_,
2142  epiworld_double epsilon_,
2143  int seed = -1
2144  );
2145 
2146  LFMCMC() {};
2147  LFMCMC(const TData & observed_data_) : m_observed_data(observed_data_) {};
2148  ~LFMCMC() {};
2149 
2150  // Setting LFMCMC variables
2151  void set_observed_data(const TData & observed_data_) {m_observed_data = observed_data_;};
2152

2154  void set_simulation_fun(LFMCMCSimFun<TData> fun);
2155  void set_summary_fun(LFMCMCSummaryFun<TData> fun);

2159  void set_stats_names(std::vector< std::string > names);
2160

2168  std::shared_ptr< std::mt19937 > & get_rand_endgine();
2169  void seed(epiworld_fast_uint s);
2170  void set_rand_gamma(epiworld_double alpha, epiworld_double beta);

2172  epiworld_double rnorm();
2173  epiworld_double rgamma();

2175  epiworld_double rnorm(epiworld_double mean, epiworld_double sd);
2176  epiworld_double rgamma(epiworld_double alpha, epiworld_double beta);
2178 
2179  // Accessing parameters of the function
2180  size_t get_n_samples() const {return m_n_samples;};
2181  size_t get_n_stats() const {return m_n_stats;};
2182  size_t get_n_params() const {return m_n_params;};

2187  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_current_accepted_params() const {return m_current_accepted_params;};
2188  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_current_proposed_stats() const {return m_current_proposed_stats;};
2189  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_current_accepted_stats() const {return m_current_accepted_stats;};

2192 
2193  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_all_sample_params() const {return m_all_sample_params;};
2194  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_all_sample_stats() const {return m_all_sample_stats;};
2195  const std::vector< bool > & get_all_sample_acceptance() const {return m_all_sample_acceptance;};
2196  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_all_sample_drawn_prob() const {return m_all_sample_drawn_prob;};
2197  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_all_sample_kernel_scores() const {return m_all_sample_kernel_scores;};
2198 
2199  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_all_accepted_params() const {return m_all_accepted_params;};
2200  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_all_accepted_stats() const {return m_all_accepted_stats;};
2201  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_all_accepted_kernel_scores() const {return m_all_accepted_kernel_scores;};
2202 
2203  std::vector< TData > * get_simulated_data() const {return m_simulated_data;};
2204 
2205  std::vector< epiworld_double > get_mean_params();
2206  std::vector< epiworld_double > get_mean_stats();
2207 
2208  // Printing
2209  LFMCMC<TData> & verbose_off();
2210  LFMCMC<TData> & verbose_on();
2211  void print(size_t burnin = 0u) const;
2212 
2213 };
2214 
2215 #endif
2216 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
2218 
2219  End of -include/epiworld//math//lfmcmc/lfmcmc-bones.hpp-
2220 
2223 
2224 
2225 
2233 template<typename TData>
2234 inline void proposal_fun_normal(
2235  std::vector< epiworld_double >& new_params,
2236  const std::vector< epiworld_double >& old_params,
2237  LFMCMC<TData>* m
2238 ) {
2239 
2240  for (size_t p = 0u; p < m->get_n_params(); ++p)
2241  new_params[p] = old_params[p] + m->rnorm();
2242 
2243  return;
2244 }
2245 
2258 template<typename TData>
2259 inline LFMCMCProposalFun<TData> make_proposal_norm_reflective(
2260  epiworld_double scale,
2261  epiworld_double lb,
2262  epiworld_double ub
2263 ) {
2264 
2265  LFMCMCProposalFun<TData> fun =
2266  [scale,lb,ub](
2267  std::vector< epiworld_double >& new_params,
2268  const std::vector< epiworld_double >& old_params,
2269  LFMCMC<TData>* m
2270  ) {
2271 
2272  // Making the proposal
2273  for (size_t p = 0u; p < m->get_n_params(); ++p)
2274  new_params[p] = old_params[p] + m->rnorm() * scale;
2275 
2276  // Checking boundaries
2277  epiworld_double d = ub - lb;
2278  int odd;
2279  epiworld_double d_above, d_below;
2280  for (auto & p : new_params)
2281  {
2282 
2283  // Correcting if parameter goes above the upper bound
2284  if (p > ub)
2285  {
2286  d_above = p - ub;
2287  odd = static_cast<int>(std::floor(d_above / d)) % 2;
2288  d_above = d_above - std::floor(d_above / d) * d;
2289 
2290  p = (lb + d_above) * odd +
2291  (ub - d_above) * (1 - odd);
2292 
2293  // Correcting if parameter goes below upper bound
2294  } else if (p < lb)
2295  {
2296  d_below = lb - p;
2297  int odd = static_cast<int>(std::floor(d_below / d)) % 2;
2298  d_below = d_below - std::floor(d_below / d) * d;
2299 
2300  p = (ub - d_below) * odd +
2301  (lb + d_below) * (1 - odd);
2302  }
2303 
2304  }
2305 
2306  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
2307  for (auto & p : new_params)
2308  if (p < lb || p > ub)
2309  throw std::range_error("The parameter is out of bounds.");
2310  #endif
2311 
2312 
2313  return;
2314 
2315  };
2316 
2317  return fun;
2318 }
2319 
2331 template<typename TData>
2332 inline void proposal_fun_unif(
2333  std::vector< epiworld_double >& new_params,
2334  const std::vector< epiworld_double >& old_params,
2335  LFMCMC<TData>* m
2336 ) {
2337 
2338  for (size_t p = 0u; p < m->get_n_params(); ++p)
2339  new_params[p] = (old_params[p] + m->runif(-1.0, 1.0));
2340 
2341  return;
2342 }
2343 
2354 template<typename TData>
2355 inline epiworld_double kernel_fun_uniform(
2356  const std::vector< epiworld_double >& simulated_stats,
2357  const std::vector< epiworld_double >& observed_stats,
2358  epiworld_double epsilon,
2359  LFMCMC<TData>* m
2360 ) {
2361 
2362  epiworld_double ans = 0.0;
2363  for (size_t p = 0u; p < m->get_n_params(); ++p)
2364  ans += std::pow(observed_stats[p] - simulated_stats[p], 2.0);
2365 
2366  return std::sqrt(ans) < epsilon ? 1.0 : 0.0;
2367 
2368 }
2369 
2370 #define sqrt2pi() 2.5066282746310002416
2371 
2383 template<typename TData>
2384 inline epiworld_double kernel_fun_gaussian(
2385  const std::vector< epiworld_double >& simulated_stats,
2386  const std::vector< epiworld_double >& observed_stats,
2387  epiworld_double epsilon,
2388  LFMCMC<TData>* m
2389 ) {
2390 
2391  epiworld_double ans = 0.0;
2392  for (size_t p = 0u; p < m->get_n_params(); ++p)
2393  ans += std::pow(observed_stats[p] - simulated_stats[p], 2.0);
2394 
2395  return std::exp(
2396  -.5 * (ans/std::pow(1 + std::pow(epsilon, 2.0)/3.0, 2.0))
2397  ) / sqrt2pi() ;
2398 
2399 }
2400 
2401 
2402 template<typename TData>
2403 inline void LFMCMC<TData>::set_proposal_fun(LFMCMCProposalFun<TData> fun)
2404 {
2405  m_proposal_fun = fun;
2406 }
2407 
2408 template<typename TData>
2409 inline void LFMCMC<TData>::set_simulation_fun(LFMCMCSimFun<TData> fun)
2410 {
2411  m_simulation_fun = fun;
2412 }
2413 
2414 template<typename TData>
2415 inline void LFMCMC<TData>::set_summary_fun(LFMCMCSummaryFun<TData> fun)
2416 {
2417  m_summary_fun = fun;
2418 }
2419 
2420 template<typename TData>
2421 inline void LFMCMC<TData>::set_kernel_fun(LFMCMCKernelFun<TData> fun)
2422 {
2423  m_kernel_fun = fun;
2424 }
2425 
2426 
2427 template<typename TData>
2428 inline void LFMCMC<TData>::run(
2429  std::vector< epiworld_double > params_init_,
2430  size_t n_samples_,
2431  epiworld_double epsilon_,
2432  int seed
2433  )
2434 {
2435 
2436  // Starting timing
2437  chrono_start();
2438 
2439  // Setting the baseline parameters of the model
2440  m_n_samples = n_samples_;
2441  m_epsilon = epsilon_;
2442  m_initial_params = params_init_;
2443  m_n_params = params_init_.size();
2444 
2445  if (seed >= 0)
2446  this->seed(seed);
2447 
2448  m_current_proposed_params.resize(m_n_params);
2449  m_current_accepted_params.resize(m_n_params);
2450 
2451  if (m_simulated_data != nullptr)
2452  m_simulated_data->resize(m_n_samples);
2453 
2454  m_current_accepted_params = m_initial_params;
2455  m_current_proposed_params = m_initial_params;
2456 
2457  // Computing the baseline sufficient statistics
2458  m_summary_fun(m_observed_stats, m_observed_data, this);
2459  m_n_stats = m_observed_stats.size();
2460 
2461  // Reserving size
2462  m_current_proposed_stats.resize(m_n_stats);
2463  m_current_accepted_stats.resize(m_n_stats);
2464  m_all_sample_drawn_prob.resize(m_n_samples);
2465  m_all_sample_acceptance.resize(m_n_samples, false);
2466  m_all_sample_params.resize(m_n_samples * m_n_params);
2467  m_all_sample_stats.resize(m_n_samples * m_n_stats);
2468  m_all_sample_kernel_scores.resize(m_n_samples);
2469 
2470  m_all_accepted_params.resize(m_n_samples * m_n_params);
2471  m_all_accepted_stats.resize(m_n_samples * m_n_stats);
2472  m_all_accepted_kernel_scores.resize(m_n_samples);
2473 
2474  TData data_i = m_simulation_fun(m_initial_params, this);
2475 
2476  m_summary_fun(m_current_proposed_stats, data_i, this);
2477  m_all_accepted_kernel_scores[0u] = m_kernel_fun(
2478  m_current_proposed_stats, m_observed_stats, m_epsilon, this
2479  );
2480 
2481  // Recording statistics
2482  for (size_t i = 0u; i < m_n_stats; ++i)
2483  m_all_sample_stats[i] = m_current_proposed_stats[i];
2484 
2485  m_current_accepted_stats = m_current_proposed_stats;
2486 
2487  for (size_t k = 0u; k < m_n_params; ++k)
2488  m_all_accepted_params[k] = m_initial_params[k];
2489 
2490  for (size_t k = 0u; k < m_n_params; ++k)
2491  m_all_sample_params[k] = m_initial_params[k];
2492 
2493  // Init progress bar
2494  progress_bar = Progress(m_n_samples, 80);
2495  if (verbose) {
2496  progress_bar.next();
2497  }
2498 
2499  // Run LFMCMC
2500  for (size_t i = 1u; i < m_n_samples; ++i)
2501  {
2502  // Step 1: Generate a proposal and store it in m_current_proposed_params
2503  m_proposal_fun(m_current_proposed_params, m_current_accepted_params, this);
2504 
2505  // Step 2: Using m_current_proposed_params, simulate data
2506  TData data_i = m_simulation_fun(m_current_proposed_params, this);
2507 
2508  // Are we storing the data?
2509  if (m_simulated_data != nullptr)
2510  m_simulated_data->operator[](i) = data_i;
2511 
2512  // Step 3: Generate the summary statistics of the data
2513  m_summary_fun(m_current_proposed_stats, data_i, this);
2514 
2515  // Step 4: Compute the hastings ratio using the kernel function
2516  epiworld_double hr = m_kernel_fun(
2517  m_current_proposed_stats, m_observed_stats, m_epsilon, this
2518  );
2519 
2520  m_all_sample_kernel_scores[i] = hr;
2521 
2522  // Storing data
2523  for (size_t k = 0u; k < m_n_params; ++k)
2524  m_all_sample_params[i * m_n_params + k] = m_current_proposed_params[k];
2525 
2526  for (size_t k = 0u; k < m_n_stats; ++k)
2527  m_all_sample_stats[i * m_n_stats + k] = m_current_proposed_stats[k];
2528 
2529  // Running Hastings ratio
2530  epiworld_double r = runif();
2531  m_all_sample_drawn_prob[i] = r;
2532 
2533  // Step 5: Update if likely
2534  if (r < std::min(static_cast<epiworld_double>(1.0), hr / m_all_accepted_kernel_scores[i - 1u]))
2535  {
2536  m_all_accepted_kernel_scores[i] = hr;
2537  m_all_sample_acceptance[i] = true;
2538 
2539  for (size_t k = 0u; k < m_n_stats; ++k)
2540  m_all_accepted_stats[i * m_n_stats + k] =
2541  m_current_proposed_stats[k];
2542 
2543  m_current_accepted_params = m_current_proposed_params;
2544  m_current_accepted_stats = m_current_proposed_stats;
2545  } else
2546  {
2547 
2548  for (size_t k = 0u; k < m_n_stats; ++k)
2549  m_all_accepted_stats[i * m_n_stats + k] =
2550  m_all_accepted_stats[(i - 1) * m_n_stats + k];
2551 
2552  m_all_accepted_kernel_scores[i] = m_all_accepted_kernel_scores[i - 1u];
2553  }
2554 
2555 
2556  for (size_t k = 0u; k < m_n_params; ++k)
2557  m_all_accepted_params[i * m_n_params + k] = m_current_accepted_params[k];
2558 
2559  if (verbose) {
2560  progress_bar.next();
2561  }
2562  }
2563 
2564  // End timing
2565  chrono_end();
2566 
2567 }
2568 
2569 
2570 template<typename TData>
2571 inline epiworld_double LFMCMC<TData>::runif()
2572 {
2573  return runifd->operator()(*m_engine);
2574 }
2575 
2576 template<typename TData>
2577 inline epiworld_double LFMCMC<TData>::runif(
2578  epiworld_double lb,
2579  epiworld_double ub
2580 )
2581 {
2582  return runifd->operator()(*m_engine) * (ub - lb) + lb;
2583 }
2584 
2585 template<typename TData>
2586 inline epiworld_double LFMCMC<TData>::rnorm()
2587 {
2588  return rnormd->operator()(*m_engine);
2589 }
2590 
2591 template<typename TData>
2592 inline epiworld_double LFMCMC<TData>::rnorm(
2593  epiworld_double mean,
2594  epiworld_double sd
2595  )
2596 {
2597  return (rnormd->operator()(*m_engine)) * sd + mean;
2598 }
2599 
2600 template<typename TData>
2601 inline epiworld_double LFMCMC<TData>::rgamma()
2602 {
2603  return rgammad->operator()(*m_engine);
2604 }
2605 
2606 template<typename TData>
2607 inline epiworld_double LFMCMC<TData>::rgamma(
2608  epiworld_double alpha,
2609  epiworld_double beta
2610  )
2611 {
2612 
2613  auto old_param = rgammad->param();
2614 
2615  rgammad->param(std::gamma_distribution<>::param_type(alpha, beta));
2616 
2617  epiworld_double ans = rgammad->operator()(*m_engine);
2618 
2619  rgammad->param(old_param);
2620 
2621  return ans;
2622 
2623 }
2624 
2625 template<typename TData>
2626 inline void LFMCMC<TData>::seed(epiworld_fast_uint s) {
2627 
2628  this->m_engine->seed(s);
2629 
2630 }
2631 
2632 template<typename TData>
2633 inline void LFMCMC<TData>::set_rand_engine(std::shared_ptr< std::mt19937 > & eng)
2634 {
2635  m_engine = eng;
2636 }
2637 
2638 template<typename TData>
2639 inline void LFMCMC<TData>::set_rand_gamma(epiworld_double alpha, epiworld_double beta)
2640 {
2641  rgammad = std::make_shared<std::gamma_distribution<>>(alpha,beta);
2642 }
2643 
2644 template<typename TData>
2645 inline std::shared_ptr< std::mt19937 > & LFMCMC<TData>::get_rand_endgine()
2646 {
2647  return m_engine;
2648 }
2649 
2650 // Step 1: Simulate data
2651 
2652 // Step 2: Compute the sufficient statistics
2653 
2654 // Step 3: Compute the hastings-ratio
2655 
2656 // Step 4: Accept/reject, and go back to step 1
2657 
2658 #define DURCAST(tunit,txtunit) {\
2659  elapsed = std::chrono::duration_cast<std::chrono:: tunit>(\
2660  m_end_time - m_start_time).count(); \
2661  abbr_unit = txtunit;}
2662 
2663 template<typename TData>
2664 inline void LFMCMC<TData>::get_elapsed_time(
2665  std::string unit,
2666  epiworld_double * last_elapsed,
2667  std::string * unit_abbr,
2668  bool print
2669 ) const {
2670 
2671  // Preparing the result
2672  epiworld_double elapsed;
2673  std::string abbr_unit;
2674 
2675  // Figuring out the length
2676  if (unit == "auto")
2677  {
2678 
2679  size_t tlength = std::to_string(
2680  static_cast<int>(floor(m_elapsed_time.count()))
2681  ).length();
2682 
2683  if (tlength <= 1)
2684  unit = "nanoseconds";
2685  else if (tlength <= 3)
2686  unit = "microseconds";
2687  else if (tlength <= 6)
2688  unit = "milliseconds";
2689  else if (tlength <= 8)
2690  unit = "seconds";
2691  else if (tlength <= 9)
2692  unit = "minutes";
2693  else
2694  unit = "hours";
2695 
2696  }
2697 
2698  if (unit == "nanoseconds") DURCAST(nanoseconds,"ns")
2699  else if (unit == "microseconds") DURCAST(microseconds,"\xC2\xB5s")
2700  else if (unit == "milliseconds") DURCAST(milliseconds,"ms")
2701  else if (unit == "seconds") DURCAST(seconds,"s")
2702  else if (unit == "minutes") DURCAST(minutes,"m")
2703  else if (unit == "hours") DURCAST(hours,"h")
2704  else
2705  throw std::range_error("The time unit " + unit + " is not supported.");
2706 
2707 
2708  if (last_elapsed != nullptr)
2709  *last_elapsed = elapsed;
2710  if (unit_abbr != nullptr)
2711  *unit_abbr = abbr_unit;
2712 
2713  if (!print)
2714  return;
2715 
2716  printf_epiworld("Elapsed time : %.2f%s.\n", elapsed, abbr_unit.c_str());
2717 }
2718 
2719 #undef DURCAST
2720 
2721 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
2723 
2724  Start of -include/epiworld//math//lfmcmc/lfmcmc-meat-print.hpp-
2725 
2728 
2729 
2730 #ifndef LFMCMC_MEAT_PRINT_HPP
2731 #define LFMCMC_MEAT_PRINT_HPP
2732 
2733 template<typename TData>
2734 inline void LFMCMC<TData>::print(size_t burnin) const
2735 {
2736 
2737  // For each statistic or parameter in the model, we print three values:
2738  // - mean, the 2.5% quantile, and the 97.5% quantile
2739  std::vector< epiworld_double > summ_params(m_n_params * 3, 0.0);
2740  std::vector< epiworld_double > summ_stats(m_n_stats * 3, 0.0);
2741 
2742  // Compute the number of samples to use based on burnin rate
2743  size_t n_samples_print = m_n_samples;
2744  if (burnin > 0)
2745  {
2746  if (burnin >= m_n_samples)
2747  throw std::length_error(
2748  "The burnin is greater than or equal to the number of samples."
2749  );
2750 
2751  n_samples_print = m_n_samples - burnin;
2752 
2753  }
2754 
2755  epiworld_double n_samples_dbl = static_cast< epiworld_double >(
2756  n_samples_print
2757  );
2758 
2759  // Compute parameter summary values
2760  for (size_t k = 0u; k < m_n_params; ++k)
2761  {
2762 
2763  // Retrieving the relevant parameter
2764  std::vector< epiworld_double > par_i(n_samples_print);
2765  for (size_t i = burnin; i < m_n_samples; ++i)
2766  {
2767  par_i[i-burnin] = m_all_accepted_params[i * m_n_params + k];
2768  summ_params[k * 3] += par_i[i-burnin]/n_samples_dbl;
2769  }
2770 
2771  // Computing the 95% Credible interval
2772  std::sort(par_i.begin(), par_i.end());
2773 
2774  summ_params[k * 3 + 1u] =
2775  par_i[std::floor(.025 * n_samples_dbl)];
2776  summ_params[k * 3 + 2u] =
2777  par_i[std::floor(.975 * n_samples_dbl)];
2778 
2779  }
2780 
2781  // Compute statistics summary values
2782  for (size_t k = 0u; k < m_n_stats; ++k)
2783  {
2784 
2785  // Retrieving the relevant parameter
2786  std::vector< epiworld_double > stat_k(n_samples_print);
2787  for (size_t i = burnin; i < m_n_samples; ++i)
2788  {
2789  stat_k[i-burnin] = m_all_accepted_stats[i * m_n_stats + k];
2790  summ_stats[k * 3] += stat_k[i-burnin]/n_samples_dbl;
2791  }
2792 
2793  // Computing the 95% Credible interval
2794  std::sort(stat_k.begin(), stat_k.end());
2795  summ_stats[k * 3 + 1u] =
2796  stat_k[std::floor(.025 * n_samples_dbl)];
2797  summ_stats[k * 3 + 2u] =
2798  stat_k[std::floor(.975 * n_samples_dbl)];
2799 
2800  }
2801 
2802  printf_epiworld("___________________________________________\n\n");
2803  printf_epiworld("LIKELIHOOD-FREE MARKOV CHAIN MONTE CARLO\n\n");
2804 
2805  printf_epiworld("N Samples (total) : %zu\n", m_n_samples);
2806  printf_epiworld("N Samples (after burn-in period) : %zu\n", m_n_samples - burnin);
2807 
2808  std::string abbr;
2809  epiworld_double elapsed;
2810  get_elapsed_time("auto", &elapsed, &abbr, false);
2811  printf_epiworld("Elapsed t : %.2f%s\n\n", elapsed, abbr.c_str());
2812 
2814  // PARAMETERS
2816  printf_epiworld("Parameters:\n");
2817 
2818  // Figuring out format
2819  std::string fmt_params;
2820 
2821  int nchar_par_num = 0;
2822  for (auto & n : summ_params)
2823  {
2824 
2825  int tmp_nchar;
2826 
2827  if (std::abs(n) < 1) {
2828  // std::log10(<1) will return negative number
2829  // std::log10(0) will return -inf and throw a runtime error
2830  tmp_nchar = 0;
2831  } else {
2832  tmp_nchar = std::floor(std::log10(std::abs(n)));
2833  }
2834 
2835  if (nchar_par_num < tmp_nchar)
2836  nchar_par_num = tmp_nchar;
2837  }
2838  nchar_par_num += 5; // 1 for neg padd, 2 for decimals, 1 the decimal point, and one b/c log(<10) < 1.
2839  std::string charlen = std::to_string(nchar_par_num);
2840 
2841  if (m_param_names.size() != 0u)
2842  {
2843  int nchar_par = 0;
2844  for (auto & n : m_param_names)
2845  {
2846  int tmp_nchar = n.length();
2847  if (nchar_par < tmp_nchar)
2848  nchar_par = tmp_nchar;
2849  }
2850 
2851  fmt_params = std::string(" -%-") +
2852  std::to_string(nchar_par) +
2853  std::string("s : % ") + charlen +
2854  std::string(".2f [% ") + charlen +
2855  std::string(".2f, % ") + charlen +
2856  std::string(".2f] (initial : % ") +
2857  charlen + std::string(".2f)\n");
2858 
2859  for (size_t k = 0u; k < m_n_params; ++k)
2860  {
2861  printf_epiworld(
2862  fmt_params.c_str(),
2863  m_param_names[k].c_str(),
2864  summ_params[k * 3],
2865  summ_params[k * 3 + 1u],
2866  summ_params[k * 3 + 2u],
2867  m_initial_params[k]
2868  );
2869  }
2870 
2871 
2872  } else {
2873 
2874  fmt_params = std::string(" [%-2ld]: % ") + charlen +
2875  std::string(".2f [% ") + charlen +
2876  std::string(".2f, % ") + charlen +
2877  std::string(".2f] (initial : % ") + charlen +
2878  std::string(".2f)\n");
2879 
2880  for (size_t k = 0u; k < m_n_params; ++k)
2881  {
2882 
2883  printf_epiworld(
2884  fmt_params.c_str(),
2885  k,
2886  summ_params[k * 3],
2887  summ_params[k * 3 + 1u],
2888  summ_params[k * 3 + 2u],
2889  m_initial_params[k]
2890  );
2891  }
2892 
2893  }
2894 
2896  // Statistics
2898  printf_epiworld("\nStatistics:\n");
2899  int nchar = 0;
2900  for (auto & s : summ_stats)
2901  {
2902  int tmp_nchar;
2903  if (std::abs(s) < 1) {
2904  // std::log10(<1) will return negative number
2905  // std::log10(0) will return -inf and throw a runtime error
2906  tmp_nchar = 0;
2907  } else {
2908  tmp_nchar = std::floor(std::log10(std::abs(s)));
2909  }
2910 
2911  if (nchar < tmp_nchar)
2912  nchar = tmp_nchar;
2913  }
2914 
2915  nchar += 5; // See above
2916 
2917  std::string nchar_char = std::to_string(nchar);
2918 
2919  // Figuring out format
2920  std::string fmt_stats;
2921  if (m_stat_names.size() != 0u)
2922  {
2923  int nchar_stats = 0;
2924  for (auto & n : m_stat_names)
2925  {
2926  int tmp_nchar = n.length();
2927  if (nchar_stats < tmp_nchar)
2928  nchar_stats = tmp_nchar;
2929  }
2930 
2931  fmt_stats = std::string(" -%-") +
2932  std::to_string(nchar_stats) +
2933  std::string("s : % ") + nchar_char +
2934  std::string(".2f [% ") + nchar_char +
2935  std::string(".2f, % ") + nchar_char +
2936  std::string(".2f] (Observed: % ") + nchar_char +
2937  std::string(".2f)\n");
2938 
2939  for (size_t k = 0u; k < m_n_stats; ++k)
2940  {
2941  printf_epiworld(
2942  fmt_stats.c_str(),
2943  m_stat_names[k].c_str(),
2944  summ_stats[k * 3],
2945  summ_stats[k * 3 + 1u],
2946  summ_stats[k * 3 + 2u],
2947  m_observed_stats[k]
2948  );
2949  }
2950 
2951 
2952  } else {
2953 
2954  fmt_stats = std::string(" [%-2ld] : % ") +
2955  nchar_char +
2956  std::string(".2f [% ") + nchar_char +
2957  std::string(".2f, % ") + nchar_char +
2958  std::string(".2f] (Observed: % ") + nchar_char +
2959  std::string(".2f)\n");
2960 
2961  for (size_t k = 0u; k < m_n_stats; ++k)
2962  {
2963  printf_epiworld(
2964  fmt_stats.c_str(),
2965  k,
2966  summ_stats[k * 3],
2967  summ_stats[k * 3 + 1u],
2968  summ_stats[k * 3 + 2u],
2969  m_observed_stats[k]
2970  );
2971  }
2972 
2973  }
2974 
2975  printf_epiworld("___________________________________________\n\n");
2976 }
2977 
2978 #endif
2979 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
2981 
2982  End of -include/epiworld//math//lfmcmc/lfmcmc-meat-print.hpp-
2983 
2986 
2987 
2988 
2989 template<typename TData>
2990 inline void LFMCMC<TData>::chrono_start() {
2991  m_start_time = std::chrono::steady_clock::now();
2992 }
2993 
2994 template<typename TData>
2995 inline void LFMCMC<TData>::chrono_end() {
2996  m_end_time = std::chrono::steady_clock::now();
2997  m_elapsed_time += (m_end_time - m_start_time);
2998 }
2999 
3000 template<typename TData>
3001 inline void LFMCMC<TData>::set_params_names(std::vector< std::string > names)
3002 {
3003 
3004  if (names.size() != m_n_params)
3005  throw std::length_error("The number of names to add differs from the number of parameters in the model.");
3006 
3007  m_param_names = names;
3008 
3009 }
3010 template<typename TData>
3011 inline void LFMCMC<TData>::set_stats_names(std::vector< std::string > names)
3012 {
3013 
3014  if (names.size() != m_n_stats)
3015  throw std::length_error("The number of names to add differs from the number of statistics in the model.");
3016 
3017  m_stat_names = names;
3018 
3019 }
3020 
3021 template<typename TData>
3022 inline std::vector< epiworld_double > LFMCMC<TData>::get_mean_params()
3023 {
3024  std::vector< epiworld_double > res(this->m_n_params, 0.0);
3025 
3026  for (size_t k = 0u; k < m_n_params; ++k)
3027  {
3028  for (size_t i = 0u; i < m_n_samples; ++i)
3029  res[k] += (this->m_all_accepted_params[k + m_n_params * i])/
3030  static_cast< epiworld_double >(m_n_samples);
3031  }
3032 
3033  return res;
3034 
3035 }
3036 
3037 template<typename TData>
3038 inline std::vector< epiworld_double > LFMCMC<TData>::get_mean_stats()
3039 {
3040  std::vector< epiworld_double > res(this->m_n_stats, 0.0);
3041 
3042  for (size_t k = 0u; k < m_n_stats; ++k)
3043  {
3044  for (size_t i = 0u; i < m_n_samples; ++i)
3045  res[k] += (this->m_all_accepted_stats[k + m_n_stats * i])/
3046  static_cast< epiworld_double >(m_n_samples);
3047  }
3048 
3049  return res;
3050 
3051 }
3052 
3053 template<typename TData>
3054 inline LFMCMC<TData> & LFMCMC<TData>::verbose_off()
3055 {
3056  verbose = false;
3057  return *this;
3058 }
3059 
3060 template<typename TData>
3061 inline LFMCMC<TData> & LFMCMC<TData>::verbose_on()
3062 {
3063  verbose = true;
3064  return *this;
3065 }
3066 
3067 #endif
3068 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
3070 
3071  End of -include/epiworld//math/lfmcmc/lfmcmc-meat.hpp-
3072 
3075 
3076 
3077 
3078 #endif
3079 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
3081

3083 
3086 
3087 
3088 
3089 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
3091 
3092  Start of -include/epiworld/userdata-bones.hpp-
3093 
3096 
3097 
3098 #ifndef EPIWORLD_USERDATA_BONES_HPP
3099 #define EPIWORLD_USERDATA_BONES_HPP
3100 
3101 template<typename TSeq>
3102 class Model;
3103 
3104 template<typename TSeq>
3105 class DataBase;
3106 
3112 template<typename TSeq>
3113 class UserData
3114 {
3115  friend class Model<TSeq>;
3116  friend class DataBase<TSeq>;
3117 
3118 private:
3119  Model<TSeq> * model;
3120 
3121  std::vector< std::string > data_names;
3122  std::vector< int > data_dates;
3123  std::vector< epiworld_double > data_data;
3124 
3125  epiworld_fast_uint k = 0u;
3126  epiworld_fast_uint n = 0u;
3127 
3128  int last_day = -1;
3129 
3130 public:
3131 
3132  UserData() = delete;
3133  UserData(Model<TSeq> & m) : model(&m) {};
3134  UserData(Model<TSeq> * m) : model(m) {};
3135 
3142  UserData(std::vector< std::string > names);
3143 
3151  void add(std::vector<epiworld_double> x);
3152  void add(
3153  epiworld_fast_uint j,
3154  epiworld_double x
3155  );
3157 
3166  epiworld_double & operator()(
3167  epiworld_fast_uint i,
3168  epiworld_fast_uint j
3169  );
3170 
3171  epiworld_double & operator()(
3172  epiworld_fast_uint i,
3173  std::string name
3174  );
3176 
3177  std::vector< std::string > & get_names();
3178 
3179  std::vector< int > & get_dates();
3180 
3181  std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_data();
3182 
3183  void get_all(
3184  std::vector< std::string > * names = nullptr,
3185  std::vector< int > * date = nullptr,
3186  std::vector< epiworld_double > * data = nullptr
3187  );
3188 
3189  epiworld_fast_uint nrow() const;
3190  epiworld_fast_uint ncol() const;
3191 
3192  void write(std::string fn);
3193  void print() const;
3194 
3195 };
3196 
3197 #endif
3198 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
3200 
3201  End of -include/epiworld/userdata-bones.hpp-
3202 
3205 
3206 
3207 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
3209 
3210  Start of -include/epiworld/userdata-meat.hpp-
3211 
3214 
3215 
3216 #ifndef EPIWORLD_USERDATA_MEAT_HPP
3217 #define EPIWORLD_USERDATA_MEAT_HPP
3218 
3219 template<typename TSeq>
3220 class UserData;
3221 
3222 template<typename TSeq>
3223 inline UserData<TSeq>::UserData(std::vector< std::string > names)
3224 {
3225 
3226  k = names.size();
3227  data_names = names;
3228 
3229 }
3230 
3231 template<typename TSeq>
3232 inline void UserData<TSeq>::add(std::vector<epiworld_double> x)
3233 {
3234 
3235  if (x.size() != k)
3236  throw std::out_of_range(
3237  "The size of -x-, " + std::to_string(x.size()) + ", does not match " +
3238  "the number of elements registered (" + std::to_string(k));
3239 
3240  for (auto & i : x)
3241  data_data.push_back(i);
3242 
3243  data_dates.push_back(model->today());
3244 
3245  n++;
3246  last_day = model->today();
3247 
3248 }
3249 
3250 template<typename TSeq>
3251 inline void UserData<TSeq>::add(epiworld_fast_uint j, epiworld_double x)
3252 {
3253 
3254  // Starting with a new day?
3255  if (static_cast<int>(model->today()) != last_day)
3256  {
3257 
3258  std::vector< epiworld_double > tmp(k, 0.0);
3259 
3260  tmp[j] = x;
3261 
3262  add(tmp);
3263 
3264  }
3265  else
3266  {
3267 
3268  this->operator()(n - 1, j) = x;
3269 
3270  }
3271 
3272 }
3273 
3274 template<typename TSeq>
3275 inline std::vector< std::string > & UserData<TSeq>::get_names()
3276 {
3277  return data_names;
3278 }
3279 
3280 template<typename TSeq>
3281 inline std::vector< int > & UserData<TSeq>::get_dates()
3282 {
3283  return data_dates;
3284 }
3285 
3286 template<typename TSeq>
3287 inline std::vector< epiworld_double > & UserData<TSeq>::get_data()
3288 {
3289  return data_data;
3290 }
3291 
3292 template<typename TSeq>
3293 inline void UserData<TSeq>::get_all(
3294  std::vector< std::string > * names,
3295  std::vector< int > * date,
3296  std::vector< epiworld_double > * data
3297 )
3298 {
3299 
3300  if (names != nullptr)
3301  names = &this->data_names;
3302 
3303  if (date != nullptr)
3304  date = &this->data_dates;
3305 
3306  if (data != nullptr)
3307  data = &this->data_data;
3308 
3309 }
3310 
3311 template<typename TSeq>
3312 inline epiworld_double & UserData<TSeq>::operator()(
3313  epiworld_fast_uint i,
3314  epiworld_fast_uint j
3315 )
3316 {
3317 
3318  if (j >= k)
3319  throw std::out_of_range("j cannot be greater than k - 1.");
3320 
3321  if (i >= n)
3322  throw std::out_of_range("j cannot be greater than n - 1.");
3323 
3324  return data_data[k * i + j];
3325 
3326 }
3327 
3328 template<typename TSeq>
3329 inline epiworld_double & UserData<TSeq>::operator()(
3330  epiworld_fast_uint i,
3331  std::string name
3332 )
3333 {
3334  int loc = -1;
3335  for (epiworld_fast_uint l = 0u; l < k; ++l)
3336  {
3337 
3338  if (name == data_names[l])
3339  {
3340 
3341  loc = l;
3342  break;
3343 
3344  }
3345 
3346  }
3347 
3348  if (loc < 0)
3349  throw std::range_error(
3350  "The variable \"" + name + "\" is not present " +
3351  "in the user UserData database."
3352  );
3353 
3354  return operator()(i, static_cast<epiworld_fast_uint>(loc));
3355 
3356 }
3357 
3358 template<typename TSeq>
3359 inline epiworld_fast_uint UserData<TSeq>::nrow() const
3360 {
3361  return n;
3362 }
3363 
3364 template<typename TSeq>
3365 inline epiworld_fast_uint UserData<TSeq>::ncol() const
3366 {
3367  return k;
3368 }
3369 
3370 template<typename TSeq>
3371 inline void UserData<TSeq>::write(std::string fn)
3372 {
3373  std::ofstream file_ud(fn, std::ios_base::out);
3374 
3375  // File header
3376  file_ud << "\"date\"";
3377  for (auto & cn : data_names)
3378  file_ud << " \"" + cn + "\"";
3379  file_ud << "\n";
3380 
3381  epiworld_fast_uint ndata = 0u;
3382  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0u; i < n; ++i)
3383  {
3384  file_ud << data_dates[i];
3385 
3386  for (epiworld_fast_uint j = 0u; j < k; ++j)
3387  file_ud << " " << data_data[ndata++];
3388 
3389  file_ud << "\n";
3390  }
3391 
3392  return;
3393 }
3394 
3395 template<typename TSeq>
3396 inline void UserData<TSeq>::print() const
3397 {
3398  // File header
3399  printf_epiworld("Total records: %llu\n", n);
3400  printf_epiworld("date");
3401 
3402  for (auto & cn : data_names)
3403  {
3404 
3405  printf_epiworld(" %s", cn.c_str());
3406 
3407  }
3408 
3409  printf_epiworld("\n");
3410 
3411  epiworld_fast_uint ndata = 0u;
3412 
3413  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0u; i < n; ++i)
3414  {
3415 
3416  printf_epiworld("%i", data_dates[i]);
3417 
3418  for (epiworld_fast_uint j = 0u; j < k; ++j)
3419  {
3420 
3421  printf_epiworld(" %.2f", data_data[ndata++]);
3422 
3423  }
3424 
3425  printf_epiworld("\n");
3426 
3427  }
3428 
3429  return;
3430 }
3431 
3432 #endif

3435 
3436  End of -include/epiworld/userdata-meat.hpp-
3437

3441

3443 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
3445 
3446  Start of -include/epiworld/seq_processing.hpp-
3447 
3450 
3451 
3452 #ifndef EPIWORLD_SEQ_PROCESSING_HPP
3453 #define EPIWORLD_SEQ_PROCESSING_HPP
3454 
3462 template<typename TSeq>
3463 inline std::vector<int> default_seq_hasher(const TSeq & x);
3464 
3465 template<>
3466 inline std::vector<int> default_seq_hasher<std::vector<int>>(const std::vector<int> & x) {
3467  return x;
3468 }
3469 
3470 template<>
3471 inline std::vector<int> default_seq_hasher<std::vector<bool>>(const std::vector<bool> & x) {
3472  std::vector<int> ans(x.size());
3473  size_t j = 0;
3474  for (const auto & i : x)
3475  ans[j++] = i? 1 : 0;
3476  return ans;
3477 }
3478 
3479 template<>
3480 inline std::vector<int> default_seq_hasher<int>(const int & x) {
3481  return {x};
3482 }
3483 
3484 template<>
3485 inline std::vector<int> default_seq_hasher<bool>(const bool & x) {
3486  return {x ? 1 : 0};
3487 }
3488 
3496 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
3497 inline std::string default_seq_writer(const TSeq & seq);
3498 
3499 template<>
3500 inline std::string default_seq_writer<std::vector<int>>(
3501  const std::vector<int> & seq
3502 ) {
3503 
3504  std::string out = "";
3505  for (const auto & s : seq)
3506  out = out + std::to_string(s);
3507 
3508  return out;
3509 
3510 }
3511 
3512 template<>
3513 inline std::string default_seq_writer<std::vector<bool>>(
3514  const std::vector<bool> & seq
3515 ) {
3516 
3517  std::string out = "";
3518  for (const auto & s : seq)
3519  out = out + (s ? "1" : "0");
3520 
3521  return out;
3522 
3523 }
3524 
3525 template<>
3526 inline std::string default_seq_writer<bool>(
3527  const bool & seq
3528 ) {
3529 
3530  return seq ? "1" : "0";
3531 
3532 }
3533 
3534 template<>
3535 inline std::string default_seq_writer<int>(
3536  const int & seq
3537 ) {
3538 
3539  return std::to_string(seq);
3540 
3541 }
3542 
3543 
3544 
3545 #endif
3546 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
3548 
3549  End of -include/epiworld/seq_processing.hpp-
3550

3560

3566 #define EPIWORLD_DATABASE_BONES_HPP
3567 
3568 template<typename TSeq>
3569 class Model;
3570 
3571 template<typename TSeq>
3572 class Virus;
3573 
3574 template<typename TSeq>
3575 class UserData;

3577 template<typename TSeq>
3578 inline void default_add_virus(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
3579 
3580 template<typename TSeq>
3581 inline void default_add_tool(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
3582 
3583 template<typename TSeq>

3585 
3586 template<typename TSeq>
3587 inline void default_rm_tool(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);

3589 template<typename TSeq>
3590 inline void default_change_state(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
3591 
3597 template<typename TSeq>
3598 class DataBase {
3599  friend class Model<TSeq>;
3600  friend void default_add_virus<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
3601  friend void default_add_tool<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
3602  friend void default_rm_virus<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
3603  friend void default_rm_tool<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
3604  friend void default_change_state<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
3605 private:
3606  Model<TSeq> * model;
3607 
3608  // Variants information
3609  MapVec_type<int,int> virus_id; ///< The squence is the key
3610  std::vector< std::string > virus_name;
3611  std::vector< TSeq> virus_sequence;
3612  std::vector< int > virus_origin_date;
3613  std::vector< int > virus_parent_id;
3614 
3615  MapVec_type<int,int> tool_id; ///< The squence is the key
3616  std::vector< std::string > tool_name;
3617  std::vector< TSeq> tool_sequence;
3618  std::vector< int > tool_origin_date;
3619 
3620  std::function<std::vector<int>(const TSeq&)> seq_hasher = default_seq_hasher<TSeq>;
3621  std::function<std::string(const TSeq &)> seq_writer = default_seq_writer<TSeq>;
3622 
3623  // {Variant 1: {state 1, state 2, etc.}, Variant 2: {...}, ...}
3624  std::vector< std::vector<int> > today_virus;
3625 
3626  // {Variant 1: {state 1, state 2, etc.}, Variant 2: {...}, ...}
3627  std::vector< std::vector<int> > today_tool;
3628 
3629  // {Susceptible, Infected, etc.}
3630  std::vector< int > today_total;
3631 
3632  // Totals
3633  int today_total_nviruses_active = 0;
3634 
3635  int sampling_freq = 1;
3636 
3637  // Variants history
3638  std::vector< int > hist_virus_date;
3639  std::vector< int > hist_virus_id;
3640  std::vector< epiworld_fast_uint > hist_virus_state;
3641  std::vector< int > hist_virus_counts;
3642 
3643  // Tools history
3644  std::vector< int > hist_tool_date;
3645  std::vector< int > hist_tool_id;
3646  std::vector< epiworld_fast_uint > hist_tool_state;
3647  std::vector< int > hist_tool_counts;
3648 
3649  // Overall hist
3650  std::vector< int > hist_total_date;
3651  std::vector< int > hist_total_nviruses_active;
3652  std::vector< epiworld_fast_uint > hist_total_state;
3653  std::vector< int > hist_total_counts;
3654  std::vector< int > hist_transition_matrix;
3655 
3656  // Transmission network
3657  std::vector< int > transmission_date; ///< Date of the transmission event
3658  std::vector< int > transmission_source; ///< Id of the source
3659  std::vector< int > transmission_target; ///< Id of the target
3660  std::vector< int > transmission_virus; ///< Id of the variant
3661  std::vector< int > transmission_source_exposure_date; ///< Date when the source acquired the variant
3662 
3663  std::vector< int > transition_matrix;
3664 
3665  UserData<TSeq> user_data;

3668  epiworld_fast_uint prev_state,
3669  epiworld_fast_uint new_state,
3670  bool undo = false
3671  );

3692  int n_transmissions_today = 0;
3693  #endif

3698  // DataBase<TSeq> & operator=(const DataBase<TSeq> & m);
3699

3819  * @param i,j Integers. Id of the source and target agents.
3820  * @param virus Integer. Id of the virus.
3821  * @param i_expo_date Integer. Date when the source agent was infected.
3822  * @details
3823  * If i is -1, then it means that the agent was assigned a virus at the
3824  * beginning of the simulation.
3825  */
3826  void record_transmission(int i, int j, int virus, int i_expo_date);
