4151 #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
4152  #define EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF printf_epiworld
4153 
4154  #define EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(etype, msg) \
4155  (etype)("[[epi-debug]] (error) " + std::string(msg));
4156 
4157  #define EPI_DEBUG_NOTIFY_ACTIVE() \
4158  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("DEBUGGING ON (compiled with EPI_DEBUG defined)%s\n", "");
4159 
4160  #define EPI_DEBUG_ALL_NON_NEGATIVE(vect) \
4161  for (auto & v : vect) \
4162  if (static_cast<double>(v) < 0.0) \
4163  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "A negative value not allowed.");
4164 
4165  #define EPI_DEBUG_SUM_DBL(vect, num) \
4166  double _epi_debug_sum = 0.0; \
4167  for (auto & v : vect) \
4168  { \
4169  _epi_debug_sum += static_cast<double>(v);\
4170  if (_epi_debug_sum > static_cast<double>(num)) \
4171  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "The sum of elements not reached."); \
4172  }
4173 
4174  #define EPI_DEBUG_SUM_INT(vect, num) \
4175  int _epi_debug_sum = 0; \
4176  for (auto & v : vect) \
4177  { \
4178  _epi_debug_sum += static_cast<int>(v);\
4179  if (_epi_debug_sum > static_cast<int>(num)) \
4180  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "The sum of elements not reached."); \
4181  }
4182 
4183  #define EPI_DEBUG_VECTOR_MATCH_INT(a, b, c) \
4184  if (a.size() != b.size()) {\
4185  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("In '%s'", std::string(c).c_str()); \
4186  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("Size of vector a: %lu\n", (a).size());\
4187  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("Size of vector b: %lu\n", (b).size());\
4188  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::length_error, "The vectors do not match size."); \
4189  }\
4190  for (int _i = 0; _i < static_cast<int>(a.size()); ++_i) \
4191  if (a[_i] != b[_i]) {\
4192  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("In '%s'", std::string(c).c_str()); \
4193  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("Iterating the last 5 values%s:\n", ""); \
4194  for (int _j = std::max(0, static_cast<int>(_i) - 4); _j <= _i; ++_j) \
4195  { \
4196  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF( \
4197  "a[%i]: %i; b[%i]: %i\n", \
4198  _j, \
4199  static_cast<int>(a[_j]), \
4200  _j, static_cast<int>(b[_j])); \
4201  } \
4202  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "The vectors do not match."); \
4203  }
4204 
4205  #define EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(a,b) \
4206  if (a) \
4207  {\
4208  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, b); \
4209  }
4210 
4211  #define epiexception(a) std::logic_error
4212 #else
4213  #define EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF(fmt, ...)
4214  #define EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(fmt, ...)
4215  #define EPI_DEBUG_NOTIFY_ACTIVE()
4216  #define EPI_DEBUG_ALL_NON_NEGATIVE(vect)
4217  #define EPI_DEBUG_SUM_DBL(vect, num)
4218  #define EPI_DEBUG_SUM_INT(vect, num)
4219  #define EPI_DEBUG_VECTOR_MATCH_INT(a, b, c)
4220  #define EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(a, b) \
4221  if (a) \
4222  return false;
4223  #define epiexception(a) a
4224 #endif
4225 
4226 #if defined(EPI_DEBUG_NO_THREAD_ID) || (!defined(__OPENMP) && !defined(_OPENMP))
4227  #define EPI_GET_THREAD_ID() 0
4228 #else
4229  #define EPI_GET_THREAD_ID() omp_get_thread_num()
4230 #endif
4231 
4232 #endif

4329  { \

4359 // Use this to make it more efficient for storage if the type is small
4360 // and the pointer is not needed
4361 #define EPI_TYPENAME_TRAITS(tseq, bound) typename std::conditional< \
4362  sizeof( tseq ) <= sizeof( bound ), \
4363  tseq, \
4364  std::shared_ptr< tseq > \
4365  >::type
4366 
4367 #define EPI_IF_TSEQ_LESS_EQ_INT(tseq) \
4368  if constexpr (sizeof( tseq ) <= sizeof( int ))
4369 
4370 #define EPI_CHECK_COALESCE(proposed_, virus_tool_, alt_) \
4371  if (static_cast<int>(proposed_) == -99) {\
4372  if (static_cast<int>(virus_tool_) == -99) \
4373  (proposed_) = (alt_);\
4374  else (proposed_) = (virus_tool_);}

4398 template<typename TSeq>
4399 class Model;
4400 
4401 template<typename TSeq>
4402 class Agent;
4403 
4404 // Relevant for anything using vecHasher function ------------------------------
4409 template <typename T>
4410 struct vecHasher {
4411  std::size_t operator()(std::vector< T > const& dat) const noexcept {
4412 
4413  std::hash< T > hasher;
4414  std::size_t hash = hasher(dat[0u]);
4415 
4416  // ^ makes bitwise XOR
4417  // 0x9e3779b9 is a 32 bit constant (comes from the golden ratio)
4418  // << is a shift operator, something like lhs * 2^(rhs)
4419  if (dat.size() > 1u)
4420  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 1u; i < dat.size(); ++i)
4421  hash ^= hasher(dat[i]) + 0x9e3779b9 + (hash<<6) + (hash>>2);
4422 
4423  return hash;
4424 
4425  }
4426 };
4427 
4428 template<typename Ta = epiworld_double, typename Tb = epiworld_fast_uint>
4429 using MapVec_type = std::unordered_map< std::vector< Ta >, Tb, vecHasher<Ta>>;
4430 
4443 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
4444 inline TSeq default_sequence(int seq_count);
4445 
4446 // Making it 'static' so that we don't have problems when including the
4447 // header. This is important during the linkage, e.g., in R.
4448 // See https://en.cppreference.com/w/cpp/language/storage_duration#Linkage
4449 // static int _n_sequences_created = 0;
4450 
4451 template<>
4452 inline bool default_sequence(int seq_count) {
4453 
4454  if (seq_count == 2)
4455  throw std::logic_error("Maximum number of sequence created.");
4456 
4457  return seq_count++ ? false : true;
4458 }
4459 
4460 template<>
4461 inline int default_sequence(int seq_count) {
4462  return seq_count++;
4463 }
4464 
4465 template<>
4466 inline epiworld_double default_sequence(int seq_count) {
4467  return static_cast<epiworld_double>(seq_count++);
4468 }
4469 
4470 template<>
4471 inline std::vector<bool> default_sequence(int seq_count) {
4472 
4473  if (seq_count == 2)
4474  throw std::logic_error("Maximum number of sequence created.");
4475 
4476  return {seq_count++ ? false : true};
4477 }
4478 
4479 template<>
4480 inline std::vector<int> default_sequence(int seq_count) {
4481  return {seq_count++};
4482 }
4483 
4484 template<>
4485 inline std::vector<epiworld_double> default_sequence(int seq_count) {
4486  return {static_cast<epiworld_double>(seq_count++)};
4487 }
4489 
4498 template<typename Ta>
4499 inline bool IN(const Ta & a, const std::vector< Ta > & b) noexcept
4500 {
4501  for (const auto & i : b)
4502  if (a == i)
4503  return true;
4504 
4505  return false;
4506 }
4507 
4521 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ, typename TDbl = epiworld_double >
4522 inline int roulette(
4523  const std::vector< TDbl > & probs,
4524  Model<TSeq> * m
4525  )
4526 {
4527 
4528  // Step 1: Computing the prob on none
4529  TDbl p_none = 1.0;
4530  std::vector< int > certain_infection;
4531  certain_infection.reserve(probs.size());
4532 
4533  for (epiworld_fast_uint p = 0u; p < probs.size(); ++p)
4534  {
4535  p_none *= (1.0 - probs[p]);
4536 
4537  if (probs[p] > (1 - 1e-100))
4538  certain_infection.push_back(p);
4539 
4540  }
4541 
4542  TDbl r = static_cast<TDbl>(m->runif());
4543  // If there are one or more probs that go close to 1, sample
4544  // uniformly
4545  if (certain_infection.size() > 0)
4546  return certain_infection[std::floor(r * certain_infection.size())];
4547 
4548  // Step 2: Calculating the prob of none or single
4549  std::vector< TDbl > probs_only_p(probs.size());
4550  TDbl p_none_or_single = p_none;
4551  for (epiworld_fast_uint p = 0u; p < probs.size(); ++p)
4552  {
4553  probs_only_p[p] = probs[p] * (p_none / (1.0 - probs[p]));
4554  p_none_or_single += probs_only_p[p];
4555  }
4556 
4557  // Step 3: Roulette
4558  TDbl cumsum = p_none/p_none_or_single;
4559  if (r < cumsum)
4560  {
4561  return -1;
4562  }
4563 
4564  for (epiworld_fast_uint p = 0u; p < probs.size(); ++p)
4565  {
4566  // If it yield here, then bingo, the individual will acquire the disease
4567  cumsum += probs_only_p[p]/(p_none_or_single);
4568  if (r < cumsum)
4569  return static_cast<int>(p);
4570 
4571  }
4572 
4573 
4574  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
4575  printf_epiworld("[epi-debug] roulette::cumsum = %.4f\n", cumsum);
4576  #endif
4577 
4578  return static_cast<int>(probs.size() - 1u);
4579 
4580 }
4581 
4582 template<typename TSeq>
4583 inline int roulette(std::vector< double > & probs, Model<TSeq> * m)
4584 {
4585  return roulette<TSeq, double>(probs, m);
4586 }
4587 
4588 template<typename TSeq>
4589 inline int roulette(std::vector< float > & probs, Model<TSeq> * m)
4590 {
4591  return roulette<TSeq, float>(probs, m);
4592 }
4593 
4594 
4595 template<typename TSeq>
4596 inline int roulette(
4597  epiworld_fast_uint nelements,
4598  Model<TSeq> * m
4599  )
4600 {
4601 
4602  if ((nelements * 2) > m->array_double_tmp.size())
4603  {
4604  throw std::logic_error(
4605  "Trying to sample from more data than there is in roulette!" +
4606  std::to_string(nelements) + " vs " +
4607  std::to_string(m->array_double_tmp.size())
4608  );
4609  }
4610 
4611  // Step 1: Computing the prob on none
4612  epiworld_double p_none = 1.0;
4613  epiworld_fast_uint ncertain = 0u;
4614  // std::vector< int > certain_infection;
4615  for (epiworld_fast_uint p = 0u; p < nelements; ++p)
4616  {
4617  p_none *= (1.0 - m->array_double_tmp[p]);
4618 
4619  if (m->array_double_tmp[p] > (1 - 1e-100))
4620  m->array_double_tmp[nelements + ncertain++] = p;
4621  // certain_infection.push_back(p);
4622 
4623  }
4624 
4625  epiworld_double r = m->runif();
4626  // If there are one or more probs that go close to 1, sample
4627  // uniformly
4628  if (ncertain > 0u)
4629  return m->array_double_tmp[nelements + std::floor(ncertain * r)]; // certain_infection[std::floor(r * certain_infection.size())];
4630 
4631  // Step 2: Calculating the prob of none or single
4632  // std::vector< epiworld_double > probs_only_p;
4633  epiworld_double p_none_or_single = p_none;
4634  for (epiworld_fast_uint p = 0u; p < nelements; ++p)
4635  {
4636  m->array_double_tmp[nelements + p] =
4637  m->array_double_tmp[p] * (p_none / (1.0 - m->array_double_tmp[p]));
4638  p_none_or_single += m->array_double_tmp[nelements + p];
4639  }
4640 
4641  // Step 3: Roulette
4642  epiworld_double cumsum = p_none/p_none_or_single;
4643  if (r < cumsum)
4644  return -1;
4645 
4646  for (epiworld_fast_uint p = 0u; p < nelements; ++p)
4647  {
4648  // If it yield here, then bingo, the individual will acquire the disease
4649  cumsum += m->array_double_tmp[nelements + p]/(p_none_or_single);
4650  if (r < cumsum)
4651  return static_cast<int>(p);
4652 
4653  }
4654 
4655  return static_cast<int>(nelements - 1u);
4656 
4657 }
4658 
4675 template <typename T>
4676 inline std::map< std::string, T > read_yaml(std::string fn)
4677 {
4678 
4679  std::ifstream paramsfile(fn);
4680 
4681  if (!paramsfile)
4682  throw std::logic_error("The file " + fn + " was not found.");
4683 
4684  std::regex pattern("^([^:]+)\\s*[:]\\s*([-]?[0-9]+|[-]?[0-9]*\\.[0-9]+)?\\s*$");
4685 
4686  std::string line;
4687  std::smatch match;
4688  auto empty = std::sregex_iterator();
4689 
4690  // Making room
4691  std::map<std::string, T> parameters;
4692 
4693  while (std::getline(paramsfile, line))
4694  {
4695 
4696  // Is it a comment or an empty line?
4697  if (std::regex_match(line, std::regex("^([*].+|//.+|#.+|\\s*)$")))
4698  continue;
4699 
4700  // Finding the pattern, if it doesn't match, then error
4701  std::regex_match(line, match, pattern);
4702 
4703  if (match.empty())
4704  throw std::logic_error("Line has invalid format:\n" + line);
4705 
4706  // Capturing the number
4707  std::string anumber = match[2u].str() + match[3u].str();
4708  T tmp_num = static_cast<T>(
4709  std::strtod(anumber.c_str(), nullptr)
4710  );
4711 
4712  std::string pname = std::regex_replace(
4713  match[1u].str(),
4714  std::regex("^\\s+|\\s+$"),
4715  "");
4716 
4717  // Adding the parameter to the map
4718  parameters[pname] = tmp_num;
4719 
4720  }
4721 
4722  return parameters;
4723 
4724 }
4725 
4726 #endif
4727 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
4729 
4730  End of -include/epiworld//misc.hpp-
4731 
4734

4740

4759

4777 template<typename TSeq>
4778 class DataBase {
4779  friend class Model<TSeq>;
4780  friend void default_add_virus<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
4781  friend void default_add_tool<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
4782  friend void default_rm_virus<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
4783  friend void default_rm_tool<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
4784  friend void default_change_state<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
4785 private:
4786  Model<TSeq> * model;
4787 
4788  // Variants information
4789  MapVec_type<int,int> virus_id; ///< The squence is the key
4790  std::vector< std::string > virus_name;
4791  std::vector< TSeq> virus_sequence;
4792  std::vector< int > virus_origin_date;
4793  std::vector< int > virus_parent_id;
4794 
4795  MapVec_type<int,int> tool_id; ///< The squence is the key
4796  std::vector< std::string > tool_name;
4797  std::vector< TSeq> tool_sequence;
4798  std::vector< int > tool_origin_date;
4799 
4800  std::function<std::vector<int>(const TSeq&)> seq_hasher = default_seq_hasher<TSeq>;
4801  std::function<std::string(const TSeq &)> seq_writer = default_seq_writer<TSeq>;
4802 
4803  // {Variant 1: {state 1, state 2, etc.}, Variant 2: {...}, ...}
4804  std::vector< std::vector<int> > today_virus;
4805 
4806  // {Variant 1: {state 1, state 2, etc.}, Variant 2: {...}, ...}
4807  std::vector< std::vector<int> > today_tool;
4808 
4809  // {Susceptible, Infected, etc.}
4810  std::vector< int > today_total;
4811 
4812  // Totals
4813  int today_total_nviruses_active = 0;
4814 
4815  int sampling_freq = 1;
4816 
4817  // Variants history
4818  std::vector< int > hist_virus_date;
4819  std::vector< int > hist_virus_id;
4820  std::vector< epiworld_fast_uint > hist_virus_state;
4821  std::vector< int > hist_virus_counts;
4822 
4823  // Tools history
4824  std::vector< int > hist_tool_date;
4825  std::vector< int > hist_tool_id;
4826  std::vector< epiworld_fast_uint > hist_tool_state;
4827  std::vector< int > hist_tool_counts;
4828 
4829  // Overall hist
4830  std::vector< int > hist_total_date;
4831  std::vector< int > hist_total_nviruses_active;
4832  std::vector< epiworld_fast_uint > hist_total_state;
4833  std::vector< int > hist_total_counts;
4834  std::vector< int > hist_transition_matrix;
4835 
4836  // Transmission network
4837  std::vector< int > transmission_date; ///< Date of the transmission event
4838  std::vector< int > transmission_source; ///< Id of the source
4839  std::vector< int > transmission_target; ///< Id of the target
4840  std::vector< int > transmission_virus; ///< Id of the variant
4841  std::vector< int > transmission_source_exposure_date; ///< Date when the source acquired the variant
4842 
4843  std::vector< int > transition_matrix;
4844 
4845  UserData<TSeq> user_data;
4846 
4847  void update_state(
4848  epiworld_fast_uint prev_state,
4849  epiworld_fast_uint new_state,
4850  bool undo = false
4851  );
4852 
4853  void update_virus(
4854  epiworld_fast_uint virus_id,
4855  epiworld_fast_uint prev_state,
4856  epiworld_fast_uint new_state
4857  );
4858 
4859  void update_tool(
4860  epiworld_fast_uint tool_id,
4861  epiworld_fast_uint prev_state,
4862  epiworld_fast_uint new_state
4863  );
4864 
4865  void record_transition(epiworld_fast_uint from, epiworld_fast_uint to, bool undo);
4866 
4867 
4868 public:
4869 
4870  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
4871  int n_transmissions_potential = 0;
4872  int n_transmissions_today = 0;
4873  #endif
4874 
4875  DataBase() = delete;
4876  DataBase(Model<TSeq> & m) : model(&m), user_data(m) {};
4877  DataBase(const DataBase<TSeq> & db);
4878  // DataBase<TSeq> & operator=(const DataBase<TSeq> & m);
4879 
4888  void record_virus(Virus<TSeq> & v);
4889  void record_tool(Tool<TSeq> & t);
4890  void set_seq_hasher(std::function<std::vector<int>(TSeq)> fun);

4894

4896  const std::vector< int > & get_nexposed() const;
4897  size_t size() const;
4898 
4912  int get_today_total(const std::string & what) const;
4913  int get_today_total(const epiworld_fast_uint & what) const;
4914  void get_today_total(
4915  std::vector< std::string > * state = nullptr,
4916  std::vector< int > * counts = nullptr
4917  ) const;
4918

4920  std::vector< std::string > & state,
4921  std::vector< int > & id,
4922  std::vector< int > & counts
4923  ) const;

4926  std::vector< int > & counts
4927  ) const;

4930  std::vector< int > * date,
4931  std::vector< std::string > * state,
4932  std::vector< int > * counts
4933  ) const;

4936  std::vector< int > & date,
4937  std::vector< int > & id,
4938  std::vector< std::string > & state,
4939  std::vector< int > & counts
4940  ) const;
4941

4943  std::vector< int > & date,
4944  std::vector< int > & id,
4945  std::vector< std::string > & state,
4946  std::vector< int > & counts
4947  ) const;
4948
