4950  std::vector< std::string > & state_from,
4951  std::vector< std::string > & state_to,
4952  std::vector< int > & date,
4953  std::vector< int > & counts,
4954  bool skip_zeros
4955  ) const;
4957 
4968  void get_transmissions(
4969  std::vector<int> & date,
4970  std::vector<int> & source,
4971  std::vector<int> & target,
4972  std::vector<int> & virus,
4973  std::vector<int> & source_exposure_date
4974  ) const;
4975 
4976  void get_transmissions(
4977  int * date,
4978  int * source,
4979  int * target,
4980  int * virus,
4981  int * source_exposure_date
4982  ) const;
4984 
4985  void write_data(
4986  std::string fn_virus_info,
4987  std::string fn_virus_hist,
4988  std::string fn_tool_info,
4989  std::string fn_tool_hist,
4990  std::string fn_total_hist,
4991  std::string fn_transmission,
4992  std::string fn_transition,
4993  std::string fn_reproductive_number,
4994  std::string fn_generation_time
4995  ) const;
4996 
4997  /***
4998  * @brief Record a transmission event
4999  * @param i,j Integers. Id of the source and target agents.
5000  * @param virus Integer. Id of the virus.
5001  * @param i_expo_date Integer. Date when the source agent was infected.
5002  * @details
5003  * If i is -1, then it means that the agent was assigned a virus at the
5004  * beginning of the simulation.
5005  */
5006  void record_transmission(int i, int j, int virus, int i_expo_date);
5007 
5008  size_t get_n_viruses() const;
5009  size_t get_n_tools() const;
5010 
5011  void set_user_data(std::vector< std::string > names);
5012  void add_user_data(std::vector< epiworld_double > x);
5013  void add_user_data(epiworld_fast_uint j, epiworld_double x);
5014  UserData<TSeq> & get_user_data();
5015 
5016 
5032  MapVec_type<int,int> get_reproductive_number() const;
5033 
5034  void get_reproductive_number(
5035  std::string fn
5036  ) const;
5038 
5052  std::vector< epiworld_double > get_transition_probability(
5053  bool print = true,
5054  bool normalize = true
5055  ) const;
5056 
5057  bool operator==(const DataBase<TSeq> & other) const;
5058  bool operator!=(const DataBase<TSeq> & other) const {return !operator==(other);};
5059 
5069  void get_generation_time(
5070  std::vector< int > & agent_id,
5071  std::vector< int > & virus_id,
5072  std::vector< int > & time,
5073  std::vector< int > & gentime
5074  ) const;
5075 
5076  void get_generation_time(
5077  std::string fn
5078  ) const;
5080 
5081 };
5082 
5083 
5084 #endif
5085 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
5087 
5088  End of -include/epiworld//database-bones.hpp-
5089 
5092 
5093 
5094 
5095 template<typename TSeq>
5096 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::reset()
5097 {
5098 
5099  // Initializing the counts
5100  today_total.resize(model->nstates);
5101  std::fill(today_total.begin(), today_total.end(), 0);
5102  for (auto & p : model->get_agents())
5103  ++today_total[p.get_state()];
5104 
5105  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
5106  // Only the first should be different from zero
5107  {
5108  int n = static_cast<int>(model->size());
5109  if (today_total[0] != n)
5110  throw std::runtime_error("The number of susceptible agents is not equal to the total number of agents.");
5111 
5112  if (std::accumulate(today_total.begin(), today_total.end(), 0) != n)
5113  throw std::runtime_error("The total number of agents is not equal to the sum of the number of agents in each state.");
5114 
5115  }
5116  #endif
5117 
5118 
5119  transition_matrix.resize(model->nstates * model->nstates);
5120  std::fill(transition_matrix.begin(), transition_matrix.end(), 0);
5121  for (size_t s = 0u; s < model->nstates; ++s)
5122  transition_matrix[s + s * model->nstates] = today_total[s];
5123 
5124  hist_virus_date.clear();
5125  hist_virus_id.clear();
5126  hist_virus_state.clear();
5127  hist_virus_counts.clear();
5128 
5129  hist_tool_date.clear();
5130  hist_tool_id.clear();
5131  hist_tool_state.clear();
5132  hist_tool_counts.clear();
5133 
5134  today_virus.resize(get_n_viruses());
5135  for (auto& virus_states : today_virus)
5136  virus_states.assign(model->nstates, 0);
5137 
5138  today_tool.resize(get_n_tools());
5139  for (auto& tool_states : today_tool)
5140  tool_states.assign(model->nstates, 0);
5141 
5142  hist_total_date.clear();
5143  hist_total_state.clear();
5144  hist_total_nviruses_active.clear();
5145  hist_total_counts.clear();
5146  hist_transition_matrix.clear();
5147 
5148  transmission_date.clear();
5149  transmission_virus.clear();
5150  transmission_source.clear();
5151  transmission_target.clear();
5152  transmission_source_exposure_date.clear();
5153 
5154  return;
5155 
5156 }
5157 
5158 template<typename TSeq>
5159 inline DataBase<TSeq>::DataBase(const DataBase<TSeq> & db) :
5160  virus_id(db.virus_id),
5161  virus_name(db.virus_name),
5162  virus_sequence(db.virus_sequence),
5163  virus_origin_date(db.virus_origin_date),
5164  virus_parent_id(db.virus_parent_id),
5165  tool_id(db.tool_id),
5166  tool_name(db.tool_name),
5167  tool_sequence(db.tool_sequence),
5168  tool_origin_date(db.tool_origin_date),
5169  seq_hasher(db.seq_hasher),
5170  seq_writer(db.seq_writer),
5171  // {Variant 1: {state 1, state 2, etc.}, Variant 2: {...}, ...}
5172  today_virus(db.today_virus),
5173  // {Variant 1: {state 1, state 2, etc.}, Variant 2: {...}, ...}
5174  today_tool(db.today_tool),
5175  // {Susceptible, Infected, etc.}
5176  today_total(db.today_total),
5177  // Totals
5178  today_total_nviruses_active(db.today_total_nviruses_active),
5179  sampling_freq(db.sampling_freq),
5180  // Variants history
5181  hist_virus_date(db.hist_virus_date),
5182  hist_virus_id(db.hist_virus_id),
5183  hist_virus_state(db.hist_virus_state),
5184  hist_virus_counts(db.hist_virus_counts),
5185  // Tools history
5186  hist_tool_date(db.hist_tool_date),
5187  hist_tool_id(db.hist_tool_id),
5188  hist_tool_state(db.hist_tool_state),
5189  hist_tool_counts(db.hist_tool_counts),
5190  // Overall hist
5191  hist_total_date(db.hist_total_date),
5192  hist_total_nviruses_active(db.hist_total_nviruses_active),
5193  hist_total_state(db.hist_total_state),
5194  hist_total_counts(db.hist_total_counts),
5195  hist_transition_matrix(db.hist_transition_matrix),
5196  // Transmission network
5197  transmission_date(db.transmission_date),
5198  transmission_source(db.transmission_source),
5199  transmission_target(db.transmission_target),
5200  transmission_virus(db.transmission_virus),
5201  transmission_source_exposure_date(db.transmission_source_exposure_date),
5202  transition_matrix(db.transition_matrix),
5203  user_data(nullptr)
5204 {}
5205 
5206 // DataBase<TSeq> & DataBase<TSeq>::operator=(const DataBase<TSeq> & m)
5207 // {
5208 
5209 // }
5210 
5211 template<typename TSeq>
5212 inline Model<TSeq> * DataBase<TSeq>::get_model() {
5213  return model;
5214 }
5215 
5216 template<typename TSeq>
5217 inline const std::vector< TSeq > & DataBase<TSeq>::get_sequence() const {
5218  return virus_sequence;
5219 }
5220 
5221 template<typename TSeq>
5222 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::record()
5223 {
5224 
5226  // DEBUGGING BLOCK
5228  EPI_DEBUG_SUM_INT(today_total, model->size())
5229  EPI_DEBUG_ALL_NON_NEGATIVE(today_total)
5230 
5231  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
5232  // Checking whether the sums correspond
5233  std::vector< int > _today_total_cp(today_total.size(), 0);
5234  for (auto & p : model->population)
5235  _today_total_cp[p.get_state()]++;
5236 
5237  EPI_DEBUG_VECTOR_MATCH_INT(
5238  _today_total_cp, today_total,
5239  "Sums of __today_total_cp in database-meat.hpp"
5240  )
5241 
5242  if (model->today() == 0)
5243  {
5244  if (hist_total_date.size() != 0)
5245  EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "DataBase::record hist_total_date should be of length 0.")
5246  if (hist_total_nviruses_active.size() != 0)
5247  EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "DataBase::record hist_total_nviruses_active should be of length 0.")
5248  if (hist_total_state.size() != 0)
5249  EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "DataBase::record hist_total_state should be of length 0.")
5250  if (hist_total_counts.size() != 0)
5251  EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "DataBase::record hist_total_counts should be of length 0.")
5252  if (hist_virus_date.size() != 0)
5253  EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "DataBase::record hist_virus_date should be of length 0.")
5254  if (hist_virus_id.size() != 0)
5255  EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "DataBase::record hist_virus_id should be of length 0.")
5256  if (hist_virus_state.size() != 0)
5257  EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "DataBase::record hist_virus_state should be of length 0.")
5258  if (hist_virus_counts.size() != 0)
5259  EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "DataBase::record hist_virus_counts should be of length 0.")
5260  if (hist_tool_date.size() != 0)
5261  EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "DataBase::record hist_tool_date should be of length 0.")
5262  if (hist_tool_id.size() != 0)
5263  EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "DataBase::record hist_tool_id should be of length 0.")
5264  if (hist_tool_state.size() != 0)
5265  EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "DataBase::record hist_tool_state should be of length 0.")
5266  if (hist_tool_counts.size() != 0)
5267  EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "DataBase::record hist_tool_counts should be of length 0.")
5268  }
5269  #endif
5271 
5272  // Only store every now and then
5273  if ((model->today() % sampling_freq) == 0)
5274  {
5275 
5276  // Recording virus's history
5277  for (auto & p : virus_id)
5278  {
5279 
5280  for (epiworld_fast_uint s = 0u; s < model->nstates; ++s)
5281  {
5282 
5283  hist_virus_date.push_back(model->today());
5284  hist_virus_id.push_back(p.second);
5285  hist_virus_state.push_back(s);
5286  hist_virus_counts.push_back(today_virus[p.second][s]);
5287 
5288  }
5289 
5290  }
5291 
5292  // Recording tool's history
5293  for (auto & p : tool_id)
5294  {
5295 
5296  for (epiworld_fast_uint s = 0u; s < model->nstates; ++s)
5297  {
5298 
5299  hist_tool_date.push_back(model->today());
5300  hist_tool_id.push_back(p.second);
5301  hist_tool_state.push_back(s);
5302  hist_tool_counts.push_back(today_tool[p.second][s]);
5303 
5304  }
5305 
5306  }
5307 
5308  // Recording the overall history
5309  for (epiworld_fast_uint s = 0u; s < model->nstates; ++s)
5310  {
5311  hist_total_date.push_back(model->today());
5312  hist_total_nviruses_active.push_back(today_total_nviruses_active);
5313  hist_total_state.push_back(s);
5314  hist_total_counts.push_back(today_total[s]);
5315  }
5316 
5317  for (const auto& cell : transition_matrix)
5318  hist_transition_matrix.push_back(cell);
5319 
5320  // Now the diagonal must reflect the state
5321  for (size_t s_i = 0u; s_i < model->nstates; ++s_i)
5322  {
5323 
5324  for (size_t s_j = 0u; s_j < model->nstates; ++s_j)
5325  {
5326 
5327  if ((s_i != s_j) && (transition_matrix[s_i + s_j * model->nstates] > 0))
5328  {
5329  transition_matrix[s_j + s_j * model->nstates] +=
5330  transition_matrix[s_i + s_j * model->nstates];
5331 
5332  transition_matrix[s_i + s_j * model->nstates] = 0;
5333  }
5334 
5335  }
5336 
5337  }
5338 
5339  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
5340  for (size_t s_i = 0u; s_i < model->nstates; ++s_i)
5341  {
5342  if (transition_matrix[s_i + s_i * model->nstates] !=
5343  today_total[s_i])
5344  throw std::logic_error(
5345  "The diagonal of the updated transition Matrix should match the daily totals"
5346  );
5347  }
5348  #endif
5349 
5350  }
5351 
5352 }
5353 
5354 template<typename TSeq>
5355 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::record_virus(Virus<TSeq> & v)
5356 {
5357 
5358  // If no sequence, then need to add one. This is regardless of the case
5359  EPI_IF_TSEQ_LESS_EQ_INT( TSeq )
5360  {
5361  if (v.get_sequence() == -1)
5362  v.set_sequence(default_sequence<TSeq>(
5363  static_cast<int>(virus_name.size())
5364  ));
5365  }
5366  else
5367  {
5368  if (v.get_sequence() == nullptr)
5369  v.set_sequence(default_sequence<TSeq>(
5370  static_cast<int>(virus_name.size())
5371  ));
5372  }
5373 
5374  // Negative id -> virus hasn't been recorded
5375  if (v.get_id() < 0)
5376  {
5377 
5378  epiworld_fast_uint new_id = virus_id.size();
5379  virus_name.push_back(v.get_name());
5380 
5381  // Generating the hash
5382  std::vector< int > hash;
5383  EPI_IF_TSEQ_LESS_EQ_INT( TSeq )
5384  {
5385  hash = seq_hasher(v.get_sequence());
5386  virus_id[hash] = new_id;
5387  virus_sequence.push_back(v.get_sequence());
5388  }
5389  else
5390  {
5391  hash = seq_hasher(*v.get_sequence());
5392  virus_id[hash] = new_id;
5393  virus_sequence.push_back(*v.get_sequence());
5394  }
5395 
5396 
5397  virus_origin_date.push_back(model->today());
5398 
5399  virus_parent_id.push_back(v.get_id()); // Must be -99
5400 
5401  today_virus.push_back({});
5402  today_virus[new_id].resize(model->nstates, 0);
5403 
5404  // Updating the variant
5405  v.set_id(new_id);
5406  v.set_date(model->today());
5407 
5408  today_total_nviruses_active++;
5409 
5410  }
5411  else
5412  { // In this case, the virus is already on record, need to make sure
5413  // The new sequence is new.
5414 
5415  // Updating registry
5416  std::vector< int > hash;
5417  EPI_IF_TSEQ_LESS_EQ_INT(TSeq)
5418  {
5419  hash = seq_hasher(v.get_sequence());
5420  }
5421  else
5422  {
5423  hash = seq_hasher(*v.get_sequence());
5424  }
5425  epiworld_fast_uint old_id = v.get_id();
5426  epiworld_fast_uint new_id;
5427 
5428  // If the sequence is new, then it means that the
5429  if (virus_id.find(hash) == virus_id.end())
5430  {
5431 
5432  new_id = virus_id.size();
5433  virus_id[hash] = new_id;
5434  virus_name.push_back(v.get_name());
5435 
5436  EPI_IF_TSEQ_LESS_EQ_INT( TSeq )
5437  {
5438  virus_sequence.push_back(v.get_sequence());
5439  }
5440  else
5441  {
5442  virus_sequence.push_back(*v.get_sequence());
5443  }
5444 
5445  virus_origin_date.push_back(model->today());
5446 
5447  virus_parent_id.push_back(old_id);
5448 
5449  today_virus.push_back({});
5450  today_virus[new_id].resize(model->nstates, 0);
5451 
5452  // Updating the variant
5453  v.set_id(new_id);
5454  v.set_date(model->today());
5455 
5456  today_total_nviruses_active++;
5457 
5458  } else {
5459 
5460  // Finding the id
5461  new_id = virus_id[hash];
5462 
5463  // Reflecting the change
5464  v.set_id(new_id);
5465  v.set_date(virus_origin_date[new_id]);
5466 
5467  }
5468 
5469  // Moving statistics (only if we are affecting an individual)
5470  if (v.get_agent() != nullptr)
5471  {
5472  // Correcting math
5473  epiworld_fast_uint tmp_state = v.get_agent()->get_state();
5474  today_virus[old_id][tmp_state]--;
5475  today_virus[new_id][tmp_state]++;
5476 
5477  }
5478 
5479  }
5480 
5481  return;
5482 
5483 }
5484 
5485 template<typename TSeq>
5486 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::record_tool(Tool<TSeq> & t)
5487 {
5488 
5489  EPI_IF_TSEQ_LESS_EQ_INT( TSeq )
5490  {
5491  if (t.get_sequence() == -1)
5492  t.set_sequence(default_sequence<TSeq>(
5493  static_cast<int>(tool_name.size())
5494  ));
5495  }
5496  else
5497  {
5498  if (t.get_sequence() == nullptr)
5499  t.set_sequence(default_sequence<TSeq>(
5500  static_cast<int>(tool_name.size())
5501  ));
5502  }
5503 
5504  if (t.get_id() < 0)
5505  {
5506 
5507  epiworld_fast_uint new_id = tool_id.size();
5508  tool_name.push_back(t.get_name());
5509 
5510  std::vector< int > hash;
5511  EPI_IF_TSEQ_LESS_EQ_INT( TSeq )
5512  {
5513  hash = seq_hasher(t.get_sequence());
5514  tool_id[hash] = new_id;
5515  tool_sequence.push_back(t.get_sequence());
5516  }
5517  else
5518  {
5519  hash = seq_hasher(*t.get_sequence());
5520  tool_id[hash] = new_id;
5521  tool_sequence.push_back(*t.get_sequence());
5522 
5523  }
5524  tool_origin_date.push_back(model->today());
5525 
5526  today_tool.push_back({});
5527  today_tool[new_id].resize(model->nstates, 0);
5528 
5529  // Updating the tool
5530  t.set_id(new_id);
5531  t.set_date(model->today());
5532 
5533  } else {
5534 
5535  // Updating registry
5536  std::vector< int > hash;
5537  EPI_IF_TSEQ_LESS_EQ_INT( TSeq )
5538  {
5539  hash = seq_hasher(t.get_sequence());
5540  }
5541  else
5542  {
5543  hash = seq_hasher(*t.get_sequence());
5544  }
5545  epiworld_fast_uint old_id = t.get_id();
5546  epiworld_fast_uint new_id;
5547 
5548  if (tool_id.find(hash) == tool_id.end())
5549  {
5550 
5551  new_id = tool_id.size();
5552  tool_id[hash] = new_id;
5553  tool_name.push_back(t.get_name());
5554 
5555  EPI_IF_TSEQ_LESS_EQ_INT( TSeq )
5556  {
5557  tool_sequence.push_back(t.get_sequence());
5558  }
5559  else
5560  {
5561  tool_sequence.push_back(*t.get_sequence());
5562  }
5563 
5564  tool_origin_date.push_back(model->today());
5565 
5566  today_tool.push_back({});
5567  today_tool[new_id].resize(model->nstates, 0);
5568 
5569  // Updating the tool
5570  t.set_id(new_id);
5571  t.set_date(model->today());
5572 
5573  } else {
5574 
5575  // Finding the id
5576  new_id = tool_id[hash];
5577 
5578  // Reflecting the change
5579  t.set_id(new_id);
5580  t.set_date(tool_origin_date[new_id]);
5581 
5582  }
5583 
5584  // Moving statistics (only if we are affecting an individual)
5585  if (t.get_agent() != nullptr)
5586  {
5587  // Correcting math
5588  epiworld_fast_uint tmp_state = t.get_agent()->get_state();
5589  today_tool[old_id][tmp_state]--;
5590  today_tool[new_id][tmp_state]++;
5591 
5592  }
5593 
5594  }
5595 
5596 
5597 
5598  return;
5599 }
5600 
5601 template<typename TSeq>
5602 inline size_t DataBase<TSeq>::size() const
5603 {
5604  return virus_id.size();
5605 }
5606 
5607 template<typename TSeq>
5608 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::update_state(
5609  epiworld_fast_uint prev_state,
5610  epiworld_fast_uint new_state,
5611  bool undo
5612 ) {
5613 
5614  if (prev_state == new_state)
5615  return; // No need to update if the state is the same
5616 
5617  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
5618  // Checking ranges (should be within expected)
5619  if ((prev_state >= model->nstates))
5620  throw std::out_of_range(
5621  "prev_state is out of range in DataBase::update_state"
5622  );
5623  if ((new_state >= model->nstates))
5624  throw std::out_of_range(
5625  "new_state is out of range in DataBase::update_state"
5626  );
5627  if (prev_state == new_state)
5628  throw std::logic_error(
5629  "prev_state and new_state are the same in DataBase::update_state"
5630  );
5631  #endif
5632 
5633  if (undo)
5634  {
5635 
5636  today_total[prev_state]++;
5637  today_total[new_state]--;
5638 
5639  } else {
5640 
5641  today_total[prev_state]--;
5642  today_total[new_state]++;
5643 
5644  }
5645 
5646  record_transition(prev_state, new_state, undo);
5647 
5648  return;
5649 }
5650 
5651 template<typename TSeq>
5652 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::update_virus(
5653  epiworld_fast_uint virus_id,
5654  epiworld_fast_uint prev_state,
5655  epiworld_fast_uint new_state
5656 ) {
5657 
5658  today_virus[virus_id][prev_state]--;
5659  today_virus[virus_id][new_state]++;
5660 
5661  return;
5662 
5663 }
5664 
5665 template<typename TSeq>
5666 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::update_tool(
5667  epiworld_fast_uint tool_id,
5668  epiworld_fast_uint prev_state,
5669  epiworld_fast_uint new_state
5670 ) {
5671 
5672 
5673  today_tool[tool_id][prev_state]--;
5674  today_tool[tool_id][new_state]++;
5675 
5676  return;
5677 
5678 }
5679 
5680 template<typename TSeq>
5681 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::record_transition(
5682  epiworld_fast_uint from,
5683  epiworld_fast_uint to,
5684  bool undo
5685 ) {
5686 
5687  if (undo)
5688  {
5689 
5690  transition_matrix[to * model->nstates + from]--;
5691  transition_matrix[from * model->nstates + from]++;
5692 
5693  } else {
5694 
5695  transition_matrix[to * model->nstates + from]++;
5696  transition_matrix[from * model->nstates + from]--;
5697 
5698  }
5699 
5700  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
5701  if (transition_matrix[from * model->nstates + from] < 0)
5702  throw std::logic_error("An entry in transition matrix is negative.");
5703  #endif
5704 
5705 }
5706 
5707 template<typename TSeq>
5708 inline int DataBase<TSeq>::get_today_total(
5709  const std::string & what
5710 ) const
5711 {
5712 
5713  for (auto i = 0u; i < model->states_labels.size(); ++i)
5714  {
5715  if (model->states_labels[i] == what)
5716  return today_total[i];
5717  }
5718 
5719  throw std::range_error("The value '" + what + "' is not in the model.");
5720 
5721 }
5722 
5723 template<typename TSeq>
5724 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::get_today_total(
5725  std::vector< std::string > * state,
5726  std::vector< int > * counts
5727 ) const
5728 {
5729  if (state != nullptr)
5730  (*state) = model->states_labels;
5731 
5732  if (counts != nullptr)
5733  *counts = today_total;
5734 
5735 }
5736 
5737 template<typename TSeq>
5738 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::get_today_virus(
5739  std::vector< std::string > & state,
5740  std::vector< int > & id,
5741  std::vector< int > & counts
5742  ) const
5743 {
5744 
5745  state.resize(today_virus.size(), "");
5746  id.resize(today_virus.size(), 0);
5747  counts.resize(today_virus.size(),0);
5748 
5749  int n = 0u;
5750  for (epiworld_fast_uint v = 0u; v < today_virus.size(); ++v)
5751  for (epiworld_fast_uint s = 0u; s < model->states_labels.size(); ++s)
5752  {
5753  state[n] = model->states_labels[s];
5754  id[n] = static_cast<int>(v);
5755  counts[n++] = today_virus[v][s];
5756 
5757  }
5758 
5759 }
5760 
5761 template<typename TSeq>
5762 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::get_hist_total(
5763  std::vector< int > * date,
5764  std::vector< std::string > * state,
5765  std::vector< int > * counts
5766 ) const
5767 {
5768 
5769  if (date != nullptr)
5770  *date = hist_total_date;
5771 
5772  if (state != nullptr)
5773  {
5774  state->resize(hist_total_state.size(), "");
5775  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0u; i < hist_total_state.size(); ++i)
5776  state->operator[](i) = model->states_labels[hist_total_state[i]];
5777  }
5778 
5779  if (counts != nullptr)
5780  *counts = hist_total_counts;
5781 
5782  return;
5783 
5784 }
5785 
5786 template<typename TSeq>
5787 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::get_hist_virus(
5788  std::vector< int > & date,
5789  std::vector< int > & id,
5790  std::vector< std::string > & state,
5791  std::vector< int > & counts
5792 ) const {
5793 
5794  date = hist_virus_date;
5795  const auto& labels = model->states_labels;
5796 
5797  id = hist_virus_id;
5798  state.resize(hist_virus_state.size(), "");
5799  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0u; i < hist_virus_state.size(); ++i)
5800  state[i] = labels[hist_virus_state[i]];
5801 
5802  counts = hist_virus_counts;
5803 
5804  return;
5805 
5806 }
5807 
5808 
5809 template<typename TSeq>
5810 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::get_hist_tool(
5811  std::vector< int > & date,
5812  std::vector< int > & id,
5813  std::vector< std::string > & state,
5814  std::vector< int > & counts
5815 ) const {
5816 
5817  date = hist_tool_date;
5818  const auto& labels = model->states_labels;
5819 
5820  id = hist_tool_id;
5821  state.resize(hist_tool_state.size(), "");
5822  for (size_t i = 0u; i < hist_tool_state.size(); ++i)
5823  state[i] = labels[hist_tool_state[i]];
5824 
5825  counts = hist_tool_counts;
5826 
5827  return;
5828 
5829 }
5830 
5831 template<typename TSeq>
5832 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::get_today_transition_matrix(
5833  std::vector< int > & counts
5834 ) const
5835 {
5836 
5837  counts = transition_matrix;
5838 
5839  return;
5840 
5841 }
5842 
5843 template<typename TSeq>
5844 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::get_hist_transition_matrix(
5845  std::vector< std::string > & state_from,
5846  std::vector< std::string > & state_to,
5847  std::vector< int > & date,
5848  std::vector< int > & counts,
5849  bool skip_zeros
5850 ) const
5851 {
5852 
5853  size_t n = this->hist_transition_matrix.size();
5854 
5855  // Clearing the previous vectors
5856  state_from.clear();
5857  state_to.clear();
5858  date.clear();
5859  counts.clear();
5860 
5861  // Reserving space
5862  state_from.reserve(n);
5863  state_to.reserve(n);
5864  date.reserve(n);
5865  counts.reserve(n);
5866 
5867  size_t n_states = model->nstates;
5868  size_t n_steps = model->get_ndays();
5869 
5870  // If n is zero, then we are done
5871  if (n == 0u)
5872  return;
5873 
5874  for (size_t step = 0u; step <= n_steps; ++step) // The final step counts
5875  {
5876  for (size_t j = 0u; j < n_states; ++j) // Column major storage
5877  {
5878  for (size_t i = 0u; i < n_states; ++i)
5879  {
5880  // Retrieving the value of the day
5881  int v = hist_transition_matrix[
5882  step * n_states * n_states + // Day of the data
5883  j * n_states + // Column (to)
5884  i // Row (from)
5885  ];
5886 
5887  // If we are skipping the zeros and it is zero, then don't save
5888  if (skip_zeros && v == 0)
5889  continue;
5890 
5891  state_from.push_back(model->states_labels[i]);
5892  state_to.push_back(model->states_labels[j]);
5893  date.push_back(hist_total_date[step * n_states]);
5894  counts.push_back(v);
5895 
5896  }
5897 
5898  }
5899  }
5900 
5901  return;
5902 
5903 
5904 }
5905 
5906 template<typename TSeq>
5907 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::get_transmissions(
5908  std::vector<int> & date,
5909  std::vector<int> & source,
5910  std::vector<int> & target,
5911  std::vector<int> & virus,
5912  std::vector<int> & source_exposure_date
5913 ) const
5914 {
5915 
5916  size_t nevents = transmission_date.size();
5917 
5918  date.resize(nevents);
5919  source.resize(nevents);
5920  target.resize(nevents);
5921  virus.resize(nevents);
5922  source_exposure_date.resize(nevents);
5923 
5924  get_transmissions(
5925  &date[0u],
5926  &source[0u],
5927  &target[0u],
5928  &virus[0u],
5929  &source_exposure_date[0u]
5930  );
5931 
5932 }
5933 
5934 template<typename TSeq>
5935 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::get_transmissions(
5936  int * date,
5937  int * source,
5938  int * target,
5939  int * virus,
5940  int * source_exposure_date
5941 ) const
5942 {
5943 
5944  size_t nevents = transmission_date.size();
5945 
5946  for (size_t i = 0u; i < nevents; ++i)
5947  {
5948 
5949  *(date + i) = transmission_date.at(i);
5950  *(source + i) = transmission_source.at(i);
5951  *(target + i) = transmission_target.at(i);
5952  *(virus + i) = transmission_virus.at(i);
5953  *(source_exposure_date + i) = transmission_source_exposure_date.at(i);
5954 
5955  }
5956 
5957 }
5958 
5959 template<typename TSeq>
5960 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::write_data(
5961  std::string fn_virus_info,
5962  std::string fn_virus_hist,
5963  std::string fn_tool_info,
5964  std::string fn_tool_hist,
5965  std::string fn_total_hist,
5966  std::string fn_transmission,
5967  std::string fn_transition,
5968  std::string fn_reproductive_number,
5969  std::string fn_generation_time
5970 ) const
5971 {
5972 
5973  if (fn_virus_info != "")
5974  {
5975  std::ofstream file_virus_info(fn_virus_info, std::ios_base::out);
5976 
5977  // Check if the file exists and throw an error if it doesn't
5978  if (!file_virus_info)
5979  {
5980  throw std::runtime_error(
5981  "Could not open file \"" + fn_virus_info +
5982  "\" for writing.")
5983  ;
5984  }
5985 
5986 
5987  file_virus_info <<
5988  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
5989  "thread" << "virus_id " << "virus " << "virus_sequence " << "date_recorded " << "parent\n";
5990  #else
5991  "virus_id " << "virus " << "virus_sequence " << "date_recorded " << "parent\n";
5992  #endif
5993 
5994  for (const auto & v : virus_id)
5995  {
5996  int id = v.second;
5997  file_virus_info <<
5998  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
5999  EPI_GET_THREAD_ID() << " " <<
6000  #endif
6001  id << " \"" <<
6002  virus_name[id] << "\" " <<
6003  seq_writer(virus_sequence[id]) << " " <<
6004  virus_origin_date[id] << " " <<
6005  virus_parent_id[id] << "\n";
6006  }
6007 
6008  }
6009 
6010  if (fn_virus_hist != "")
6011  {
6012  std::ofstream file_virus(fn_virus_hist, std::ios_base::out);
6013 
6014  // Repeat the same error if the file doesn't exists
6015  if (!file_virus)
6016  {
6017  throw std::runtime_error(
6018  "Could not open file \"" + fn_virus_hist +
6019  "\" for writing.")
6020  ;
6021  }
6022 
6023  file_virus <<
6024  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
6025  "thread "<< "date " << "virus_id " << "virus " << "state " << "n\n";
6026  #else
6027  "date " << "virus_id " << "virus " << "state " << "n\n";
6028  #endif
6029 
6030  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0; i < hist_virus_id.size(); ++i)
6031  file_virus <<
6032  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
6033  EPI_GET_THREAD_ID() << " " <<
6034  #endif
6035  hist_virus_date[i] << " " <<
6036  hist_virus_id[i] << " \"" <<
6037  virus_name[hist_virus_id[i]] << "\" " <<
6038  model->states_labels[hist_virus_state[i]] << " " <<
6039  hist_virus_counts[i] << "\n";
6040  }
6041 
6042  if (fn_tool_info != "")
6043  {
6044  std::ofstream file_tool_info(fn_tool_info, std::ios_base::out);
6045 
6046  // Repeat the same error if the file doesn't exists
6047  if (!file_tool_info)
6048  {
6049  throw std::runtime_error(
6050  "Could not open file \"" + fn_tool_info +
6051  "\" for writing.")
6052  ;
6053  }
6054 
6055  file_tool_info <<
6056  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
6057  "thread " <<
6058  #endif
6059  "id " << "tool_name " << "tool_sequence " << "date_recorded\n";
6060 
6061  for (const auto & t : tool_id)
6062  {
6063  int id = t.second;
6064  file_tool_info <<
6065  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
6066  EPI_GET_THREAD_ID() << " " <<
6067  #endif
6068  id << " \"" <<
6069  tool_name[id] << "\" " <<
6070  seq_writer(tool_sequence[id]) << " " <<
6071  tool_origin_date[id] << "\n";
6072  }
6073 
6074  }
6075 
6076  if (fn_tool_hist != "")
6077  {
6078  std::ofstream file_tool_hist(fn_tool_hist, std::ios_base::out);
6079 
6080  // Repeat the same error if the file doesn't exists
6081  if (!file_tool_hist)
6082  {
6083  throw std::runtime_error(
6084  "Could not open file \"" + fn_tool_hist +
6085  "\" for writing.")
6086  ;
6087  }
6088 
6089  file_tool_hist <<
6090  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
6091  "thread " <<
6092  #endif
6093  "date " << "id " << "state " << "n\n";
6094 
6095  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0; i < hist_tool_id.size(); ++i)
6096  file_tool_hist <<
6097  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
6098  EPI_GET_THREAD_ID() << " " <<
6099  #endif
6100  hist_tool_date[i] << " " <<
6101  hist_tool_id[i] << " " <<
6102  model->states_labels[hist_tool_state[i]] << " " <<
6103  hist_tool_counts[i] << "\n";
6104  }
6105 
6106  if (fn_total_hist != "")
6107  {
6108  std::ofstream file_total(fn_total_hist, std::ios_base::out);
6109 
6110  // Repeat the same error if the file doesn't exists
6111  if (!file_total)
6112  {
6113  throw std::runtime_error(
6114  "Could not open file \"" + fn_total_hist +
6115  "\" for writing.")
6116  ;
6117  }
6118 
6119  file_total <<
6120  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
6121  "thread " <<
6122  #endif
6123  "date " << "nviruses " << "state " << "counts\n";
6124 
6125  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0; i < hist_total_date.size(); ++i)
6126  file_total <<
6127  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
6128  EPI_GET_THREAD_ID() << " " <<
6129  #endif
6130  hist_total_date[i] << " " <<
6131  hist_total_nviruses_active[i] << " \"" <<
6132  model->states_labels[hist_total_state[i]] << "\" " <<
6133  hist_total_counts[i] << "\n";
6134  }
6135 
6136  if (fn_transmission != "")
6137  {
6138  std::ofstream file_transmission(fn_transmission, std::ios_base::out);
6139 
6140  // Repeat the same error if the file doesn't exists
6141  if (!file_transmission)
6142  {
6143  throw std::runtime_error(
6144  "Could not open file \"" + fn_transmission +
6145  "\" for writing.")
6146  ;
6147  }
6148 
6149  file_transmission <<
6150  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
6151  "thread " <<
6152  #endif
6153  "date " << "virus_id virus " << "source_exposure_date " << "source " << "target\n";
6154 
6155  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0; i < transmission_target.size(); ++i)
6156  file_transmission <<
6157  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
6158  EPI_GET_THREAD_ID() << " " <<
6159  #endif
6160  transmission_date[i] << " " <<
6161  transmission_virus[i] << " \"" <<
6162  virus_name[transmission_virus[i]] << "\" " <<
6163  transmission_source_exposure_date[i] << " " <<
6164  transmission_source[i] << " " <<
6165  transmission_target[i] << "\n";
6166 
6167  }
6168 
6169  if (fn_transition != "")
6170  {
6171  std::ofstream file_transition(fn_transition, std::ios_base::out);
6172 
6173  // Repeat the same error if the file doesn't exists
6174  if (!file_transition)
6175  {
6176  throw std::runtime_error(
6177  "Could not open file \"" + fn_transition +
6178  "\" for writing.")
6179  ;
6180  }
6181 
6182  file_transition <<
6183  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
6184  "thread " <<
6185  #endif
6186  "date " << "from " << "to " << "counts\n";
6187 
6188  int ns = model->nstates;
6189 
6190  for (int i = 0; i <= model->today(); ++i)
6191  {
6192 
6193  for (int from = 0u; from < ns; ++from)
6194  {
6195  for (int to = 0u; to < ns; ++to)
6196  {
6197  // Skipping the zeros
6198  auto counts = hist_transition_matrix[
6199  i * (ns * ns) + to * ns + from
6200  ];
6201 
6202  if (counts == 0)
6203  continue;
6204 
6205  file_transition <<
6206  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
6207  EPI_GET_THREAD_ID() << " " <<
6208  #endif
6209  i << " \"" <<
6210  model->states_labels[from] << "\" \"" <<
6211  model->states_labels[to] << "\" " <<
6212  counts << "\n";
6213  }
6214  }
6215 
6216  }
6217 
6218  }
6219 
6220  if (fn_reproductive_number != "")
6221  get_reproductive_number(fn_reproductive_number);
6222 
6223  if (fn_generation_time != "")
6224  get_generation_time(fn_generation_time);
6225 
6226 }
6227 
6228 template<typename TSeq>
6229 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::record_transmission(
6230  int i,
6231  int j,
6232  int virus,
6233  int i_expo_date
6234 ) {
6235 
6236  transmission_date.push_back(model->today());
6237  transmission_source.push_back(i);
6238  transmission_target.push_back(j);
6239  transmission_virus.push_back(virus);
6240  transmission_source_exposure_date.push_back(i_expo_date);
6241 
6242 }
6243 
6244 template<typename TSeq>
6245 inline size_t DataBase<TSeq>::get_n_viruses() const
6246 {
6247  return virus_id.size();
6248 }
6249 
6250 template<typename TSeq>
6251 inline size_t DataBase<TSeq>::get_n_tools() const
6252 {
6253  return tool_id.size();
6254 }
6255 
6256 
6257 template<typename TSeq>
6258 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::set_user_data(
6259  std::vector< std::string > names
6260 )
6261 {
6262  user_data = UserData<TSeq>(names);
6263  user_data.model = model;
6264 }
6265 
6266 template<typename TSeq>
6267 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::add_user_data(
6268  std::vector< epiworld_double > x
6269 )
6270 {
6271 
6272  user_data.add(x);
6273 
6274 }
6275 
6276 template<typename TSeq>
6277 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::add_user_data(
6278  epiworld_fast_uint k,
6279  epiworld_double x
6280 )
6281 {
6282 
6283  user_data.add(k, x);
6284 
6285 }
6286 
6287 template<typename TSeq>
6288 inline UserData<TSeq> & DataBase<TSeq>::get_user_data()
6289 {
6290  return user_data;
6291 }
6292 
6293 template<typename TSeq>
6294 inline MapVec_type<int,int> DataBase<TSeq>::get_reproductive_number()
6295 const {
6296 
6297  // Checking size
6298  MapVec_type<int,int> map;
6299 
6300  // Number of digits of maxid
6301  for (size_t i = 0u; i < transmission_date.size(); ++i)
6302  {
6303  // Fabricating id
6304  std::vector< int > h = {
6305  transmission_virus[i],
6306  transmission_source[i],
6307  transmission_source_exposure_date[i]
6308  };
6309 
6310  // Adding to counter
6311  if (map.find(h) == map.end())
6312  map[h] = 1;
6313  else
6314  map[h]++;
6315 
6316  // The target is added
6317  std::vector< int > h_target = {
6318  transmission_virus[i],
6319  transmission_target[i],
6320  transmission_date[i]
6321  };
6322 
6323  map[h_target] = 0;
6324 
6325  }
6326 
6327  return map;
6328 
6329 }
6330 
6331 template<typename TSeq>
6332 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::get_reproductive_number(
6333  std::string fn
6334 ) const {
6335 
6336 
6337  auto map = get_reproductive_number();
6338 
6339  std::ofstream fn_file(fn, std::ios_base::out);
6340 
6341  // Repeat the same error if the file doesn't exists
6342  if (!fn_file)
6343  {
6344  throw std::runtime_error(
6345  "Could not open file \"" + fn +
6346  "\" for writing.")
6347  ;
6348  }
6349 
6350  fn_file <<
6351  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
6352  "thread " <<
6353  #endif
6354  "virus_id virus source source_exposure_date rt\n";
6355 
6356 
6357  for (auto & m : map)
6358  fn_file <<
6359  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
6360  EPI_GET_THREAD_ID() << " " <<
6361  #endif
6362  m.first[0u] << " \"" <<
6363  virus_name[m.first[0u]] << "\" " <<
6364  m.first[1u] << " " <<
6365  m.first[2u] << " " <<
6366  m.second << "\n";
6367 
6368  return;
6369 
6370 }
6371 
6372 template<typename TSeq>
6373 inline std::vector< epiworld_double > DataBase<TSeq>::get_transition_probability(
6374  bool print,
6375  bool normalize
6376 ) const {
6377 
6378  const auto& states_labels = model->get_states();
6379  size_t n_state = states_labels.size();
6380  size_t n_days = model->get_ndays();
6381  std::vector< epiworld_double > res(n_state * n_state, 0.0);
6382  std::vector< epiworld_double > rowsums(n_state, 0.0);
6383 
6384  for (size_t t = 0; t < n_days; ++t)
6385  {
6386 
6387  for (size_t s_i = 0; s_i < n_state; ++s_i)
6388  {
6389 
6390  for (size_t s_j = 0u; s_j < n_state; ++s_j)
6391  {
6392  res[s_i + s_j * n_state] += (
6393  hist_transition_matrix[
6394  s_i + s_j * n_state +
6395  t * (n_state * n_state)
6396  ]
6397  );
6398 
6399  rowsums[s_i] += hist_transition_matrix[
6400  s_i + s_j * n_state +
6401  t * (n_state * n_state)
6402  ];
6403 
6404  }
6405 
6406  }
6407 
6408  }
6409 
6410  if (normalize)
6411  {
6412  for (size_t s_i = 0; s_i < n_state; ++s_i)
6413  {
6414  // Nothing to normalize if the row is zero
6415  if (rowsums[s_i] == 0)
6416  continue;
6417 
6418  for (size_t s_j = 0; s_j < n_state; ++s_j)
6419  res[s_i + s_j * n_state] /= rowsums[s_i];
6420  }
6421  }
6422 
6423  if (print)
6424  {
6425 
6426  size_t nchar = 0u;
6427  for (auto & l : states_labels)
6428  if (l.length() > nchar)
6429  nchar = l.length();
6430 
6431  std::string fmt = " - %-" + std::to_string(nchar) + "s";
6432 
6433  std::string fmt_entry = " % 4.2f";
6434  if (!normalize)
6435  {
6436  nchar = 0u;
6437  for (auto & l: res)
6438  {
6439  std::string tmp = std::to_string(l);
6440  if (tmp.length() > nchar)
6441  nchar = tmp.length();
6442  }
6443 
6444  fmt_entry = " % " + std::to_string(nchar) + ".0f";
6445  }
6446 
6447 
6448  printf_epiworld("\nTransition Probabilities:\n");
6449  for (size_t s_i = 0u; s_i < n_state; ++s_i)
6450  {
6451  printf_epiworld(fmt.c_str(), states_labels[s_i].c_str());
6452  for (size_t s_j = 0u; s_j < n_state; ++s_j)
6453  {
6454  if (
6455  std::isnan(res[s_i + s_j * n_state]) ||
6456  (res[s_i + s_j * n_state] < 1e-10)
6457  )
6458  {
6459  printf_epiworld(" -");
6460  } else {
6461  printf_epiworld(
6462  fmt_entry.c_str(), res[s_i + s_j * n_state]
6463  );
6464  }
6465  }
6466  printf_epiworld("\n");
6467  }
6468 
6469  printf_epiworld("\n");
6470 
6471  }
6472 
6473  return res;
6474 
6475 
6476 }
6477 
6478 #define VECT_MATCH(a, b, c) \
6479  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(a.size() != b.size(), c) \
6480  for (size_t __i = 0u; __i < a.size(); ++__i) \
6481  {\
6482  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(a[__i] != b[__i], c) \
6483  }
6484 
6485 template<>
6486 inline bool DataBase<std::vector<int>>::operator==(const DataBase<std::vector<int>> & other) const
6487 {
6488  VECT_MATCH(
6489  virus_name, other.virus_name,
6490  "DataBase:: virus_name don't match"
6491  )
6492 
6493  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
6494  virus_sequence.size() != other.virus_sequence.size(),
6495  "DataBase:: virus_sequence don't match."
6496  )
6497 
6498  for (size_t i = 0u; i < virus_sequence.size(); ++i)
6499  {
6500  VECT_MATCH(
6501  virus_sequence[i], other.virus_sequence[i],
6502  "DataBase:: virus_sequence[i] don't match"
6503  )
6504  }
6505 
6506  VECT_MATCH(
6507  virus_origin_date,
6508  other.virus_origin_date,
6509  "DataBase:: virus_origin_date[i] don't match"
6510  )
6511 
6512  VECT_MATCH(
6513  virus_parent_id,
6514  other.virus_parent_id,
6515  "DataBase:: virus_parent_id[i] don't match"
6516  )
6517 
6518  VECT_MATCH(
6519  tool_name,
6520  other.tool_name,
6521  "DataBase:: tool_name[i] don't match"
6522  )
6523 
6524  VECT_MATCH(
6525  tool_sequence,
6526  other.tool_sequence,
6527  "DataBase:: tool_sequence[i] don't match"
6528  )
6529 
6530  VECT_MATCH(
6531  tool_origin_date,
6532  other.tool_origin_date,
6533  "DataBase:: tool_origin_date[i] don't match"
6534  )
6535 
6536 
6537  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
6538  sampling_freq != other.sampling_freq,
6539  "DataBase:: sampling_freq don't match."
6540  )
6541 
6542  // Variants history
6543  VECT_MATCH(
6544  hist_virus_date,
6545  other.hist_virus_date,
6546  "DataBase:: hist_virus_date[i] don't match"
6547  )
6548 
6549  VECT_MATCH(
6550  hist_virus_id,
6551  other.hist_virus_id,
6552  "DataBase:: hist_virus_id[i] don't match"
6553  )
6554 
6555  VECT_MATCH(
6556  hist_virus_state,
6557  other.hist_virus_state,
6558  "DataBase:: hist_virus_state[i] don't match"
6559  )
6560 
6561  VECT_MATCH(
6562  hist_virus_counts,
6563  other.hist_virus_counts,
6564  "DataBase:: hist_virus_counts[i] don't match"
6565  )
6566 
6567  // Tools history
6568  VECT_MATCH(
6569  hist_tool_date,
6570  other.hist_tool_date,
6571  "DataBase:: hist_tool_date[i] don't match"
6572  )
6573 
6574  VECT_MATCH(
6575  hist_tool_id,
6576  other.hist_tool_id,
6577  "DataBase:: hist_tool_id[i] don't match"
6578  )
6579 
6580  VECT_MATCH(
6581  hist_tool_state,
6582  other.hist_tool_state,
6583  "DataBase:: hist_tool_state[i] don't match"
6584  )
6585 
6586  VECT_MATCH(
6587  hist_tool_counts,
6588  other.hist_tool_counts,
6589  "DataBase:: hist_tool_counts[i] don't match"
6590  )
6591 
6592  // Overall hist
6593  VECT_MATCH(
6594  hist_total_date,
6595  other.hist_total_date,
6596  "DataBase:: hist_total_date[i] don't match"
6597  )
6598 
6599  VECT_MATCH(
6600  hist_total_nviruses_active,
6601  other.hist_total_nviruses_active,
6602  "DataBase:: hist_total_nviruses_active[i] don't match"
6603  )
6604 
6605  VECT_MATCH(
6606  hist_total_state,
6607  other.hist_total_state,
6608  "DataBase:: hist_total_state[i] don't match"
6609  )
6610 
6611  VECT_MATCH(
6612  hist_total_counts,
6613  other.hist_total_counts,
6614  "DataBase:: hist_total_counts[i] don't match"
6615  )
6616 
6617  VECT_MATCH(
6618  hist_transition_matrix,
6619  other.hist_transition_matrix,
6620  "DataBase:: hist_transition_matrix[i] don't match"
6621  )
6622 
6623  // {Variant 1: {state 1, state 2, etc.}, Variant 2: {...}, ...}
6624  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
6625  today_virus.size() != other.today_virus.size(),
6626  "DataBase:: today_virus don't match."
6627  )
6628 
6629  for (size_t i = 0u; i < today_virus.size(); ++i)
6630  {
6631  VECT_MATCH(
6632  today_virus[i], other.today_virus[i],
6633  "DataBase:: today_virus[i] don't match"
6634  )
6635  }
6636 
6637  // {Variant 1: {state 1, state 2, etc.}, Variant 2: {...}, ...}
6638  if (today_tool.size() != other.today_tool.size())
6639  return false;
6640 
6641  for (size_t i = 0u; i < today_tool.size(); ++i)
6642  {
6643  VECT_MATCH(
6644  today_tool[i], other.today_tool[i],
6645  "DataBase:: today_tool[i] don't match"
6646  )
6647  }
6648 
6649  // {Susceptible, Infected, etc.}
6650  VECT_MATCH(
6651  today_total, other.today_total,
6652  "DataBase:: today_total don't match"
6653  )
6654 
6655  // Totals
6656  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
6657  today_total_nviruses_active != other.today_total_nviruses_active,
6658  "DataBase:: today_total_nviruses_active don't match."
6659  )
6660 
6661  // Transmission network
6662  VECT_MATCH(
6663  transmission_date,
6664  other.transmission_date, ///< Date of the transmission eve,
6665  "DataBase:: transmission_date[i] don't match"
6666  )
6667 
6668  VECT_MATCH(
6669  transmission_source,
6670  other.transmission_source, ///< Id of the sour,
6671  "DataBase:: transmission_source[i] don't match"
6672  )
6673 
6674  VECT_MATCH(
6675  transmission_target,
6676  other.transmission_target, ///< Id of the targ,
6677  "DataBase:: transmission_target[i] don't match"
6678  )
6679 
6680  VECT_MATCH(
6681  transmission_virus,
6682  other.transmission_virus, ///< Id of the varia,
6683  "DataBase:: transmission_virus[i] don't match"
6684  )
6685 
6686  VECT_MATCH(
6687  transmission_source_exposure_date,
6688  other.transmission_source_exposure_date, ///< Date when the source acquired the varia,
6689  "DataBase:: transmission_source_exposure_date[i] don't match"
6690  )
6691 
6692 
6693  VECT_MATCH(
6694  transition_matrix,
6695  other.transition_matrix,
6696  "DataBase:: transition_matrix[i] don't match"
6697  )
6698 
6699 
6700  return true;
6701 
6702 }
6703 
6704 template<typename TSeq>
6705 inline bool DataBase<TSeq>::operator==(const DataBase<TSeq> & other) const
6706 {
6707  VECT_MATCH(
6708  virus_name,
6709  other.virus_name,
6710  "DataBase:: virus_name[i] don't match"
6711  )
6712 
6713  VECT_MATCH(
6714  virus_sequence,
6715  other.virus_sequence,
6716  "DataBase:: virus_sequence[i] don't match"
6717  )
6718 
6719  VECT_MATCH(
6720  virus_origin_date,
6721  other.virus_origin_date,
6722  "DataBase:: virus_origin_date[i] don't match"
6723  )
6724 
6725  VECT_MATCH(
6726  virus_parent_id,
6727  other.virus_parent_id,
6728  "DataBase:: virus_parent_id[i] don't match"
6729  )
6730 
6731  VECT_MATCH(
6732  tool_name,
6733  other.tool_name,
6734  "DataBase:: tool_name[i] don't match"
6735  )
6736 
6737  VECT_MATCH(
6738  tool_sequence,
6739  other.tool_sequence,
6740  "DataBase:: tool_sequence[i] don't match"
6741  )
6742 
6743  VECT_MATCH(
6744  tool_origin_date,
6745  other.tool_origin_date,
6746  "DataBase:: tool_origin_date[i] don't match"
6747  )
6748 
6749 
6750  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
6751  sampling_freq != other.sampling_freq,
6752  "DataBase:: sampling_freq don't match."
6753  )
6754 
6755  // Variants history
6756  VECT_MATCH(
6757  hist_virus_date,
6758  other.hist_virus_date,
6759  "DataBase:: hist_virus_date[i] don't match"
6760  )
6761 
6762  VECT_MATCH(
6763  hist_virus_id,
6764  other.hist_virus_id,
6765  "DataBase:: hist_virus_id[i] don't match"
6766  )
6767 
6768  VECT_MATCH(
6769  hist_virus_state,
6770  other.hist_virus_state,
6771  "DataBase:: hist_virus_state[i] don't match"
6772  )
6773 
6774  VECT_MATCH(
6775  hist_virus_counts,
6776  other.hist_virus_counts,
6777  "DataBase:: hist_virus_counts[i] don't match"
6778  )
6779 
6780  // Tools history
6781  VECT_MATCH(
6782  hist_tool_date,
6783  other.hist_tool_date,
6784  "DataBase:: hist_tool_date[i] don't match"
6785  )
6786 
6787  VECT_MATCH(
6788  hist_tool_id,
6789  other.hist_tool_id,
6790  "DataBase:: hist_tool_id[i] don't match"
6791  )
6792 
6793  VECT_MATCH(
6794  hist_tool_state,
6795  other.hist_tool_state,
6796  "DataBase:: hist_tool_state[i] don't match"
6797  )
6798 
6799  VECT_MATCH(
6800  hist_tool_counts,
6801  other.hist_tool_counts,
6802  "DataBase:: hist_tool_counts[i] don't match"
6803  )
6804 
6805  // Overall hist
6806  VECT_MATCH(
6807  hist_total_date,
6808  other.hist_total_date,
6809  "DataBase:: hist_total_date[i] don't match"
6810  )
6811 
6812  VECT_MATCH(
6813  hist_total_nviruses_active,
6814  other.hist_total_nviruses_active,
6815  "DataBase:: hist_total_nviruses_active[i] don't match"
6816  )
6817 
6818  VECT_MATCH(
6819  hist_total_state,
6820  other.hist_total_state,
6821  "DataBase:: hist_total_state[i] don't match"
6822  )
6823 
6824  VECT_MATCH(
6825  hist_total_counts,
6826  other.hist_total_counts,
6827  "DataBase:: hist_total_counts[i] don't match"
6828  )
6829 
6830  VECT_MATCH(
6831  hist_transition_matrix,
6832  other.hist_transition_matrix,
6833  "DataBase:: hist_transition_matrix[i] don't match"
6834  )
6835 
6836  // {Variant 1: {state 1, state 2, etc.}, Variant 2: {...}, ...}
6837  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
6838  today_virus.size() != other.today_virus.size(),
6839  "DataBase:: today_virus.size() don't match."
6840  )
6841 
6842  for (size_t i = 0u; i < today_virus.size(); ++i)
6843  {
6844  VECT_MATCH(
6845  today_virus[i], other.today_virus[i],
6846  "DataBase:: today_virus[i] don't match"
6847  )
6848  }
6849 
6850  // {Variant 1: {state 1, state 2, etc.}, Variant 2: {...}, ...}
6851  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
6852  today_tool.size() != other.today_tool.size(),
6853  "DataBase:: today_tool.size() don't match."
6854  )
6855 
6856  for (size_t i = 0u; i < today_tool.size(); ++i)
6857  {
6858  VECT_MATCH(
6859  today_tool[i], other.today_tool[i],
6860  "DataBase:: today_tool[i] don't match"
6861  )
6862  }
6863 
6864  // {Susceptible, Infected, etc.}
6865  VECT_MATCH(
6866  today_total, other.today_total,
6867  "DataBase:: today_total[i] don't match"
6868  )
6869 
6870  // Totals
6871  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
6872  today_total_nviruses_active != other.today_total_nviruses_active,
6873  "DataBase:: today_total_nviruses_active don't match."
6874  )
6875 
6876  // Transmission network
6877  VECT_MATCH( ///< Date of the transmission eve
6878  transmission_date,
6879  other.transmission_date,
6880  "DataBase:: transmission_date[i] don't match"
6881  )
6882 
6883  VECT_MATCH( ///< Id of the sour
6884  transmission_source,
6885  other.transmission_source,
6886  "DataBase:: transmission_source[i] don't match"
6887  )
6888 
6889  VECT_MATCH( ///< Id of the targ
6890  transmission_target,
6891  other.transmission_target,
6892  "DataBase:: transmission_target[i] don't match"
6893  )
6894 
6895  VECT_MATCH( ///< Id of the varia
6896  transmission_virus,
6897  other.transmission_virus,
6898  "DataBase:: transmission_virus[i] don't match"
6899  )
6900 
6901  VECT_MATCH( ///< Date when the source acquired the varia
6902  transmission_source_exposure_date,
6903  other.transmission_source_exposure_date,
6904  "DataBase:: transmission_source_exposure_date[i] don't match"
6905  )
6906 
6907  VECT_MATCH(
6908  transition_matrix,
6909  other.transition_matrix,
6910  "DataBase:: transition_matrix[i] don't match"
6911  )
6912 
6913  return true;
6914 
6915 }
6916 
6917 template<typename TSeq>
6918 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::get_generation_time(
6919  std::vector< int > & agent_id,
6920  std::vector< int > & virus_id,
6921  std::vector< int > & time,
6922  std::vector< int > & gentime
6923 ) const {
6924 
6925  size_t nevents = transmission_date.size();
6926 
6927  agent_id.reserve(nevents);
6928  virus_id.reserve(nevents);
6929  time.reserve(nevents);
6930  gentime.reserve(nevents);
6931 
6932  // Iterating through the individuals
6933  for (size_t i = 0u; i < nevents; ++i)
6934  {
6935  int agent_id_i = transmission_target[i];
6936  agent_id.push_back(agent_id_i);
6937  virus_id.push_back(transmission_virus[i]);
6938  time.push_back(transmission_date[i]);
6939 
6940  bool found = false;
6941  for (size_t j = i; j < nevents; ++j)
6942  {
6943 
6944  if (transmission_source[j] == agent_id_i)
6945  {
6946  gentime.push_back(transmission_date[j] - time[i]);
6947  found = true;
6948  break;
6949  }
6950 
6951  }
6952 
6953  // If there's no transmission, we set the generation time to
6954  // minus 1;
6955  if (!found)
6956  gentime.push_back(-1);
6957 
6958  }
6959 
6960  agent_id.shrink_to_fit();
6961  virus_id.shrink_to_fit();
6962  time.shrink_to_fit();
6963  gentime.shrink_to_fit();
6964 
6965  return;
6966 
6967 }
6968 
6969 template<typename TSeq>
6970 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::get_generation_time(
6971  std::string fn
6972 ) const
6973 {
6974 
6975  std::vector< int > agent_id;
6976  std::vector< int > virus_id;
6977  std::vector< int > time;
6978  std::vector< int > gentime;
6979 
6980  get_generation_time(agent_id, virus_id, time, gentime);
6981 
6982  std::ofstream fn_file(fn, std::ios_base::out);
6983 
6984  // Throw an error if the file doesn't exists using throw
6985  if (!fn_file)
6986  {
6987  throw std::runtime_error(
6988  "DataBase::get_generation_time: "
6989  "Cannot open file " + fn + "."
6990  );
6991  }
6992 
6993 
6994 
6995  fn_file <<
6996  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
6997  "thread " <<
6998  #endif
6999  "virus source source_exposure_date gentime\n";
7000 
7001  size_t n = agent_id.size();
7002  for (size_t i = 0u; i < n; ++i)
7003  fn_file <<
7004  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
7005  EPI_GET_THREAD_ID() << " " <<
7006  #endif
7007  virus_id[i] << " " <<
7008  agent_id[i] << " " <<
7009  time[i] << " " <<
7010  gentime[i] << "\n";
7011 
7012  return;
7013 
7014 }
7015 
7016 #undef VECT_MATCH
7017 
7018 #endif
7019 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
7021 
7022  End of -include/epiworld/database-meat.hpp-
7023 
7026 
7027 
7028 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
7030 
7031  Start of -include/epiworld/adjlist-bones.hpp-
7032 
7035 
7036 
7037 #ifndef EPIWORLD_ADJLIST_BONES_HPP
7038 #define EPIWORLD_ADJLIST_BONES_HPP
7039 
7040 class AdjList {
7041 private:
7042 
7043  std::vector<std::map<int, int>> dat;
7044  bool directed;
7045  epiworld_fast_uint N = 0;
7046  epiworld_fast_uint E = 0;
7047 
7048 public:
7049 
7050  AdjList() {};
7051 
7063  AdjList(
7064  const std::vector< int > & source,
7065  const std::vector< int > & target,
7066  int size,
7067  bool directed
7068  );
7069 
7070  AdjList(AdjList && a); // Move constructor
7071  AdjList(const AdjList & a); // Copy constructor
7072  AdjList& operator=(const AdjList& a);
7073 
7074 
7085  void read_edgelist(
7086  std::string fn,
7087  int size,
7088  int skip = 0,
7089  bool directed = true
7090  );
7091 
7092  std::map<int, int> operator()(
7093  epiworld_fast_uint i
7094  ) const;
7095 
7096  void print(epiworld_fast_uint limit = 20u) const;
7097  size_t vcount() const; ///< Number of vertices/nodes in the network.
7098  size_t ecount() const; ///< Number of edges/arcs/ties in the network.
7099 
7100  std::vector<std::map<int,int>> & get_dat() {
7101  return dat;
7102  };
7103 
7104  bool is_directed() const; ///< `true` if the network is directed.
7105 
7106 };
7107 
7108 
7109 #endif
7110 
7111 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
7113 
7114  End of -include/epiworld/adjlist-bones.hpp-
7115 
7118 
7119 
7120 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
7122 
7123  Start of -include/epiworld/adjlist-meat.hpp-
7124 
7127 
7128 
7129 #ifndef EPIWORLD_ADJLIST_MEAT_HPP
7130 #define EPIWORLD_ADJLIST_MEAT_HPP
7131 
7132 inline AdjList::AdjList(
7133  const std::vector< int > & source,
7134  const std::vector< int > & target,
7135  int size,
7136  bool directed
7137 ) : directed(directed) {
7138 
7139 
7140  dat.resize(size, std::map<int,int>({}));
7141  int max_id = size - 1;
7142 
7143  int i,j;
7144  for (int m = 0; m < static_cast<int>(source.size()); ++m)
7145  {
7146 
7147  i = source[m];
7148  j = target[m];
7149 
7150  if (i > max_id)
7151  throw std::range_error(
7152  "The source["+std::to_string(m)+"] = " + std::to_string(i) +
7153  " is above the max_id " + std::to_string(max_id)
7154  );
7155 
7156  if (j > max_id)
7157  throw std::range_error(
7158  "The target["+std::to_string(m)+"] = " + std::to_string(j) +
7159  " is above the max_id " + std::to_string(max_id)
7160  );
7161 
7162  // Adding nodes
7163  if (dat[i].find(j) == dat[i].end())
7164  dat[i].insert(std::pair<int, int>(j, 1u));
7165  else
7166  dat[i][j]++;
7167 
7168  if (!directed)
7169  {
7170 
7171  if (dat[j].find(i) == dat[j].end())
7172  dat[j].insert(std::pair<int, int>(i, 1u));
7173  else
7174  dat[j][i]++;
7175 
7176  }
7177 
7178  E++;
7179 
7180  }
7181 
7182  N = size;
7183 
7184  return;
7185 
7186 }
7187 
7188 
7189 inline AdjList::AdjList(AdjList && a) :
7190  dat(std::move(a.dat)),
7191  directed(a.directed),
7192  N(a.N),
7193  E(a.E)
7194 {
7195 
7196 }
7197 
7198 inline AdjList::AdjList(const AdjList & a) :
7199  dat(a.dat),
7200  directed(a.directed),
7201  N(a.N),
7202  E(a.E)
7203 {
7204 
7205 }
7206 
7207 inline AdjList& AdjList::operator=(const AdjList& a)
7208 {
7209  if (this == &a)
7210  return *this;
7211 
7212  this->dat = a.dat;
7213  this->directed = a.directed;
7214  this->N = a.N;
7215  this->E = a.E;
7216 
7217  return *this;
7218 }
7219 
7220 inline void AdjList::read_edgelist(
7221  std::string fn,
7222  int size,
7223  int skip,
7224  bool directed
7225 ) {
7226 
7227  int i,j;
7228  std::ifstream filei(fn);
7229 
7230  if (!filei)
7231  throw std::logic_error("The file " + fn + " was not found.");
7232 
7233  int linenum = 0;
7234  std::vector< int > source_;
7235  std::vector< int > target_;
7236 
7237  source_.reserve(1e5);
7238  target_.reserve(1e5);
7239 
7240  int max_id = size - 1;
7241 
7242  while (!filei.eof())
7243  {
7244 
7245  if (linenum++ < skip)
7246  continue;
7247 
7248  filei >> i >> j;
7249 
7250  // Looking for exceptions
7251  if (filei.bad())
7252  throw std::logic_error(
7253  "I/O error while reading the file " +
7254  fn
7255  );
7256 
7257  if (filei.fail())
7258  break;
7259 
7260  if (i > max_id)
7261  throw std::range_error(
7262  "The source["+std::to_string(linenum)+"] = " + std::to_string(i) +
7263  " is above the max_id " + std::to_string(max_id)
7264  );
7265 
7266  if (j > max_id)
7267  throw std::range_error(
7268  "The target["+std::to_string(linenum)+"] = " + std::to_string(j) +
7269  " is above the max_id " + std::to_string(max_id)
7270  );
7271 
7272  source_.push_back(i);
7273  target_.push_back(j);
7274 
7275  }
7276 
7277  // Now using the right constructor
7278  *this = AdjList(source_, target_, size, directed);
7279 
7280  return;
7281 
7282 }
7283 
7284 inline std::map<int,int> AdjList::operator()(
7285  epiworld_fast_uint i
7286  ) const {
7287 
7288  if (i >= N)
7289  throw std::range_error(
7290  "The vertex id " + std::to_string(i) + " is not in the network."
7291  );
7292 
7293  return dat[i];
7294 
7295 }
7296 
7297 inline void AdjList::print(epiworld_fast_uint limit) const {
7298 
7299 
7300  epiworld_fast_uint counter = 0;
7301  printf_epiworld("Nodeset:\n");
7302  int i = -1;
7303  for (auto & n : dat)
7304  {
7305 
7306  if (counter++ > limit)
7307  break;
7308 
7309  printf_epiworld(" % 3i: {", ++i);
7310  int niter = 0;
7311  for (auto n_n : n)
7312  if (++niter < static_cast<int>(n.size()))
7313  {
7314  printf_epiworld("%i, ", static_cast<int>(n_n.first));
7315  }
7316  else {
7317  printf_epiworld("%i}\n", static_cast<int>(n_n.first));
7318  }
7319  }
7320 
7321  if (limit < dat.size())
7322  {
7323  printf_epiworld(
7324  " (... skipping %i records ...)\n",
7325  static_cast<int>(dat.size() - limit)
7326  );
7327  }
7328 
7329 }
7330 
7331 inline size_t AdjList::vcount() const
7332 {
7333  return N;
7334 }
7335 
7336 inline size_t AdjList::ecount() const
7337 {
7338  return E;
7339 }
7340 
7341 inline bool AdjList::is_directed() const {
7342 
7343  if (dat.size() == 0u)
7344  throw std::logic_error("The edgelist is empty.");
7345 
7346  return directed;
7347 
7348 }
7349 
7350 #endif
7351 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
7353 
7354  End of -include/epiworld/adjlist-meat.hpp-
7355 
7358 
7359 
7360 
7361 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
7363 
7364  Start of -include/epiworld/randgraph.hpp-
7365 
7368 
7369 
7370 #ifndef EPIWORLD_RANDGRA
7371 #define EPIWORLD_RANDGRA
7372 
7373 template<typename TSeq>
7374 class Model;
7375 
7376 template<typename TSeq>
7377 class Agent;
7378 
7379 class AdjList;
7380 
7381 
7382 template<typename TSeq, typename TDat>
7383 inline void rewire_degseq(
7384  TDat * agents,
7385  Model<TSeq> * model,
7386  epiworld_double proportion
7387  );
7388 
7389 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
7390 inline void rewire_degseq(
7391  std::vector< Agent<TSeq> > * agents,
7392  Model<TSeq> * model,
7393  epiworld_double proportion
7394  )
7395 {
7396 
7397  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
7398  std::vector< int > _degree0(agents->size(), 0);
7399  for (size_t i = 0u; i < _degree0.size(); ++i)
7400  _degree0[i] = model->get_agents()[i].get_neighbors().size();
7401  #endif
7402 
7403  // Identifying individuals with degree > 0
7404  std::vector< epiworld_fast_uint > non_isolates;
7405  std::vector< epiworld_double > weights;
7406  epiworld_double nedges = 0.0;
7407 
7408  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0u; i < agents->size(); ++i)
7409  {
7410  if (agents->operator[](i).get_neighbors().size() > 0u)
7411  {
7412  non_isolates.push_back(i);
7413  epiworld_double wtemp = static_cast<epiworld_double>(
7414  agents->operator[](i).get_neighbors().size()
7415  );
7416  weights.push_back(wtemp);
7417  nedges += wtemp;
7418  }
7419  }
7420 
7421  if (non_isolates.size() == 0u)
7422  throw std::logic_error("The graph is completely disconnected.");
7423 
7424  // Cumulative probs
7425  weights[0u] /= nedges;
7426  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 1u; i < non_isolates.size(); ++i)
7427  {
7428  weights[i] /= nedges;
7429  weights[i] += weights[i - 1u];
7430  }
7431 
7432  // Only swap if needed
7433  epiworld_fast_uint N = non_isolates.size();
7434  epiworld_double prob;
7435  int nrewires = floor(proportion * nedges);
7436  while (nrewires-- > 0)
7437  {
7438 
7439  // Picking egos
7440  prob = model->runif();
7441  int id0 = N - 1;
7442  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0u; i < N; ++i)
7443  if (prob <= weights[i])
7444  {
7445  id0 = i;
7446  break;
7447  }
7448 
7449  prob = model->runif();
7450  int id1 = N - 1;
7451  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0u; i < N; ++i)
7452  if (prob <= weights[i])
7453  {
7454  id1 = i;
7455  break;
7456  }
7457 
7458  // Correcting for under or overflow.
7459  if (id1 == id0)
7460  id1++;
7461 
7462  if (id1 >= static_cast<int>(N))
7463  id1 = 0;
7464 
7465  Agent<TSeq> & p0 = agents->operator[](non_isolates[id0]);
7466  Agent<TSeq> & p1 = agents->operator[](non_isolates[id1]);
7467 
7468  // Picking alters (relative location in their lists)
7469  // In this case, these are uniformly distributed within the list
7470  int id01 = std::floor(p0.get_n_neighbors() * model->runif());
7471  int id11 = std::floor(p1.get_n_neighbors() * model->runif());
7472 
7473  // When rewiring, we need to flip the individuals from the other
7474  // end as well, since we are dealing withi an undirected graph
7475 
7476  // Finding what neighbour is id0
7477  model->get_agents()[id0].swap_neighbors(
7478  model->get_agents()[id1],
7479  id01,
7480  id11
7481  );
7482 
7483 
7484  }
7485 
7486  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
7487  for (size_t _i = 0u; _i < _degree0.size(); ++_i)
7488  {
7489  if (_degree0[_i] != static_cast<int>(model->get_agents()[_i].get_n_neighbors()))
7490  throw std::logic_error("[epi-debug] Degree does not match afted rewire_degseq.");
7491  }
7492  #endif
7493 
7494  return;
7495 
7496 }
7497 
7498 template<typename TSeq>
7499 inline void rewire_degseq(
7500  AdjList * agents,
7501  Model<TSeq> * model,
7502  epiworld_double proportion
7503  )
7504 {
7505 
7506  // Identifying individuals with degree > 0
7507  std::vector< epiworld_fast_int > nties(agents->vcount(), 0);
7508 
7509  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
7510  std::vector< int > _degree0(agents->vcount(), 0);
7511  for (size_t i = 0u; i < _degree0.size(); ++i)
7512  _degree0[i] = agents->get_dat()[i].size();
7513  #endif
7514 
7515  std::vector< epiworld_fast_uint > non_isolates;
7516  non_isolates.reserve(nties.size());
7517 
7518  std::vector< epiworld_double > weights;
7519  weights.reserve(nties.size());
7520 
7521  epiworld_double nedges = 0.0;
7522  auto & dat = agents->get_dat();
7523 
7524  for (size_t i = 0u; i < dat.size(); ++i)
7525  nties[i] += dat[i].size();
7526 
7527  bool directed = agents->is_directed();
7528  for (size_t i = 0u; i < dat.size(); ++i)
7529  {
7530  if (nties[i] > 0)
7531  {
7532  non_isolates.push_back(i);
7533  if (directed)
7534  {
7535  weights.push_back(
7536  static_cast<epiworld_double>(nties[i])
7537  );
7538  nedges += static_cast<epiworld_double>(nties[i]);
7539  }
7540  else {
7541  weights.push_back(
7542  static_cast<epiworld_double>(nties[i])/2.0
7543  );
7544  nedges += static_cast<epiworld_double>(nties[i]) / 2.0;
7545  }
7546  }
7547  }
7548 
7549  if (non_isolates.size() == 0u)
7550  throw std::logic_error("The graph is completely disconnected.");
7551 
7552  // Cumulative probs
7553  weights[0u] /= nedges;
7554  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 1u; i < non_isolates.size(); ++i)
7555  {
7556  weights[i] /= nedges;
7557  weights[i] += weights[i - 1u];
7558  }
7559 
7560  // Only swap if needed
7561  epiworld_fast_uint N = non_isolates.size();
7562  epiworld_double prob;
7563  int nrewires = floor(proportion * nedges / (
7564  agents->is_directed() ? 1.0 : 2.0
7565  ));
7566 
7567  while (nrewires-- > 0)
7568  {
7569 
7570  // Picking egos
7571  prob = model->runif();
7572  int id0 = N - 1;
7573  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0u; i < N; ++i)
7574  if (prob <= weights[i])
7575  {
7576  id0 = i;
7577  break;
7578  }
7579 
7580  prob = model->runif();
7581  int id1 = N - 1;
7582  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0u; i < N; ++i)
7583  if (prob <= weights[i])
7584  {
7585  id1 = i;
7586  break;
7587  }
7588 
7589  // Correcting for under or overflow.
7590  if (id1 == id0)
7591  id1++;
7592 
7593  if (id1 >= static_cast<int>(N))
7594  id1 = 0;
7595 
7596  std::map<int,int> & p0 = agents->get_dat()[non_isolates[id0]];
7597  std::map<int,int> & p1 = agents->get_dat()[non_isolates[id1]];
7598 
7599  // Picking alters (relative location in their lists)
7600  // In this case, these are uniformly distributed within the list
7601  int id01 = std::floor(p0.size() * model->runif());
7602  int id11 = std::floor(p1.size() * model->runif());
7603 
7604  // Since it is a map, we need to find the actual ids (positions)
7605  // are not good enough.
7606  int count = 0;
7607  for (auto & n : p0)
7608  if (count++ == id01)
7609  id01 = n.first;
7610 
7611  count = 0;
7612  for (auto & n : p1)
7613  if (count++ == id11)
7614  id11 = n.first;
7615 
7616  // When rewiring, we need to flip the individuals from the other
7617  // end as well, since we are dealing withi an undirected graph
7618 
7619  // Finding what neighbour is id0
7620  if (!agents->is_directed())
7621  {
7622 
7623  std::map<int,int> & p01 = agents->get_dat()[id01];
7624  std::map<int,int> & p11 = agents->get_dat()[id11];
7625 
7626  std::swap(p01[id0], p11[id1]);
7627 
7628  }
7629 
7630  // Moving alter first
7631  std::swap(p0[id01], p1[id11]);
7632 
7633  }
7634 
7635  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
7636  for (size_t _i = 0u; _i < _degree0.size(); ++_i)
7637  {
7638  if (_degree0[_i] != static_cast<int>(agents->get_dat()[_i].size()))
7639  throw std::logic_error(
7640  "[epi-debug] Degree does not match afted rewire_degseq. " +
7641  std::string("Expected: ") +
7642  std::to_string(_degree0[_i]) +
7643  std::string(", observed: ") +
7644  std::to_string(agents->get_dat()[_i].size())
7645  );
7646  }
7647  #endif
7648 
7649 
7650  return;
7651 
7652 }
7653 
7654 template<typename TSeq>
7655 inline AdjList rgraph_bernoulli(
7656  epiworld_fast_uint n,
7657  epiworld_double p,
7658  bool directed,
7659  Model<TSeq> & model
7660 ) {
7661 
7662  std::vector< int > source;
7663  std::vector< int > target;
7664 
7665  // Checking the density (how many)
7666  std::binomial_distribution<> d(
7667  n * (n - 1.0) / (directed ? 1.0 : 2.0),
7668  p
7669  );
7670 
7671  epiworld_fast_uint m = d(model.get_rand_endgine());
7672 
7673  source.resize(m);
7674  target.resize(m);
7675 
7676  epiworld_fast_uint a,b;
7677  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0u; i < m; ++i)
7678  {
7679  a = floor(model.runif() * n);
7680 
7681  if (!directed)
7682  b = floor(model.runif() * a);
7683  else
7684  {
7685  b = floor(model.runif() * n);
7686  if (b == a)
7687  b++;
7688 
7689  if (b >= n)
7690  b = 0u;
7691  }
7692 
7693  source[i] = static_cast<int>(a);
7694  target[i] = static_cast<int>(b);
7695 
7696  }
7697 
7698  AdjList al(source, target, static_cast<int>(n), directed);
7699 
7700  return al;
7701 
7702 }
7703 
7704 template<typename TSeq>
7705 inline AdjList rgraph_bernoulli2(
7706  epiworld_fast_uint n,
7707  epiworld_double p,
7708  bool directed,
7709  Model<TSeq> & model
7710 ) {
7711 
7712  std::vector< int > source;
7713  std::vector< int > target;
7714 
7715  // Checking the density (how many)
7716  std::binomial_distribution<> d(
7717  n * (n - 1.0) / (directed ? 1.0 : 2.0),
7718  p
7719  );
7720 
7721  // Need to compensate for the possible number of diagonal
7722  // elements sampled. If n * n, then each diag element has
7723  // 1/(n^2) chance of sampling
7724 
7725  epiworld_fast_uint m = d(model.get_rand_endgine());
7726 
7727  source.resize(m);
7728  target.resize(m);
7729 
7730  double n2 = static_cast<double>(n * n);
7731 
7732  int loc,row,col;
7733  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0u; i < m; ++i)
7734  {
7735  loc = floor(model.runif() * n2);
7736  col = floor(static_cast<double>(loc)/static_cast<double>(n));
7737  row = loc - row * n;
7738 
7739  // Undirected needs to swap
7740  if (!directed && (col > row))
7741  std::swap(col, row);
7742 
7743  source[i] = row;
7744  target[i] = col;
7745 
7746  }
7747 
7748  AdjList al(source, target, static_cast<int>(n), directed);
7749 
7750  return al;
7751 
7752 }
7753 
7754 inline AdjList rgraph_ring_lattice(
7755  epiworld_fast_uint n,
7756  epiworld_fast_uint k,
7757  bool directed = false
7758 ) {
7759 
7760  if ((n - 1u) < k)
7761  throw std::logic_error("k can be at most n - 1.");
7762 
7763  std::vector< int > source;
7764  std::vector< int > target;
7765 
7766  if (!directed)
7767  if (k > 1u) k = static_cast< size_t >(floor(k / 2.0));
7768 
7769  for (size_t i = 0; i < n; ++i)
7770  {
7771 
7772  for (size_t j = 1u; j <= k; ++j)
7773  {
7774 
7775  // Next neighbor
7776  size_t l = i + j;
7777  if (l >= n) l = l - n;
7778 
7779  source.push_back(i);
7780  target.push_back(l);
7781 
7782  }
7783 
7784  }
7785 
7786  return AdjList(source, target, n, directed);
7787 
7788 }
7789 
7801 template<typename TSeq>
7802 inline AdjList rgraph_smallworld(
7803  epiworld_fast_uint n,
7804  epiworld_fast_uint k,
7805  epiworld_double p,
7806  bool directed,
7807  Model<TSeq> & model
7808 ) {
7809 
7810  // Creating the ring lattice
7811  AdjList ring = rgraph_ring_lattice(n,k,directed);
7812 
7813  // Rewiring and returning
7814  if (k > 0u)
7815  rewire_degseq(&ring, &model, p);
7816 
7817  return ring;
7818 
7819 }
7820 
7834 template<typename TSeq>
7835 inline AdjList rgraph_blocked(
7836  epiworld_fast_uint n,
7837  epiworld_fast_uint blocksize,
7838  epiworld_fast_uint ncons,
7839  Model<TSeq>&
7840 ) {
7841 
7842  std::vector< int > source_;
7843  std::vector< int > target_;
7844 
7845  size_t i = 0u;
7846  size_t cum_node_count = 0u;
7847  while (i < n)
7848  {
7849 
7850  for (size_t j = 0; j < blocksize; ++j)
7851  {
7852 
7853  for (size_t k = 0; k < j; ++k)
7854  {
7855  // No loops
7856  if (k == j)
7857  continue;
7858 
7859  // Exists the loop in case there are no more
7860  // nodes available
7861  if ((i + k) >= n)
7862  break;
7863 
7864  source_.push_back(static_cast<int>(j + i));
7865  target_.push_back(static_cast<int>(k + i));
7866  }
7867 
7868  // No more nodes left to build connections
7869  if (++cum_node_count >= n)
7870  break;
7871 
7872  }
7873 
7874  // Connections between this and the previou sone
7875  if (i != 0)
7876  {
7877 
7878  size_t max_cons = std::min(ncons, n - cum_node_count);
7879 
7880  // Generating the connections
7881  for (size_t j = 0u; j < max_cons; ++j)
7882  {
7883 
7884  source_.push_back(static_cast<int>(i + j - blocksize));
7885  target_.push_back(static_cast<int>(i + j));
7886 
7887  }
7888  }
7889 
7890  i += blocksize;
7891 
7892  }
7893 
7894  return AdjList(source_, target_, n, false);
7895 
7896 }
7897 
7898 #endif
7899 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
7901 
7902  End of -include/epiworld/randgraph.hpp-
7903 
7906 
7907 
7908 
7909 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
7911 
7912  Start of -include/epiworld/queue-bones.hpp-
7913 
7916 
7917 
7918 #ifndef EPIWORLD_QUEUE_BONES_HPP
7919 #define EPIWORLD_QUEUE_BONES_HPP
7920 
7931 template<typename TSeq>
7932 class Queue
7933 {
7934  friend class Model<TSeq>;
7935 
7936 private:
7937 
7941  std::vector< epiworld_fast_int > active;
7942  Model<TSeq> * model = nullptr;
7943  int n_in_queue = 0;
7944 
7945  // Auxiliary variable that checks how many steps
7946  // left are there
7947  // int n_steps_left;
7948  // bool queuing_started = false;
7949 
7950 public:
7951 
7952  void operator+=(Agent<TSeq> * p);
7953  void operator-=(Agent<TSeq> * p);
7954  epiworld_fast_int & operator[](epiworld_fast_uint i);
7955 
7956  // void initialize(Model<TSeq> * m, Agent<TSeq> * p);
7957  void reset();
7958 
7959  bool operator==(const Queue<TSeq> & other) const;
7960  bool operator!=(const Queue<TSeq> & other) const {return !operator==(other);};
7961 
7962  static const int NoOne = 0;
7963  static const int OnlySelf = 1;
7964  static const int Everyone = 2;
7965 
7966 };
7967 
7968 template<typename TSeq>
7969 inline void Queue<TSeq>::operator+=(Agent<TSeq> * p)
7970 {
7971 
7972  if (++active[p->id] == 1)
7973  n_in_queue++;
7974 
7975  if (p->get_n_neighbors() == 0u)
7976  return; // No neighbors, no need to add them
7977 
7978  for (auto n : (*p->neighbors))
7979  {
7980 
7981  if (++active[n] == 1)
7982  n_in_queue++;
7983 
7984  }
7985 
7986 }
7987 
7988 template<typename TSeq>
7989 inline void Queue<TSeq>::operator-=(Agent<TSeq> * p)
7990 {
7991 
7992  if (--active[p->id] == 0)
7993  n_in_queue--;
7994 
7995  if (p->get_n_neighbors() == 0u)
7996  return; // No neighbors, no need to add them
7997 
7998  for (auto n : (*p->neighbors))
7999  {
8000  if (--active[n] == 0)
8001  n_in_queue--;
8002  }
8003 
8004 }
8005 
8006 template<typename TSeq>
8007 inline epiworld_fast_int & Queue<TSeq>::operator[](epiworld_fast_uint i)
8008 {
8009  return active[i];
8010 }
8011 
8012 template<typename TSeq>
8013 inline void Queue<TSeq>::reset()
8014 {
8015 
8016  if (n_in_queue)
8017  {
8018 
8019  for (auto & q : this->active)
8020  q = 0;
8021 
8022  n_in_queue = 0;
8023 
8024  }
8025 
8026  active.resize(model->size(), 0);
8027 
8028 }
8029 
8030 template<typename TSeq>
8031 inline bool Queue<TSeq>::operator==(const Queue<TSeq> & other) const
8032 {
8033  if (active.size() != other.active.size())
8034  return false;
8035 
8036  for (size_t i = 0u; i < active.size(); ++i)
8037  {
8038  if (active[i] != other.active[i])
8039  return false;
8040  }
8041 
8042  return true;
8043 }
8044 
8045 #endif
8046 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
8048 
8049  End of -include/epiworld/queue-bones.hpp-
8050 
8053 
8054

8058

8068 // template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
8069 // using GlobalFun = std::function<void(Model<TSeq>*)>;
8070 
8077 template<typename TSeq>
8078 class GlobalEvent
8079 {
8080 private:
8081  GlobalFun<TSeq> fun = nullptr;
8082  std::string name = "A global action";
8083  int day = -99;
8084 public:
8085 
8086  GlobalEvent() {};
8087 
8095  GlobalEvent(GlobalFun<TSeq> fun, std::string name, int day = -99);
8096 
8097  ~GlobalEvent() {};
8098 
8099  void operator()(Model<TSeq> * m, int day);
8100 
8101  void set_name(std::string name);
8102  std::string get_name() const;
8103 
8104  void set_day(int day);
8105  int get_day() const;
8106 
8107  void print() const;
8108 
8109  // Comparison operators
8110  bool operator==(const GlobalEvent<TSeq> & other) const;
8111  bool operator!=(const GlobalEvent<TSeq> & other) const;
8112 
8113 };
8114

8137 #define EPIWORLD_GLOBALEVENT_MEAT_HPP
8138 
8139 template<typename TSeq>
8140 inline GlobalEvent<TSeq>::GlobalEvent(
8141  GlobalFun<TSeq> fun,
8142  std::string name,
8143  int day
8144  )
8145 {
8146  this->fun = fun;
8147  this->name = name;
8148  this->day = day;
8149 }
8150 
8151 template<typename TSeq>
8152 inline void GlobalEvent<TSeq>::operator()(Model<TSeq> * m, int day)
8153 {
8154 
8155  if (this->fun == nullptr)
8156  return;
8157 
8158  // events apply if day is negative or if day is equal to the day of the action
8159  if (this->day < 0 || this->day == day)
8160  this->fun(m);
8161 
8162  return;
8163 
8164 }
8165 
8166 template<typename TSeq>
8167 inline void GlobalEvent<TSeq>::set_name(std::string name)
8168 {
8169  this->name = name;
8170 }
8171 
8172 template<typename TSeq>
8173 inline std::string GlobalEvent<TSeq>::get_name() const
8174 {
8175  return this->name;
8176 }
8177 
8178 template<typename TSeq>
8179 inline void GlobalEvent<TSeq>::set_day(int day)
8180 {
8181  this->day = day;
8182 }
8183 
8184 template<typename TSeq>
8185 inline int GlobalEvent<TSeq>::get_day() const
8186 {
8187  return this->day;
8188 }
8189 
8190 template<typename TSeq>
8191 inline void GlobalEvent<TSeq>::print() const
8192 {
8193  printf_epiworld(
8194  "Global action: %s\n"
8195  " - Day: %i\n",
8196  this->name.c_str(),
8197  this->day
8198  );
8199 }
8200 
8201 template<typename TSeq>
8202 inline bool GlobalEvent<TSeq>::operator==(const GlobalEvent<TSeq> & other) const
8203 {
8204  return (this->name == other.name) && (this->day == other.day);
8205 }
8206 
8207 template<typename TSeq>
8208 inline bool GlobalEvent<TSeq>::operator!=(const GlobalEvent<TSeq> & other) const
8209 {
8210  return !(*this == other);
8211 }
8212 
8213 #endif
