8312 
8322 template<typename TSeq>
8323 class Model {
8324  friend class Agent<TSeq>;
8325  friend class AgentsSample<TSeq>;
8326  friend class DataBase<TSeq>;
8327  friend class Queue<TSeq>;
8328 protected:
8329 
8330  std::string name = ""; ///< Name of the model
8331 
8332  DataBase<TSeq> db = DataBase<TSeq>(*this);
8333 
8334  std::vector< Agent<TSeq> > population = {};
8335 
8336  bool using_backup = true;
8337  std::vector< Agent<TSeq> > population_backup = {};
8338 
8348  std::vector< Agent<TSeq> * > sampled_population;
8349  size_t sampled_population_n = 0u;
8350  std::vector< size_t > population_left;
8351  size_t population_left_n = 0u;
8353 
8363  double * agents_data = nullptr;
8364  size_t agents_data_ncols = 0u;
8366 
8367  bool directed = false;
8368 
8369  std::vector< VirusPtr<TSeq> > viruses = {};
8370  std::vector< ToolPtr<TSeq> > tools = {};
8371 
8372  std::vector< Entity<TSeq> > entities = {};
8373  std::vector< Entity<TSeq> > entities_backup = {};
8374 
8375  std::shared_ptr< std::mt19937 > engine = std::make_shared< std::mt19937 >();
8376 
8377  std::uniform_real_distribution<> runifd =
8378  std::uniform_real_distribution<> (0.0, 1.0);
8379  std::normal_distribution<> rnormd =
8380  std::normal_distribution<>(0.0);
8381  std::gamma_distribution<> rgammad =
8382  std::gamma_distribution<>();
8383  std::lognormal_distribution<> rlognormald =
8384  std::lognormal_distribution<>();
8385  std::exponential_distribution<> rexpd =
8386  std::exponential_distribution<>();
8387  std::binomial_distribution<> rbinomd =
8388  std::binomial_distribution<>();
8389  std::negative_binomial_distribution<> rnbinomd =
8390  std::negative_binomial_distribution<>();
8391  std::geometric_distribution<> rgeomd =
8392  std::geometric_distribution<>();
8393  std::poisson_distribution<> rpoissd =
8394  std::poisson_distribution<>();
8395 
8396  std::function<void(std::vector<Agent<TSeq>>*,Model<TSeq>*,epiworld_double)> rewire_fun;
8397  epiworld_double rewire_prop = 0.0;
8398 
8399  std::map<std::string, epiworld_double > parameters;
8400  epiworld_fast_uint ndays = 0;
8401  Progress pb;
8402 
8403  std::vector< UpdateFun<TSeq> > state_fun = {}; ///< Functions to update states
8404  std::vector< std::string > states_labels = {}; ///< Labels of the states
8405 
8407  std::function<void(Model<TSeq>*)> initial_states_fun = [](Model<TSeq> * /**/)
8408  -> void {};
8409 
8410  epiworld_fast_uint nstates = 0u;
8411 
8412  bool verbose = true;
8413  int current_date = 0;
8414 
8415  void dist_tools();
8416  void dist_virus();
8417  void dist_entities();
8418 
8419  std::chrono::time_point<std::chrono::steady_clock> time_start;
8420  std::chrono::time_point<std::chrono::steady_clock> time_end;
8421 
8422  // std::chrono::milliseconds
8423  std::chrono::duration<epiworld_double,std::micro> time_elapsed =
8424  std::chrono::duration<epiworld_double,std::micro>::zero();
8425  epiworld_fast_uint n_replicates = 0u;
8426  void chrono_start();
8427  void chrono_end();
8428 
8429  std::vector<GlobalEvent<TSeq>> globalevents;
8430 
8431  Queue<TSeq> queue;
8432  bool use_queuing = true;
8433 
8438  std::vector< Event<TSeq> > events = {};
8439  epiworld_fast_uint nactions = 0u;
8440 
8454  void events_add(
8455  Agent<TSeq> * agent_,
8456  VirusPtr<TSeq> virus_,
8457  ToolPtr<TSeq> tool_,
8458  Entity<TSeq> * entity_,
8459  epiworld_fast_int new_state_,
8460  epiworld_fast_int queue_,
8461  EventFun<TSeq> call_,
8462  int idx_agent_,
8463  int idx_object_
8464  );
8465 
8475  MixerFun<TSeq> susceptibility_reduction_mixer = susceptibility_reduction_mixer_default<TSeq>;
8476  MixerFun<TSeq> transmission_reduction_mixer = transmission_reduction_mixer_default<TSeq>;
8477  MixerFun<TSeq> recovery_enhancer_mixer = recovery_enhancer_mixer_default<TSeq>;
8478  MixerFun<TSeq> death_reduction_mixer = death_reduction_mixer_default<TSeq>;

9032 // In case the user has a way to stop the program
9033 // This is called during `run_multiple()` and it is
9034 // passed the simulation number.
9035 #ifndef EPI_CHECK_USER_INTERRUPT
9036  #define EPI_CHECK_USER_INTERRUPT(a)

9099 using VirusPtr = std::shared_ptr< Virus< TSeq > >;

9102 using ToolPtr = std::shared_ptr< Tool< TSeq > >;
9103 
9104 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
9105 using ToolFun = std::function<epiworld_double(Tool<TSeq>&,Agent<TSeq>*,VirusPtr<TSeq>,Model<TSeq>*)>;
9106 
9107 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
9108 using MixerFun = std::function<epiworld_double(Agent<TSeq>*,VirusPtr<TSeq>,Model<TSeq>*)>;
9109 
9110 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
9111 using MutFun = std::function<bool(Agent<TSeq>*,Virus<TSeq>&,Model<TSeq>*)>;
9112 
9113 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
9114 using PostRecoveryFun = std::function<void(Agent<TSeq>*,Virus<TSeq>&,Model<TSeq>*)>;

9117 using VirusFun = std::function<epiworld_double(Agent<TSeq>*,Virus<TSeq>&,Model<TSeq>*)>;
9118 
9119 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
9120 using UpdateFun = std::function<void(Agent<TSeq>*,Model<TSeq>*)>;
9121 
9122 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
9123 using GlobalFun = std::function<void(Model<TSeq>*)>;
9124 
9125 template<typename TSeq>
9126 struct Event;
9127 
9128 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
9129 using EventFun = std::function<void(Event<TSeq>&,Model<TSeq>*)>;
9130

9135 using VirusToAgentFun = std::function<void(Virus<TSeq>&,Model<TSeq>*)>;
9136

9142 
9146 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
9147 using EntityToAgentFun = std::function<void(Entity<TSeq>&,Model<TSeq>*)>;
9148 
9154 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
9155 struct Event {
9156  Agent<TSeq> * agent;
9157  VirusPtr<TSeq> virus;
9158  ToolPtr<TSeq> tool;
9159  Entity<TSeq> * entity;
9160  epiworld_fast_int new_state;
9161  epiworld_fast_int queue;
9162  EventFun<TSeq> call;
9163  int idx_agent;
9164  int idx_object;
9165 public:
9182  Event(
9183  Agent<TSeq> * agent_,
9184  VirusPtr<TSeq> & virus_,
9185  ToolPtr<TSeq> & tool_,
9186  Entity<TSeq> * entity_,
9187  epiworld_fast_int new_state_,
9188  epiworld_fast_int queue_,
9189  EventFun<TSeq> & call_,
9190  int idx_agent_,
9191  int idx_object_
9192  ) : agent(agent_), virus(virus_), tool(tool_), entity(entity_),
9193  new_state(new_state_),
9194  queue(queue_), call(call_), idx_agent(idx_agent_), idx_object(idx_object_) {
9195  return;
9196  };
9197 };

9228 #endif

9238 
9239 #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
9240  #define EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF printf_epiworld
9241 
9242  #define EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(etype, msg) \
9243  (etype)("[[epi-debug]] (error) " + std::string(msg));
9244 
9245  #define EPI_DEBUG_NOTIFY_ACTIVE() \
9246  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("DEBUGGING ON (compiled with EPI_DEBUG defined)%s\n", "");
9247 
9248  #define EPI_DEBUG_ALL_NON_NEGATIVE(vect) \
9249  for (auto & v : vect) \
9250  if (static_cast<double>(v) < 0.0) \
9251  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "A negative value not allowed.");
9252 
9253  #define EPI_DEBUG_SUM_DBL(vect, num) \
9254  double _epi_debug_sum = 0.0; \
9255  for (auto & v : vect) \
9256  { \
9257  _epi_debug_sum += static_cast<double>(v);\
9258  if (_epi_debug_sum > static_cast<double>(num)) \
9259  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "The sum of elements not reached."); \
9260  }
9261 
9262  #define EPI_DEBUG_SUM_INT(vect, num) \
9263  int _epi_debug_sum = 0; \
9264  for (auto & v : vect) \
9265  { \
9266  _epi_debug_sum += static_cast<int>(v);\
9267  if (_epi_debug_sum > static_cast<int>(num)) \
9268  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "The sum of elements not reached."); \
9269  }
9270 
9271  #define EPI_DEBUG_VECTOR_MATCH_INT(a, b, c) \
9272  if (a.size() != b.size()) {\
9273  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("In '%s'", std::string(c).c_str()); \
9274  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("Size of vector a: %lu\n", (a).size());\
9275  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("Size of vector b: %lu\n", (b).size());\
9276  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::length_error, "The vectors do not match size."); \
9277  }\
9278  for (int _i = 0; _i < static_cast<int>(a.size()); ++_i) \
9279  if (a[_i] != b[_i]) {\
9280  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("In '%s'", std::string(c).c_str()); \
9281  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("Iterating the last 5 values%s:\n", ""); \
9282  for (int _j = std::max(0, static_cast<int>(_i) - 4); _j <= _i; ++_j) \
9283  { \
9284  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF( \
9285  "a[%i]: %i; b[%i]: %i\n", \
9286  _j, \
9287  static_cast<int>(a[_j]), \
9288  _j, static_cast<int>(b[_j])); \
9289  } \
9290  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "The vectors do not match."); \
9291  }
9292 
9293  #define EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(a,b) \
9294  if (a) \
9295  {\
9296  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, b); \
9297  }
9298 
9299  #define epiexception(a) std::logic_error
9300 #else
9301  #define EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF(fmt, ...)
9302  #define EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(fmt, ...)
9303  #define EPI_DEBUG_NOTIFY_ACTIVE()
9304  #define EPI_DEBUG_ALL_NON_NEGATIVE(vect)
9305  #define EPI_DEBUG_SUM_DBL(vect, num)
9306  #define EPI_DEBUG_SUM_INT(vect, num)
9307  #define EPI_DEBUG_VECTOR_MATCH_INT(a, b, c)
9308  #define EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(a, b) \
9309  if (a) \
9310  return false;
9311  #define epiexception(a) a
9312 #endif
9313 
9314 #if defined(EPI_DEBUG_NO_THREAD_ID) || (!defined(__OPENMP) && !defined(_OPENMP))
9315  #define EPI_GET_THREAD_ID() 0
9316 #else
9317  #define EPI_GET_THREAD_ID() omp_get_thread_num()
9318 #endif
9319 
9320 #endif
9321 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
9323 
9324  End of -include/epiworld//config.hpp-
9325

9329 
9330 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
9332 
9333  Start of -include/epiworld//userdata-bones.hpp-
9334 
9337 
9338 
9339 #ifndef EPIWORLD_USERDATA_BONES_HPP
9340 #define EPIWORLD_USERDATA_BONES_HPP
9341 
9342 template<typename TSeq>
9343 class Model;
9344 
9345 template<typename TSeq>
9346 class DataBase;
9347 
9353 template<typename TSeq>
9354 class UserData
9355 {
9356  friend class Model<TSeq>;
9357  friend class DataBase<TSeq>;
9358 
9359 private:
9360  Model<TSeq> * model;
9361 
9362  std::vector< std::string > data_names;
9363  std::vector< int > data_dates;
9364  std::vector< epiworld_double > data_data;
9365 
9366  epiworld_fast_uint k = 0u;
9367  epiworld_fast_uint n = 0u;
9368 
9369  int last_day = -1;
9370 
9371 public:
9372 
9373  UserData() = delete;
9374  UserData(Model<TSeq> & m) : model(&m) {};
9375  UserData(Model<TSeq> * m) : model(m) {};
9376 
9383  UserData(std::vector< std::string > names);
9384 
9392  void add(std::vector<epiworld_double> x);
9393  void add(
9394  epiworld_fast_uint j,
9395  epiworld_double x
9396  );
9398 
9407  epiworld_double & operator()(
9408  epiworld_fast_uint i,
9409  epiworld_fast_uint j
9410  );

9413  epiworld_fast_uint i,
9414  std::string name
9415  );

9638 template<typename TSeq>
9639 class Model {

9641  friend class AgentsSample<TSeq>;
9642  friend class DataBase<TSeq>;
9643  friend class Queue<TSeq>;

9645

9647

9692

9694  std::uniform_real_distribution<> (0.0, 1.0);
9695  std::normal_distribution<> rnormd =
9696  std::normal_distribution<>(0.0);
9697  std::gamma_distribution<> rgammad =
9698  std::gamma_distribution<>();
9699  std::lognormal_distribution<> rlognormald =
9700  std::lognormal_distribution<>();
9701  std::exponential_distribution<> rexpd =
9702  std::exponential_distribution<>();

9704  std::binomial_distribution<>();

9706  std::negative_binomial_distribution<>();

9708  std::geometric_distribution<>();

9710  std::poisson_distribution<>();

10313 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
10315 
10316  Start of -include/epiworld//entities-bones.hpp-
10317 
10320 
10321 
10322 #ifndef EPIWORLD_ENTITIES_BONES_HPP
10323 #define EPIWORLD_ENTITIES_BONES_HPP
10324 
10325 template<typename TSeq>
10326 class Virus;
10327 
10328 template<typename TSeq>
10329 class Agent;
10330 
10331 
10337 template<typename TSeq>
10338 class Entities {
10339  friend class Entity<TSeq>;
10340  friend class Agent<TSeq>;
10341 private:
10342  std::vector< Entity<TSeq> * > dat;
10343  const size_t n_entities;
10344 
10345 public:
10346 
10347  Entities() = delete;
10348  Entities(Agent<TSeq> & p);
10349 
10350  typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq> * >::iterator begin();
10351  typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq> * >::iterator end();
10352 
10353  Entity<TSeq> & operator()(size_t i);
10354  Entity<TSeq> & operator[](size_t i);
10355 
10356  size_t size() const noexcept;
10357 
10358  bool operator==(const Entities<TSeq> & other) const;
10359 
10360 };
10361 
10362 template<typename TSeq>
10363 inline Entities<TSeq>::Entities(Agent<TSeq> & p) :
10364  n_entities(p.get_n_entities())
10365 {
10366 
10367  dat.reserve(n_entities);
10368  for (size_t i = 0u; i < n_entities; ++i)
10369  dat.push_back(&p.get_entity(i));
10370 
10371 }
10372 
10373 template<typename TSeq>
10374 inline typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq>* >::iterator Entities<TSeq>::begin()
10375 {
10376 
10377  if (n_entities == 0u)
10378  return dat.end();
10379 
10380  return dat.begin();
10381 }
10382 
10383 template<typename TSeq>
10384 inline typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq>* >::iterator Entities<TSeq>::end()
10385 {
10386 
10387  return begin() + n_entities;
10388 }
10389 
10390 template<typename TSeq>
10391 inline Entity<TSeq> & Entities<TSeq>::operator()(size_t i)
10392 {
10393 
10394  if (i >= n_entities)
10395  throw std::range_error("Entity index out of range.");
10396 
10397  return *dat[i];
10398 
10399 }
10400 
10401 template<typename TSeq>
10402 inline Entity<TSeq> & Entities<TSeq>::operator[](size_t i)
10403 {
10404 
10405  return *dat[i];
10406 
10407 }
10408 
10409 template<typename TSeq>
10410 inline size_t Entities<TSeq>::size() const noexcept
10411 {
10412  return n_entities;
10413 }
10414 
10415 template<typename TSeq>
10416 inline bool Entities<TSeq>::operator==(const Entities<TSeq> & other) const
10417 {
10418 
10419  if (n_entities != other.n_entities)
10420  return false;
10421 
10422  for (size_t i = 0u; i < dat.size(); ++i)
10423  {
10424  if (dat[i] != other.dat[i])
10425  return false;
10426  }
10427 
10428  return true;
10429 }
10430 
10436 template<typename TSeq>
10437 class Entities_const {
10438  friend class Virus<TSeq>;
10439  friend class Agent<TSeq>;
10440 private:
10441  const std::vector< Entity<TSeq>* > dat;
10442  const size_t n_entities;
10443 
10444 public:
10445 
10446  Entities_const() = delete;
10447  Entities_const(const Agent<TSeq> & p);
10448 
10449  typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq>* >::const_iterator begin();
10450  typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq>* >::const_iterator end();
10451 
10452  const Entity<TSeq> & operator()(size_t i);
10453  const Entity<TSeq> & operator[](size_t i);
10454 
10455  size_t size() const noexcept;
10456 
10457  bool operator==(const Entities_const<TSeq> & other) const;
10458 
10459 };
10460 
10461 template<typename TSeq>
10462 inline Entities_const<TSeq>::Entities_const(const Agent<TSeq> & p) :
10463  n_entities(p.get_n_entities())
10464 {
10465 
10466  dat.reserve(n_entities);
10467  for (size_t i = 0u; i < n_entities; ++i)
10468  dat.push_back(&p.get_entity(i));
10469 
10470 }
10471 
10472 template<typename TSeq>
10473 inline typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq>* >::const_iterator Entities_const<TSeq>::begin() {
10474 
10475  if (n_entities == 0u)
10476  return dat.end();
10477 
10478  return dat.begin();
10479 }
10480 
10481 template<typename TSeq>
10482 inline typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq>* >::const_iterator Entities_const<TSeq>::end() {
10483 
10484  return begin() + n_entities;
10485 }
10486 
10487 template<typename TSeq>
10488 inline const Entity<TSeq> & Entities_const<TSeq>::operator()(size_t i)
10489 {
10490 
10491  if (i >= n_entities)
10492  throw std::range_error("Entity index out of range.");
10493 
10494  return *dat[i];
10495 
10496 }
10497 
10498 template<typename TSeq>
10499 inline const Entity<TSeq> & Entities_const<TSeq>::operator[](size_t i)
10500 {
10501 
10502  return *dat[i];
10503 
10504 }
10505 
10506 template<typename TSeq>
10507 inline size_t Entities_const<TSeq>::size() const noexcept
10508 {
10509  return n_entities;
10510 }
10511 
10512 template<typename TSeq>
10513 inline bool Entities_const<TSeq>::operator==(const Entities_const<TSeq> & other) const
10514 {
10515 
10516  if (n_entities != other.n_entities)
10517  return false;
10518 
10519  for (size_t i = 0u; i < dat.size(); ++i)
10520  {
10521  if (dat[i] != other.dat[i])
10522  return false;
10523  }
10524 
10525  return true;
10526 }
10527 
10528 
10529 #endif
10530 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
10532 
10533  End of -include/epiworld//entities-bones.hpp-
10534

10561 class VirusFunctions {
10562 public:

10564  PostRecoveryFun<TSeq> post_recovery = nullptr;
10565  VirusFun<TSeq> probability_of_infecting = nullptr;
10566  VirusFun<TSeq> probability_of_recovery = nullptr;
10567  VirusFun<TSeq> probability_of_death = nullptr;
10568  VirusFun<TSeq> incubation = nullptr;
10569 
10570  // Information about how distribution works
10571  VirusToAgentFun<TSeq> dist = nullptr;
10572 
10573  VirusFunctions() = default;
10574 
10575 };
10576 
10587 template<typename TSeq>
10588 class Virus {
10589  friend class Agent<TSeq>;
10590  friend class Model<TSeq>;
10591  friend class DataBase<TSeq>;
10592  friend void default_add_virus<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
10593  friend void default_rm_virus<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
10594 private:
10595 
10596  Agent<TSeq> * agent = nullptr;
10597 
10598  EPI_TYPENAME_TRAITS(TSeq, int) baseline_sequence =
10599  EPI_TYPENAME_TRAITS(TSeq, int)();
10600 
10601  std::string virus_name = "unknown virus";
10602  int date = -99;
10603  int id = -99;
10604  epiworld_fast_int state_init = -99; ///< Change of state when added to agent.
10605  epiworld_fast_int state_post = -99; ///< Change of state when removed from agent.
10606  epiworld_fast_int state_removed = -99; ///< Change of state when agent is removed
10607 
10608  epiworld_fast_int queue_init = Queue<TSeq>::Everyone; ///< Change of state when added to agent.
10609  epiworld_fast_int queue_post = -Queue<TSeq>::Everyone; ///< Change of state when removed from agent.
10610  epiworld_fast_int queue_removed = -Queue<TSeq>::Everyone; ///< Change of state when agent is removed
10611 
10612  std::shared_ptr< VirusFunctions<TSeq> > virus_functions =
10613  std::make_shared< VirusFunctions<TSeq> >();
10614 
10615 public:
10616 
10617  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG_VIRUS
10618  static std::atomic<int> counter_construct; // Default and parameterized constructors
10619  static std::atomic<int> counter_copy_construct; // Copy constructor
10620  static std::atomic<int> counter_move_construct; // Move constructor
10621  static std::atomic<int> counter_copy_assign; // Copy assignment
10622  static std::atomic<int> counter_move_assign; // Move assignment
10623  static std::atomic<int> counter_destruct; // Destructor
10624  #endif
10625 
10626  Virus();
10627 
10628  Virus(std::string name = "unknown virus");
10629 
10630  Virus(
10631  std::string name,
10632  epiworld_double prevalence,
10633  bool as_proportion
10634  );
10635 
10636  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG_VIRUS
10637 
10638  // Copy and move operations for debugging
10639  Virus(const Virus<TSeq>& other); // Copy constructor
10640  Virus(Virus<TSeq>&& other) noexcept; // Move constructor
10641  Virus<TSeq>& operator=(const Virus<TSeq>& other); // Copy assignment
10642  Virus<TSeq>& operator=(Virus<TSeq>&& other) noexcept; // Move assignment
10643 
10644  ~Virus();
10645  #endif
10646 
10647  void mutate(Model<TSeq> * model);
10648  void set_mutation(MutFun<TSeq> fun);
10649 
10650  EPI_TYPENAME_TRAITS(TSeq, int) get_sequence();
10651  void set_sequence(TSeq sequence);
10652

10654  void set_agent(Agent<TSeq> * p);
10655 
10656  void set_date(int d);
10657  int get_date() const;
10658 
10659  void set_id(int idx);
10660  int get_id() const;
10661 
10671  epiworld_double get_prob_infecting(Model<TSeq> * model);
10672  epiworld_double get_prob_recovery(Model<TSeq> * model);
10673  epiworld_double get_prob_death(Model<TSeq> * model);
10674  epiworld_double get_incubation(Model<TSeq> * model);
10675 
10676  void post_recovery(Model<TSeq> * model);
10677  void set_post_recovery(PostRecoveryFun<TSeq> fun);
10678  void set_post_immunity(epiworld_double prob);
10679  void set_post_immunity(epiworld_double * prob);
10680 
10681  void set_prob_infecting_fun(VirusFun<TSeq> fun);
10682  void set_prob_recovery_fun(VirusFun<TSeq> fun);
10683  void set_prob_death_fun(VirusFun<TSeq> fun);
10684  void set_incubation_fun(VirusFun<TSeq> fun);
10685 
10686  void set_prob_infecting(const epiworld_double * prob);
10687  void set_prob_recovery(const epiworld_double * prob);
10688  void set_prob_death(const epiworld_double * prob);
10689  void set_incubation(const epiworld_double * prob);
10690 
10691  void set_prob_infecting(epiworld_double prob);
10692  void set_prob_recovery(epiworld_double prob);
10693  void set_prob_death(epiworld_double prob);
10694  void set_incubation(epiworld_double prob);
10696 
10697

10699  std::string get_name() const;
10700 
10714  void set_state(
10715  epiworld_fast_int init,
10716  epiworld_fast_int end,
10717  epiworld_fast_int removed = -99
10718  );

10734  epiworld_fast_int * end,
10735  epiworld_fast_int * removed = nullptr
10736  );

10838 template<typename TSeq>
10839 class Agent {
10840  friend class Model<TSeq>;
10841  friend class Virus<TSeq>;
10842  friend class Tool<TSeq>;
10843  friend class Tools<TSeq>;
10844  friend class Tools_const<TSeq>;
10845  friend class Queue<TSeq>;
10846  friend class Entities<TSeq>;
10847  friend class AgentsSample<TSeq>;
10848  friend void default_add_virus<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
10849  friend void default_add_tool<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
10850  friend void default_add_entity<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
10851  friend void default_rm_virus<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
10852  friend void default_rm_tool<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
10853  friend void default_rm_entity<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
10854  friend void default_change_state<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
10855 private:
10856 
10857  Model<TSeq> * model;
10858 
10859  std::vector< size_t > * neighbors = nullptr;
10860  std::vector< size_t > * neighbors_locations = nullptr;
10861  size_t n_neighbors = 0u;
10862 
10863  std::vector< size_t > entities;
10864  std::vector< size_t > entities_locations;
10865  size_t n_entities = 0u;
10866 
10867  unsigned int state = 0u;
10868  unsigned int state_prev = 0u; ///< For accounting, if need to undo a change.
10869 
10870  int state_last_changed = -1; ///< Last time the agent was updated.
10871  int id = -1;
10872 
10873  VirusPtr<TSeq> virus = nullptr;
10874 
10875  std::vector< ToolPtr<TSeq> > tools;
10876  unsigned int n_tools = 0u;
10877 
10878 public:
10879 
10880  Agent();

10883  Agent<TSeq> & operator=(const Agent<TSeq> & other_agent);
10884  ~Agent();
10885 
10897  void add_tool(
10898  ToolPtr<TSeq> & tool,
10899  Model<TSeq> * model,
10900  epiworld_fast_int state_new = -99,
10901  epiworld_fast_int queue = -99
10902  );

11079 
11080 
11081 
11100 template<typename TSeq>
11101 inline std::function<void(size_t,Model<TSeq>*)> make_save_run(
11102  std::string fmt,
11103  bool total_hist,
11104  bool virus_info,
11105  bool virus_hist,
11106  bool tool_info,
11107  bool tool_hist,
11108  bool transmission,
11109  bool transition,
11110  bool reproductive,
11111  bool generation
11112  )
11113 {
11114 
11115  // Counting number of %
11116  int n_fmt = 0;
11117  for (auto & f : fmt)
11118  if (f == '%')
11119  n_fmt++;
11120 
11121  if (n_fmt != 1)
11122  throw std::logic_error("The -fmt- argument must have only one \"%\" symbol.");
11123 
11124  // Listting things to save
11125  std::vector< bool > what_to_save = {
11126  virus_info,
11127  virus_hist,
11128  tool_info,
11129  tool_hist,
11130  total_hist,
11131  transmission,
11132  transition,
11133  reproductive,
11134  generation
11135  };
11136 
11137  std::function<void(size_t,Model<TSeq>*)> saver = [fmt,what_to_save](
11138  size_t niter, Model<TSeq> * m
11139  ) -> void {
11140 
11141  std::string virus_info = "";
11142  std::string virus_hist = "";
11143  std::string tool_info = "";
11144  std::string tool_hist = "";
11145  std::string total_hist = "";
11146  std::string transmission = "";
11147  std::string transition = "";
11148  std::string reproductive = "";
11149  std::string generation = "";
11150 
11151  char buff[1024u];
11152  if (what_to_save[0u])
11153  {
11154  virus_info = fmt + std::string("_virus_info.csv");
11155  snprintf(buff, sizeof(buff), virus_info.c_str(), niter);
11156  virus_info = buff;
11157  }
11158  if (what_to_save[1u])
11159  {
11160  virus_hist = fmt + std::string("_virus_hist.csv");
11161  snprintf(buff, sizeof(buff), virus_hist.c_str(), niter);
11162  virus_hist = buff;
11163  }
11164  if (what_to_save[2u])
11165  {
11166  tool_info = fmt + std::string("_tool_info.csv");
11167  snprintf(buff, sizeof(buff), tool_info.c_str(), niter);
11168  tool_info = buff;
11169  }
11170  if (what_to_save[3u])
11171  {
11172  tool_hist = fmt + std::string("_tool_hist.csv");
11173  snprintf(buff, sizeof(buff), tool_hist.c_str(), niter);
11174  tool_hist = buff;
11175  }
11176  if (what_to_save[4u])
11177  {
11178  total_hist = fmt + std::string("_total_hist.csv");
11179  snprintf(buff, sizeof(buff), total_hist.c_str(), niter);
11180  total_hist = buff;
11181  }
11182  if (what_to_save[5u])
11183  {
11184  transmission = fmt + std::string("_transmission.csv");
11185  snprintf(buff, sizeof(buff), transmission.c_str(), niter);
11186  transmission = buff;
11187  }
11188  if (what_to_save[6u])
11189  {
11190  transition = fmt + std::string("_transition.csv");
11191  snprintf(buff, sizeof(buff), transition.c_str(), niter);
11192  transition = buff;
11193  }
11194  if (what_to_save[7u])
11195  {
11196 
11197  reproductive = fmt + std::string("_reproductive.csv");
11198  snprintf(buff, sizeof(buff), reproductive.c_str(), niter);
11199  reproductive = buff;
11200 
11201  }
11202  if (what_to_save[8u])
11203  {
11204 
11205  generation = fmt + std::string("_generation.csv");
11206  snprintf(buff, sizeof(buff), generation.c_str(), niter);
11207  generation = buff;
11208 
11209  }
11210 
11211 
11212  m->write_data(
11213  virus_info,
11214  virus_hist,
11215  tool_info,
11216  tool_hist,
11217  total_hist,
11218  transmission,
11219  transition,
11220  reproductive,
11221  generation
11222  );
11223 
11224  };
11225 
11226  return saver;
11227 }
11228 
11229 
11230 template<typename TSeq>
11231 inline void Model<TSeq>::events_add(
11232  Agent<TSeq> * agent_,
11233  VirusPtr<TSeq> virus_,
11234  ToolPtr<TSeq> tool_,
11235  Entity<TSeq> * entity_,
11236  epiworld_fast_int new_state_,
11237  epiworld_fast_int queue_,
11238  EventFun<TSeq> call_,
11239  int idx_agent_,
11240  int idx_object_
11241 ) {
11242 
11243  ++nactions;
11244 
11245  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
11246  if (nactions == 0)
11247  throw std::logic_error("Events cannot be zero!!");
11248  #endif
11249 
11250  if (nactions > events.size())
11251  {
11252 
11253  events.emplace_back(
11254  Event<TSeq>(
11255  agent_, virus_, tool_, entity_, new_state_, queue_, call_,
11256  idx_agent_, idx_object_
11257  ));
11258 
11259  }
11260  else
11261  {
11262 
11263  Event<TSeq> & A = events.at(nactions - 1u);
11264 
11265  A.agent = std::move(agent_);
11266  A.virus = std::move(virus_);
11267  A.tool = std::move(tool_);
11268  A.entity = std::move(entity_);
11269  A.new_state = std::move(new_state_);
11270  A.queue = std::move(queue_);
11271  A.call = std::move(call_);
11272  A.idx_agent = std::move(idx_agent_);
11273  A.idx_object = std::move(idx_object_);
11274 
11275  }
11276 
11277  return;
11278 
11279 }
11280 
11281 template<typename TSeq>
11282 inline void Model<TSeq>::events_run()
11283 {
11284  // Making the call
11285  size_t nevents_tmp = 0;
11286  while (nevents_tmp < nactions)
11287  {
11288 
11289  Event<TSeq> & a = events[nevents_tmp++];
11290  Agent<TSeq> * p = a.agent;
11291 
11292  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
11293  if (a.new_state >= static_cast<epiworld_fast_int>(nstates))
11294  {
11295  throw std::range_error(
11296  "The proposed state " + std::to_string(a.new_state) + " is out of range. " +
11297  "The model currently has " + std::to_string(nstates - 1) + " states.");
11298 
11299  }
11300  else if ((a.new_state != -99) && (a.new_state < 0))
11301  {
11302  throw std::range_error(
11303  "The proposed state " + std::to_string(a.new_state) + " is out of range. " +
11304  "The state cannot be negative.");
11305  }
11306  #endif
11307 
11308  // Undoing the change in the transition matrix
11309  if (
11310  (a.new_state != -99) &&
11311  (p->state_last_changed == today()) &&
11312  (static_cast<int>(p->state) != a.new_state)
11313  )
11314  {
11315  // Undoing state change in the transition matrix
11316  // The previous state is already recorded
11317  db.update_state(p->state_prev, p->state, true);
11318 
11319  } else if (p->state_last_changed != today())
11320  p->state_prev = p->state; // Recording the previous state
11321 
11322  // Applying function after the fact. This way, if there were
11323  // updates, they can be recorded properly, before losing the information
11324  if (a.call)
11325  {
11326  a.call(a, this);
11327  }
11328 
11329  if (a.new_state != -99)
11330  p->state = a.new_state;
11331 
11332  // Registering that the last change was today
11333  p->state_last_changed = today();
11334 
11335 
11336  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
11337  if (static_cast<int>(p->state) >= static_cast<int>(nstates))
11338  throw std::range_error(
11339  "The new state " + std::to_string(p->state) + " is out of range. " +
11340  "The model currently has " + std::to_string(nstates - 1) + " states.");
11341  #endif
11342 
11343  // Updating queue
11344  if (use_queuing && a.queue != -99)
11345  {
11346 
11347  if (a.queue == Queue<TSeq>::Everyone)
11348  queue += p;
11349  else if (a.queue == -Queue<TSeq>::Everyone)
11350  queue -= p;
11351  else if (a.queue == Queue<TSeq>::OnlySelf)
11352  queue[p->get_id()]++;
11353  else if (a.queue == -Queue<TSeq>::OnlySelf)
11354  queue[p->get_id()]--;
11355  else if (a.queue != Queue<TSeq>::NoOne)
11356  throw std::logic_error(
11357  "The proposed queue change is not valid. Queue values can be {-2, -1, 0, 1, 2}."
11358  );
11359 
11360  }
11361 
11362  }
11363 
11364  // Go back to square 1
11365  nactions = 0u;
11366 
11367  return;
11368 
11369 }
11370 
11379 template<typename TSeq>
11380 inline epiworld_double susceptibility_reduction_mixer_default(
11381  Agent<TSeq>* p,
11382  VirusPtr<TSeq> v,
11383  Model<TSeq> * m
11384 )
11385 {
11386  epiworld_double total = 1.0;
11387  for (auto & tool : p->get_tools())
11388  total *= (1.0 - tool->get_susceptibility_reduction(v, m));
11389 
11390  return 1.0 - total;
11391 
11392 }
11393 
11394 template<typename TSeq>
11395 inline epiworld_double transmission_reduction_mixer_default(
11396  Agent<TSeq>* p,
11397  VirusPtr<TSeq> v,
11398  Model<TSeq>* m
11399 )
11400 {
11401  epiworld_double total = 1.0;
11402  for (auto & tool : p->get_tools())
11403  total *= (1.0 - tool->get_transmission_reduction(v, m));
11404 
11405  return (1.0 - total);
11406 
11407 }
11408 
11409 template<typename TSeq>
11410 inline epiworld_double recovery_enhancer_mixer_default(
11411  Agent<TSeq>* p,
11412  VirusPtr<TSeq> v,
11413  Model<TSeq>* m
11414 )
11415 {
11416  epiworld_double total = 1.0;
11417  for (auto & tool : p->get_tools())
11418  total *= (1.0 - tool->get_recovery_enhancer(v, m));
11419 
11420  return 1.0 - total;
11421 
11422 }
11423 
11424 template<typename TSeq>
11425 inline epiworld_double death_reduction_mixer_default(
11426  Agent<TSeq>* p,
11427  VirusPtr<TSeq> v,
11428  Model<TSeq>* m
11429 ) {
11430 
11431  epiworld_double total = 1.0;
11432  for (auto & tool : p->get_tools())
11433  {
11434  total *= (1.0 - tool->get_death_reduction(v, m));
11435  }
11436 
11437  return 1.0 - total;
11438 
11439 }
11441 
11442 template<typename TSeq>
11443 inline Model<TSeq> * Model<TSeq>::clone_ptr()
11444 {
11445  // Everything is copied
11446  Model<TSeq> * ptr = new Model<TSeq>(*dynamic_cast<const Model<TSeq>*>(this));
11447 
11448  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
11449  if (*this != *ptr)
11450  throw std::logic_error("Model::clone_ptr The copies of the model don't match.");
11451  #endif
11452 
11453  return ptr;
11454 }
11455 
11456 template<typename TSeq>
11457 inline Model<TSeq>::Model()
11458 {
11459  db.model = this;
11460  db.user_data = this;
11461  if (use_queuing)
11462  queue.model = this;
11463 }
11464 
11465 template<typename TSeq>
11466 inline Model<TSeq>::Model(const Model<TSeq> & model) :
11467  name(model.name),
11468  db(model.db),
11469  population(model.population),
11470  population_backup(model.population_backup),
11471  directed(model.directed),
11472  viruses(model.viruses),
11473  tools(model.tools),
11474  entities(model.entities),
11475  entities_backup(model.entities_backup),
11476  rewire_fun(model.rewire_fun),
11477  rewire_prop(model.rewire_prop),
11478  parameters(model.parameters),
11479  ndays(model.ndays),
11480  pb(model.pb),
11481  state_fun(model.state_fun),
11482  states_labels(model.states_labels),
11483  initial_states_fun(model.initial_states_fun),
11484  nstates(model.nstates),
11485  verbose(model.verbose),
11486  current_date(model.current_date),
11487  globalevents(model.globalevents),
11488  queue(model.queue),
11489  use_queuing(model.use_queuing),
11490  array_double_tmp(model.array_double_tmp.size()),
11491  array_virus_tmp(model.array_virus_tmp.size())
11492 {
11493 
11494 
11495  // Removing old neighbors
11496  for (auto & p : population)
11497  p.model = this;
11498 
11499  // Pointing to the right place. This needs
11500  // to be done afterwards since the state zero is set as a function
11501  // of the population.
11502  db.model = this;
11503  db.user_data.model = this;
11504 
11505  if (use_queuing)
11506  queue.model = this;
11507 
11508  agents_data = model.agents_data;
11509  agents_data_ncols = model.agents_data_ncols;
11510 
11511 }
11512 
11513 template<typename TSeq>
11514 inline Model<TSeq>::Model(Model<TSeq> & model) :
11515  Model(dynamic_cast< const Model<TSeq> & >(model)) {}
11516 
11517 template<typename TSeq>
11518 inline Model<TSeq>::Model(Model<TSeq> && model) :
11519  name(std::move(model.name)),
11520  db(std::move(model.db)),
11521  population(std::move(model.population)),
11522  agents_data(std::move(model.agents_data)),
11523  agents_data_ncols(std::move(model.agents_data_ncols)),
11524  directed(std::move(model.directed)),
11525  // Virus
11526  viruses(std::move(model.viruses)),
11527  // Tools
11528  tools(std::move(model.tools)),
11529  // Entities
11530  entities(std::move(model.entities)),
11531  entities_backup(std::move(model.entities_backup)),
11532  // Pseudo-RNG
11533  engine(std::move(model.engine)),
11534  runifd(std::move(model.runifd)),
11535  rnormd(std::move(model.rnormd)),
11536  rgammad(std::move(model.rgammad)),
11537  rlognormald(std::move(model.rlognormald)),
11538  rexpd(std::move(model.rexpd)),
11539  // Rewiring
11540  rewire_fun(std::move(model.rewire_fun)),
11541  rewire_prop(std::move(model.rewire_prop)),
11542  parameters(std::move(model.parameters)),
11543  // Others
11544  ndays(model.ndays),
11545  pb(std::move(model.pb)),
11546  state_fun(std::move(model.state_fun)),
11547  states_labels(std::move(model.states_labels)),
11548  initial_states_fun(std::move(model.initial_states_fun)),
11549  nstates(model.nstates),
11550  verbose(model.verbose),
11551  current_date(std::move(model.current_date)),
11552  globalevents(std::move(model.globalevents)),
11553  queue(std::move(model.queue)),
11554  use_queuing(model.use_queuing),
11555  array_double_tmp(model.array_double_tmp.size()),
11556  array_virus_tmp(model.array_virus_tmp.size())
11557 {
11558 
11559  db.model = this;
11560  db.user_data.model = this;
11561 
11562  if (use_queuing)
11563  queue.model = this;
11564 
11565 }
11566 
11567 template<typename TSeq>
11568 inline Model<TSeq> & Model<TSeq>::operator=(const Model<TSeq> & m)
11569 {
11570  name = m.name;
11571 
11572  population = m.population;
11573  population_backup = m.population_backup;
11574 
11575  for (auto & p : population)
11576  p.model = this;
11577 
11578  db = m.db;
11579  db.model = this;
11580  db.user_data.model = this;
11581 
11582  directed = m.directed;
11583 
11584  viruses = m.viruses;
11585 
11586  tools = m.tools;
11587 
11588  entities = m.entities;
11589  entities_backup = m.entities_backup;
11590 
11591  rewire_fun = m.rewire_fun;
11592  rewire_prop = m.rewire_prop;
11593 
11594  parameters = m.parameters;
11595  ndays = m.ndays;
11596  pb = m.pb;
11597 
11598  state_fun = m.state_fun;
11599  states_labels = m.states_labels;
11600  initial_states_fun = m.initial_states_fun;
11601  nstates = m.nstates;
11602 
11603  verbose = m.verbose;
11604 
11605  current_date = m.current_date;
11606 
11607  globalevents = m.globalevents;
11608 
11609  queue = m.queue;
11610  use_queuing = m.use_queuing;
11611 
11612  // Making sure population is passed correctly
11613  // Pointing to the right place
11614  db.model = this;
11615  db.user_data.model = this;
11616 
11617  agents_data = m.agents_data;
11618  agents_data_ncols = m.agents_data_ncols;
11619 
11620  // Figure out the queuing
11621  if (use_queuing)
11622  queue.model = this;
11623 
11624  array_double_tmp.resize(static_cast<size_t>(1024u), 0.0);
11625  array_virus_tmp.resize(1024u);
11626 
11627  return *this;
11628 
11629 }
11630 
11631 template<typename TSeq>
11632 inline DataBase<TSeq> & Model<TSeq>::get_db()
11633 {
11634  return db;
11635 }
11636 
11637 template<typename TSeq>
11638 inline const DataBase<TSeq> & Model<TSeq>::get_db() const
11639 {
11640  return db;
11641 }
11642 
11643 
11644 template<typename TSeq>
11645 inline std::vector<Agent<TSeq>> & Model<TSeq>::get_agents()
11646 {
11647  return population;
11648 }
11649 
11650 template<typename TSeq>
11651 inline Agent<TSeq> & Model<TSeq>::get_agent(size_t i)
11652 {
11653  return population[i];
11654 }
11655 
11656 template<typename TSeq>
11657 inline std::vector< epiworld_fast_uint > Model<TSeq>::get_agents_states() const
11658 {
11659  std::vector< epiworld_fast_uint > states(population.size());
11660  for (size_t i = 0u; i < population.size(); ++i)
11661  states[i] = population[i].get_state();
11662 
11663  return states;
11664 }
11665 
11666 template<typename TSeq>
11667 inline std::vector< Viruses_const<TSeq> > Model<TSeq>::get_agents_viruses() const
11668 {
11669 
11670  std::vector< Viruses_const<TSeq> > viruses(population.size());
11671  for (size_t i = 0u; i < population.size(); ++i)
11672  viruses[i] = population[i].get_virus();
11673 
11674  return viruses;
11675 
11676 }
11677 
11678 // Same as before, but the non const version
11679 template<typename TSeq>
11680 inline std::vector< Viruses<TSeq> > Model<TSeq>::get_agents_viruses()
11681 {
11682 
11683  std::vector< Viruses<TSeq> > viruses(population.size());
11684  for (size_t i = 0u; i < population.size(); ++i)
11685  viruses[i] = population[i].get_virus();
11686 
11687  return viruses;
11688 
11689 }
11690 
11691 template<typename TSeq>
11692 inline std::vector<Entity<TSeq>> & Model<TSeq>::get_entities()
11693 {
11694  return entities;
11695 }
11696 
11697 template<typename TSeq>
11698 inline Entity<TSeq> & Model<TSeq>::get_entity(size_t i, int * entity_pos)
11699 {
11700 
11701  for (size_t j = 0u; j < entities.size(); ++j)
11702  if (entities[j].get_id() == static_cast<int>(i))
11703  {
11704 
11705  if (entity_pos)
11706  *entity_pos = j;
11707 
11708  return entities[j];
11709 
11710  }
11711 
11712  throw std::range_error("The entity with id " + std::to_string(i) + " was not found.");
11713 
11714 }
11715 
11716 template<typename TSeq>
11717 inline Model<TSeq> & Model<TSeq>::agents_smallworld(
11718  epiworld_fast_uint n,
11719  epiworld_fast_uint k,
11720  bool d,
11721  epiworld_double p
11722 )
11723 {
11724  agents_from_adjlist(
11725  rgraph_smallworld(n, k, p, d, *this)
11726  );
11727 
11728  return *this;
11729 }
11730 
11731 template<typename TSeq>
11732 inline void Model<TSeq>::agents_empty_graph(
11733  epiworld_fast_uint n
11734 )
11735 {
11736 
11737  // Resizing the people
11738  population.clear();
11739  population.resize(n, Agent<TSeq>());
11740 
11741  // Filling the model and ids
11742  size_t i = 0u;
11743  for (auto & p : population)
11744  {
11745  p.id = i++;
11746  p.model = this;
11747  }
11748 
11749 
11750 }
11751 
11752 template<typename TSeq>
11753 inline void Model<TSeq>::set_rand_gamma(epiworld_double alpha, epiworld_double beta)
11754 {
11755  rgammad = std::gamma_distribution<>(alpha,beta);
11756 }
11757 
11758 template<typename TSeq>
11759 inline void Model<TSeq>::set_rand_norm(epiworld_double mean, epiworld_double sd)
11760 {
11761  rnormd = std::normal_distribution<>(mean, sd);
11762 }
11763 
11764 template<typename TSeq>
11765 inline void Model<TSeq>::set_rand_unif(epiworld_double a, epiworld_double b)
11766 {
11767  runifd = std::uniform_real_distribution<>(a, b);
11768 }
11769 
11770 template<typename TSeq>
11771 inline void Model<TSeq>::set_rand_lognormal(epiworld_double mean, epiworld_double shape)
11772 {
11773  rlognormald = std::lognormal_distribution<>(mean, shape);
11774 }
11775

11777 inline void Model<TSeq>::set_rand_exp(epiworld_double lambda)
11778 {
11779  rexpd = std::exponential_distribution<>(lambda);
11780 }
11781 
11782 template<typename TSeq>
11783 inline void Model<TSeq>::set_rand_binom(int n, epiworld_double p)
11784 {
11785  rbinomd = std::binomial_distribution<>(n, p);
11786 }
11787

11789 inline void Model<TSeq>::set_rand_nbinom(int n, epiworld_double p)
11790 {
11791  rnbinomd = std::negative_binomial_distribution<>(n, p);
11792 }
11793

11796 {

11798 }
