11801 inline void Model<TSeq>::set_rand_poiss(epiworld_double lambda)
11802 {
11803  rpoissd = std::poisson_distribution<>(lambda);
11804 }
11805 
11806 template<typename TSeq>
11807 inline epiworld_double & Model<TSeq>::operator()(std::string pname) {
11808 
11809  if (parameters.find(pname) == parameters.end())
11810  throw std::range_error("The parameter '"+ pname + "' is not in the model.");
11811 
11812  return parameters[pname];
11813 
11814 }
11815 
11816 template<typename TSeq>
11817 inline size_t Model<TSeq>::size() const {
11818  return population.size();
11819 }
11820 
11821 template<typename TSeq>
11822 inline void Model<TSeq>::dist_virus()
11823 {
11824 
11825  for (auto & v: viruses)
11826  {
11827 
11828  v->distribute(this);
11829 
11830  // Apply the events
11831  events_run();
11832  }
11833 
11834 }
11835 
11836 template<typename TSeq>
11837 inline void Model<TSeq>::dist_tools()
11838 {
11839 
11840  for (auto & tool: tools)
11841  {
11842 
11843  tool->distribute(this);
11844 
11845  // Apply the events
11846  events_run();
11847 
11848  }
11849 
11850 }
11851 
11852 template<typename TSeq>
11853 inline void Model<TSeq>::dist_entities()
11854 {
11855 
11856  for (auto & entity: entities)
11857  {
11858 
11859  entity.distribute(this);
11860 
11861  // Apply the events
11862  events_run();
11863 
11864  }
11865 
11866 }
11867 
11868 template<typename TSeq>
11869 inline void Model<TSeq>::chrono_start() {
11870  time_start = std::chrono::steady_clock::now();
11871 }
11872 
11873 template<typename TSeq>
11874 inline void Model<TSeq>::chrono_end() {
11875  time_end = std::chrono::steady_clock::now();
11876  time_elapsed += (time_end - time_start);
11877  n_replicates++;
11878 }
11879 
11880 template<typename TSeq>
11881 inline void Model<TSeq>::set_backup()
11882 {
11883 
11884  if (population_backup.size() == 0u)
11885  population_backup = std::vector< Agent<TSeq> >(population);
11886 
11887  if (entities_backup.size() == 0u)
11888  entities_backup = std::vector< Entity<TSeq> >(entities);
11889 
11890 }
11891 
11892 template<typename TSeq>
11893 inline std::shared_ptr< std::mt19937 > & Model<TSeq>::get_rand_endgine()
11894 {
11895  return engine;
11896 }
11897 
11898 template<typename TSeq>
11899 inline epiworld_double Model<TSeq>::runif() {
11900  // CHECK_INIT()
11901  return runifd(*engine);
11902 }
11903 
11904 template<typename TSeq>
11905 inline epiworld_double Model<TSeq>::runif(epiworld_double a, epiworld_double b) {
11906  // CHECK_INIT()
11907  return runifd(*engine) * (b - a) + a;
11908 }
11909 
11910 template<typename TSeq>
11911 inline epiworld_double Model<TSeq>::rnorm() {
11912  // CHECK_INIT()
11913  return rnormd(*engine);
11914 }
11915 
11916 template<typename TSeq>
11917 inline epiworld_double Model<TSeq>::rnorm(epiworld_double mean, epiworld_double sd) {
11918  // CHECK_INIT()
11919  return rnormd(*engine) * sd + mean;
11920 }
11921 
11922 template<typename TSeq>
11923 inline epiworld_double Model<TSeq>::rgamma() {
11924  return rgammad(*engine);
11925 }
11926 
11927 template<typename TSeq>
11928 inline epiworld_double Model<TSeq>::rgamma(epiworld_double alpha, epiworld_double beta) {
11929 
11930  return rgammad(
11931  *engine,
11932  std::gamma_distribution<>::param_type(alpha, beta)
11933  );
11934 
11935 }
11936 
11937 template<typename TSeq>
11938 inline epiworld_double Model<TSeq>::rexp() {
11939  return rexpd(*engine);
11940 }
11941 
11942 template<typename TSeq>
11943 inline epiworld_double Model<TSeq>::rexp(epiworld_double lambda) {
11944 
11945  return rexpd(
11946  *engine,
11947  std::exponential_distribution<>::param_type(lambda)
11948  );
11949 
11950 }
11951 
11952 template<typename TSeq>
11953 inline epiworld_double Model<TSeq>::rlognormal() {
11954  return rlognormald(*engine);
11955 }
11956 
11957 template<typename TSeq>
11958 inline epiworld_double Model<TSeq>::rlognormal(epiworld_double mean, epiworld_double shape) {
11959 
11960  return rlognormald(
11961  *engine,
11962  std::lognormal_distribution<>::param_type(mean, shape)
11963  );
11964 }
11965 
11966 template<typename TSeq>
11967 inline int Model<TSeq>::rbinom() {
11968  return rbinomd(*engine);
11969 }
11970 
11971 template<typename TSeq>
11972 inline int Model<TSeq>::rbinom(int n, epiworld_double p) {
11973 
11974  if (n == 0 || p == 0.0)
11975  return 0;
11976 
11977  return rbinomd(
11978  *engine,
11979  std::binomial_distribution<>::param_type(n, p)
11980  );
11981 
11982 }
11983 
11984 template<typename TSeq>
11985 inline int Model<TSeq>::rnbinom() {
11986  return rnbinomd(*engine);
11987 }
11988 
11989 template<typename TSeq>
11990 inline int Model<TSeq>::rnbinom(int n, epiworld_double p) {
11991 
11992  return rnbinomd(
11993  *engine,
11994  std::negative_binomial_distribution<>::param_type(n, p)
11995  );
11996 }
11997 
11998 template<typename TSeq>
11999 inline int Model<TSeq>::rgeom() {
12000  return rgeomd(*engine);
12001 }
12002 
12003 template<typename TSeq>
12004 inline int Model<TSeq>::rgeom(epiworld_double p) {
12005 
12006  return rgeomd(
12007  *engine,
12008  std::geometric_distribution<>::param_type(p)
12009  );
12010 
12011 }
12012 
12013 template<typename TSeq>
12014 inline int Model<TSeq>::rpoiss() {
12015  return rpoissd(*engine);
12016 }
12017 
12018 template<typename TSeq>
12019 inline int Model<TSeq>::rpoiss(epiworld_double lambda) {
12020 
12021  return rpoissd(
12022  *engine,
12023  std::poisson_distribution<>::param_type(lambda)
12024  );
12025 
12026 }
12027 
12028 template<typename TSeq>
12029 inline void Model<TSeq>::seed(size_t s) {
12030  this->engine->seed(s);
12031 }
12032 
12033 template<typename TSeq>
12034 inline void Model<TSeq>::add_virus(
12035  Virus<TSeq> & v
12036  )
12037 {
12038 
12039  // Checking the state
12040  epiworld_fast_int init_, post_, rm_;
12041  v.get_state(&init_, &post_, &rm_);
12042 
12043  if (init_ == -99)
12044  throw std::logic_error(
12045  "The virus \"" + v.get_name() + "\" has no -init- state."
12046  );
12047  else if (post_ == -99)
12048  throw std::logic_error(
12049  "The virus \"" + v.get_name() + "\" has no -post- state."
12050  );
12051 
12052  // Recording the variant
12053  db.record_virus(v);
12054 
12055  // Adding new virus
12056  viruses.push_back(std::make_shared< Virus<TSeq> >(v));
12057 
12058 }
12059 
12060 template<typename TSeq>
12061 inline void Model<TSeq>::add_tool(Tool<TSeq> & t)
12062 {
12063 
12064 
12065  db.record_tool(t);
12066 
12067  // Adding the tool to the model (and database.)
12068  tools.push_back(std::make_shared< Tool<TSeq> >(t));
12069 
12070 }
12071 
12072 template<typename TSeq>
12073 inline void Model<TSeq>::add_entity(Entity<TSeq> e)
12074 {
12075 
12076  e.id = entities.size();
12077  entities.push_back(e);
12078 
12079 }
12080 
12081 template<typename TSeq>
12082 inline void Model<TSeq>::rm_entity(size_t entity_id)
12083 {
12084 
12085  int entity_pos = 0;
12086  auto & entity = this->get_entity(entity_id, &entity_pos);
12087 
12088  // First, resetting the entity
12089  entity.reset();
12090 
12091  // How should
12092  if (entity_pos != (static_cast<int>(entities.size()) - 1))
12093  std::swap(entities[entity_pos], entities[entities.size() - 1]);
12094 
12095  entities.pop_back();
12096 }
12097 
12098 template<typename TSeq>
12099 inline void Model<TSeq>::rm_virus(size_t virus_pos)
12100 {
12101 
12102  if (viruses.size() <= virus_pos)
12103  throw std::range_error(
12104  std::string("The specified virus (") +
12105  std::to_string(virus_pos) +
12106  std::string(") is out of range. ") +
12107  std::string("There are only ") +
12108  std::to_string(viruses.size()) +
12109  std::string(" viruses.")
12110  );
12111 
12112  // Flipping with the last one
12113  std::swap(viruses[virus_pos], viruses[viruses.size() - 1]);
12114  viruses.pop_back();
12115 
12116  return;
12117 
12118 }
12119 
12120 template<typename TSeq>
12121 inline void Model<TSeq>::rm_tool(size_t tool_pos)
12122 {
12123 
12124  if (tools.size() <= tool_pos)
12125  throw std::range_error(
12126  std::string("The specified tool (") +
12127  std::to_string(tool_pos) +
12128  std::string(") is out of range. ") +
12129  std::string("There are only ") +
12130  std::to_string(tools.size()) +
12131  std::string(" tools.")
12132  );
12133 
12134  // Flipping with the last one
12135  std::swap(tools[tool_pos], tools[tools.size() - 1]);
12136 
12137  /* There's an error on windows:
12138  https://github.com/UofUEpiBio/epiworldR/actions/runs/4801482395/jobs/8543744180#step:6:84
12139 
12140  More clear here:
12141  https://stackoverflow.com/questions/58660207/why-doesnt-stdswap-work-on-vectorbool-elements-under-clang-win
12142  */
12143 
12144  tools.pop_back();
12145 
12146  return;
12147 
12148 }
12149 
12150 template<typename TSeq>
12151 inline void Model<TSeq>::load_agents_entities_ties(
12152  std::string fn,
12153  int skip
12154  )
12155 {
12156 
12157  int i,j;
12158  std::ifstream filei(fn);
12159 
12160  if (!filei)
12161  throw std::logic_error("The file " + fn + " was not found.");
12162 
12163  int linenum = 0;
12164  std::vector< std::vector< epiworld_fast_uint > > target_(entities.size());
12165 
12166  target_.reserve(1e5);
12167 
12168  while (!filei.eof())
12169  {
12170 
12171  if (linenum++ < skip)
12172  continue;
12173 
12174  filei >> i >> j;
12175 
12176  // Looking for exceptions
12177  if (filei.bad())
12178  throw std::logic_error(
12179  "I/O error while reading the file " +
12180  fn
12181  );
12182 
12183  if (filei.fail())
12184  break;
12185 
12186  if (i >= static_cast<int>(this->size()))
12187  throw std::range_error(
12188  "The agent["+std::to_string(linenum)+"] = " + std::to_string(i) +
12189  " is above the max id " + std::to_string(this->size() - 1)
12190  );
12191 
12192  if (j >= static_cast<int>(this->entities.size()))
12193  throw std::range_error(
12194  "The entity["+std::to_string(linenum)+"] = " + std::to_string(j) +
12195  " is above the max id " + std::to_string(this->entities.size() - 1)
12196  );
12197 
12198  target_[j].push_back(i);
12199 
12200  population[i].add_entity(entities[j], nullptr);
12201 
12202  }
12203 
12204  return;
12205 
12206 }
12207 
12208 template<typename TSeq>
12209 inline void Model<TSeq>::load_agents_entities_ties(
12210  const std::vector< int > & agents_ids,
12211  const std::vector< int > & entities_ids
12212 ) {
12213 
12214  // Checking the size
12215  if (agents_ids.size() != entities_ids.size())
12216  throw std::length_error(
12217  std::string("The size of agents_ids (") +
12218  std::to_string(agents_ids.size()) +
12219  std::string(") and entities_ids (") +
12220  std::to_string(entities_ids.size()) +
12221  std::string(") must be the same.")
12222  );
12223 
12224  return this->load_agents_entities_ties(
12225  agents_ids.data(),
12226  entities_ids.data(),
12227  agents_ids.size()
12228  );
12229 
12230 }
12231 
12232 template<typename TSeq>
12233 inline void Model<TSeq>::load_agents_entities_ties(
12234  const int * agents_ids,
12235  const int * entities_ids,
12236  size_t n
12237 ) {
12238 
12239  auto get_agent = [agents_ids](int i) -> int {
12240  return *(agents_ids + i);
12241  };
12242 
12243  auto get_entity = [entities_ids](int i) -> int {
12244  return *(entities_ids + i);
12245  };
12246 
12247  for (size_t i = 0u; i < n; ++i)
12248  {
12249 
12250  if (get_agent(i) < 0)
12251  throw std::length_error(
12252  std::string("agents_ids[") +
12253  std::to_string(i) +
12254  std::string("] = ") +
12255  std::to_string(get_agent(i)) +
12256  std::string(" is negative.")
12257  );
12258 
12259  if (get_entity(i) < 0)
12260  throw std::length_error(
12261  std::string("entities_ids[") +
12262  std::to_string(i) +
12263  std::string("] = ") +
12264  std::to_string(get_entity(i)) +
12265  std::string(" is negative.")
12266  );
12267 
12268  int pop_size = static_cast<int>(this->population.size());
12269  if (get_agent(i) >= pop_size)
12270  throw std::length_error(
12271  std::string("agents_ids[") +
12272  std::to_string(i) +
12273  std::string("] = ") +
12274  std::to_string(get_agent(i)) +
12275  std::string(" is out of range (population size: ") +
12276  std::to_string(pop_size) +
12277  std::string(").")
12278  );
12279 
12280  int ent_size = static_cast<int>(this->entities.size());
12281  if (get_entity(i) >= ent_size)
12282  throw std::length_error(
12283  std::string("entities_ids[") +
12284  std::to_string(i) +
12285  std::string("] = ") +
12286  std::to_string(get_entity(i)) +
12287  std::string(" is out of range (entities size: ") +
12288  std::to_string(ent_size) +
12289  std::string(").")
12290  );
12291 
12292  // Adding the entity to the agent
12293  this->population[get_agent(i)].add_entity(
12294  this->entities[get_entity(i)],
12295  nullptr /* Immediately add it to the agent */
12296  );
12297 
12298  }
12299 
12300  return;
12301 
12302 
12303 }
12304 
12305 template<typename TSeq>
12306 inline void Model<TSeq>::agents_from_adjlist(
12307  std::string fn,
12308  int size,
12309  int skip,
12310  bool directed
12311  ) {
12312 
12313  AdjList al;
12314  al.read_edgelist(fn, size, skip, directed);
12315  this->agents_from_adjlist(al);
12316 
12317 }
12318 
12319 template<typename TSeq>
12320 inline void Model<TSeq>::agents_from_edgelist(
12321  const std::vector< int > & source,
12322  const std::vector< int > & target,
12323  int size,
12324  bool directed
12325 ) {
12326 
12327  AdjList al(source, target, size, directed);
12328  agents_from_adjlist(al);
12329 
12330 }
12331 
12332 template<typename TSeq>
12333 inline void Model<TSeq>::agents_from_adjlist(AdjList al) {
12334 
12335  // Resizing the people
12336  agents_empty_graph(al.vcount());
12337 
12338  const auto & tmpdat = al.get_dat();
12339 
12340  for (size_t i = 0u; i < tmpdat.size(); ++i)
12341  {
12342 
12343  // population[i].id = i;
12344  population[i].model = this;
12345 
12346  for (const auto & link: tmpdat[i])
12347  {
12348 
12349  population[i].add_neighbor(
12350  population[link.first],
12351  true, true
12352  );
12353 
12354  }
12355 
12356  }
12357 
12358  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
12359  for (auto & p: population)
12360  {
12361  if (p.id >= static_cast<int>(al.vcount()))
12362  throw std::logic_error(
12363  "Agent's id cannot be negative above or equal to the number of agents!");
12364  }
12365  #endif
12366 
12367 }
12368 
12369 template<typename TSeq>
12370 inline bool Model<TSeq>::is_directed() const
12371 {
12372  if (population.size() == 0u)
12373  throw std::logic_error("The population hasn't been initialized.");
12374 
12375  return directed;
12376 }
12377 
12378 template<typename TSeq>
12379 inline int Model<TSeq>::today() const {
12380 
12381  if (ndays == 0)
12382  return 0;
12383 
12384  return this->current_date;
12385 }
12386 
12387 template<typename TSeq>
12388 inline void Model<TSeq>::next() {
12389 
12390  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
12391  // Checking all the agents have proper states
12392  for (auto & p : population)
12393  {
12394  if ((p.state >= nstates) || (p.state < 0))
12395  {
12396  throw std::range_error(
12397  "The agent " + std::to_string(p.id) +
12398  " has state " + std::to_string(p.state) +
12399  " which is above the maximum state of " +
12400  std::to_string(nstates - 1) + "."
12401  );
12402  }
12403 
12404  if ((p.state_prev >= nstates) || (p.state_prev < 0))
12405  {
12406  throw std::range_error(
12407  "The agent " + std::to_string(p.id) +
12408  " has previous state " + std::to_string(p.state_prev) +
12409  " which is above the maximum state of " +
12410  std::to_string(nstates - 1) + "."
12411  );
12412  }
12413 
12414  }
12415 
12416  #endif
12417 
12418  db.record();
12419  ++this->current_date;
12420 
12421  // Advancing the progress bar
12422  if ((this->current_date >= 1) && verbose)
12423  pb.next();
12424 
12425  return ;
12426 }
12427 
12428 template<typename TSeq>
12429 inline Model<TSeq> & Model<TSeq>::run(
12430  epiworld_fast_uint ndays,
12431  int seed
12432 )
12433 {
12434 
12435  if (size() == 0u)
12436  throw std::logic_error("There are no agents in this model!");
12437 
12438  if (nstates == 0u)
12439  throw std::logic_error(
12440  std::string("No states registered in this model. ") +
12441  std::string("At least one state should be included. See the function -Model::add_state()-")
12442  );
12443 
12444  // Setting up the number of steps
12445  this->ndays = ndays;
12446 
12447  if (seed >= 0)
12448  engine->seed(seed);
12449 
12450  array_double_tmp.resize(std::max(
12451  size(),
12452  static_cast<size_t>(1024)
12453  ));
12454 
12455 
12456  array_virus_tmp.resize(1024);
12457 
12458  // Checking whether the proposed state in/out/removed
12459  // are valid
12460  epiworld_fast_int _init, _end, _removed;
12461  int nstate_int = static_cast<int>(nstates);
12462  for (auto & v : viruses)
12463  {
12464  v->get_state(&_init, &_end, &_removed);
12465 
12466  // Negative unspecified state
12467  if (((_init != -99) && (_init < 0)) || (_init >= nstate_int))
12468  throw std::range_error("States must be between 0 and " +
12469  std::to_string(nstates - 1));
12470 
12471  // Negative unspecified state
12472  if (((_end != -99) && (_end < 0)) || (_end >= nstate_int))
12473  throw std::range_error("States must be between 0 and " +
12474  std::to_string(nstates - 1));
12475 
12476  if (((_removed != -99) && (_removed < 0)) || (_removed >= nstate_int))
12477  throw std::range_error("States must be between 0 and " +
12478  std::to_string(nstates - 1));
12479 
12480  }
12481 
12482  for (auto & t : tools)
12483  {
12484  t->get_state(&_init, &_end);
12485 
12486  // Negative unspecified state
12487  if (((_init != -99) && (_init < 0)) || (_init >= nstate_int))
12488  throw std::range_error("States must be between 0 and " +
12489  std::to_string(nstates - 1));
12490 
12491  // Negative unspecified state
12492  if (((_end != -99) && (_end < 0)) || (_end >= nstate_int))
12493  throw std::range_error("States must be between 0 and " +
12494  std::to_string(nstates - 1));
12495 
12496  }
12497 
12498  // Starting first infection and tools
12499  reset();
12500 
12501  // Initializing the simulation
12502  chrono_start();
12503  EPIWORLD_RUN((*this))
12504  {
12505 
12506  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
12507  db.n_transmissions_potential = 0;
12508  db.n_transmissions_today = 0;
12509  #endif
12510 
12511  // We can execute these components in whatever order the
12512  // user needs.
12513  this->update_state();
12514 
12515  // We start with the Global events
12516  this->run_globalevents();
12517 
12518  // In this case we are applying degree sequence rewiring
12519  // to change the network just a bit.
12520  this->rewire();
12521 
12522  // This locks all the changes
12523  this->next();
12524 
12525  // Mutation must happen at the very end of all
12526  this->mutate_virus();
12527 
12528  }
12529 
12530  // The last reaches the end...
12531  this->current_date--;
12532 
12533  chrono_end();
12534 
12535  return *this;
12536 
12537 }
12538 
12539 template<typename TSeq>
12540 inline void Model<TSeq>::run_multiple(
12541  epiworld_fast_uint ndays,
12542  epiworld_fast_uint nexperiments,
12543  int seed_,
12544  std::function<void(size_t,Model<TSeq>*)> fun,
12545  bool reset,
12546  bool verbose,
12547  #ifdef _OPENMP
12548  int nthreads
12549  #else
12550  int
12551  #endif
12552 )
12553 {
12554 
12555  if (seed_ >= 0)
12556  this->seed(seed_);
12557 
12558  // Seeds will be reproducible by default
12559  std::vector< int > seeds_n(nexperiments);
12560  for (auto & s : seeds_n)
12561  {
12562  s = static_cast<int>(
12563  std::floor(
12564  runif() * static_cast<double>(std::numeric_limits<int>::max())
12565  )
12566  );
12567  }
12568  // #endif
12569 
12570  EPI_DEBUG_NOTIFY_ACTIVE()
12571 
12572  bool old_verb = this->verbose;
12573  verbose_off();
12574 
12575  // Setting up backup
12576  if (reset)
12577  set_backup();
12578 
12579  #ifdef _OPENMP
12580 
12581  omp_set_num_threads(nthreads);
12582 
12583  // Not more than the number of experiments
12584  nthreads =
12585  static_cast<size_t>(nthreads) > nexperiments ? nexperiments : nthreads;
12586 
12587  // Generating copies of the model
12588  std::vector< Model<TSeq> * > these(
12589  std::max(nthreads - 1, 0)
12590  );
12591 
12592  #pragma omp parallel for shared(these, nthreads)
12593  for (size_t i = 0u; i < static_cast<size_t>(nthreads); ++i)
12594  {
12595 
12596  if (i == 0)
12597  continue;
12598 
12599  these[i - 1] = clone_ptr();
12600 
12601  }
12602 
12603 
12604  // Figuring out how many replicates - distribute remainder evenly
12605  std::vector< size_t > nreplicates(nthreads, 0);
12606  std::vector< size_t > nreplicates_csum(nthreads, 0);
12607 
12608  size_t base_replicates = nexperiments / nthreads;
12609  size_t remainder = nexperiments % nthreads;
12610 
12611  size_t sums = 0u;
12612  for (int i = 0; i < nthreads; ++i)
12613  {
12614  // Distribute remainder to first 'remainder' threads
12615  nreplicates[i] = base_replicates + (static_cast<size_t>(i) < remainder ? 1 : 0);
12616 
12617  // This takes the cumsum
12618  nreplicates_csum[i] = sums;
12619  sums += nreplicates[i];
12620  }
12621 
12622  Progress pb_multiple(
12623  nreplicates[0u],
12624  EPIWORLD_PROGRESS_BAR_WIDTH
12625  );
12626 
12627  if (verbose)
12628  {
12629 
12630  printf_epiworld(
12631  "Starting multiple runs (%i) using %i thread(s)\n",
12632  static_cast<int>(nexperiments),
12633  static_cast<int>(nthreads)
12634  );
12635 
12636  pb_multiple.start();
12637 
12638  }
12639 
12640  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
12641  // Checking the initial state of all the models. Throw an
12642  // exception if they are not the same.
12643  for (size_t i = 1; i < static_cast<size_t>(std::max(nthreads - 1, 0)); ++i)
12644  {
12645 
12646  if (db != these[i]->db)
12647  {
12648  throw std::runtime_error(
12649  "The initial state of the models is not the same"
12650  );
12651  }
12652  }
12653  #endif
12654 
12655  #pragma omp parallel shared(these, nreplicates, nreplicates_csum, seeds_n) \
12656  firstprivate(nexperiments, nthreads, fun, reset, verbose, pb_multiple, ndays) \
12657  default(shared)
12658  {
12659 
12660  auto iam = omp_get_thread_num();
12661 
12662  for (size_t n = 0u; n < nreplicates[iam]; ++n)
12663  {
12664  size_t sim_id = nreplicates_csum[iam] + n;
12665  if (iam == 0)
12666  {
12667 
12668  // Checking if the user interrupted the simulation
12669  EPI_CHECK_USER_INTERRUPT(n);
12670 
12671  // Initializing the seed
12672  run(ndays, seeds_n[sim_id]);
12673 
12674  if (fun)
12675  fun(n, this);
12676 
12677  // Only the first one prints
12678  if (verbose)
12679  pb_multiple.next();
12680 
12681  } else {
12682 
12683  // Initializing the seed
12684  these[iam - 1]->run(ndays, seeds_n[sim_id]);
12685 
12686  if (fun)
12687  fun(sim_id, these[iam - 1]);
12688 
12689  }
12690 
12691 
12692 
12693  }
12694 
12695  }
12696 
12697  // Adjusting the number of replicates
12698  n_replicates += (nexperiments - nreplicates[0u]);
12699 
12700  #pragma omp parallel for shared(these)
12701  for (int i = 1; i < nthreads; ++i)
12702  {
12703  delete these[i - 1];
12704  }
12705 
12706  #else
12707  // if (reset)
12708  // set_backup();
12709 
12710  Progress pb_multiple(
12711  nexperiments,
12712  EPIWORLD_PROGRESS_BAR_WIDTH
12713  )
12714  ;
12715  if (verbose)
12716  {
12717 
12718  printf_epiworld(
12719  "Starting multiple runs (%i)\n",
12720  static_cast<int>(nexperiments)
12721  );
12722 
12723  pb_multiple.start();
12724 
12725  }
12726 
12727  for (size_t n = 0u; n < nexperiments; ++n)
12728  {
12729 
12730  // Checking if the user interrupted the simulation
12731  EPI_CHECK_USER_INTERRUPT(n);
12732 
12733  run(ndays, seeds_n[n]);
12734 
12735  if (fun)
12736  fun(n, this);
12737 
12738  if (verbose)
12739  pb_multiple.next();
12740 
12741  }
12742  #endif
12743 
12744  if (verbose)
12745  pb_multiple.end();
12746 
12747  if (old_verb)
12748  verbose_on();
12749 
12750  return;
12751 
12752 }
12753 
12754 template<typename TSeq>
12755 inline void Model<TSeq>::update_state() {
12756 
12757  // Next state
12758  if (use_queuing)
12759  {
12760  int i = -1;
12761  for (auto & p: population)
12762  if (queue[++i] > 0)
12763  {
12764  if (state_fun[p.state])
12765  state_fun[p.state](&p, this);
12766  }
12767 
12768  }
12769  else
12770  {
12771 
12772  for (auto & p: population)
12773  if (state_fun[p.state])
12774  state_fun[p.state](&p, this);
12775 
12776  }
12777 
12778  events_run();
12779 
12780 }
12781 
12782 template<typename TSeq>
12783 inline void Model<TSeq>::mutate_virus() {
12784 
12785  // Checking if any virus has mutation
12786  size_t nmutates = 0u;
12787  for (const auto & v: viruses)
12788  if (v->virus_functions->mutation)
12789  nmutates++;
12790 
12791  if (nmutates == 0u)
12792  return;
12793 
12794  if (use_queuing)
12795  {
12796 
12797  int i = -1;
12798  for (auto & p: population)
12799  {
12800 
12801  if (queue[++i] == 0)
12802  continue;
12803 
12804  if (p.virus != nullptr)
12805  p.virus->mutate(this);
12806 
12807  }
12808 
12809  }
12810  else
12811  {
12812 
12813  for (auto & p: population)
12814  {
12815 
12816  if (p.virus != nullptr)
12817  p.virus->mutate(this);
12818 
12819  }
12820 
12821  }
12822 
12823 
12824 }
12825 
12826 template<typename TSeq>
12827 inline size_t Model<TSeq>::get_n_viruses() const {
12828  return db.size();
12829 }
12830 
12831 template<typename TSeq>
12832 inline size_t Model<TSeq>::get_n_tools() const {
12833  return tools.size();
12834 }
12835 
12836 template<typename TSeq>
12837 inline epiworld_fast_uint Model<TSeq>::get_ndays() const {
12838  return ndays;
12839 }
12840 
12841 template<typename TSeq>
12842 inline epiworld_fast_uint Model<TSeq>::get_n_replicates() const
12843 {
12844  return n_replicates;
12845 }
12846 
12847 template<typename TSeq>
12848 inline size_t Model<TSeq>::get_n_entities() const {
12849  return entities.size();
12850 }
12851 
12852 template<typename TSeq>
12853 inline void Model<TSeq>::set_ndays(epiworld_fast_uint ndays) {
12854  this->ndays = ndays;
12855 }
12856 
12857 template<typename TSeq>
12858 inline bool Model<TSeq>::get_verbose() const {
12859  return verbose;
12860 }
12861 
12862 template<typename TSeq>
12863 inline Model<TSeq> & Model<TSeq>::verbose_on() {
12864  verbose = true;
12865  return *this;
12866 }
12867 
12868 template<typename TSeq>
12869 inline Model<TSeq> & Model<TSeq>::verbose_off() {
12870  verbose = false;
12871  return *this;
12872 }
12873 
12874 template<typename TSeq>
12875 inline void Model<TSeq>::set_rewire_fun(
12876  std::function<void(std::vector<Agent<TSeq>>*,Model<TSeq>*,epiworld_double)> fun
12877  ) {
12878  rewire_fun = fun;
12879 }
12880 
12881 template<typename TSeq>
12882 inline void Model<TSeq>::set_rewire_prop(epiworld_double prop)
12883 {
12884 
12885  if (prop < 0.0)
12886  throw std::range_error("Proportions cannot be negative.");
12887 
12888  if (prop > 1.0)
12889  throw std::range_error("Proportions cannot be above 1.0.");
12890 
12891  rewire_prop = prop;
12892 }
12893 
12894 template<typename TSeq>
12895 inline epiworld_double Model<TSeq>::get_rewire_prop() const {
12896  return rewire_prop;
12897 }
12898 
12899 template<typename TSeq>
12900 inline void Model<TSeq>::rewire() {
12901 
12902  if (rewire_fun)
12903  rewire_fun(&population, this, rewire_prop);
12904 }
12905 
12906 
12907 template<typename TSeq>
12908 inline void Model<TSeq>::write_data(
12909  std::string fn_virus_info,
12910  std::string fn_virus_hist,
12911  std::string fn_tool_info,
12912  std::string fn_tool_hist,
12913  std::string fn_total_hist,
12914  std::string fn_transmission,
12915  std::string fn_transition,
12916  std::string fn_reproductive_number,
12917  std::string fn_generation_time
12918  ) const
12919 {
12920 
12921  db.write_data(
12922  fn_virus_info, fn_virus_hist,
12923  fn_tool_info, fn_tool_hist,
12924  fn_total_hist, fn_transmission, fn_transition,
12925  fn_reproductive_number, fn_generation_time
12926  );
12927 
12928 }
12929 
12930 template<typename TSeq>
12931 inline void Model<TSeq>::write_edgelist(
12932  std::string fn
12933  ) const
12934 {
12935 
12936  // Figuring out the writing sequence
12937  std::vector< const Agent<TSeq> * > wseq(size());
12938  for (const auto & p: population)
12939  wseq[p.id] = &p;
12940 
12941  std::ofstream efile(fn, std::ios_base::out);
12942  efile << "source target\n";
12943  if (this->is_directed())
12944  {
12945 
12946  for (const auto & p : wseq)
12947  {
12948 
12949  if (p->neighbors == nullptr)
12950  continue;
12951 
12952  for (auto & n : *p->neighbors)
12953  efile << p->id << " " << n << "\n";
12954  }
12955 
12956  } else {
12957 
12958  for (const auto & p : wseq)
12959  {
12960 
12961  if (p->neighbors == nullptr)
12962  continue;
12963 
12964  for (auto & n : *p->neighbors)
12965  if (static_cast<int>(p->id) <= static_cast<int>(n))
12966  efile << p->id << " " << n << "\n";
12967  }
12968 
12969  }
12970 
12971 }
12972 
12973 template<typename TSeq>
12974 inline void Model<TSeq>::write_edgelist(
12975 std::vector< int > & source,
12976 std::vector< int > & target
12977 ) const {
12978 
12979  // Figuring out the writing sequence
12980  std::vector< const Agent<TSeq> * > wseq(size());
12981  for (const auto & p: population)
12982  wseq[p.id] = &p;
12983 
12984  if (this->is_directed())
12985  {
12986 
12987  for (const auto & p : wseq)
12988  {
12989  if (p->neighbors == nullptr)
12990  continue;
12991 
12992  for (auto & n : *p->neighbors)
12993  {
12994  source.push_back(static_cast<int>(p->id));
12995  target.push_back(static_cast<int>(n));
12996  }
12997  }
12998 
12999  } else {
13000 
13001  for (const auto & p : wseq)
13002  {
13003 
13004  if (p->neighbors == nullptr)
13005  continue;
13006 
13007  for (auto & n : *p->neighbors) {
13008  if (static_cast<int>(p->id) <= static_cast<int>(n)) {
13009  source.push_back(static_cast<int>(p->id));
13010  target.push_back(static_cast<int>(n));
13011  }
13012  }
13013  }
13014 
13015  }
13016 
13017 
13018 }
13019 
13020 template<typename TSeq>
13021 inline std::map<std::string,epiworld_double> & Model<TSeq>::params()
13022 {
13023  return parameters;
13024 }
13025 
13026 template<typename TSeq>
13027 inline void Model<TSeq>::reset() {
13028 
13029  // Restablishing people
13030  pb = Progress(ndays, 80);
13031 
13032  if (population_backup.size())
13033  {
13034  population = population_backup;
13035 
13036  // Ensuring the population is poiting to the model
13037  for (auto & p : population)
13038  p.model = this;
13039 
13040  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
13041  for (size_t i = 0; i < population.size(); ++i)
13042  {
13043 
13044  if (population[i] != (population_backup)[i])
13045  throw std::logic_error("Model::reset population doesn't match.");
13046 
13047  }
13048  #endif
13049 
13050  }
13051 
13052  for (auto & p : population)
13053  p.reset();
13054 
13055  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
13056  for (auto & a: population)
13057  {
13058  if (a.get_state() != 0u)
13059  throw std::logic_error("Model::reset population doesn't match."
13060  "Some agents are not in the baseline state.");
13061  }
13062  #endif
13063 
13064  if (entities_backup.size())
13065  {
13066  entities = entities_backup;
13067 
13068  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
13069  for (size_t i = 0; i < entities.size(); ++i)
13070  {
13071 
13072  if (entities[i] != (entities_backup)[i])
13073  throw std::logic_error("Model::reset entities don't match.");
13074 
13075  }
13076  #endif
13077 
13078  }
13079 
13080  for (auto & e: entities)
13081  e.reset();
13082 
13083  current_date = 0;
13084 
13085  db.reset();
13086 
13087  // This also clears the queue
13088  if (use_queuing)
13089  queue.reset();
13090 
13091  // Re distributing tools and virus
13092  dist_virus();
13093  dist_tools();
13094  dist_entities();
13095 
13096  // Distributing initial state, if specified
13097  initial_states_fun(this);
13098 
13099  // Recording the original state (at time 0) and advancing
13100  // to time 1
13101  next();
13102 
13103 
13104 }
13105 
13106 // Too big to keep here
13107 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
13109 
13110  Start of -include/epiworld//model-meat-print.hpp-
13111 
13114 
13115 
13116 #ifndef EPIWORLD_MODEL_MEAT_PRINT_HPP
13117 #define EPIWORLD_MODEL_MEAT_PRINT_HPP
13118 
13119 template<typename TSeq>
13120 inline const Model<TSeq> & Model<TSeq>::print(bool lite) const
13121 {
13122 
13123  // Horizontal line
13124  std::string line = "";
13125  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0u; i < 80u; ++i)
13126  line += "_";
13127 
13128  // Prints a message if debugging is on
13129  EPI_DEBUG_NOTIFY_ACTIVE()
13130 
13131  printf_epiworld("%s\n",line.c_str());
13132 
13133  if (lite)
13134  {
13135  // Printing the name of the model
13136  printf_epiworld("%s", name.c_str());
13137 
13138  // Printing the number of agents, viruses, and tools
13139  printf_epiworld(
13140  "\nIt features %i agents, %i virus(es), and %i tool(s).\n",
13141  static_cast<int>(size()),
13142  static_cast<int>(get_n_viruses()),
13143  static_cast<int>(get_n_tools())
13144  );
13145 
13146  printf_epiworld(
13147  "The model has %i states.",
13148  static_cast<int>(nstates)
13149  );
13150 
13151  if (today() != 0)
13152  {
13153  printf_epiworld(
13154  "\nThe final distribution is: "
13155  );
13156 
13157  int nstate_int = static_cast<int>(nstates);
13158 
13159  for (int i = 0u; i < nstate_int; ++i)
13160  {
13161  printf_epiworld(
13162  "%i %s%s",
13163  static_cast<int>(db.today_total[ i ]),
13164  states_labels[i].c_str(),
13165  (
13166  i == (nstate_int - 2)
13167  ) ? ", and " : (
13168  (i == (nstate_int - 1)) ? ".\n" : ", "
13169  )
13170  );
13171  }
13172  } else {
13173  printf_epiworld(" The model hasn't been run yet.\n");
13174  }
13175 
13176  return *this;
13177  }
13178 
13179  printf_epiworld("%s\n%s\n\n",line.c_str(), "SIMULATION STUDY");
13180 
13181  printf_epiworld("Name of the model : %s\n", (this->name == "") ? std::string("(none)").c_str() : name.c_str());
13182  printf_epiworld("Population size : %i\n", static_cast<int>(size()));
13183 
13184  auto ncols = get_agents_data_ncols();
13185 
13186  if (ncols > 0)
13187  {
13188  printf_epiworld("Agents' data loaded : yes (%i columns/features)\n", static_cast<int>(ncols));
13189  }
13190  else
13191  {
13192  printf_epiworld("Agents' data : (none)\n");
13193  }
13194 
13195  printf_epiworld("Number of entities : %i\n", static_cast<int>(entities.size()));
13196  printf_epiworld("Days (duration) : %i (of %i)\n", today(), static_cast<int>(ndays));
13197  printf_epiworld("Number of viruses : %i\n", static_cast<int>(db.get_n_viruses()));
13198  if (n_replicates > 0u)
13199  {
13200  std::string abbr;
13201  epiworld_double elapsed;
13202  epiworld_double total;
13203  get_elapsed("auto", &elapsed, &total, &abbr, false);
13204  printf_epiworld("Last run elapsed t : %.2f%s\n", elapsed, abbr.c_str());
13205  if (n_replicates > 1u)
13206  {
13207  printf_epiworld("Total elapsed t : %.2f%s (%i runs)\n", total, abbr.c_str(), static_cast<int>(n_replicates));
13208  }
13209 
13210  // Elapsed time in speed
13211  get_elapsed("microseconds", &elapsed, &total, &abbr, false);
13212  printf_epiworld("Last run speed : %.2f million agents x day / second\n",
13213  static_cast<double>(this->size()) *
13214  static_cast<double>(this->get_ndays()) /
13215  static_cast<double>(elapsed)
13216  );
13217  if (n_replicates > 1u)
13218  {
13219  printf_epiworld("Average run speed : %.2f million agents x day / second\n",
13220  static_cast<double>(this->size()) *
13221  static_cast<double>(this->get_ndays()) *
13222  static_cast<double>(n_replicates) /
13223  static_cast<double>(total)
13224  );
13225  }
13226 
13227  } else {
13228  printf_epiworld("Last run elapsed t : -\n");
13229  }
13230 
13231 
13232  if (rewire_fun)
13233  {
13234  printf_epiworld("Rewiring : on (%.2f)\n\n", rewire_prop);
13235  } else {
13236  printf_epiworld("Rewiring : off\n\n");
13237  }
13238 
13239  // Printing Global events
13240  printf_epiworld("Global events:\n");
13241  for (auto & a : globalevents)
13242  {
13243  if (a.get_day() < 0)
13244  {
13245  printf_epiworld(" - %s (runs daily)\n", a.get_name().c_str());
13246  } else {
13247  printf_epiworld(" - %s (day %i)\n", a.get_name().c_str(), a.get_day());
13248  }
13249  }
13250 
13251  if (globalevents.size() == 0u)
13252  {
13253  printf_epiworld(" (none)\n");
13254  }
13255 
13256  printf_epiworld("\nVirus(es):\n");
13257  size_t n_viruses_model = viruses.size();
13258  for (size_t i = 0u; i < n_viruses_model; ++i)
13259  {
13260 
13261 
13262  const auto & virus = viruses[i];
13263  if ((n_viruses_model > 10) && (i >= 10))
13264  {
13265  printf_epiworld(" ...and %i more viruses...\n",
13266  static_cast<int>(n_viruses_model) -
13267  static_cast<int>(i)
13268  );
13269  break;
13270  }
13271 
13272  if (i < n_viruses_model)
13273  {
13274 
13275  printf_epiworld(
13276  " - %s\n",
13277  virus->get_name().c_str()
13278  );
13279 
13280  } else {
13281 
13282  printf_epiworld(
13283  " - %s (originated in the model...)\n",
13284  virus->get_name().c_str()
13285  );
13286 
13287  }
13288 
13289  }
13290 
13291  auto nvariants = db.get_n_viruses() - n_viruses_model;
13292  if (nvariants > 0)
13293  {
13294 
13295  printf_epiworld(" ...and %i more variants...\n", static_cast<int>(nvariants));
13296 
13297  }
13298 
13299  if (viruses.size() == 0u)
13300  {
13301  printf_epiworld(" (none)\n");
13302  }
13303 
13304  printf_epiworld("\nTool(s):\n");
13305  size_t n_tools_model = tools.size();
13306  for (size_t i = 0u; i < tools.size(); ++i)
13307  {
13308  const auto & tool = tools[i];
13309 
13310  if ((n_tools_model > 10) && (i >= 10))
13311  {
13312  printf_epiworld(
13313  " ...and %i more tools...\n",
13314  static_cast<int>(n_tools_model) - static_cast<int>(i)
13315  );
13316  break;
13317  }
13318 
13319  if (i < n_tools_model)
13320  {
13321  printf_epiworld(
13322  " - %s\n",
13323  tool->get_name().c_str()
13324  );
13325 
13326 
13327  } else {
13328 
13329  printf_epiworld(
13330  " - %s (originated in the model...)\n",
13331  tool->get_name().c_str()
13332  );
13333 
13334  }
13335 
13336 
13337  }
13338 
13339  if (tools.size() == 0u)
13340  {
13341  printf_epiworld(" (none)\n");
13342  }
13343 
13344  // Information about the parameters included
13345  printf_epiworld("\nModel parameters:\n");
13346  epiworld_fast_uint nchar = 0u;
13347  for (auto & p : parameters)
13348  if (p.first.length() > nchar)
13349  nchar = p.first.length();
13350 
13351  std::string fmt = " - %-" + std::to_string(nchar + 1) + "s: ";
13352  for (auto & p : parameters)
13353  {
13354  std::string fmt_tmp = fmt;
13355  if (std::fabs(p.second) < 0.0001)
13356  fmt_tmp += "%.1e\n";
13357  else
13358  fmt_tmp += "%.4f\n";
13359 
13360  printf_epiworld(
13361  fmt_tmp.c_str(),
13362  p.first.c_str(),
13363  p.second
13364  );
13365 
13366  }
13367 
13368  if (parameters.size() == 0u)
13369  {
13370  printf_epiworld(" (none)\n");
13371  }
13372 
13373  nchar = 0u;
13374  for (auto & p : states_labels)
13375  if (p.length() > nchar)
13376  nchar = p.length();
13377 
13378 
13379 
13380  if (today() != 0)
13381  {
13382  fmt =
13383  std::string(" - (%") +
13384  std::to_string(std::to_string(nstates).length()) +
13385  std::string("d) %-") + std::to_string(nchar) +
13386  std::string("s : %") +
13387  std::to_string(std::to_string(size()).length()) +
13388  std::string("i -> %i\n");
13389  } else {
13390  fmt =
13391  std::string(" - (%") +
13392  std::to_string(std::to_string(nstates).length()) +
13393  std::string("d) %-") + std::to_string(nchar) +
13394  std::string("s : %i\n");
13395  }
13396 
13397  if (today() != 0)
13398  {
13399  printf_epiworld("\nDistribution of the population at time %i:\n", today());
13400  for (size_t s = 0u; s < nstates; ++s)
13401  {
13402 
13403  printf_epiworld(
13404  fmt.c_str(),
13405  s,
13406  states_labels[s].c_str(),
13407  db.hist_total_counts[s],
13408  db.today_total[ s ]
13409  );
13410 
13411  }
13412  }
13413 
13414  if (today() != 0)
13415  (void) db.get_transition_probability(true);
13416 
13417  return *this;
13418 
13419 }
13420 
13421 #endif
13422 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
13424 
13425  End of -include/epiworld//model-meat-print.hpp-
13426 
13429 
13430 
13431 
13432 
13433 template<typename TSeq>
13434 inline void Model<TSeq>::add_state(
13435  std::string lab,
13436  UpdateFun<TSeq> fun
13437 )
13438 {
13439 
13440  // Checking it doesn't match
13441  for (auto & s : states_labels)
13442  if (s == lab)
13443  throw std::logic_error("state \"" + s + "\" already registered.");
13444 
13445  states_labels.push_back(lab);
13446  state_fun.push_back(fun);
13447  nstates++;
13448 
13449 }
13450 
13451 
13452 template<typename TSeq>
13453 inline const std::vector< std::string > &
13454 Model<TSeq>::get_states() const
13455 {
13456  return states_labels;
13457 }
13458 
13459 template<typename TSeq>
13460 inline size_t Model<TSeq>::get_n_states() const
13461 {
13462  return nstates;
13463 }
13464 
13465 template<typename TSeq>
13466 inline const std::vector< UpdateFun<TSeq> > &
13467 Model<TSeq>::get_state_fun() const
13468 {
13469  return state_fun;
13470 }
13471 
13472 template<typename TSeq>
13473 inline void Model<TSeq>::print_state_codes() const
13474 {
13475 
13476  // Horizontal line
13477  std::string line = "";
13478  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0u; i < 80u; ++i)
13479  line += "_";
13480 
13481  printf_epiworld("\n%s\nstates CODES\n\n", line.c_str());
13482 
13483  epiworld_fast_uint nchar = 0u;
13484  for (auto & p : states_labels)
13485  if (p.length() > nchar)
13486  nchar = p.length();
13487 
13488  std::string fmt = " %2i = %-" + std::to_string(nchar + 1 + 4) + "s\n";
13489  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0u; i < nstates; ++i)
13490  {
13491 
13492  printf_epiworld(
13493  fmt.c_str(),
13494  i,
13495  (states_labels[i] + " (S)").c_str()
13496  );
13497 
13498  }
13499 
13500 }
13501 
13502 
13503 
13504 template<typename TSeq>
13505 inline epiworld_double Model<TSeq>::add_param(
13506  epiworld_double initial_value,
13507  std::string pname,
13508  bool overwrite
13509  ) {
13510 
13511  if (parameters.find(pname) == parameters.end())
13512  parameters[pname] = initial_value;
13513  else if (!overwrite)
13514  throw std::logic_error("The parameter " + pname + " already exists.");
13515  else
13516  parameters[pname] = initial_value;
13517 
13518  return initial_value;
13519 
13520 }
13521 
13522 template<typename TSeq>
13523 inline Model<TSeq> & Model<TSeq>::read_params(std::string fn, bool overwrite)
13524 {
13525 
13526  auto params_map = read_yaml<epiworld_double>(fn);
13527 
13528  for (auto & p : params_map)
13529  add_param(p.second, p.first, overwrite);
13530 
13531  return *this;
13532 
13533 }
13534 
13535 template<typename TSeq>
13536 inline epiworld_double Model<TSeq>::get_param(std::string pname)
13537 {
13538  if (parameters.find(pname) == parameters.end())
13539  throw std::logic_error("The parameter " + pname + " does not exists.");
13540 
13541  return parameters[pname];
13542 }
13543 
13544 template<typename TSeq>
13545 inline void Model<TSeq>::set_param(std::string pname, epiworld_double value)
13546 {
13547  if (parameters.find(pname) == parameters.end())
13548  throw std::logic_error("The parameter " + pname + " does not exists.");
13549 
13550  parameters[pname] = value;
13551 
13552  return;
13553 
13554 }
13555 
13556 // // Same as before but using the size_t method
13557 // template<typename TSeq>
13558 // inline void Model<TSeq>::set_param(size_t k, epiworld_double value)
13559 // {
13560 // if (k >= parameters.size())
13561 // throw std::logic_error("The parameter index " + std::to_string(k) + " does not exists.");
13562 
13563 // // Access the k-th element of the std::unordered_map parameters
13564 
13565 
13566 // *(parameters.begin() + k) = value;
13567 
13568 // return;
13569 // }
13570 
13571 template<typename TSeq>
13572 inline epiworld_double Model<TSeq>::par(std::string pname) const
13573 {
13574  const auto iter = parameters.find(pname);
13575  if (iter == parameters.end())
13576  throw std::logic_error("The parameter " + pname + " does not exists.");
13577  return iter->second;
13578 }
13579 
13580 #define DURCAST(tunit,txtunit) {\
13581  elapsed = std::chrono::duration_cast<std::chrono:: tunit>(\
13582  time_end - time_start).count(); \
13583  elapsed_total = std::chrono::duration_cast<std::chrono:: tunit>(time_elapsed).count(); \
13584  abbr_unit = txtunit;}
13585 
13586 template<typename TSeq>
13587 inline void Model<TSeq>::get_elapsed(
13588  std::string unit,
13589  epiworld_double * last_elapsed,
13590  epiworld_double * total_elapsed,
13591  std::string * unit_abbr,
13592  bool print
13593 ) const {
13594 
13595  // Preparing the result
13596  epiworld_double elapsed, elapsed_total;
13597  std::string abbr_unit;
13598 
13599  // Figuring out the length
13600  if (unit == "auto")
13601  {
13602 
13603  size_t tlength = std::to_string(
13604  static_cast<int>(floor(time_elapsed.count()))
13605  ).length();
13606 
13607  if (tlength <= 1)
13608  unit = "nanoseconds";
13609  else if (tlength <= 3)
13610  unit = "microseconds";
13611  else if (tlength <= 6)
13612  unit = "milliseconds";
13613  else if (tlength <= 8)
13614  unit = "seconds";
13615  else if (tlength <= 9)
13616  unit = "minutes";
13617  else
13618  unit = "hours";
13619 
13620  }
13621 
13622  if (unit == "nanoseconds") DURCAST(nanoseconds,"ns")
13623  else if (unit == "microseconds") DURCAST(microseconds,"\xC2\xB5s")
13624  else if (unit == "milliseconds") DURCAST(milliseconds,"ms")
13625  else if (unit == "seconds") DURCAST(seconds,"s")
13626  else if (unit == "minutes") DURCAST(minutes,"m")
13627  else if (unit == "hours") DURCAST(hours,"h")
13628  else
13629  throw std::range_error("The time unit " + unit + " is not supported.");
13630 
13631 
13632  if (last_elapsed != nullptr)
13633  *last_elapsed = elapsed;
13634  if (total_elapsed != nullptr)
13635  *total_elapsed = elapsed_total;
13636  if (unit_abbr != nullptr)
13637  *unit_abbr = abbr_unit;
13638 
13639  if (!print)
13640  return;
13641 
13642  if (n_replicates > 1u)
13643  {
13644  printf_epiworld("last run elapsed time : %.2f%s\n",
13645  elapsed, abbr_unit.c_str());
13646  printf_epiworld("total elapsed time : %.2f%s\n",
13647  elapsed_total, abbr_unit.c_str());
13648  printf_epiworld("total runs : %i\n",
13649  static_cast<int>(n_replicates));
13650  printf_epiworld("mean run elapsed time : %.2f%s\n",
13651  elapsed_total/static_cast<epiworld_double>(n_replicates), abbr_unit.c_str());
13652 
13653  } else {
13654  printf_epiworld("last run elapsed time : %.2f%s.\n", elapsed, abbr_unit.c_str());
13655  }
13656 }
13657 
13658 template<typename TSeq>
13659 inline void Model<TSeq>::set_user_data(std::vector< std::string > names)
13660 {
13661  db.set_user_data(names);
13662 }
13663 
13664 template<typename TSeq>
13665 inline void Model<TSeq>::add_user_data(epiworld_fast_uint j, epiworld_double x)
13666 {
13667  db.add_user_data(j, x);
13668 }
13669 
13670 template<typename TSeq>
13671 inline void Model<TSeq>::add_user_data(std::vector<epiworld_double> x)
13672 {
13673  db.add_user_data(x);
13674 }
13675 
13676 template<typename TSeq>
13677 inline UserData<TSeq> & Model<TSeq>::get_user_data()
13678 {
13679  return db.get_user_data();
13680 }
13681 
13682 template<typename TSeq>
13683 inline void Model<TSeq>::add_globalevent(
13684  std::function<void(Model<TSeq>*)> fun,
13685  std::string name,
13686  int date
13687 )
13688 {
13689 
13690  globalevents.push_back(
13691  GlobalEvent<TSeq>(
13692  fun,
13693  name,
13694  date
13695  )
13696  );
13697 
13698 }
13699 
13700 template<typename TSeq>
13701 inline void Model<TSeq>::add_globalevent(
13702  GlobalEvent<TSeq> action
13703 )
13704 {
13705  globalevents.push_back(action);
13706 }
13707 
13708 template<typename TSeq>
13709 GlobalEvent<TSeq> & Model<TSeq>::get_globalevent(
13710  std::string name
13711 )
13712 {
13713 
13714  for (auto & a : globalevents)
13715  if (a.name == name)
13716  return a;
13717 
13718  throw std::logic_error("The global action " + name + " was not found.");
13719 
13720 }
13721 
13722 template<typename TSeq>
13723 GlobalEvent<TSeq> & Model<TSeq>::get_globalevent(
13724  size_t index
13725 )
13726 {
13727 
13728  if (index >= globalevents.size())
13729  throw std::range_error("The index " + std::to_string(index) + " is out of range.");
13730 
13731  return globalevents[index];
13732 
13733 }
13734 
13735 // Remove implementation
13736 template<typename TSeq>
13737 inline void Model<TSeq>::rm_globalevent(
13738  std::string name
13739 )
13740 {
13741 
13742  for (auto it = globalevents.begin(); it != globalevents.end(); ++it)
13743  {
13744  if (it->get_name() == name)
13745  {
13746  globalevents.erase(it);
13747  return;
13748  }
13749  }
13750 
13751  throw std::logic_error("The global action " + name + " was not found.");
13752 
13753 }
13754 
13755 // Same as above, but the index implementation
13756 template<typename TSeq>
13757 inline void Model<TSeq>::rm_globalevent(
13758  size_t index
13759 )
13760 {
13761 
13762  if (index >= globalevents.size())
13763  throw std::range_error("The index " + std::to_string(index) + " is out of range.");
13764 
13765  globalevents.erase(globalevents.begin() + index);
13766 
13767 }
13768 
13769 template<typename TSeq>
13770 inline void Model<TSeq>::run_globalevents()
13771 {
13772 
13773  for (auto & action: globalevents)
13774  {
13775  action(this, today());
13776  events_run();
13777  }
13778 
13779 }
13780 
13781 template<typename TSeq>
13782 inline void Model<TSeq>::queuing_on()
13783 {
13784  use_queuing = true;
13785 }
13786 
13787 template<typename TSeq>
13788 inline Model<TSeq> & Model<TSeq>::queuing_off()
13789 {
13790  use_queuing = false;
13791  return *this;
13792 }
13793 
13794 template<typename TSeq>
13795 inline bool Model<TSeq>::is_queuing_on() const
13796 {
13797  return use_queuing;
13798 }
13799 
13800 template<typename TSeq>
13801 inline Queue<TSeq> & Model<TSeq>::get_queue()
13802 {
13803  return queue;
13804 }
13805 
13806 template<typename TSeq>
13807 inline const std::vector< VirusPtr<TSeq> > & Model<TSeq>::get_viruses() const
13808 {
13809  return viruses;
13810 }
13811 
13812 template<typename TSeq>
13813 const std::vector< ToolPtr<TSeq> > & Model<TSeq>::get_tools() const
13814 {
13815  return tools;
13816 }
13817 
13818 template<typename TSeq>
13819 inline Virus<TSeq> & Model<TSeq>::get_virus(size_t id)
13820 {
13821 
13822  if (viruses.size() <= id)
13823  throw std::length_error("The specified id for the virus is out of range");
13824 
13825  return *viruses[id];
13826 
13827 }
13828 
13829 template<typename TSeq>
13830 inline Tool<TSeq> & Model<TSeq>::get_tool(size_t id)
13831 {
13832 
13833  if (tools.size() <= id)
13834  throw std::length_error("The specified id for the tools is out of range");
13835 
13836  return *tools[id];
13837 
13838 }

13849 inline double * Model<TSeq>::get_agents_data() {
13850  return this->agents_data;

13855  return this->agents_data_ncols;

13861 {

13866 inline std::string Model<TSeq>::get_name() const
13867 {
13868  return this->name;
13869 }
13870 
13871 #define VECT_MATCH(a, b, c) \
13872  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(a.size() != b.size(), c) \
13873  for (size_t __i = 0u; __i < a.size(); ++__i) \
13874  {\
13875  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(a[__i] != b[__i], c) \
13876  }
13877 
13878 template<typename TSeq>
13879 inline bool Model<TSeq>::operator==(const Model<TSeq> & other) const
13880 {
13881  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(name != other.name, "names don't match")
13882  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(db != other.db, "database don't match")
13883 
13884  VECT_MATCH(population, other.population, "population doesn't match")
13885 
13886  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
13887  using_backup != other.using_backup,
13888  "Model:: using_backup don't match"
13889  )
13890 
13891  if ((population_backup.size() != 0) & (other.population_backup.size() != 0))
13892  {
13893 
13894  // False is population_backup.size() != other.population_backup.size()
13895  if (population_backup.size() != other.population_backup.size())
13896  return false;
13897 
13898  for (size_t i = 0u; i < population_backup.size(); ++i)
13899  {
13900  if (population_backup[i] != other.population_backup[i])
13901  return false;
13902  }
13903 
13904  } else if ((population_backup.size() == 0) & (other.population_backup.size() != 0)) {
13905  return false;
13906  } else if ((population_backup.size() != 0) & (other.population_backup.size() == 0))
13907  {
13908  return false;
13909  }
13910 
13911  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
13912  agents_data != other.agents_data,
13913  "Model:: agents_data don't match"
13914  )
13915 
13916  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
13917  agents_data_ncols != other.agents_data_ncols,
13918  "Model:: agents_data_ncols don't match"
13919  )
13920 
13921  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
13922  directed != other.directed,
13923  "Model:: directed don't match"
13924  )
13925 
13926  // Viruses -----------------------------------------------------------------
13927  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
13928  viruses.size() != other.viruses.size(),
13929  "Model:: viruses.size() don't match"
13930  )
13931 
13932  for (size_t i = 0u; i < viruses.size(); ++i)
13933  {
13934  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
13935  *viruses[i] != *other.viruses[i],
13936  "Model:: *viruses[i] don't match"
13937  )
13938 
13939  }
13940 
13941  // Tools -------------------------------------------------------------------
13942  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
13943  tools.size() != other.tools.size(),
13944  "Model:: tools.size() don't match"
13945  )
13946 
13947  for (size_t i = 0u; i < tools.size(); ++i)
13948  {
13949  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
13950  *tools[i] != *other.tools[i],
13951  "Model:: *tools[i] don't match"
13952  )
13953 
13954  }
13955 
13956  VECT_MATCH(
13957  entities,
13958  other.entities,
13959  "entities don't match"
13960  )
13961 
13962  if ((entities_backup.size() != 0) & (other.entities_backup.size() != 0))
13963  {
13964 
13965  for (size_t i = 0u; i < entities_backup.size(); ++i)
13966  {
13967 
13968  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
13969  entities_backup[i] != other.entities_backup[i],
13970  "Model:: entities_backup[i] don't match"
13971  )
13972 
13973  }
13974 
13975  } else if ((entities_backup.size() == 0) & (other.entities_backup.size() != 0)) {
13976  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(true, "entities_backup don't match")
13977  } else if ((entities_backup.size() != 0) & (other.entities_backup.size() == 0))
13978  {
13979  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(true, "entities_backup don't match")
13980  }
13981 
13982  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
13983  rewire_prop != other.rewire_prop,
13984  "Model:: rewire_prop don't match"
13985  )
13986 
13987  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
13988  parameters.size() != other.parameters.size(),
13989  "Model:: () don't match"
13990  )
13991 
13992  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
13993  parameters != other.parameters,
13994  "Model:: parameters don't match"
13995  )
13996 
13997  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
13998  ndays != other.ndays,
13999  "Model:: ndays don't match"
14000  )
14001 
14002  VECT_MATCH(
14003  states_labels,
14004  other.states_labels,
14005  "state labels don't match"
14006  )
14007 
14008  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
14009  nstates != other.nstates,
14010  "Model:: nstates don't match"
14011  )
14012 
14013  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
14014  verbose != other.verbose,
14015  "Model:: verbose don't match"
14016  )
14017 
14018  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
14019  current_date != other.current_date,
14020  "Model:: current_date don't match"
14021  )
14022 
14023  VECT_MATCH(globalevents, other.globalevents, "global action don't match");
14024 
14025  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
14026  queue != other.queue,
14027  "Model:: queue don't match"
14028  )
14029 
14030 
14031  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
14032  use_queuing != other.use_queuing,
14033  "Model:: use_queuing don't match"
14034  )
14035 
14036  return true;
14037 
14038 }
14039 
14040 template<typename TSeq>
14041 inline void Model<TSeq>::draw(
14042  DiagramType diagram_type,
14043  const std::string & fn_output,
14044  bool self
14045 ) {
14046 
14047  ModelDiagram diagram;
14048 
14049  diagram.draw_from_data(
14050  diagram_type,
14051  this->get_states(),
14052  this->get_db().get_transition_probability(false),
14053  fn_output,
14054  self
14055  );
14056 
14057  return;
14058 
14059 }
14060 
14061 #undef VECT_MATCH
14062 #undef DURCAST
14063 #undef CASES_PAR
14064 #undef CASE_PAR
14065 #undef CHECK_INIT
14066 #endif
14067 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
14069 
14070  End of -include/epiworld/model-meat.hpp-
14071 
14074 
14075 
14076 
14077 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
14079 
14080  Start of -include/epiworld/viruses-bones.hpp-
14081 
14084 
14085 
14086 #ifndef EPIWORLD_VIRUSES_BONES_HPP
14087 #define EPIWORLD_VIRUSES_BONES_HPP
14088 
14089 template<typename TSeq>
14090 class Virus;
14091 
14092 template<typename TSeq>
14093 class Agent;
14094 
14100 template<typename TSeq>
14101 class Viruses {
14102  friend class Virus<TSeq>;
14103  friend class Agent<TSeq>;
14104 private:
14105  std::vector< VirusPtr<TSeq> > * dat;
14106  const epiworld_fast_uint * n_viruses;
14107 
14108 public:
14109 
14110  Viruses() = delete;
14111  Viruses(Agent<TSeq> & p) : dat(&p.viruses), n_viruses(&p.n_viruses) {};
14112 
14113  typename std::vector< VirusPtr<TSeq> >::iterator begin();
14114  typename std::vector< VirusPtr<TSeq> >::iterator end();
14115 
14116  VirusPtr<TSeq> & operator()(size_t i);
14117  VirusPtr<TSeq> & operator[](size_t i);
14118 
14119  size_t size() const noexcept;
14120 
14121  void print() const noexcept;
14122 
14123 };
14124 
14125 template<typename TSeq>
14126 inline typename std::vector< VirusPtr<TSeq> >::iterator Viruses<TSeq>::begin()
14127 {
14128 
14129  if (*n_viruses == 0u)
14130  return dat->end();
14131 
14132  return dat->begin();
14133 }
14134 
14135 template<typename TSeq>
14136 inline typename std::vector< VirusPtr<TSeq> >::iterator Viruses<TSeq>::end()
14137 {
14138 
14139  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
14140  if (dat->size() < *n_viruses)
14141  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "Viruses:: The end of the virus is out of range");
14142  #endif
14143 
14144  return begin() + *n_viruses;
14145 }
14146 
14147 template<typename TSeq>
14148 inline VirusPtr<TSeq> & Viruses<TSeq>::operator()(size_t i)
14149 {
14150 
14151  if (i >= *n_viruses)
14152  throw std::range_error("Virus index out of range.");
14153 
14154  return dat->operator[](i);
14155 
14156 }
14157 
14158 template<typename TSeq>
14159 inline VirusPtr<TSeq> & Viruses<TSeq>::operator[](size_t i)
14160 {
14161 
14162  return dat->operator[](i);
14163 
14164 }
14165 
14166 template<typename TSeq>
14167 inline size_t Viruses<TSeq>::size() const noexcept
14168 {
14169  return *n_viruses;
14170 }
14171 
14172 template<typename TSeq>
14173 inline void Viruses<TSeq>::print() const noexcept
14174 {
14175 
14176  if (*n_viruses == 0u)
14177  {
14178  printf_epiworld("List of viruses (none)\n");
14179  return;
14180  }
14181 
14182  printf_epiworld("List of viruses (%i): ", *n_viruses);
14183 
14184  // Printing the name of each virus separated by a comma
14185  for (size_t i = 0u; i < *n_viruses; ++i)
14186  {
14187  if (i == *n_viruses - 1u)
14188  {
14189  printf_epiworld("%s", dat->operator[](i)->get_name().c_str());
14190  } else
14191  {
14192  printf_epiworld("%s, ", dat->operator[](i)->get_name().c_str());
14193  }
14194  }
14195 
14196  printf_epiworld("\n");
14197 
14198 }
14199 
14205 template<typename TSeq>
14206 class Viruses_const {
14207  friend class Virus<TSeq>;
14208  friend class Agent<TSeq>;
14209 private:
14210  const std::vector< VirusPtr<TSeq> > * dat;
14211  const epiworld_fast_uint * n_viruses;
14212 
14213 public:
14214 
14215  Viruses_const() = delete;
14216  Viruses_const(const Agent<TSeq> & p) : dat(&p.viruses), n_viruses(&p.n_viruses) {};
14217 
14218  typename std::vector< VirusPtr<TSeq> >::const_iterator begin() const;
14219  typename std::vector< VirusPtr<TSeq> >::const_iterator end() const;
14220 
14221  const VirusPtr<TSeq> & operator()(size_t i);
14222  const VirusPtr<TSeq> & operator[](size_t i);
14223 
14224  size_t size() const noexcept;
14225 
14226  void print() const noexcept;
14227 
14228 };
14229 
14230 template<typename TSeq>
14231 inline typename std::vector< VirusPtr<TSeq> >::const_iterator Viruses_const<TSeq>::begin() const {
14232 
14233  if (*n_viruses == 0u)
14234  return dat->end();
14235 
14236  return dat->begin();
14237 }
14238 
14239 template<typename TSeq>
14240 inline typename std::vector< VirusPtr<TSeq> >::const_iterator Viruses_const<TSeq>::end() const {
14241 
14242  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
14243  if (dat->size() < *n_viruses)
14244  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "Viruses_const:: The end of the virus is out of range");
14245  #endif
14246  return begin() + *n_viruses;
14247 }
14248 
14249 template<typename TSeq>
14250 inline const VirusPtr<TSeq> & Viruses_const<TSeq>::operator()(size_t i)
14251 {
14252 
14253  if (i >= *n_viruses)
14254  throw std::range_error("Virus index out of range.");
14255 
14256  return dat->operator[](i);
14257 
14258 }
14259 
14260 template<typename TSeq>
14261 inline const VirusPtr<TSeq> & Viruses_const<TSeq>::operator[](size_t i)
14262 {
14263 
14264  return dat->operator[](i);
14265 
14266 }
14267 
14268 template<typename TSeq>
14269 inline size_t Viruses_const<TSeq>::size() const noexcept
14270 {
14271  return *n_viruses;
14272 }
14273 
14274 template<typename TSeq>
14275 inline void Viruses_const<TSeq>::print() const noexcept
14276 {
14277 
14278  if (*n_viruses == 0u)
14279  {
14280  printf_epiworld("List of viruses (none)\n");
14281  return;
14282  }
14283 
14284  printf_epiworld("List of viruses (%i): ", *n_viruses);
14285 
14286  // Printing the name of each virus separated by a comma
14287  for (size_t i = 0u; i < *n_viruses; ++i)
14288  {
14289  if (i == *n_viruses - 1u)
14290  {
14291  printf_epiworld("%s", dat->operator[](i)->get_name().c_str());
14292  } else
14293  {
14294  printf_epiworld("%s, ", dat->operator[](i)->get_name().c_str());
14295  }
14296  }
14297 
14298  printf_epiworld("\n");
14299 
14300 }
14301 
14302 
14303 #endif
14304 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
14306 
14307  End of -include/epiworld/viruses-bones.hpp-
14308 
14311 
14312

14316 
14317  Start of -include/epiworld/virus-bones.hpp-
14318 
14321 
14322 
14323 #ifndef EPIWORLD_VIRUS_HPP
14324 #define EPIWORLD_VIRUS_HPP
14325 
14326 template<typename TSeq>
14327 class Agent;
14328 
14329 template<typename TSeq>
14330 class Virus;
14331 
14332 template<typename TSeq>
14333 class Model;
14334 
14335 template<typename TSeq>
14336 class VirusFunctions {
14337 public:
14338  MutFun<TSeq> mutation = nullptr;
14339  PostRecoveryFun<TSeq> post_recovery = nullptr;
14340  VirusFun<TSeq> probability_of_infecting = nullptr;
14341  VirusFun<TSeq> probability_of_recovery = nullptr;
14342  VirusFun<TSeq> probability_of_death = nullptr;
14343  VirusFun<TSeq> incubation = nullptr;
14344 
14345  // Information about how distribution works
14346  VirusToAgentFun<TSeq> dist = nullptr;
14347 
14348  VirusFunctions() = default;
14349 
14350 };
14351 
14362 template<typename TSeq>
14363 class Virus {
14364  friend class Agent<TSeq>;
14365  friend class Model<TSeq>;
14366  friend class DataBase<TSeq>;
14367  friend void default_add_virus<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
14368  friend void default_rm_virus<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
14369 private:
14370 
14371  Agent<TSeq> * agent = nullptr;
14372 
14373  EPI_TYPENAME_TRAITS(TSeq, int) baseline_sequence =
14374  EPI_TYPENAME_TRAITS(TSeq, int)();
14375 
14376  std::string virus_name = "unknown virus";
14377  int date = -99;
14378  int id = -99;
14379  epiworld_fast_int state_init = -99; ///< Change of state when added to agent.
14380  epiworld_fast_int state_post = -99; ///< Change of state when removed from agent.
14381  epiworld_fast_int state_removed = -99; ///< Change of state when agent is removed
14382 
14383  epiworld_fast_int queue_init = Queue<TSeq>::Everyone; ///< Change of state when added to agent.
14384  epiworld_fast_int queue_post = -Queue<TSeq>::Everyone; ///< Change of state when removed from agent.
14385  epiworld_fast_int queue_removed = -Queue<TSeq>::Everyone; ///< Change of state when agent is removed
14386 
14387  std::shared_ptr< VirusFunctions<TSeq> > virus_functions =
14388  std::make_shared< VirusFunctions<TSeq> >();
14389 
14390 public:
14391 
14392  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG_VIRUS
14393  static std::atomic<int> counter_construct; // Default and parameterized constructors
14394  static std::atomic<int> counter_copy_construct; // Copy constructor
14395  static std::atomic<int> counter_move_construct; // Move constructor
14396  static std::atomic<int> counter_copy_assign; // Copy assignment
14397  static std::atomic<int> counter_move_assign; // Move assignment
14398  static std::atomic<int> counter_destruct; // Destructor
14399  #endif
14400 
14401  Virus();
14402 
14403  Virus(std::string name = "unknown virus");
14404 
14405  Virus(
14406  std::string name,
14407  epiworld_double prevalence,
14408  bool as_proportion
14409  );
14410 
14411  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG_VIRUS
14412 
14413  // Copy and move operations for debugging
14414  Virus(const Virus<TSeq>& other); // Copy constructor
14415  Virus(Virus<TSeq>&& other) noexcept; // Move constructor
14416  Virus<TSeq>& operator=(const Virus<TSeq>& other); // Copy assignment
14417  Virus<TSeq>& operator=(Virus<TSeq>&& other) noexcept; // Move assignment
14418 
14419  ~Virus();
14420  #endif
14421 
14422  void mutate(Model<TSeq> * model);
14423  void set_mutation(MutFun<TSeq> fun);
14424 
14425  EPI_TYPENAME_TRAITS(TSeq, int) get_sequence();
14426  void set_sequence(TSeq sequence);
14427

14430 
14431  void set_date(int d);
14432  int get_date() const;
14433 
14434  void set_id(int idx);
14435  int get_id() const;
14436 
14446  epiworld_double get_prob_infecting(Model<TSeq> * model);
14447  epiworld_double get_prob_recovery(Model<TSeq> * model);
14448  epiworld_double get_prob_death(Model<TSeq> * model);
14449  epiworld_double get_incubation(Model<TSeq> * model);
14450 
14451  void post_recovery(Model<TSeq> * model);
14452  void set_post_recovery(PostRecoveryFun<TSeq> fun);
14453  void set_post_immunity(epiworld_double prob);
14454  void set_post_immunity(epiworld_double * prob);

14457  void set_prob_recovery_fun(VirusFun<TSeq> fun);
14458  void set_prob_death_fun(VirusFun<TSeq> fun);
14459  void set_incubation_fun(VirusFun<TSeq> fun);
14460 
14461  void set_prob_infecting(const epiworld_double * prob);
14462  void set_prob_recovery(const epiworld_double * prob);
14463  void set_prob_death(const epiworld_double * prob);
14464  void set_incubation(const epiworld_double * prob);
14465 
14466  void set_prob_infecting(epiworld_double prob);
14467  void set_prob_recovery(epiworld_double prob);
14468  void set_prob_death(epiworld_double prob);
14469  void set_incubation(epiworld_double prob);
14471 
14472

14474  std::string get_name() const;
14475

14490  epiworld_fast_int init,
14491  epiworld_fast_int end,
14492  epiworld_fast_int removed = -99
14493  );
14494

14496  epiworld_fast_int init,
14497  epiworld_fast_int end,
14498  epiworld_fast_int removed = -99
14499  );

14502  epiworld_fast_int * init,
14503  epiworld_fast_int * end,
14504  epiworld_fast_int * removed = nullptr
14505  );
14506

14508  epiworld_fast_int * init,
14509  epiworld_fast_int * end,
14510  epiworld_fast_int * removed = nullptr
14511  );
14513 
14514  bool operator==(const Virus<TSeq> & other) const;
14515  bool operator!=(const Virus<TSeq> & other) const {return !operator==(other);};
14516 
14517  void print() const;

14535 
14538 
14539 
14540 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
14542 
14543  Start of -include/epiworld/virus-distribute-meat.hpp-
14544 
14547 
14548 
14549 #ifndef EPIWORLD_VIRUS_DISTRIBUTE_MEAT_HPP
14550 #define EPIWORLD_VIRUS_DISTRIBUTE_MEAT_HPP
14551 
14564 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
14565 inline VirusToAgentFun<TSeq> distribute_virus_to_set(
14566  std::vector< size_t > agents_ids
14567 ) {
14568 
14569  return [agents_ids](
14570  Virus<TSeq> & virus, Model<TSeq> * model
14571  ) -> void
14572  {
14573  // Adding action
14574  for (auto i: agents_ids)
14575  {
14576  model->get_agent(i).set_virus(
14577  virus,
14578  const_cast<Model<TSeq> * >(model)
14579  );
14580  }
14581  };
14582 
14583 }
14584 
14595 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
14596 inline VirusToAgentFun<TSeq> distribute_virus_randomly(
14597  epiworld_double prevalence,
14598  bool prevalence_as_proportion = true,
14599  std::vector< size_t > agents_ids = {}
14600 ) {
14601 
14602  auto agents_ids_ptr = std::make_shared< std::vector< size_t > >(agents_ids);
14603 
14604  return [prevalence,prevalence_as_proportion,agents_ids_ptr](
14605  Virus<TSeq> & virus, Model<TSeq> * model
14606  ) -> void
14607  {
14608 
14609  // Figuring out how what agents are available
14610  bool use_set = agents_ids_ptr->size() > 0;
14611  std::vector< size_t > idx;
14612  if (use_set)
14613  {
14614  for (const auto & agent: *agents_ids_ptr)
14615  if (model->get_agent(agent).get_virus() == nullptr)
14616  idx.push_back(agent);
14617  }
14618  else
14619  {
14620  for (const auto & agent: model->get_agents())
14621  if (agent.get_virus() == nullptr)
14622  idx.push_back(agent.get_id());
14623  }
14624 
14625  // Picking how many
14626  int n = use_set ?
14627  static_cast<int>(idx.size()) :
14628  static_cast<int>(model->size())
14629  ;
14630 
14631  int n_available = static_cast<int>(idx.size());
14632  int n_to_sample;
14633  if (prevalence_as_proportion)
14634  {
14635  n_to_sample = static_cast<int>(std::floor(
14636  prevalence * static_cast< epiworld_double >(n)
14637  ));
14638 
14639  // Correcting for possible overflow
14640  if (n_to_sample > n)
14641  n_to_sample = n;
14642  }
14643  else
14644  {
14645  n_to_sample = static_cast<int>(prevalence);
14646  }
14647 
14648  if (n_to_sample > n_available)
14649  throw std::range_error(
14650  "There are only " + std::to_string(n_available) +
14651  " individuals with no virus in the population. " +
14652  "Cannot add the virus to " +
14653  std::to_string(n_to_sample)
14654  );
14655 
14656  auto & population = model->get_agents();
14657  for (int i = 0; i < n_to_sample; ++i)
14658  {
14659 
14660  int loc = static_cast<epiworld_fast_uint>(
14661  floor(model->runif() * (n_available--))
14662  );
14663 
14664  // Correcting for possible overflow
14665  if ((loc > 0) && (loc >= n_available))
14666  loc = n_available - 1;
14667 
14668  Agent<TSeq> & agent = population[idx[loc]];
14669 
14670  // Adding action
14671  agent.set_virus(
14672  virus,
14673  const_cast<Model<TSeq> * >(model)
14674  );
14675 
14676  // Adjusting sample
14677  std::swap(idx[loc], idx[n_available]);
14678 
14679  }
14680 
14681  };
14682 
14683 }
14684 
14685 #endif
14686 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
14688 
14689  End of -include/epiworld/virus-distribute-meat.hpp-
14690 
14693

14697

14717 #define EPIWORLD_CONFIG_HPP
14718

14720  #define printf_epiworld fflush(stdout);printf
14721 #endif
14722 
14723 // In case the user has a way to stop the program
14724 // This is called during `run_multiple()` and it is
14725 // passed the simulation number.
14726 #ifndef EPI_CHECK_USER_INTERRUPT
14727  #define EPI_CHECK_USER_INTERRUPT(a)
14728 #endif
14729 
14730 #ifndef EPIWORLD_MAXNEIGHBORS
14731  #define EPIWORLD_MAXNEIGHBORS 1048576
14732 #endif
14733 
14734 #if defined(_OPENMP) || defined(__OPENMP)
14735  #include <omp.h>
14736 // #else
14737 // #define omp_get_thread_num() 0
14738 // #define omp_set_num_threads() 1
14739 #endif

14742  #define epiworld_double float
14743 #endif
14744

14746  #define epiworld_fast_int int
14747 #endif
14748

14750  #define epiworld_fast_uint unsigned long long int
14751 #endif
14752 
14753 #define EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ int
14754 
14755 #ifndef EPI_MAX_TRACKING
14756  #define EPI_MAX_TRACKING 100
14757 #endif

14760 class Model;

14790 using VirusPtr = std::shared_ptr< Virus< TSeq > >;

14793 using ToolPtr = std::shared_ptr< Tool< TSeq > >;

14795 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
14796 using ToolFun = std::function<epiworld_double(Tool<TSeq>&,Agent<TSeq>*,VirusPtr<TSeq>,Model<TSeq>*)>;
14797 
14798 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
14799 using MixerFun = std::function<epiworld_double(Agent<TSeq>*,VirusPtr<TSeq>,Model<TSeq>*)>;
14800 
14801 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
14802 using MutFun = std::function<bool(Agent<TSeq>*,Virus<TSeq>&,Model<TSeq>*)>;

14805 using PostRecoveryFun = std::function<void(Agent<TSeq>*,Virus<TSeq>&,Model<TSeq>*)>;

14808 using VirusFun = std::function<epiworld_double(Agent<TSeq>*,Virus<TSeq>&,Model<TSeq>*)>;
14809

14811 using UpdateFun = std::function<void(Agent<TSeq>*,Model<TSeq>*)>;
14812 
14813 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
14814 using GlobalFun = std::function<void(Model<TSeq>*)>;
14815

14817 struct Event;

14820 using EventFun = std::function<void(Event<TSeq>&,Model<TSeq>*)>;
14821

14826 using VirusToAgentFun = std::function<void(Virus<TSeq>&,Model<TSeq>*)>;

14838 using EntityToAgentFun = std::function<void(Entity<TSeq>&,Model<TSeq>*)>;

14845 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
14846 struct Event {
14847  Agent<TSeq> * agent;
14848  VirusPtr<TSeq> virus;
14849  ToolPtr<TSeq> tool;
14850  Entity<TSeq> * entity;
14851  epiworld_fast_int new_state;
14852  epiworld_fast_int queue;
14853  EventFun<TSeq> call;
14854  int idx_agent;
14855  int idx_object;
14856 public:
14873  Event(
14874  Agent<TSeq> * agent_,
14875  VirusPtr<TSeq> & virus_,
14876  ToolPtr<TSeq> & tool_,
14877  Entity<TSeq> * entity_,
14878  epiworld_fast_int new_state_,
14879  epiworld_fast_int queue_,
14880  EventFun<TSeq> & call_,
14881  int idx_agent_,
14882  int idx_object_
14883  ) : agent(agent_), virus(virus_), tool(tool_), entity(entity_),
14884  new_state(new_state_),
14885  queue(queue_), call(call_), idx_agent(idx_agent_), idx_object(idx_object_) {
14886  return;
14887  };
14888 };
14889 
14897 #ifndef DEFAULT_TOOL_CONTAGION_REDUCTION

14899 #endif

14902  #define DEFAULT_TOOL_TRANSMISSION_REDUCTION 0.0
14903 #endif
14904

14907 #endif

14911 #endif

14915 #endif
14916 
14917 #ifndef EPI_DEFAULT_VIRUS_PROB_RECOVERY
14918  #define EPI_DEFAULT_VIRUS_PROB_RECOVERY 0.1428
14919 #endif

14921 #ifndef EPI_DEFAULT_VIRUS_PROB_DEATH
14922  #define EPI_DEFAULT_VIRUS_PROB_DEATH 0.0
14923 #endif
