14927 #endif
14929 
14930 #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
14931  #define EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF printf_epiworld
14932 
14933  #define EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(etype, msg) \
14934  (etype)("[[epi-debug]] (error) " + std::string(msg));
14935 
14936  #define EPI_DEBUG_NOTIFY_ACTIVE() \
14937  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("DEBUGGING ON (compiled with EPI_DEBUG defined)%s\n", "");
14938 
14939  #define EPI_DEBUG_ALL_NON_NEGATIVE(vect) \
14940  for (auto & v : vect) \
14941  if (static_cast<double>(v) < 0.0) \
14942  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "A negative value not allowed.");
14943 
14944  #define EPI_DEBUG_SUM_DBL(vect, num) \
14945  double _epi_debug_sum = 0.0; \
14946  for (auto & v : vect) \
14947  { \
14948  _epi_debug_sum += static_cast<double>(v);\
14949  if (_epi_debug_sum > static_cast<double>(num)) \
14950  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "The sum of elements not reached."); \
14951  }
14952 
14953  #define EPI_DEBUG_SUM_INT(vect, num) \
14954  int _epi_debug_sum = 0; \
14955  for (auto & v : vect) \
14956  { \
14957  _epi_debug_sum += static_cast<int>(v);\
14958  if (_epi_debug_sum > static_cast<int>(num)) \
14959  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "The sum of elements not reached."); \
14960  }
14961 
14962  #define EPI_DEBUG_VECTOR_MATCH_INT(a, b, c) \
14963  if (a.size() != b.size()) {\
14964  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("In '%s'", std::string(c).c_str()); \
14965  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("Size of vector a: %lu\n", (a).size());\
14966  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("Size of vector b: %lu\n", (b).size());\
14967  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::length_error, "The vectors do not match size."); \
14968  }\
14969  for (int _i = 0; _i < static_cast<int>(a.size()); ++_i) \
14970  if (a[_i] != b[_i]) {\
14971  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("In '%s'", std::string(c).c_str()); \
14972  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("Iterating the last 5 values%s:\n", ""); \
14973  for (int _j = std::max(0, static_cast<int>(_i) - 4); _j <= _i; ++_j) \
14974  { \
14975  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF( \
14976  "a[%i]: %i; b[%i]: %i\n", \
14977  _j, \
14978  static_cast<int>(a[_j]), \
14979  _j, static_cast<int>(b[_j])); \
14980  } \
14981  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "The vectors do not match."); \
14982  }
14983 
14984  #define EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(a,b) \
14985  if (a) \
14986  {\
14987  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, b); \
14988  }
14989 
14990  #define epiexception(a) std::logic_error
14991 #else
14992  #define EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF(fmt, ...)
14993  #define EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(fmt, ...)
14994  #define EPI_DEBUG_NOTIFY_ACTIVE()
14995  #define EPI_DEBUG_ALL_NON_NEGATIVE(vect)
14996  #define EPI_DEBUG_SUM_DBL(vect, num)
14997  #define EPI_DEBUG_SUM_INT(vect, num)
14998  #define EPI_DEBUG_VECTOR_MATCH_INT(a, b, c)
14999  #define EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(a, b) \
15000  if (a) \
15001  return false;
15002  #define epiexception(a) a
15003 #endif
15004 
15005 #if defined(EPI_DEBUG_NO_THREAD_ID) || (!defined(__OPENMP) && !defined(_OPENMP))
15006  #define EPI_GET_THREAD_ID() 0
15007 #else
15008  #define EPI_GET_THREAD_ID() omp_get_thread_num()
15009 #endif
15010 
15011 #endif
15012 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
15014 
15015  End of -include/epiworld//config.hpp-
15016 
15019 
15020 
15021 
15030 template<typename TSeq>
15031 inline VirusFun<TSeq> virus_fun_logit(
15032  std::vector< int > vars,
15033  std::vector< double > coefs,
15034  Model<TSeq> * model,
15035  bool logit = true
15036 ) {
15037 
15038  // Checking that there are features
15039  if (coefs.size() == 0u)
15040  throw std::logic_error(
15041  "The -coefs- argument should feature at least one element."
15042  );
15043 
15044  if (coefs.size() != vars.size())
15045  throw std::length_error(
15046  std::string("The length of -coef- (") +
15047  std::to_string(coefs.size()) +
15048  std::string(") and -vars- (") +
15049  std::to_string(vars.size()) +
15050  std::string(") should match. ")
15051  );
15052 
15053  // Checking that there are variables in the model
15054  if (model != nullptr)
15055  {
15056 
15057  size_t K = model->get_agents_data_ncols();
15058  for (const auto & var: vars)
15059  {
15060  if ((var >= static_cast<int>(K)) | (var < 0))
15061  throw std::range_error(
15062  std::string("The variable ") +
15063  std::to_string(var) +
15064  std::string(" is out of range.") +
15065  std::string(" The agents only feature ") +
15066  std::to_string(K) +
15067  std::string("variables (features).")
15068  );
15069  }
15070 
15071  }
15072 
15073  std::vector< epiworld_double > coefs_f;
15074  for (auto c: coefs)
15075  coefs_f.push_back(static_cast<epiworld_double>(c));
15076 
15077  VirusFun<TSeq> fun_infect = [coefs_f,vars](
15078  Agent<TSeq> * agent,
15079  Virus<TSeq> &,
15080  Model<TSeq> *
15081  ) -> epiworld_double {
15082 
15083  size_t K = coefs_f.size();
15084  epiworld_double res = 0.0;
15085 
15086  #if defined(__OPENMP) || defined(_OPENMP)
15087  #pragma omp simd reduction(+:res)
15088  #endif
15089  for (size_t i = 0u; i < K; ++i)
15090  res += agent->operator[](vars.at(i)) * coefs_f.at(i);
15091 
15092  return 1.0/(1.0 + std::exp(-res));
15093 
15094  };
15095 
15096  return fun_infect;
15097 
15098 }
15099 
15100 template<typename TSeq>
15101 inline Virus<TSeq>::Virus()
15102 {
15103 
15104  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG_VIRUS
15105  counter_construct++;
15106  #endif
15107 
15108  EPI_IF_TSEQ_LESS_EQ_INT( TSeq )
15109  {
15110  baseline_sequence = -1;
15111  }
15112  else
15113  {
15114  baseline_sequence = nullptr;
15115  }
15116 
15117 }
15118 
15119 template<typename TSeq>
15120 inline Virus<TSeq>::Virus(
15121  std::string name
15122  ) {
15123 
15124  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG_VIRUS
15125  counter_construct++;
15126  #endif
15127 
15128  EPI_IF_TSEQ_LESS_EQ_INT( TSeq )
15129  {
15130  baseline_sequence = -1;
15131  }
15132  else
15133  {
15134  baseline_sequence = nullptr;
15135  }
15136 
15137  set_name(name);
15138 }
15139 
15140 template<typename TSeq>
15141 inline Virus<TSeq>::Virus(
15142  std::string name,
15143  epiworld_double prevalence,
15144  bool prevalence_as_proportion
15145  ) {
15146 
15147  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG_VIRUS
15148  counter_construct++;
15149  #endif
15150 
15151  EPI_IF_TSEQ_LESS_EQ_INT( TSeq )
15152  {
15153  baseline_sequence = -1;
15154  }
15155  else
15156  {
15157  baseline_sequence = nullptr;
15158  }
15159 
15160  set_name(name);
15161  set_distribution(
15162  distribute_virus_randomly<TSeq>(
15163  prevalence,
15164  prevalence_as_proportion
15165  )
15166  );
15167 }
15168 
15169 #ifdef EPI_DEBUG_VIRUS
15170 template<typename TSeq>
15171 std::atomic<int> Virus<TSeq>::counter_construct = 0;
15172 
15173 template<typename TSeq>
15174 std::atomic<int> Virus<TSeq>::counter_copy_construct = 0;
15175 
15176 template<typename TSeq>
15177 std::atomic<int> Virus<TSeq>::counter_move_construct = 0;
15178 
15179 template<typename TSeq>
15180 std::atomic<int> Virus<TSeq>::counter_copy_assign = 0;
15181 
15182 template<typename TSeq>
15183 std::atomic<int> Virus<TSeq>::counter_move_assign = 0;
15184 
15185 template<typename TSeq>
15186 std::atomic<int> Virus<TSeq>::counter_destruct = 0;
15187 
15188 template<typename TSeq>
15189 inline Virus<TSeq>::~Virus()
15190 {
15191  counter_destruct++;
15192 }
15193 
15194 // Copy constructor
15195 template<typename TSeq>
15196 inline Virus<TSeq>::Virus(const Virus<TSeq>& other)
15197  : agent(other.agent),
15198  baseline_sequence(other.baseline_sequence),
15199  virus_name(other.virus_name),
15200  date(other.date),
15201  id(other.id),
15202  state_init(other.state_init),
15203  state_post(other.state_post),
15204  state_removed(other.state_removed),
15205  queue_init(other.queue_init),
15206  queue_post(other.queue_post),
15207  queue_removed(other.queue_removed),
15208  virus_functions(other.virus_functions)
15209 {
15210  counter_copy_construct++;
15211 }
15212 
15213 // Move constructor
15214 template<typename TSeq>
15215 inline Virus<TSeq>::Virus(Virus<TSeq>&& other) noexcept
15216  : agent(other.agent),
15217  baseline_sequence(std::move(other.baseline_sequence)),
15218  virus_name(std::move(other.virus_name)),
15219  date(other.date),
15220  id(other.id),
15221  state_init(other.state_init),
15222  state_post(other.state_post),
15223  state_removed(other.state_removed),
15224  queue_init(other.queue_init),
15225  queue_post(other.queue_post),
15226  queue_removed(other.queue_removed),
15227  virus_functions(std::move(other.virus_functions))
15228 {
15229  counter_move_construct++;
15230  // other.agent = nullptr;
15231 }
15232 
15233 // Copy assignment
15234 template<typename TSeq>
15235 inline Virus<TSeq>& Virus<TSeq>::operator=(const Virus<TSeq>& other)
15236 {
15237  if (this != &other) {
15238  agent = other.agent;
15239  baseline_sequence = other.baseline_sequence;
15240  virus_name = other.virus_name;
15241  date = other.date;
15242  id = other.id;
15243  state_init = other.state_init;
15244  state_post = other.state_post;
15245  state_removed = other.state_removed;
15246  queue_init = other.queue_init;
15247  queue_post = other.queue_post;
15248  queue_removed = other.queue_removed;
15249  virus_functions = other.virus_functions;
15250  counter_copy_assign++;
15251  }
15252  return *this;
15253 }
15254 
15255 // Move assignment
15256 template<typename TSeq>
15257 inline Virus<TSeq>& Virus<TSeq>::operator=(Virus<TSeq>&& other) noexcept
15258 {
15259  if (this != &other) {
15260  agent = other.agent;
15261  baseline_sequence = std::move(other.baseline_sequence);
15262  virus_name = std::move(other.virus_name);
15263  date = other.date;
15264  id = other.id;
15265  state_init = other.state_init;
15266  state_post = other.state_post;
15267  state_removed = other.state_removed;
15268  queue_init = other.queue_init;
15269  queue_post = other.queue_post;
15270  queue_removed = other.queue_removed;
15271  virus_functions = std::move(other.virus_functions);
15272  other.agent = nullptr;
15273  counter_move_assign++;
15274  }
15275  return *this;
15276 }
15277 #endif
15278 
15279 template<typename TSeq>
15280 inline void Virus<TSeq>::mutate(
15281  Model<TSeq> * model
15282 ) {
15283 
15284  if (virus_functions->mutation)
15285  if (virus_functions->mutation(agent, *this, model))
15286  model->get_db().record_virus(*this);
15287 
15288  return;
15289 
15290 }
15291 
15292 template<typename TSeq>
15293 inline void Virus<TSeq>::set_mutation(
15294  MutFun<TSeq> fun
15295 ) {
15296  virus_functions->mutation = MutFun<TSeq>(fun);
15297 }

15312  return;
15313

15458  [prob](Agent<TSeq> *, Virus<TSeq> &, Model<TSeq> *)
15459  {
15460  return *prob;
15461  };
15462 
15463  virus_functions->probability_of_infecting = tmpfun;
15464 }

15550 template<typename TSeq>
15551 inline void Virus<TSeq>::set_post_recovery(PostRecoveryFun<TSeq> fun)
15552 {
15553  if (virus_functions->post_recovery)
15554  {
15555  printf_epiworld(
15556  "Warning: a PostRecoveryFun is alreay in place (overwriting)."
15557  );
15558  }
15559 
15560  virus_functions->post_recovery = fun;
15561 }
15562 
15563 template<typename TSeq>
15564 inline void Virus<TSeq>::post_recovery(
15565  Model<TSeq> * model
15566 )
15567 {
15568 
15569  if (virus_functions->post_recovery)
15570  virus_functions->post_recovery(agent, *this, model);
15571 
15572  return;
15573 
15574 }
15575 
15576 template<typename TSeq>
15577 inline void Virus<TSeq>::set_post_immunity(
15578  epiworld_double prob
15579 )
15580 {
15581 
15582  if (virus_functions->post_recovery)
15583  {
15584 
15585  std::string msg =
15586  std::string(
15587  "You cannot set post immunity when a post_recovery "
15588  ) +
15589  std::string(
15590  "function is already in place. Redesign the post_recovery function."
15591  );
15592 
15593  throw std::logic_error(msg);
15594 
15595  }
15596 
15597  // To make sure that we keep registering the virus
15598  ToolPtr<TSeq> __no_reinfect = std::make_shared<Tool<TSeq>>(
15599  "Immunity (" + virus_name + ")"
15600  );
15601 
15602  __no_reinfect->set_susceptibility_reduction(prob);
15603  __no_reinfect->set_death_reduction(0.0);
15604  __no_reinfect->set_transmission_reduction(0.0);
15605  __no_reinfect->set_recovery_enhancer(0.0);
15606 
15607  PostRecoveryFun<TSeq> tmpfun =
15608  [__no_reinfect](
15609  Agent<TSeq> * p, Virus<TSeq> &, Model<TSeq> * m
15610  )
15611  {
15612 
15613  // Have we registered the tool?
15614  if (__no_reinfect->get_id() == -99)
15615  m->get_db().record_tool(*__no_reinfect);
15616 
15617  p->add_tool(*__no_reinfect, m);
15618 
15619  return;
15620 
15621  };
15622 
15623  virus_functions->post_recovery = tmpfun;
15624 
15625 }
15626 
15627 template<typename TSeq>
15628 inline void Virus<TSeq>::set_post_immunity(
15629  epiworld_double * prob
15630 )
15631 {
15632 
15633  if (virus_functions->post_recovery)
15634  {
15635 
15636  std::string msg =
15637  std::string(
15638  "You cannot set post immunity when a post_recovery "
15639  ) +
15640  std::string(
15641  "function is already in place. Redesign the post_recovery function."
15642  );
15643 
15644  throw std::logic_error(msg);
15645 
15646  }
15647 
15648  // To make sure that we keep registering the virus
15649  ToolPtr<TSeq> __no_reinfect = std::make_shared<Tool<TSeq>>(
15650  "Immunity (" + virus_name + ")"
15651  );
15652 
15653  __no_reinfect->set_susceptibility_reduction(prob);
15654  __no_reinfect->set_death_reduction(0.0);
15655  __no_reinfect->set_transmission_reduction(0.0);
15656  __no_reinfect->set_recovery_enhancer(0.0);
15657 
15658  PostRecoveryFun<TSeq> tmpfun =
15659  [__no_reinfect](Agent<TSeq> * p, Virus<TSeq> &, Model<TSeq> * m)
15660  {
15661 
15662  // Have we registered the tool?
15663  if (__no_reinfect->get_id() == -99)
15664  m->get_db().record_tool(*__no_reinfect);
15665 
15666  p->add_tool(*__no_reinfect, m);
15667 
15668  return;
15669 
15670  };
15671 
15672  virus_functions->post_recovery = tmpfun;
15673 
15674 }
15675

15677 inline void Virus<TSeq>::set_name(std::string name)
15678 {
15679 
15680  virus_name = name;
15681 
15682 }

15686 {
15687 
15688  return virus_name;

15692 template<typename TSeq>
15693 inline void Virus<TSeq>::set_state(
15694  epiworld_fast_int init,
15695  epiworld_fast_int end,
15696  epiworld_fast_int removed
15697 )
15698 {
15699  state_init = init;
15700  state_post = end;
15701  state_removed = removed;
15702 }
15703 
15704 template<typename TSeq>
15705 inline void Virus<TSeq>::set_queue(
15706  epiworld_fast_int init,
15707  epiworld_fast_int end,
15708  epiworld_fast_int removed
15709 )
15710 {
15711 
15712  queue_init = init;
15713  queue_post = end;
15714  queue_removed = removed;
15715 
15716 }
15717 
15718 template<typename TSeq>
15719 inline void Virus<TSeq>::get_state(
15720  epiworld_fast_int * init,
15721  epiworld_fast_int * end,
15722  epiworld_fast_int * removed
15723 )
15724 {
15725 
15726  if (init != nullptr)
15727  *init = state_init;
15728 
15729  if (end != nullptr)
15730  *end = state_post;
15731 
15732  if (removed != nullptr)
15733  *removed = state_removed;
15734 
15735 }
15736 
15737 template<typename TSeq>
15738 inline void Virus<TSeq>::get_queue(
15739  epiworld_fast_int * init,
15740  epiworld_fast_int * end,
15741  epiworld_fast_int * removed
15742 )
15743 {
15744 
15745  if (init != nullptr)
15746  *init = queue_init;
15747 
15748  if (end != nullptr)
15749  *end = queue_post;
15750 
15751  if (removed != nullptr)
15752  *removed = queue_removed;
15753 
15754 }
15755 
15756 template<>
15757 inline bool Virus<std::vector<int>>::operator==(
15758  const Virus<std::vector<int>> & other
15759  ) const
15760 {
15761 
15762  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
15763  baseline_sequence->size() != other.baseline_sequence->size(),
15764  "Virus:: baseline_sequence don't match"
15765  )
15766 
15767  for (size_t i = 0u; i < baseline_sequence->size(); ++i)
15768  {
15769 
15770  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
15771  baseline_sequence->operator[](i) != other.baseline_sequence->operator[](i),
15772  "Virus:: baseline_sequence[i] don't match"
15773  )
15774 
15775  }
15776 
15777  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
15778  virus_name != other.virus_name,
15779  "Virus:: virus_name don't match"
15780  )
15781 
15782  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
15783  state_init != other.state_init,
15784  "Virus:: state_init don't match"
15785  )
15786 
15787  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
15788  state_post != other.state_post,
15789  "Virus:: state_post don't match"
15790  )
15791 
15792  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
15793  state_removed != other.state_removed,
15794  "Virus:: state_removed don't match"
15795  )
15796 
15797  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
15798  queue_init != other.queue_init,
15799  "Virus:: queue_init don't match"
15800  )
15801 
15802  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
15803  queue_post != other.queue_post,
15804  "Virus:: queue_post don't match"
15805  )
15806 
15807  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
15808  queue_removed != other.queue_removed,
15809  "Virus:: queue_removed don't match"
15810  )
15811 
15812  return true;
15813 
15814 }
15815 
15816 template<typename TSeq>
15817 inline bool Virus<TSeq>::operator==(const Virus<TSeq> & other) const
15818 {
15819 
15820  EPI_IF_TSEQ_LESS_EQ_INT( TSeq )
15821  {
15822  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
15823  baseline_sequence != other.baseline_sequence,
15824  "Virus:: baseline_sequence don't match"
15825  )
15826  }
15827  else
15828  {
15829  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
15830  baseline_sequence != other.baseline_sequence,
15831  "Virus:: baseline_sequence don't match"
15832  )
15833  }
15834 
15835  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
15836  virus_name != other.virus_name,
15837  "Virus:: virus_name don't match"
15838  )
15839 
15840  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
15841  state_init != other.state_init,
15842  "Virus:: state_init don't match"
15843  )
15844 
15845  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
15846  state_post != other.state_post,
15847  "Virus:: state_post don't match"
15848  )
15849 
15850  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
15851  state_removed != other.state_removed,
15852  "Virus:: state_removed don't match"
15853  )
15854 
15855  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
15856  queue_init != other.queue_init,
15857  "Virus:: queue_init don't match"
15858  )
15859 
15860  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
15861  queue_post != other.queue_post,
15862  "Virus:: queue_post don't match"
15863  )
15864 
15865  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
15866  queue_removed != other.queue_removed,
15867  "Virus:: queue_removed don't match"
15868  )
15869 
15870  return true;
15871 
15872 }
15873 
15874 template<typename TSeq>
15875 inline void Virus<TSeq>::print() const
15876 {
15877 
15878  printf_epiworld("Virus : %s\n", virus_name.c_str());
15879  printf_epiworld("Id : %s\n", (id < 0)? std::string("(empty)").c_str() : std::to_string(id).c_str());
15880  printf_epiworld("state_init : %i\n", static_cast<int>(state_init));
15881  printf_epiworld("state_post : %i\n", static_cast<int>(state_post));
15882  printf_epiworld("state_removed : %i\n", static_cast<int>(state_removed));
15883  printf_epiworld("queue_init : %i\n", static_cast<int>(queue_init));
15884  printf_epiworld("queue_post : %i\n", static_cast<int>(queue_post));
15885  printf_epiworld("queue_removed : %i\n", static_cast<int>(queue_removed));
15886 
15887 }
15888 
15889 template<typename TSeq>
15890 inline void Virus<TSeq>::distribute(Model<TSeq> * model)
15891 {
15892 
15893  if (virus_functions->dist)
15894  {
15895 
15896  virus_functions->dist(*this, model);
15897 
15898  }
15899 
15900 }
15901 
15902 template<typename TSeq>
15903 inline void Virus<TSeq>::set_distribution(VirusToAgentFun<TSeq> fun)
15904 {
15905  virus_functions->dist = fun;
15906 }
15907 
15908 #endif
15909 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
15911 
15912  End of -include/epiworld/virus-meat.hpp-

15921

15923 
15926 
15927 
15928 #ifndef EPIWORLD_TOOLS_BONES_HPP
15929 #define EPIWORLD_TOOLS_BONES_HPP
15930 
15931 template<typename TSeq>
15932 class Tool;
15933 
15934 template<typename TSeq>
15935 class Agent;
15936 
15937 // #define ToolPtr<TSeq> std::shared_ptr< Tool<TSeq> >
15938 
15944 template<typename TSeq>
15945 class Tools {
15946  friend class Tool<TSeq>;
15947  friend class Agent<TSeq>;
15948 private:
15949  std::vector< ToolPtr<TSeq> > * dat;
15950  const unsigned int * n_tools;
15951 
15952 public:
15953 
15954  Tools() = delete;
15955  Tools(Agent<TSeq> & p) : dat(&p.tools), n_tools(&p.n_tools) {};
15956 
15957  typename std::vector< ToolPtr<TSeq> >::iterator begin();
15958  typename std::vector< ToolPtr<TSeq> >::iterator end();
15959 
15960  ToolPtr<TSeq> & operator()(size_t i);
15961  ToolPtr<TSeq> & operator[](size_t i);
15962 
15963  size_t size() const noexcept;
15964 
15965  void print() const noexcept;
15966 
15967 };
15968 
15969 template<typename TSeq>
15970 inline typename std::vector< ToolPtr<TSeq> >::iterator Tools<TSeq>::begin()
15971 {
15972 
15973  if (*n_tools == 0u)
15974  return dat->end();
15975 
15976  return dat->begin();
15977 }
15978 
15979 template<typename TSeq>
15980 inline typename std::vector< ToolPtr<TSeq> >::iterator Tools<TSeq>::end()
15981 {
15982 
15983  return begin() + *n_tools;
15984 }
15985 
15986 template<typename TSeq>
15987 inline ToolPtr<TSeq> & Tools<TSeq>::operator()(size_t i)
15988 {
15989 
15990  if (i >= *n_tools)
15991  throw std::range_error("Tool index out of range.");
15992 
15993  return dat->operator[](i);
15994 
15995 }
15996 
15997 template<typename TSeq>
15998 inline ToolPtr<TSeq> & Tools<TSeq>::operator[](size_t i)
15999 {
16000 
16001  return dat->operator[](i);
16002 
16003 }
16004 
16005 template<typename TSeq>
16006 inline size_t Tools<TSeq>::size() const noexcept
16007 {
16008  return *n_tools;
16009 }
16010 
16011 template<typename TSeq>
16012 inline void Tools<TSeq>::print() const noexcept
16013 {
16014  if (*n_tools == 0u)
16015  {
16016  printf_epiworld("List of tools (none)\n");
16017  return;
16018  }
16019 
16020  printf_epiworld("List of tools (%i): ", static_cast<int>(*n_tools));
16021 
16022  // Printing the name of each virus separated by a comma
16023  for (size_t i = 0u; i < *n_tools; ++i)
16024  {
16025  if (i == *n_tools - 1u)
16026  {
16027  printf_epiworld("%s", dat->operator[](i)->get_name().c_str());
16028  } else
16029  {
16030  printf_epiworld("%s, ", dat->operator[](i)->get_name().c_str());
16031  }
16032  }
16033 
16034  printf_epiworld("\n");
16035 
16036 }
16037 
16043 template<typename TSeq>
16044 class Tools_const {
16045  friend class Tool<TSeq>;
16046  friend class Agent<TSeq>;
16047 private:
16048  const std::vector< ToolPtr<TSeq> > * dat;
16049  const epiworld_fast_uint * n_tools;
16050 
16051 public:
16052 
16053  Tools_const() = delete;
16054  Tools_const(const Agent<TSeq> & p) : dat(&p.tools), n_tools(&p.n_tools) {};
16055 
16056  typename std::vector< ToolPtr<TSeq> >::const_iterator begin() const;
16057  typename std::vector< ToolPtr<TSeq> >::const_iterator end() const;
16058 
16059  const ToolPtr<TSeq> & operator()(size_t i);
16060  const ToolPtr<TSeq> & operator[](size_t i);
16061 
16062  size_t size() const noexcept;
16063 
16064  void print() const noexcept;
16065 
16066 };
16067 
16068 template<typename TSeq>
16069 inline typename std::vector< ToolPtr<TSeq> >::const_iterator Tools_const<TSeq>::begin() const {
16070 
16071  if (*n_tools == 0u)
16072  return dat->end();
16073 
16074  return dat->begin();
16075 }
16076 
16077 template<typename TSeq>
16078 inline typename std::vector< ToolPtr<TSeq> >::const_iterator Tools_const<TSeq>::end() const {
16079 
16080  return begin() + *n_tools;
16081 }
16082 
16083 template<typename TSeq>
16084 inline const ToolPtr<TSeq> & Tools_const<TSeq>::operator()(size_t i)
16085 {
16086 
16087  if (i >= *n_tools)
16088  throw std::range_error("Tool index out of range.");
16089 
16090  return dat->operator[](i);
16091 
16092 }
16093 
16094 template<typename TSeq>
16095 inline const ToolPtr<TSeq> & Tools_const<TSeq>::operator[](size_t i)
16096 {
16097 
16098  return dat->operator[](i);
16099 
16100 }
16101 
16102 template<typename TSeq>
16103 inline size_t Tools_const<TSeq>::size() const noexcept
16104 {
16105  return *n_tools;
16106 }
16107 
16108 template<typename TSeq>
16109 inline void Tools_const<TSeq>::print() const noexcept
16110 {
16111  if (*n_tools == 0u)
16112  {
16113  printf_epiworld("List of tools (none)\n");
16114  return;
16115  }
16116 
16117  printf_epiworld("List of tools (%i): ", *n_tools);
16118 
16119  // Printing the name of each virus separated by a comma
16120  for (size_t i = 0u; i < *n_tools; ++i)
16121  {
16122  if (i == *n_tools - 1u)
16123  {
16124  printf_epiworld("%s", dat->operator[](i)->get_name().c_str());
16125  } else
16126  {
16127  printf_epiworld("%s, ", dat->operator[](i)->get_name().c_str());
16128  }
16129  }
16130 
16131  printf_epiworld("\n");
16132 
16133 }

16158 #ifndef EPIWORLD_TOOL_BONES_HPP
16159 #define EPIWORLD_TOOL_BONES_HPP
16160 
16161 template<typename TSeq>
16162 class Virus;
16163 
16164 template<typename TSeq>
16165 class Agent;
16166 
16167 template<typename TSeq>
16168 class Model;
16169 
16170 template<typename TSeq>
16171 class Tool;
16172 
16177 template<typename TSeq>
16178 class ToolFunctions {
16179 public:
16180  ToolFun<TSeq> susceptibility_reduction = nullptr;
16181  ToolFun<TSeq> transmission_reduction = nullptr;
16182  ToolFun<TSeq> recovery_enhancer = nullptr;
16183  ToolFun<TSeq> death_reduction = nullptr;
16184 
16185  ToolToAgentFun<TSeq> dist = nullptr;
16186 
16187  ToolFunctions() = default;
16188 };
16189 
16195 template<typename TSeq>
16196 class Tool {
16197  friend class Agent<TSeq>;
16198  friend class Model<TSeq>;
16199  friend void default_add_tool<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
16200  friend void default_rm_tool<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
16201 private:
16202 
16203  Agent<TSeq> * agent = nullptr;
16204  int pos_in_agent = -99; ///< Location in the agent
16205 
16206  int date = -99;
16207  int id = -99;
16208  std::string tool_name;
16209 
16210  EPI_TYPENAME_TRAITS(TSeq, int) sequence =
16211  EPI_TYPENAME_TRAITS(TSeq, int)(); ///< Sequence of the tool
16212 
16213  std::shared_ptr<ToolFunctions<TSeq>> tool_functions =
16214  std::make_shared< ToolFunctions<TSeq> >();
16215 
16216  epiworld_fast_int state_init = -99;
16217  epiworld_fast_int state_post = -99;
16218 
16219  epiworld_fast_int queue_init = Queue<TSeq>::NoOne; ///< Change of state when added to agent.
16220  epiworld_fast_int queue_post = Queue<TSeq>::NoOne; ///< Change of state when removed from agent.
16221 
16222  void set_agent(Agent<TSeq> * p, size_t idx);
16223 
16224 public:
16225  Tool();
16226  Tool(std::string name = "unknown tool");
16227  Tool(
16228  std::string name,
16229  epiworld_double prevalence,
16230  bool as_proportion
16231  );
16232 
16233  void set_sequence(TSeq d);
16234  void set_sequence(std::shared_ptr<TSeq> d);
16235  EPI_TYPENAME_TRAITS(TSeq, int) get_sequence();
16236 
16246  epiworld_double get_susceptibility_reduction(VirusPtr<TSeq> v, Model<TSeq> * model);
16247  epiworld_double get_transmission_reduction(VirusPtr<TSeq> v, Model<TSeq> * model);
16248  epiworld_double get_recovery_enhancer(VirusPtr<TSeq> v, Model<TSeq> * model);
16249  epiworld_double get_death_reduction(VirusPtr<TSeq> v, Model<TSeq> * model);
16250 
16251  void set_susceptibility_reduction_fun(ToolFun<TSeq> fun);
16252  void set_transmission_reduction_fun(ToolFun<TSeq> fun);
16253  void set_recovery_enhancer_fun(ToolFun<TSeq> fun);
16254  void set_death_reduction_fun(ToolFun<TSeq> fun);
16255 
16256  void set_susceptibility_reduction(epiworld_double * prob);
16257  void set_transmission_reduction(epiworld_double * prob);
16258  void set_recovery_enhancer(epiworld_double * prob);
16259  void set_death_reduction(epiworld_double * prob);
16260 
16261  void set_susceptibility_reduction(epiworld_double prob);
16262  void set_transmission_reduction(epiworld_double prob);
16263  void set_recovery_enhancer(epiworld_double prob);
16264  void set_death_reduction(epiworld_double prob);
16266 
16267  void set_name(std::string name);
16268  std::string get_name() const;
16269 
16270  Agent<TSeq> * get_agent();
16271  int get_id() const;
16272  void set_id(int id);
16273  void set_date(int d);
16274  int get_date() const;
16275 
16276  void set_state(epiworld_fast_int init, epiworld_fast_int post);
16277  void set_queue(epiworld_fast_int init, epiworld_fast_int post);
16278  void get_state(epiworld_fast_int * init, epiworld_fast_int * post);
16279  void get_queue(epiworld_fast_int * init, epiworld_fast_int * post);
16280 
16281  bool operator==(const Tool<TSeq> & other) const;
16282  bool operator!=(const Tool<TSeq> & other) const {return !operator==(other);};
16283 
16284  void print() const;
16285 
16286  void distribute(Model<TSeq> * model);
16287  void set_distribution(ToolToAgentFun<TSeq> fun);
16288 
16289 };
16290 
16291 #endif
16292 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
16294 
16295  End of -include/epiworld/tool-bones.hpp-
16296 
16299 
16300 
16301 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
16303 
16304  Start of -include/epiworld/tool-distribute-meat.hpp-
16305 
16308 
16309 
16310 #ifndef TOOL_DISTRIBUTE_MEAT_HPP
16311 #define TOOL_DISTRIBUTE_MEAT_HPP
16312 
16328 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
16329 inline ToolToAgentFun<TSeq> distribute_tool_to_set(
16330  std::vector< size_t > agents_ids
16331 ) {
16332 
16333  return [agents_ids](
16334  Tool<TSeq> & tool, Model<TSeq> * model
16335  ) -> void
16336  {
16337  // Adding action
16338  for (auto i: agents_ids)
16339  {
16340  model->get_agent(i).add_tool(
16341  tool,
16342  const_cast<Model<TSeq> * >(model)
16343  );
16344  }
16345  };
16346 
16347 }
16348 
16359 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
16360 inline ToolToAgentFun<TSeq> distribute_tool_randomly(
16361  epiworld_double prevalence,
16362  bool as_proportion = true,
16363  std::vector< size_t > agents_ids = {}
16364 ) {
16365 
16366  auto agents_ids_ptr = std::make_shared< std::vector< size_t > >(agents_ids);
16367 
16368  return [prevalence,as_proportion,agents_ids_ptr](
16369  Tool<TSeq> & tool, Model<TSeq> * model
16370  ) -> void {
16371 
16372  // Figuring out how what agents are available
16373  bool use_set = agents_ids_ptr->size() > 0;
16374 
16375  // Picking how many
16376  int n_to_distribute;
16377  int n = use_set ?
16378  static_cast<int>(agents_ids_ptr->size()) :
16379  static_cast<int>(model->size());
16380 
16381  if (as_proportion)
16382  {
16383  n_to_distribute = static_cast<int>(std::floor(prevalence * n));
16384 
16385  // Correcting for possible rounding errors
16386  if (n_to_distribute > n)
16387  n_to_distribute = n;
16388 
16389  }
16390  else
16391  {
16392  n_to_distribute = static_cast<int>(prevalence);
16393  }
16394 
16395  if (n_to_distribute > n)
16396  throw std::range_error("There are only " + std::to_string(n) +
16397  " individuals in the population. Cannot add the tool to " + std::to_string(n_to_distribute));
16398 
16399  std::vector< int > idx(n);
16400  std::iota(idx.begin(), idx.end(), 0);
16401  auto & population = model->get_agents();
16402  for (int i = 0u; i < n_to_distribute; ++i)
16403  {
16404  int loc = static_cast<epiworld_fast_uint>(
16405  floor(model->runif() * n--)
16406  );
16407 
16408  if ((loc > 0) && (loc == n))
16409  loc--;
16410 
16411  population[idx[loc]].add_tool(
16412  tool,
16413  const_cast< Model<TSeq> * >(model)
16414  );
16415 
16416  std::swap(idx[loc], idx[n]);
16417 
16418  }
16419 
16420  };
16421 
16422 }
16423 #endif
16424 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
16426 
16427  End of -include/epiworld/tool-distribute-meat.hpp-
16428 
16431 
16432 
16433 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
16435 
16436  Start of -include/epiworld/tool-meat.hpp-
16437 
16440 
16441 
16442 
16443 #ifndef EPIWORLD_TOOLS_MEAT_HPP
16444 #define EPIWORLD_TOOLS_MEAT_HPP
16445 
16454 template<typename TSeq>
16455 inline ToolFun<TSeq> tool_fun_logit(
16456  std::vector< int > vars,
16457  std::vector< double > coefs,
16458  Model<TSeq> * model
16459 ) {
16460 
16461  // Checking that there are features
16462  if (coefs.size() == 0u)
16463  throw std::logic_error(
16464  "The -coefs- argument should feature at least one element."
16465  );
16466 
16467  if (coefs.size() != vars.size())
16468  throw std::length_error(
16469  std::string("The length of -coef- (") +
16470  std::to_string(coefs.size()) +
16471  std::string(") and -vars- (") +
16472  std::to_string(vars.size()) +
16473  std::string(") should match. ")
16474  );
16475 
16476  // Checking that there are variables in the model
16477  if (model != nullptr)
16478  {
16479 
16480  size_t K = model->get_agents_data_ncols();
16481  for (const auto & var: vars)
16482  {
16483  if ((var >= static_cast<int>(K)) | (var < 0))
16484  throw std::range_error(
16485  std::string("The variable ") +
16486  std::to_string(var) +
16487  std::string(" is out of range.") +
16488  std::string(" The agents only feature ") +
16489  std::to_string(K) +
16490  std::string("variables (features).")
16491  );
16492  }
16493 
16494  }
16495 
16496  std::vector< epiworld_double > coefs_f;
16497  for (auto c: coefs)
16498  coefs_f.push_back(static_cast<epiworld_double>(c));
16499 
16500  ToolFun<TSeq> fun_ = [coefs_f,vars](
16501  Tool<TSeq>& tool,
16502  Agent<TSeq> * agent,
16503  VirusPtr<TSeq> virus,
16504  Model<TSeq> * model
16505  ) -> epiworld_double {
16506 
16507  size_t K = coefs_f.size();
16508  epiworld_double res = 0.0;
16509 
16510  #if defined(__OPENMP) || defined(_OPENMP)
16511  #pragma omp simd reduction(+:res)
16512  #endif
16513  for (size_t i = 0u; i < K; ++i)
16514  res += agent->operator[](vars.at(i)) * coefs_f.at(i);
16515 
16516  return 1.0/(1.0 + std::exp(-res));
16517 
16518  };
16519 
16520  return fun_;
16521 
16522 }
16523 
16524 template<typename TSeq>
16525 inline Tool<TSeq>::Tool()
16526 {
16527  EPI_IF_TSEQ_LESS_EQ_INT( TSeq )
16528  {
16529  sequence = -1;
16530  }
16531  else
16532  {
16533  sequence = nullptr;
16534  }
16535 
16536  set_name("Tool");
16537 }
16538 
16539 template<typename TSeq>
16540 inline Tool<TSeq>::Tool(std::string name)
16541 {
16542  EPI_IF_TSEQ_LESS_EQ_INT( TSeq )
16543  {
16544  sequence = -1;
16545  }
16546  else
16547  {
16548  sequence = nullptr;
16549  }
16550 
16551  set_name(name);
16552 }
16553 
16554 template<typename TSeq>
16555 inline Tool<TSeq>::Tool(
16556  std::string name,
16557  epiworld_double prevalence,
16558  bool as_proportion
16559  )
16560 {
16561 
16562  EPI_IF_TSEQ_LESS_EQ_INT( TSeq )
16563  {
16564  sequence = -1;
16565  }
16566  else
16567  {
16568  sequence = nullptr;
16569  }
16570 
16571  set_name(name);
16572 
16573  set_distribution(
16574  distribute_tool_randomly<TSeq>(prevalence, as_proportion)
16575  );
16576 }
16577 
16578 template<typename TSeq>
16579 inline void Tool<TSeq>::set_sequence(TSeq d) {
16580  sequence = std::make_shared<TSeq>(d);
16581 }
16582 
16583 template<typename TSeq>
16584 inline void Tool<TSeq>::set_sequence(std::shared_ptr<TSeq> d) {
16585  sequence = d;
16586 }
16587 
16588 template<>
16589 inline void Tool<int>::set_sequence(int d) {
16590  sequence = d;
16591 }
16592 
16593 template<typename TSeq>
16594 inline EPI_TYPENAME_TRAITS(TSeq, int) Tool<TSeq>::get_sequence() {
16595  return sequence;
16596 }
16597 
16598 template<typename TSeq>
16599 inline epiworld_double Tool<TSeq>::get_susceptibility_reduction(
16600  VirusPtr<TSeq> v,
16601  Model<TSeq> * model
16602 )
16603 {
16604 
16605  if (tool_functions->susceptibility_reduction)
16606  return tool_functions->susceptibility_reduction(
16607  *this, this->agent, v, model
16608  );
16609 
16610  return DEFAULT_TOOL_CONTAGION_REDUCTION;
16611 
16612 }
16613 
16614 template<typename TSeq>
16615 inline epiworld_double Tool<TSeq>::get_transmission_reduction(
16616  VirusPtr<TSeq> v,
16617  Model<TSeq> * model
16618 )
16619 {
16620 
16621  if (tool_functions->transmission_reduction)
16622  return tool_functions->transmission_reduction(
16623  *this, this->agent, v, model
16624  );
16625 
16626  return DEFAULT_TOOL_TRANSMISSION_REDUCTION;
16627 
16628 }
16629 
16630 template<typename TSeq>
16631 inline epiworld_double Tool<TSeq>::get_recovery_enhancer(
16632  VirusPtr<TSeq> v,
16633  Model<TSeq> * model
16634 )
16635 {
16636 
16637  if (tool_functions->recovery_enhancer)
16638  return tool_functions->recovery_enhancer(*this, this->agent, v, model);
16639 
16640  return DEFAULT_TOOL_RECOVERY_ENHANCER;
16641 
16642 }
16643

16645 inline epiworld_double Tool<TSeq>::get_death_reduction(
16646  VirusPtr<TSeq> v,
16647  Model<TSeq> * model
16648 )
16649 {
16650 
16651  if (tool_functions->death_reduction)
16652  return tool_functions->death_reduction(*this, this->agent, v, model);
16653 
16654  return DEFAULT_TOOL_DEATH_REDUCTION;
16655 
16656 }

16690 template<typename TSeq>
16691 inline void Tool<TSeq>::set_susceptibility_reduction(epiworld_double * prob)
16692 {
16693 
16694  ToolFun<TSeq> tmpfun =
16695  [prob](Tool<TSeq> &, Agent<TSeq> *, VirusPtr<TSeq>, Model<TSeq> *)
16696  {
16697  return *prob;
16698  };
16699 
16700  tool_functions->susceptibility_reduction = tmpfun;
16701 
16702 }
16703

16710  [prob](Tool<TSeq> &, Agent<TSeq> *, VirusPtr<TSeq>, Model<TSeq> *)
16711  {
16712  return *prob;
16713  };

16716 
16717 }

16886 template<typename TSeq>
16887 inline void Tool<TSeq>::get_state(
16888  epiworld_fast_int * init,
16889  epiworld_fast_int * post
16890 )
16891 {
16892  if (init != nullptr)
16893  *init = state_init;
16894 
16895  if (post != nullptr)
16896  *post = state_post;
16897 
16898 }

16900 template<typename TSeq>
16901 inline void Tool<TSeq>::get_queue(
16902  epiworld_fast_int * init,
16903  epiworld_fast_int * post
16904 )
16905 {
16906  if (init != nullptr)
16907  *init = queue_init;
16908 
16909  if (post != nullptr)
16910  *post = queue_post;
16911 
16912 }
16913 
16914 template<>
16915 inline bool Tool<std::vector<int>>::operator==(
16916  const Tool<std::vector<int>> & other
16917  ) const
16918 {
16919 
16920  if (sequence->size() != other.sequence->size())
16921  return false;
16922 
16923  for (size_t i = 0u; i < sequence->size(); ++i)
16924  {
16925  if (sequence->operator[](i) != other.sequence->operator[](i))
16926  return false;
16927  }
16928 
16929  if (tool_name != other.tool_name)
16930  return false;
16931 
16932  if (state_init != other.state_init)
16933  return false;
16934 
16935  if (state_post != other.state_post)
16936  return false;
16937 
16938  if (queue_init != other.queue_init)
16939  return false;
16940 
16941  if (queue_post != other.queue_post)
16942  return false;
16943 
16944 
16945  return true;
16946 
16947 }
16948 
16949 template<typename TSeq>
16950 inline bool Tool<TSeq>::operator==(const Tool<TSeq> & other) const
16951 {
16952  EPI_IF_TSEQ_LESS_EQ_INT( TSeq )
16953  {
16954  if (sequence != other.sequence)
16955  return false;
16956  }
16957  else
16958  {
16959  if (*sequence != *other.sequence)
16960  return false;
16961  }
16962 
16963 
16964  if (tool_name != other.tool_name)
16965  return false;
16966 
16967  if (state_init != other.state_init)
16968  return false;
16969 
16970  if (state_post != other.state_post)
16971  return false;
16972 
16973  if (queue_init != other.queue_init)
16974  return false;
16975 
16976  if (queue_post != other.queue_post)
16977  return false;
16978 
16979  return true;
16980 
16981 }
16982 
16983 
16984 template<typename TSeq>
16985 inline void Tool<TSeq>::print() const
16986 {
16987 
16988  printf_epiworld("Tool : %s\n", tool_name.c_str());
16989  printf_epiworld("Id : %s\n", (id < 0)? std::string("(empty)").c_str() : std::to_string(id).c_str());
16990  printf_epiworld("state_init : %i\n", static_cast<int>(state_init));
16991  printf_epiworld("state_post : %i\n", static_cast<int>(state_post));
16992  printf_epiworld("queue_init : %i\n", static_cast<int>(queue_init));
16993  printf_epiworld("queue_post : %i\n", static_cast<int>(queue_post));
16994 
16995 }
16996 
16997 template<typename TSeq>
16998 inline void Tool<TSeq>::distribute(Model<TSeq> * model)
16999 {
17000 
17001  if (tool_functions->dist)
17002  {
17003 
17004  tool_functions->dist(*this, model);
17005 
17006  }
17007 
17008 }
17009

17011 inline void Tool<TSeq>::set_distribution(ToolToAgentFun<TSeq> fun)
17012 {
17013  tool_functions->dist = fun;
17014 }

17027 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
17029 
17030  Start of -include/epiworld/entity-bones.hpp-
17031 
17034 
17035 
17036 #ifndef EPIWORLD_ENTITY_BONES_HPP
17037 #define EPIWORLD_ENTITY_BONES_HPP
17038 
17039 template<typename TSeq>
17040 class Model;
17041 
17042 template<typename TSeq>
17043 class Agent;
17044 
17045 template<typename TSeq>
17046 class AgentsSample;
17047 
17048 template<typename TSeq>
17049 inline void default_add_entity(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
17050 
17051 template<typename TSeq>
17052 inline void default_rm_entity(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
17053 
17054 template<typename TSeq>
17055 class Entity {
17056  friend class Agent<TSeq>;
17057  friend class AgentsSample<TSeq>;
17058  friend class Model<TSeq>;
17059  friend void default_add_entity<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
17060  friend void default_rm_entity<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
17061 private:
17062 
17063  int id = -1;
17064  std::vector< size_t > agents; ///< Vector of agents
17065  std::vector< size_t > agents_location; ///< Location where the entity is stored in the agent
17066  size_t n_agents = 0u;
17067 
17068  int max_capacity = -1;
17069  std::string entity_name = "Unnamed entity";
17070 
17071  std::vector< epiworld_double > location = {0.0}; ///< An arbitrary vector for location
17072 
17073  epiworld_fast_int state_init = -99;
17074  epiworld_fast_int state_post = -99;
17075 
17076  epiworld_fast_int queue_init = 0; ///< Change of state when added to agent.
17077  epiworld_fast_int queue_post = 0; ///< Change of state when removed from agent.
17078 
17079  EntityToAgentFun<TSeq> dist_fun = nullptr;
17080 
17081 public:
17082 
17083 
17092  Entity(
17093  std::string name,
17094  EntityToAgentFun<TSeq> fun = nullptr
17095  ) :
17096  entity_name(name),
17097  dist_fun(fun)
17098  {};
17099 
17100  void add_agent(Agent<TSeq> & p, Model<TSeq> * model);
17101  void add_agent(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * model);
17102  void rm_agent(size_t idx, Model<TSeq> * model);
17103  size_t size() const noexcept;
17104  void set_location(std::vector< epiworld_double > loc);
17105  std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_location();
17106 
17107  typename std::vector< Agent<TSeq> * >::iterator begin();
17108  typename std::vector< Agent<TSeq> * >::iterator end();
17109 
17110  typename std::vector< Agent<TSeq> * >::const_iterator begin() const;
17111  typename std::vector< Agent<TSeq> * >::const_iterator end() const;
17112 
17113  size_t operator[](size_t i);
17114 
17115  int get_id() const noexcept;
17116  const std::string & get_name() const noexcept;
17117 
17118  void set_state(epiworld_fast_int init, epiworld_fast_int post);
17119  void set_queue(epiworld_fast_int init, epiworld_fast_int post);
17120  void get_state(epiworld_fast_int * init, epiworld_fast_int * post);
17121  void get_queue(epiworld_fast_int * init, epiworld_fast_int * post);
17122 
17123  void reset();
17124 
17125  bool operator==(const Entity<TSeq> & other) const;
17126  bool operator!=(const Entity<TSeq> & other) const {return !operator==(other);};
17127 
17135  void distribute(Model<TSeq> * model);
17136 
17137  std::vector< size_t > & get_agents();
17138 
17139  void print() const;
17140  void set_distribution(EntityToAgentFun<TSeq> fun);
17141 
17142 };
17143 
17144 
17145 #endif
17146 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
17148 
17149  End of -include/epiworld/entity-bones.hpp-
17150 
17153 
17154 
17155 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
17157 
17158  Start of -include/epiworld/entity-distribute-meat.hpp-
17159 
17162 
17163 
17164 #ifndef EPIWORLD_ENTITY_DISTRIBUTE_MEAT_HPP
17165 #define EPIWORLD_ENTITY_DISTRIBUTE_MEAT_HPP
17166 
17167 
17168 template <typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
17179 inline EntityToAgentFun<TSeq> distribute_entity_randomly(
17180  epiworld_double prevalence,
17181  bool as_proportion,
17182  bool to_unassigned
17183 )
17184 {
17185 
17186  return [prevalence, as_proportion, to_unassigned](
17187  Entity<TSeq> & e, Model<TSeq> * m
17188  ) -> void {
17189 
17190 
17191  // Preparing the sampling space
17192  std::vector< size_t > idx;
17193  if (to_unassigned)
17194  {
17195  for (const auto & a: m->get_agents())
17196  if (a.get_n_entities() == 0)
17197  idx.push_back(a.get_id());
17198  }
17199  else
17200  {
17201 
17202  for (const auto & a: m->get_agents())
17203  idx.push_back(a.get_id());
17204 
17205  }
17206 
17207  size_t n = idx.size();
17208 
17209  // Figuring out how many to sample
17210  int n_to_sample;
17211  if (as_proportion)
17212  {
17213  n_to_sample = static_cast<int>(std::floor(prevalence * n));
17214 
17215  // Correcting for possible overflow
17216  if (n_to_sample > static_cast<int>(n))
17217  n_to_sample = static_cast<int>(n);
17218 
17219  } else
17220  {
17221  n_to_sample = static_cast<int>(prevalence);
17222  if (n_to_sample > static_cast<int>(n))
17223  throw std::range_error("There are only " + std::to_string(n) +
17224  " individuals in the population. Cannot add the entity to " +
17225  std::to_string(n_to_sample));
17226  }
17227 
17228  int n_left = n;
17229  for (int i = 0; i < n_to_sample; ++i)
17230  {
17231  int loc = static_cast<epiworld_fast_uint>(
17232  floor(m->runif() * n_left--)
17233  );
17234 
17235  // Correcting for possible overflow
17236  if ((loc > 0) && (loc >= n_left))
17237  loc = n_left - 1;
17238 
17239  m->get_agent(idx[loc]).add_entity(e, m);
17240 
17241  std::swap(idx[loc], idx[n_left]);
17242 
17243  }
17244 
17245  };
17246 
17247 }
17248 
17249 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
17260 inline EntityToAgentFun<TSeq> distribute_entity_to_range(
17261  int from,
17262  int to,
17263  bool to_unassigned = false
17264  ) {
17265 
17266  if (to_unassigned)
17267  {
17268 
17269  return [from, to](Entity<TSeq> & e, Model<TSeq> * m) -> void {
17270 
17271  auto & agents = m->get_agents();
17272  for (size_t i = from; i < to; ++i)
17273  {
17274  if (agents[i].get_n_entities() == 0)
17275  e.add_agent(&agents[i], m);
17276  else
17277  throw std::logic_error(
17278  "Agent " + std::to_string(i) + " already has an entity."
17279  );
17280  }
17281 
17282  return;
17283 
17284  };
17285 
17286  }
17287  else
17288  {
17289 
17290  return [from, to](Entity<TSeq> & e, Model<TSeq> * m) -> void {
17291 
17292  auto & agents = m->get_agents();
17293  for (size_t i = from; i < to; ++i)
17294  {
17295  e.add_agent(&agents[i], m);
17296  }
17297 
17298  return;
17299 
17300  };
17301 
17302  }
17303 }
17304 
17305 
17306 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
17307 inline EntityToAgentFun<TSeq> distribute_entity_to_set(
17308  std::vector< size_t > & idx
17309  ) {
17310 
17311  auto idx_shared = std::make_shared< std::vector< size_t > >(idx);
17312 
17313  return [idx_shared](Entity<TSeq> & e, Model<TSeq> * m) -> void {
17314 
17315  for (const auto & i: *idx_shared)
17316  {
17317  e.add_agent(&m->get_agent(i), m);
17318  }
17319 
17320  };
17321 
17322 }
17323 
17324 #endif
17325 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
17327 
17328  End of -include/epiworld/entity-distribute-meat.hpp-
17329 
17332 
17333 
17334 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
17336 
17337  Start of -include/epiworld/entity-meat.hpp-
17338 
17341 
17342 
17343 #ifndef EPIWORLD_ENTITY_MEAT_HPP
17344 #define EPIWORLD_ENTITY_MEAT_HPP
17345 
17346 template<typename TSeq>
17347 inline void Entity<TSeq>::add_agent(
17348  Agent<TSeq> & p,
17349  Model<TSeq> * model
17350  )
17351 {
17352 
17353  // Need to add it to the events, through the individual
17354  p.add_entity(*this, model);
17355 
17356 }
17357 
17358 template<typename TSeq>
17359 inline void Entity<TSeq>::add_agent(
17360  Agent<TSeq> * p,
17361  Model<TSeq> * model
17362  )
17363 {
17364  p->add_entity(*this, model);
17365 }
17366 
17367 template<typename TSeq>
17368 inline void Entity<TSeq>::rm_agent(size_t idx, Model<TSeq> * model)
17369 {
17370  if (idx >= n_agents)
17371  throw std::out_of_range(
17372  "Trying to remove agent "+ std::to_string(idx) +
17373  " out of " + std::to_string(n_agents)
17374  );
17375 
17376  model->get_agents()[agents[idx]].rm_entity(*this, model);
17377 
17378  return;
17379 }
17380 
17381 template<typename TSeq>
17382 inline size_t Entity<TSeq>::size() const noexcept
17383 {
17384  return n_agents;
17385 }
17386 
17387 template<typename TSeq>
17388 inline void Entity<TSeq>::set_location(std::vector< epiworld_double > loc)
17389 {
17390  location = loc;
17391 }
17392 
17393 template<typename TSeq>
17394 inline std::vector< epiworld_double > & Entity<TSeq>::get_location()
17395 {
17396  return location;
17397 }
17398 
17399 template<typename TSeq>
17400 inline typename std::vector< Agent<TSeq> * >::iterator Entity<TSeq>::begin()
17401 {
17402 
17403  if (n_agents == 0)
17404  return agents.end();
17405 
17406  return agents.begin();
17407 
17408 }
17409 
17410 template<typename TSeq>
17411 inline typename std::vector< Agent<TSeq> * >::iterator Entity<TSeq>::end()
17412 {
17413  return agents.begin() + n_agents;
17414 }
17415 
17416 template<typename TSeq>
17417 inline typename std::vector< Agent<TSeq> * >::const_iterator Entity<TSeq>::begin() const
17418 {
17419 
17420  if (n_agents == 0)
17421  return agents.end();
17422 
17423  return agents.begin();
17424 
17425 }
17426 
17427 template<typename TSeq>
17428 inline typename std::vector< Agent<TSeq> * >::const_iterator Entity<TSeq>::end() const
17429 {
17430  return agents.begin() + n_agents;
17431 }
17432 
17433 template<typename TSeq>
17434 size_t Entity<TSeq>::operator[](size_t i)
17435 {
17436  if (n_agents <= i)
17437  throw std::logic_error(
17438  "There are not that many agents in this entity. " +
17439  std::to_string(n_agents) + " <= " + std::to_string(i)
17440  );
17441 
17442  return i;
17443 }
17444 
17445 template<typename TSeq>
17446 inline int Entity<TSeq>::get_id() const noexcept
17447 {
17448  return id;
17449 }
17450 
17451 template<typename TSeq>
17452 inline const std::string & Entity<TSeq>::get_name() const noexcept
17453 {
17454  return entity_name;
17455 }
17456 
17457 template<typename TSeq>
17458 inline void Entity<TSeq>::set_state(
17459  epiworld_fast_int init,
17460  epiworld_fast_int end
17461 )
17462 {
17463  state_init = init;
17464  state_post = end;
17465 }
17466

17468 inline void Entity<TSeq>::set_queue(
17469  epiworld_fast_int init,
17470  epiworld_fast_int end
17471 )
17472 {
17473  queue_init = init;
17474  queue_post = end;
17475 }
17476 
17477 template<typename TSeq>
17478 inline void Entity<TSeq>::get_state(
17479  epiworld_fast_int * init,
17480  epiworld_fast_int * post
17481 )
17482 {
17483  if (init != nullptr)
17484  *init = state_init;
17485 
17486  if (post != nullptr)
17487  *post = state_post;
17488 
17489 }
17490 
17491 template<typename TSeq>
17492 inline void Entity<TSeq>::get_queue(
17493  epiworld_fast_int * init,
17494  epiworld_fast_int * post
17495 )
17496 {
17497  if (init != nullptr)
17498  *init = queue_init;
17499 
17500  if (post != nullptr)
17501  *post = queue_post;
17502 
17503 }
17504 
17505 template<typename TSeq>
17506 inline void Entity<TSeq>::reset()
17507 {
17508 
17509  this->agents.clear();
17510  this->n_agents = 0u;
17511  this->agents_location.clear();
17512 
17513  return;
17514 
17515 }
17516 
17517 template<typename TSeq>
17518 inline bool Entity<TSeq>::operator==(const Entity<TSeq> & other) const
17519 {
17520 
17521  if (id != other.id)
17522  return false;
17523 
17524  if (n_agents != other.n_agents)
17525  return false;
17526 
17527  for (size_t i = 0u; i < n_agents; ++i)
17528  {
17529  if (agents[i] != other.agents[i])
17530  return false;
17531  }
17532 
17533 
17534  if (max_capacity != other.max_capacity)
17535  return false;
17536 
17537  if (entity_name != other.entity_name)
17538  return false;
17539 
17540  if (location.size() != other.location.size())
17541  return false;
17542 
17543  for (size_t i = 0u; i < location.size(); ++i)
17544  {
17545 
17546  if (location[i] != other.location[i])
17547  return false;
17548 
17549  }
17550 
17551  if (state_init != other.state_init)
17552  return false;
17553 
17554  if (state_post != other.state_post)
17555  return false;
17556 
17557  if (queue_init != other.queue_init)
17558  return false;
17559 
17560  if (queue_post != other.queue_post)
17561  return false;
17562 
17563  return true;
17564 
17565 }
17566 
17567 template<typename TSeq>
17568 inline void Entity<TSeq>::distribute(Model<TSeq> * model)
17569 {
17570 
17571  if (dist_fun)
17572  {
17573 
17574  dist_fun(*this, model);
17575 
17576  }
17577 
17578 }
17579 
17580 template<typename TSeq>
17581 inline std::vector< size_t > & Entity<TSeq>::get_agents()
17582 {
17583  return agents;
17584 }
17585 
17586 template<typename TSeq>
17587 inline void Entity<TSeq>::print() const
17588 {
17589 
17590  printf_epiworld(
17591  "Entity '%s' (id %i) with %i agents.\n",
17592  this->entity_name.c_str(),
17593  static_cast<int>(id),
17594  static_cast<int>(n_agents)
17595  );
17596 }
17597

17599 inline void Entity<TSeq>::set_distribution(EntityToAgentFun<TSeq> fun)
17600 {
17601  dist_fun = fun;
17602 }
17603 
17604 #endif

17625 #define EPIWORLD_ENTITIES_BONES_HPP

17627 template<typename TSeq>
17628 class Virus;
17629 
17630 template<typename TSeq>
17631 class Agent;
17632 
17633 
17639 template<typename TSeq>
17640 class Entities {
17641  friend class Entity<TSeq>;
17642  friend class Agent<TSeq>;
17643 private:
17644  std::vector< Entity<TSeq> * > dat;
17645  const size_t n_entities;
17646 
17647 public:
17648 
17649  Entities() = delete;
17650  Entities(Agent<TSeq> & p);
17651 
17652  typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq> * >::iterator begin();
17653  typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq> * >::iterator end();
17654 
17655  Entity<TSeq> & operator()(size_t i);
17656  Entity<TSeq> & operator[](size_t i);
17657 
17658  size_t size() const noexcept;
17659 
17660  bool operator==(const Entities<TSeq> & other) const;
17661 
17662 };
17663 
17664 template<typename TSeq>
17665 inline Entities<TSeq>::Entities(Agent<TSeq> & p) :
17666  n_entities(p.get_n_entities())
17667 {
17668 
17669  dat.reserve(n_entities);
17670  for (size_t i = 0u; i < n_entities; ++i)
17671  dat.push_back(&p.get_entity(i));
17672 
17673 }
17674 
17675 template<typename TSeq>
17676 inline typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq>* >::iterator Entities<TSeq>::begin()
17677 {
17678 
17679  if (n_entities == 0u)
17680  return dat.end();
17681 
17682  return dat.begin();
17683 }
17684 
17685 template<typename TSeq>
17686 inline typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq>* >::iterator Entities<TSeq>::end()
17687 {
17688 
17689  return begin() + n_entities;
17690 }
17691 
17692 template<typename TSeq>
17693 inline Entity<TSeq> & Entities<TSeq>::operator()(size_t i)
17694 {
17695 
17696  if (i >= n_entities)
17697  throw std::range_error("Entity index out of range.");
17698 
17699  return *dat[i];
17700 
17701 }
17702 
17703 template<typename TSeq>
17704 inline Entity<TSeq> & Entities<TSeq>::operator[](size_t i)
17705 {
17706 
17707  return *dat[i];
17708 
17709 }
17710 
17711 template<typename TSeq>
17712 inline size_t Entities<TSeq>::size() const noexcept
17713 {
17714  return n_entities;
17715 }
17716 
17717 template<typename TSeq>
17718 inline bool Entities<TSeq>::operator==(const Entities<TSeq> & other) const
17719 {
17720 
17721  if (n_entities != other.n_entities)
17722  return false;
17723 
17724  for (size_t i = 0u; i < dat.size(); ++i)
17725  {
17726  if (dat[i] != other.dat[i])
17727  return false;
17728  }
17729 
17730  return true;
17731 }
17732 
17738 template<typename TSeq>
17739 class Entities_const {
17740  friend class Virus<TSeq>;
17741  friend class Agent<TSeq>;
17742 private:
17743  const std::vector< Entity<TSeq>* > dat;
17744  const size_t n_entities;
17745 
17746 public:
17747

17749  Entities_const(const Agent<TSeq> & p);
17750 
17751  typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq>* >::const_iterator begin();
17752  typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq>* >::const_iterator end();
17753 
17754  const Entity<TSeq> & operator()(size_t i);
17755  const Entity<TSeq> & operator[](size_t i);
17756 
17757  size_t size() const noexcept;
17758 
17759  bool operator==(const Entities_const<TSeq> & other) const;
17760 
17761 };
17762 
17763 template<typename TSeq>
17764 inline Entities_const<TSeq>::Entities_const(const Agent<TSeq> & p) :
17765  n_entities(p.get_n_entities())
17766 {
17767 
17768  dat.reserve(n_entities);
17769  for (size_t i = 0u; i < n_entities; ++i)
17770  dat.push_back(&p.get_entity(i));
17771 
17772 }

17775 inline typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq>* >::const_iterator Entities_const<TSeq>::begin() {
17776 
17777  if (n_entities == 0u)
17778  return dat.end();
17779 
17780  return dat.begin();
17781 }

17784 inline typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq>* >::const_iterator Entities_const<TSeq>::end() {
17785 
17786  return begin() + n_entities;
17787 }

17790 inline const Entity<TSeq> & Entities_const<TSeq>::operator()(size_t i)
17791 {
17792 
17793  if (i >= n_entities)
17794  throw std::range_error("Entity index out of range.");
17795 
17796  return *dat[i];
17797 
17798 }

17802 {
17803 
17804  return *dat[i];
17805 
17806 }
17807

17809 inline size_t Entities_const<TSeq>::size() const noexcept
17810 {
17811  return n_entities;
17812 }

17814 template<typename TSeq>
17815 inline bool Entities_const<TSeq>::operator==(const Entities_const<TSeq> & other) const
17816 {
17817

17819  return false;
17820 
17821  for (size_t i = 0u; i < dat.size(); ++i)
17822  {
17823  if (dat[i] != other.dat[i])
17824  return false;
17825  }
17826 
17827  return true;
17828 }

17839 
17840 
17841 
17842 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
17844 
17845  Start of -include/epiworld/agent-meat-virus-sampling.hpp-
17846 
17849 
17850 
17851 #ifndef EPIWORLD_AGENT_MEAT_VIRUS_SAMPLING
17852 #define EPIWORLD_AGENT_MEAT_VIRUS_SAMPLING
17853 
17858 namespace sampler {
17859 
17873 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
17874 inline std::function<void(Agent<TSeq>*,Model<TSeq>*)> make_update_susceptible(
17875  std::vector< epiworld_fast_uint > exclude = {}
17876  )
17877 {
17878 
17879 
17880  if (exclude.size() == 0u)
17881  {
17882 
17883  std::function<void(Agent<TSeq>*,Model<TSeq>*)> sampler =
17884  [](Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m) -> void
17885  {
17886 
17887  if (p->get_virus() != nullptr)
17888  throw std::logic_error(
17889  std::string("Using the -default_update_susceptible- on agents WITH viruses makes no sense! ") +
17890  std::string("Agent id ") + std::to_string(p->get_id()) +
17891  std::string(" has a virus.")
17892  );
17893 
17894  // This computes the prob of getting any neighbor variant
17895  size_t nviruses_tmp = 0u;
17896  for (auto & neighbor: p->get_neighbors())
17897  {
17898 
17899  auto & v = neighbor->get_virus();
17900  if (v == nullptr)
17901  continue;
17902 
17903  /* And it is a function of susceptibility_reduction as well */
17904  m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp] =
17905  (1.0 - p->get_susceptibility_reduction(v, m)) *
17906  v->get_prob_infecting(m) *
17907  (1.0 - neighbor->get_transmission_reduction(v, m))
17908  ;
17909 
17910  m->array_virus_tmp[nviruses_tmp++] = &(*v);
17911 
17912  }
17913 
17914  // No virus to compute
17915  if (nviruses_tmp == 0u)
17916  return;
17917 
17918  // Running the roulette
17919  int which = roulette(nviruses_tmp, m);
17920 
17921  if (which < 0)
17922  return;
17923 
17924  p->set_virus(*m->array_virus_tmp[which], m);
17925 
17926  return;
17927  };
17928 
17929  return sampler;
17930 
17931  } else {
17932 
17933  // Making room for the query
17934  std::shared_ptr<std::vector<bool>> exclude_agent_bool =
17935  std::make_shared<std::vector<bool>>(0);
17936 
17937  std::shared_ptr<std::vector<epiworld_fast_uint>> exclude_agent_bool_idx =
17938  std::make_shared<std::vector<epiworld_fast_uint>>(exclude);
17939 
17940  std::function<void(Agent<TSeq>*,Model<TSeq>*)> sampler =
17941  [exclude_agent_bool,exclude_agent_bool_idx](Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m) -> void
17942  {
17943 
17944  // The first time we call it, we need to initialize the vector
17945  if (exclude_agent_bool->size() == 0u)
17946  {
17947 
17948  exclude_agent_bool->resize(m->get_states().size(), false);
17949  for (auto s : *exclude_agent_bool_idx)
17950  {
17951  if (s >= exclude_agent_bool->size())
17952  throw std::logic_error(
17953  std::string("You are trying to exclude a state that is out of range: ") +
17954  std::to_string(s) + std::string(". There are only ") +
17955  std::to_string(exclude_agent_bool->size()) +
17956  std::string(" states in the model.")
17957  );
17958 
17959  exclude_agent_bool->operator[](s) = true;
17960 
17961  }
17962 
17963  }
17964 
17965  if (p->get_virus() != nullptr)
17966  throw std::logic_error(
17967  std::string("Using the -default_update_susceptible- on agents WITH viruses makes no sense! ") +
17968  std::string("Agent id ") + std::to_string(p->get_id()) +
17969  std::string(" has a virus.")
17970  );
17971 
17972  // This computes the prob of getting any neighbor variant
17973  size_t nviruses_tmp = 0u;
17974  for (auto & neighbor: p->get_neighbors())
17975  {
17976 
17977  // If the state is in the list, exclude it
17978  if (exclude_agent_bool->operator[](neighbor->get_state()))
17979  continue;
17980 
17981  auto & v = neighbor->get_virus();
17982  if (v == nullptr)
17983  continue;
17984 
17985 
17986  /* And it is a function of susceptibility_reduction as well */
17987  m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp] =
17988  (1.0 - p->get_susceptibility_reduction(v, m)) *
17989  v->get_prob_infecting(m) *
17990  (1.0 - neighbor->get_transmission_reduction(v, m))
17991  ;
17992 
17993  m->array_virus_tmp[nviruses_tmp++] = &(*v);
17994 
17995  }
17996 
17997  // No virus to compute
17998  if (nviruses_tmp == 0u)
17999  return;
18000 
18001  // Running the roulette
18002  int which = roulette(nviruses_tmp, m);
18003 
18004  if (which < 0)
18005  return;
18006 
18007  p->set_virus(*m->array_virus_tmp[which], m);
18008 
18009  return;
18010 
18011  };
18012 
18013  return sampler;
18014 
18015  }
18016 
18017 }
18018 
18032 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
18033 inline std::function<Virus<TSeq>*(Agent<TSeq>*,Model<TSeq>*)> make_sample_virus_neighbors(
18034  std::vector< epiworld_fast_uint > exclude = {}
18035 )
18036 {
18037  if (exclude.size() == 0u)
18038  {
18039 
18040  std::function<Virus<TSeq>*(Agent<TSeq>*,Model<TSeq>*)> res =
18041  [](Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m) -> Virus<TSeq>* {
18042 
18043  if (p->get_virus() != nullptr)
18044  throw std::logic_error(
18045  std::string("Using the -default_update_susceptible- on agents WITH viruses makes no sense! ") +
18046  std::string("Agent id ") + std::to_string(p->get_id()) +
18047  std::string(" has a virus.")
18048  );
18049 
18050  // This computes the prob of getting any neighbor variant
18051  size_t nviruses_tmp = 0u;
18052  for (auto & neighbor: p->get_neighbors())
18053  {
18054 
18055  if (neighbor->get_virus() == nullptr)
18056  continue;
18057 
18058  auto & v = neighbor->get_virus();
18059 
18060  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
18061  if (nviruses_tmp >= static_cast<int>(m->array_virus_tmp.size()))
18062  throw std::logic_error("Trying to add an extra element to a temporal array outside of the range.");
18063  #endif
18064 
18065  /* And it is a function of susceptibility_reduction as well */
18066  m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp] =
18067  (1.0 - p->get_susceptibility_reduction(v, m)) *
18068  v->get_prob_infecting(m) *
18069  (1.0 - neighbor->get_transmission_reduction(v, m))
18070  ;
18071 
18072  m->array_virus_tmp[nviruses_tmp++] = &(*v);
18073 
18074  }
18075 
18076  // No virus to compute
18077  if (nviruses_tmp == 0u)
18078  return nullptr;
18079 
18080  // Running the roulette
18081  int which = roulette(nviruses_tmp, m);
18082 
18083  if (which < 0)
18084  return nullptr;
18085 
18086  return m->array_virus_tmp[which];
18087 
18088  };
18089 
18090  return res;
18091 
18092 
18093  } else {
18094 
18095  // Making room for the query
18096  std::shared_ptr<std::vector<bool>> exclude_agent_bool =
18097  std::make_shared<std::vector<bool>>(0);
18098 
18099  std::shared_ptr<std::vector<epiworld_fast_uint>> exclude_agent_bool_idx =
18100  std::make_shared<std::vector<epiworld_fast_uint>>(exclude);
18101 
18102 
18103  std::function<Virus<TSeq>*(Agent<TSeq>*,Model<TSeq>*)> res =
18104  [exclude_agent_bool,exclude_agent_bool_idx](Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m) -> Virus<TSeq>* {
18105 
18106  // The first time we call it, we need to initialize the vector
18107  if (exclude_agent_bool->size() == 0u)
18108  {
18109 
18110  exclude_agent_bool->resize(m->get_states().size(), false);
18111  for (auto s : *exclude_agent_bool_idx)
18112  {
18113  if (s >= exclude_agent_bool->size())
18114  throw std::logic_error(
18115  std::string("You are trying to exclude a state that is out of range: ") +
18116  std::to_string(s) + std::string(". There are only ") +
18117  std::to_string(exclude_agent_bool->size()) +
18118  std::string(" states in the model.")
18119  );
18120 
18121  exclude_agent_bool->operator[](s) = true;
18122 
18123  }
18124 
18125  }
18126 
18127  if (p->get_virus() != nullptr)
18128  throw std::logic_error(
18129  std::string("Using the -default_update_susceptible- on agents WITH viruses makes no sense! ") +
18130  std::string("Agent id ") + std::to_string(p->get_id()) +
18131  std::string(" has a virus.")
18132  );
18133 
18134  // This computes the prob of getting any neighbor variant
18135  size_t nviruses_tmp = 0u;
18136  for (auto & neighbor: p->get_neighbors())
18137  {
18138 
18139  // If the state is in the list, exclude it
18140  if (exclude_agent_bool->operator[](neighbor->get_state()))
18141  continue;
18142 
18143  if (neighbor->get_virus() == nullptr)
18144  continue;
18145 
18146  auto & v = neighbor->get_virus();
18147 
18148  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
18149  if (nviruses_tmp >= static_cast<int>(m->array_virus_tmp.size()))
18150  throw std::logic_error("Trying to add an extra element to a temporal array outside of the range.");
18151  #endif
18152 
18153  /* And it is a function of susceptibility_reduction as well */
18154  m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp] =
18155  (1.0 - p->get_susceptibility_reduction(v, m)) *
18156  v->get_prob_infecting(m) *
18157  (1.0 - neighbor->get_transmission_reduction(v, m))
18158  ;
18159 
18160  m->array_virus_tmp[nviruses_tmp++] = &(*v);
18161 
18162  }
18163 
18164  // No virus to compute
18165  if (nviruses_tmp == 0u)
18166  return nullptr;
18167 
18168  // Running the roulette
18169  int which = roulette(nviruses_tmp, m);
18170 
18171  if (which < 0)
18172  return nullptr;
18173 
18174  return m->array_virus_tmp[which];
18175 
18176  };
18177 
18178  return res;
18179 
18180  }
18181 
18182 }
18183 
18200 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
18201 inline Virus<TSeq> * sample_virus_single(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m)
18202 {
18203 
18204  if (p->get_virus() != nullptr)
18205  throw std::logic_error(
18206  std::string("Using the -default_update_susceptible- on agents WITH viruses makes no sense!") +
18207  std::string("Agent id ") + std::to_string(p->get_id()) +
18208  std::string(" has a virus.")
18209  );
18210 
18211  // This computes the prob of getting any neighbor variant
18212  size_t nviruses_tmp = 0u;
18213  for (auto & neighbor: p->get_neighbors())
18214  {
18215  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
18216  int _vcount_neigh = 0;
18217  #endif
18218 
18219  if (neighbor->get_virus() == nullptr)
18220  continue;
18221 
18222  auto & v = neighbor->get_virus();
18223 
18224  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
18225  if (nviruses_tmp >= m->array_virus_tmp.size())
18226  throw std::logic_error("Trying to add an extra element to a temporal array outside of the range.");
18227  #endif
18228 
18229  /* And it is a function of susceptibility_reduction as well */
18230  m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp] =
18231  (1.0 - p->get_susceptibility_reduction(v, m)) *
18232  v->get_prob_infecting(m) *
18233  (1.0 - neighbor->get_transmission_reduction(v, m))
18234  ;
18235 
18236  m->array_virus_tmp[nviruses_tmp++] = &(*v);
18237 
18238  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
18239  if (
18240  (m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp - 1] < 0.0) |
18241  (m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp - 1] > 1.0)
18242  )
18243  {
18244  printf_epiworld(
18245  "[epi-debug] Agent %i's virus %i has transmission prob outside of [0, 1]: %.4f!\n",
18246  static_cast<int>(neighbor->get_id()),
18247  static_cast<int>(_vcount_neigh++),
18248  m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp - 1]
18249  );
18250  }
18251  #endif
18252 
18253  }
18254 
18255 
18256  // No virus to compute
18257  if (nviruses_tmp == 0u)
18258  return nullptr;
18259 
18260  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
18261  m->get_db().n_transmissions_potential++;
18262  #endif
18263 
18264  // Running the roulette
18265  int which = roulette(nviruses_tmp, m);
18266 
18267  if (which < 0)
18268  return nullptr;
18269 
18270  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
18271  m->get_db().n_transmissions_today++;
18272  #endif
18273 
18274  return m->array_virus_tmp[which];
18275 
18276 }
18277 
18278 }
18279 
18280 #endif
18281 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
18283 
18284  End of -include/epiworld/agent-meat-virus-sampling.hpp-
18285 
18288 
18289 
18290 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
18292 
18293  Start of -include/epiworld/agent-meat-state.hpp-
18294 
18297 
18298 
18299 #ifndef EPIWORLD_PERSON_MEAT_STATE_HPP
18300 #define EPIWORLD_PERSON_MEAT_STATE_HPP

18401 class Model {

18415  std::vector< Agent<TSeq> > population_backup = {};
18416 
18426  std::vector< Agent<TSeq> * > sampled_population;
18427  size_t sampled_population_n = 0u;
18428  std::vector< size_t > population_left;
18429  size_t population_left_n = 0u;

18441  double * agents_data = nullptr;

18452 
18453  std::shared_ptr< std::mt19937 > engine = std::make_shared< std::mt19937 >();
18454 
18455  std::uniform_real_distribution<> runifd =
18456  std::uniform_real_distribution<> (0.0, 1.0);
18457  std::normal_distribution<> rnormd =
18458  std::normal_distribution<>(0.0);
18459  std::gamma_distribution<> rgammad =
18460  std::gamma_distribution<>();
18461  std::lognormal_distribution<> rlognormald =
18462  std::lognormal_distribution<>();
18463  std::exponential_distribution<> rexpd =
18464  std::exponential_distribution<>();
18465  std::binomial_distribution<> rbinomd =
18466  std::binomial_distribution<>();
18467  std::negative_binomial_distribution<> rnbinomd =
18468  std::negative_binomial_distribution<>();
18469  std::geometric_distribution<> rgeomd =
18470  std::geometric_distribution<>();
18471  std::poisson_distribution<> rpoissd =
18472  std::poisson_distribution<>();
18473

18475  epiworld_double rewire_prop = 0.0;
18476 
18477  std::map<std::string, epiworld_double > parameters;
18478  epiworld_fast_uint ndays = 0;
18479  Progress pb;

18486  -> void {};
18487

18489

18499 
18500  // std::chrono::milliseconds
18501  std::chrono::duration<epiworld_double,std::micro> time_elapsed =
18502  std::chrono::duration<epiworld_double,std::micro>::zero();
18503  epiworld_fast_uint n_replicates = 0u;
18504  void chrono_start();
18505  void chrono_end();
