19070 
19073 
19074 
19075 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
19077 
19078  Start of -include/epiworld//agent-meat-virus-sampling.hpp-
19079 
19082 
19083 
19084 #ifndef EPIWORLD_AGENT_MEAT_VIRUS_SAMPLING
19085 #define EPIWORLD_AGENT_MEAT_VIRUS_SAMPLING
19086 
19091 namespace sampler {
19092 
19106 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
19107 inline std::function<void(Agent<TSeq>*,Model<TSeq>*)> make_update_susceptible(
19108  std::vector< epiworld_fast_uint > exclude = {}
19109  )
19110 {
19111 
19112 
19113  if (exclude.size() == 0u)
19114  {
19115 
19116  std::function<void(Agent<TSeq>*,Model<TSeq>*)> sampler =
19117  [](Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m) -> void
19118  {
19119 
19120  if (p->get_virus() != nullptr)
19121  throw std::logic_error(
19122  std::string("Using the -default_update_susceptible- on agents WITH viruses makes no sense! ") +
19123  std::string("Agent id ") + std::to_string(p->get_id()) +
19124  std::string(" has a virus.")
19125  );
19126 
19127  // This computes the prob of getting any neighbor variant
19128  size_t nviruses_tmp = 0u;
19129  for (auto & neighbor: p->get_neighbors())
19130  {
19131 
19132  auto & v = neighbor->get_virus();
19133  if (v == nullptr)
19134  continue;
19135 
19136  /* And it is a function of susceptibility_reduction as well */
19137  m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp] =
19138  (1.0 - p->get_susceptibility_reduction(v, m)) *
19139  v->get_prob_infecting(m) *
19140  (1.0 - neighbor->get_transmission_reduction(v, m))
19141  ;
19142 
19143  m->array_virus_tmp[nviruses_tmp++] = &(*v);
19144 
19145  }
19146 
19147  // No virus to compute
19148  if (nviruses_tmp == 0u)
19149  return;
19150 
19151  // Running the roulette
19152  int which = roulette(nviruses_tmp, m);
19153 
19154  if (which < 0)
19155  return;
19156 
19157  p->set_virus(*m->array_virus_tmp[which], m);
19158 
19159  return;
19160  };
19161 
19162  return sampler;
19163 
19164  } else {
19165 
19166  // Making room for the query
19167  std::shared_ptr<std::vector<bool>> exclude_agent_bool =
19168  std::make_shared<std::vector<bool>>(0);
19169 
19170  std::shared_ptr<std::vector<epiworld_fast_uint>> exclude_agent_bool_idx =
19171  std::make_shared<std::vector<epiworld_fast_uint>>(exclude);
19172 
19173  std::function<void(Agent<TSeq>*,Model<TSeq>*)> sampler =
19174  [exclude_agent_bool,exclude_agent_bool_idx](Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m) -> void
19175  {
19176 
19177  // The first time we call it, we need to initialize the vector
19178  if (exclude_agent_bool->size() == 0u)
19179  {
19180 
19181  exclude_agent_bool->resize(m->get_states().size(), false);
19182  for (auto s : *exclude_agent_bool_idx)
19183  {
19184  if (s >= exclude_agent_bool->size())
19185  throw std::logic_error(
19186  std::string("You are trying to exclude a state that is out of range: ") +
19187  std::to_string(s) + std::string(". There are only ") +
19188  std::to_string(exclude_agent_bool->size()) +
19189  std::string(" states in the model.")
19190  );
19191 
19192  exclude_agent_bool->operator[](s) = true;
19193 
19194  }
19195 
19196  }
19197 
19198  if (p->get_virus() != nullptr)
19199  throw std::logic_error(
19200  std::string("Using the -default_update_susceptible- on agents WITH viruses makes no sense! ") +
19201  std::string("Agent id ") + std::to_string(p->get_id()) +
19202  std::string(" has a virus.")
19203  );
19204 
19205  // This computes the prob of getting any neighbor variant
19206  size_t nviruses_tmp = 0u;
19207  for (auto & neighbor: p->get_neighbors())
19208  {
19209 
19210  // If the state is in the list, exclude it
19211  if (exclude_agent_bool->operator[](neighbor->get_state()))
19212  continue;
19213 
19214  auto & v = neighbor->get_virus();
19215  if (v == nullptr)
19216  continue;
19217 
19218 
19219  /* And it is a function of susceptibility_reduction as well */
19220  m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp] =
19221  (1.0 - p->get_susceptibility_reduction(v, m)) *
19222  v->get_prob_infecting(m) *
19223  (1.0 - neighbor->get_transmission_reduction(v, m))
19224  ;
19225 
19226  m->array_virus_tmp[nviruses_tmp++] = &(*v);
19227 
19228  }
19229 
19230  // No virus to compute
19231  if (nviruses_tmp == 0u)
19232  return;
19233 
19234  // Running the roulette
19235  int which = roulette(nviruses_tmp, m);
19236 
19237  if (which < 0)
19238  return;
19239 
19240  p->set_virus(*m->array_virus_tmp[which], m);
19241 
19242  return;
19243 
19244  };
19245 
19246  return sampler;
19247 
19248  }
19249 
19250 }
19251 
19265 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
19266 inline std::function<Virus<TSeq>*(Agent<TSeq>*,Model<TSeq>*)> make_sample_virus_neighbors(
19267  std::vector< epiworld_fast_uint > exclude = {}
19268 )
19269 {
19270  if (exclude.size() == 0u)
19271  {
19272 
19273  std::function<Virus<TSeq>*(Agent<TSeq>*,Model<TSeq>*)> res =
19274  [](Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m) -> Virus<TSeq>* {
19275 
19276  if (p->get_virus() != nullptr)
19277  throw std::logic_error(
19278  std::string("Using the -default_update_susceptible- on agents WITH viruses makes no sense! ") +
19279  std::string("Agent id ") + std::to_string(p->get_id()) +
19280  std::string(" has a virus.")
19281  );
19282 
19283  // This computes the prob of getting any neighbor variant
19284  size_t nviruses_tmp = 0u;
19285  for (auto & neighbor: p->get_neighbors())
19286  {
19287 
19288  if (neighbor->get_virus() == nullptr)
19289  continue;
19290 
19291  auto & v = neighbor->get_virus();
19292 
19293  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
19294  if (nviruses_tmp >= static_cast<int>(m->array_virus_tmp.size()))
19295  throw std::logic_error("Trying to add an extra element to a temporal array outside of the range.");
19296  #endif
19297 
19298  /* And it is a function of susceptibility_reduction as well */
19299  m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp] =
19300  (1.0 - p->get_susceptibility_reduction(v, m)) *
19301  v->get_prob_infecting(m) *
19302  (1.0 - neighbor->get_transmission_reduction(v, m))
19303  ;
19304 
19305  m->array_virus_tmp[nviruses_tmp++] = &(*v);
19306 
19307  }
19308 
19309  // No virus to compute
19310  if (nviruses_tmp == 0u)
19311  return nullptr;
19312 
19313  // Running the roulette
19314  int which = roulette(nviruses_tmp, m);
19315 
19316  if (which < 0)
19317  return nullptr;
19318 
19319  return m->array_virus_tmp[which];
19320 
19321  };
19322 
19323  return res;
19324 
19325 
19326  } else {
19327 
19328  // Making room for the query
19329  std::shared_ptr<std::vector<bool>> exclude_agent_bool =
19330  std::make_shared<std::vector<bool>>(0);
19331 
19332  std::shared_ptr<std::vector<epiworld_fast_uint>> exclude_agent_bool_idx =
19333  std::make_shared<std::vector<epiworld_fast_uint>>(exclude);
19334 
19335 
19336  std::function<Virus<TSeq>*(Agent<TSeq>*,Model<TSeq>*)> res =
19337  [exclude_agent_bool,exclude_agent_bool_idx](Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m) -> Virus<TSeq>* {
19338 
19339  // The first time we call it, we need to initialize the vector
19340  if (exclude_agent_bool->size() == 0u)
19341  {
19342 
19343  exclude_agent_bool->resize(m->get_states().size(), false);
19344  for (auto s : *exclude_agent_bool_idx)
19345  {
19346  if (s >= exclude_agent_bool->size())
19347  throw std::logic_error(
19348  std::string("You are trying to exclude a state that is out of range: ") +
19349  std::to_string(s) + std::string(". There are only ") +
19350  std::to_string(exclude_agent_bool->size()) +
19351  std::string(" states in the model.")
19352  );
19353 
19354  exclude_agent_bool->operator[](s) = true;
19355 
19356  }
19357 
19358  }
19359 
19360  if (p->get_virus() != nullptr)
19361  throw std::logic_error(
19362  std::string("Using the -default_update_susceptible- on agents WITH viruses makes no sense! ") +
19363  std::string("Agent id ") + std::to_string(p->get_id()) +
19364  std::string(" has a virus.")
19365  );
19366 
19367  // This computes the prob of getting any neighbor variant
19368  size_t nviruses_tmp = 0u;
19369  for (auto & neighbor: p->get_neighbors())
19370  {
19371 
19372  // If the state is in the list, exclude it
19373  if (exclude_agent_bool->operator[](neighbor->get_state()))
19374  continue;
19375 
19376  if (neighbor->get_virus() == nullptr)
19377  continue;
19378 
19379  auto & v = neighbor->get_virus();
19380 
19381  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
19382  if (nviruses_tmp >= static_cast<int>(m->array_virus_tmp.size()))
19383  throw std::logic_error("Trying to add an extra element to a temporal array outside of the range.");
19384  #endif
19385 
19386  /* And it is a function of susceptibility_reduction as well */
19387  m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp] =
19388  (1.0 - p->get_susceptibility_reduction(v, m)) *
19389  v->get_prob_infecting(m) *
19390  (1.0 - neighbor->get_transmission_reduction(v, m))
19391  ;
19392 
19393  m->array_virus_tmp[nviruses_tmp++] = &(*v);
19394 
19395  }
19396 
19397  // No virus to compute
19398  if (nviruses_tmp == 0u)
19399  return nullptr;
19400 
19401  // Running the roulette
19402  int which = roulette(nviruses_tmp, m);
19403 
19404  if (which < 0)
19405  return nullptr;
19406 
19407  return m->array_virus_tmp[which];
19408 
19409  };
19410 
19411  return res;
19412 
19413  }
19414 
19415 }
19416 
19433 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
19434 inline Virus<TSeq> * sample_virus_single(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m)
19435 {
19436 
19437  if (p->get_virus() != nullptr)
19438  throw std::logic_error(
19439  std::string("Using the -default_update_susceptible- on agents WITH viruses makes no sense!") +
19440  std::string("Agent id ") + std::to_string(p->get_id()) +
19441  std::string(" has a virus.")
19442  );
19443 
19444  // This computes the prob of getting any neighbor variant
19445  size_t nviruses_tmp = 0u;
19446  for (auto & neighbor: p->get_neighbors())
19447  {
19448  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
19449  int _vcount_neigh = 0;
19450  #endif
19451 
19452  if (neighbor->get_virus() == nullptr)
19453  continue;
19454 
19455  auto & v = neighbor->get_virus();
19456 
19457  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
19458  if (nviruses_tmp >= m->array_virus_tmp.size())
19459  throw std::logic_error("Trying to add an extra element to a temporal array outside of the range.");
19460  #endif
19461 
19462  /* And it is a function of susceptibility_reduction as well */
19463  m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp] =
19464  (1.0 - p->get_susceptibility_reduction(v, m)) *
19465  v->get_prob_infecting(m) *
19466  (1.0 - neighbor->get_transmission_reduction(v, m))
19467  ;
19468 
19469  m->array_virus_tmp[nviruses_tmp++] = &(*v);
19470 
19471  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
19472  if (
19473  (m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp - 1] < 0.0) |
19474  (m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp - 1] > 1.0)
19475  )
19476  {
19477  printf_epiworld(
19478  "[epi-debug] Agent %i's virus %i has transmission prob outside of [0, 1]: %.4f!\n",
19479  static_cast<int>(neighbor->get_id()),
19480  static_cast<int>(_vcount_neigh++),
19481  m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp - 1]
19482  );
19483  }
19484  #endif
19485 
19486  }
19487 
19488 
19489  // No virus to compute
19490  if (nviruses_tmp == 0u)
19491  return nullptr;
19492 
19493  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
19494  m->get_db().n_transmissions_potential++;
19495  #endif
19496 
19497  // Running the roulette
19498  int which = roulette(nviruses_tmp, m);
19499 
19500  if (which < 0)
19501  return nullptr;
19502 
19503  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
19504  m->get_db().n_transmissions_today++;
19505  #endif
19506 
19507  return m->array_virus_tmp[which];
19508 
19509 }
19510 
19511 }
19512 
19513 #endif
19514 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
19516 
19517  End of -include/epiworld//agent-meat-virus-sampling.hpp-
19518

19537 #endif

19540 // This is called during `run_multiple()` and it is
19541 // passed the simulation number.
19542 #ifndef EPI_CHECK_USER_INTERRUPT
19543  #define EPI_CHECK_USER_INTERRUPT(a)
19544 #endif
19545

19547  #define EPIWORLD_MAXNEIGHBORS 1048576
19548 #endif
19549

19551  #include <omp.h>
19552 // #else
19553 // #define omp_get_thread_num() 0
19554 // #define omp_set_num_threads() 1
19555 #endif

19559 #endif

19562  #define epiworld_fast_int int
19563 #endif

19567 #endif

19603 class Entity;

19605 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
19606 using VirusPtr = std::shared_ptr< Virus< TSeq > >;
19607 
19608 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
19609 using ToolPtr = std::shared_ptr< Tool< TSeq > >;
19610

19612 using ToolFun = std::function<epiworld_double(Tool<TSeq>&,Agent<TSeq>*,VirusPtr<TSeq>,Model<TSeq>*)>;
19613 
19614 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
19615 using MixerFun = std::function<epiworld_double(Agent<TSeq>*,VirusPtr<TSeq>,Model<TSeq>*)>;
19616 
19617 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
19618 using MutFun = std::function<bool(Agent<TSeq>*,Virus<TSeq>&,Model<TSeq>*)>;
19619 
19620 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
19621 using PostRecoveryFun = std::function<void(Agent<TSeq>*,Virus<TSeq>&,Model<TSeq>*)>;
19622 
19623 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
19624 using VirusFun = std::function<epiworld_double(Agent<TSeq>*,Virus<TSeq>&,Model<TSeq>*)>;
19625 
19626 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
19627 using UpdateFun = std::function<void(Agent<TSeq>*,Model<TSeq>*)>;
19628 
19629 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
19630 using GlobalFun = std::function<void(Model<TSeq>*)>;
19631 
19632 template<typename TSeq>
19633 struct Event;
19634 
19635 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
19636 using EventFun = std::function<void(Event<TSeq>&,Model<TSeq>*)>;
19637 
19641 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
19642 using VirusToAgentFun = std::function<void(Virus<TSeq>&,Model<TSeq>*)>;
19643 
19647 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
19648 using ToolToAgentFun = std::function<void(Tool<TSeq>&,Model<TSeq>*)>;
19649 
19653 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
19654 using EntityToAgentFun = std::function<void(Entity<TSeq>&,Model<TSeq>*)>;
19655 
19661 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
19662 struct Event {
19663  Agent<TSeq> * agent;
19664  VirusPtr<TSeq> virus;
19665  ToolPtr<TSeq> tool;
19666  Entity<TSeq> * entity;
19667  epiworld_fast_int new_state;
19668  epiworld_fast_int queue;
19669  EventFun<TSeq> call;
19670  int idx_agent;
19671  int idx_object;
19672 public:
19689  Event(
19690  Agent<TSeq> * agent_,
19691  VirusPtr<TSeq> & virus_,
19692  ToolPtr<TSeq> & tool_,
19693  Entity<TSeq> * entity_,
19694  epiworld_fast_int new_state_,
19695  epiworld_fast_int queue_,
19696  EventFun<TSeq> & call_,
19697  int idx_agent_,
19698  int idx_object_
19699  ) : agent(agent_), virus(virus_), tool(tool_), entity(entity_),
19700  new_state(new_state_),
19701  queue(queue_), call(call_), idx_agent(idx_agent_), idx_object(idx_object_) {
19702  return;
19703  };
19704 };
19705 
19713 #ifndef DEFAULT_TOOL_CONTAGION_REDUCTION
19714  #define DEFAULT_TOOL_CONTAGION_REDUCTION 0.0
19715 #endif
19716 
19717 #ifndef DEFAULT_TOOL_TRANSMISSION_REDUCTION
19718  #define DEFAULT_TOOL_TRANSMISSION_REDUCTION 0.0
19719 #endif
19720 
19721 #ifndef DEFAULT_TOOL_RECOVERY_ENHANCER
19722  #define DEFAULT_TOOL_RECOVERY_ENHANCER 0.0
19723 #endif
19724 
19725 #ifndef DEFAULT_TOOL_DEATH_REDUCTION
19726  #define DEFAULT_TOOL_DEATH_REDUCTION 0.0
19727 #endif
19728 
19729 #ifndef EPI_DEFAULT_VIRUS_PROB_INFECTION
19730  #define EPI_DEFAULT_VIRUS_PROB_INFECTION 1.0
19731 #endif
19732 
19733 #ifndef EPI_DEFAULT_VIRUS_PROB_RECOVERY
19734  #define EPI_DEFAULT_VIRUS_PROB_RECOVERY 0.1428
19735 #endif
19736 
19737 #ifndef EPI_DEFAULT_VIRUS_PROB_DEATH
19738  #define EPI_DEFAULT_VIRUS_PROB_DEATH 0.0
19739 #endif
19740 
19741 #ifndef EPI_DEFAULT_INCUBATION_DAYS
19742  #define EPI_DEFAULT_INCUBATION_DAYS 7.0
19743 #endif
19745 
19746 #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
19747  #define EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF printf_epiworld
19748 
19749  #define EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(etype, msg) \
19750  (etype)("[[epi-debug]] (error) " + std::string(msg));
19751 
19752  #define EPI_DEBUG_NOTIFY_ACTIVE() \
19753  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("DEBUGGING ON (compiled with EPI_DEBUG defined)%s\n", "");
19754 
19755  #define EPI_DEBUG_ALL_NON_NEGATIVE(vect) \
19756  for (auto & v : vect) \
19757  if (static_cast<double>(v) < 0.0) \
19758  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "A negative value not allowed.");
19759 
19760  #define EPI_DEBUG_SUM_DBL(vect, num) \
19761  double _epi_debug_sum = 0.0; \
19762  for (auto & v : vect) \
19763  { \
19764  _epi_debug_sum += static_cast<double>(v);\
19765  if (_epi_debug_sum > static_cast<double>(num)) \
19766  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "The sum of elements not reached."); \
19767  }
19768 
19769  #define EPI_DEBUG_SUM_INT(vect, num) \
19770  int _epi_debug_sum = 0; \
19771  for (auto & v : vect) \
19772  { \
19773  _epi_debug_sum += static_cast<int>(v);\
19774  if (_epi_debug_sum > static_cast<int>(num)) \
19775  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "The sum of elements not reached."); \
19776  }
19777 
19778  #define EPI_DEBUG_VECTOR_MATCH_INT(a, b, c) \
19779  if (a.size() != b.size()) {\
19780  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("In '%s'", std::string(c).c_str()); \
19781  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("Size of vector a: %lu\n", (a).size());\
19782  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("Size of vector b: %lu\n", (b).size());\
19783  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::length_error, "The vectors do not match size."); \
19784  }\
19785  for (int _i = 0; _i < static_cast<int>(a.size()); ++_i) \
19786  if (a[_i] != b[_i]) {\
19787  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("In '%s'", std::string(c).c_str()); \
19788  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("Iterating the last 5 values%s:\n", ""); \
19789  for (int _j = std::max(0, static_cast<int>(_i) - 4); _j <= _i; ++_j) \
19790  { \
19791  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF( \
19792  "a[%i]: %i; b[%i]: %i\n", \
19793  _j, \
19794  static_cast<int>(a[_j]), \
19795  _j, static_cast<int>(b[_j])); \
19796  } \
19797  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "The vectors do not match."); \
19798  }
19799 
19800  #define EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(a,b) \
19801  if (a) \
19802  {\
19803  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, b); \
19804  }
19805 
19806  #define epiexception(a) std::logic_error
19807 #else
19808  #define EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF(fmt, ...)
19809  #define EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(fmt, ...)
19810  #define EPI_DEBUG_NOTIFY_ACTIVE()
19811  #define EPI_DEBUG_ALL_NON_NEGATIVE(vect)
19812  #define EPI_DEBUG_SUM_DBL(vect, num)
19813  #define EPI_DEBUG_SUM_INT(vect, num)
19814  #define EPI_DEBUG_VECTOR_MATCH_INT(a, b, c)
19815  #define EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(a, b) \
19816  if (a) \
19817  return false;
19818  #define epiexception(a) a
19819 #endif
19820 
19821 #if defined(EPI_DEBUG_NO_THREAD_ID) || (!defined(__OPENMP) && !defined(_OPENMP))
19822  #define EPI_GET_THREAD_ID() 0
19823 #else
19824  #define EPI_GET_THREAD_ID() omp_get_thread_num()
19825 #endif
19826 
19827 #endif
19828 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
19830 
19831  End of -include/epiworld//config.hpp-
19832 
19835 
19836 
19837 
19849 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
19850 inline void default_update_susceptible(
19851  Agent<TSeq> * p,
19852  Model<TSeq> * m
19853  )
19854 {
19855 
19856  Virus<TSeq> * virus = sampler::sample_virus_single<TSeq>(p, m);
19857 
19858  if (virus == nullptr)
19859  return;
19860 
19861  p->set_virus(*virus, m);
19862 
19863  return;
19864 
19865 }
19866 
19867 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
19868 inline void default_update_exposed(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m) {
19869 
19870  if (p->get_virus() == nullptr)
19871  throw std::logic_error(
19872  std::string("Using the -default_update_exposed- on agents WITHOUT viruses makes no sense! ") +
19873  std::string("Agent id ") + std::to_string(p->get_id()) + std::string(" has no virus registered.")
19874  );
19875 
19876  // Die
19877  auto & virus = p->get_virus();
19878  m->array_double_tmp[0u] =
19879  virus->get_prob_death(m) * (1.0 - p->get_death_reduction(virus, m));
19880 
19881  // Recover
19882  m->array_double_tmp[1u] =
19883  1.0 - (1.0 - virus->get_prob_recovery(m)) * (1.0 - p->get_recovery_enhancer(virus, m));
19884 
19885 
19886  // Running the roulette
19887  int which = roulette(2u, m);
19888 
19889  if (which < 0)
19890  return;
19891 
19892  // Which roulette happen?
19893  if (which == 0u) // If odd
19894  {
19895 
19896  p->rm_agent_by_virus(m);
19897 
19898  } else {
19899 
19900  p->rm_virus(m);
19901 
19902  }
19903 
19904  return ;
19905 
19906 };
19907 
19908 #endif
19909 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
19911 
19912  End of -include/epiworld/agent-meat-state.hpp-
19913

19920 
19921  Start of -include/epiworld/agent-bones.hpp-
19922

19926 
19927 #ifndef EPIWORLD_PERSON_BONES_HPP
19928 #define EPIWORLD_PERSON_BONES_HPP
19929

19931 class Model;
19932 
19933 template<typename TSeq>
19934 class Virus;
19935 
19936 template<typename TSeq>
19937 class Viruses;
19938

19940 class Viruses_const;
19941 
19942 template<typename TSeq>
19943 class Tool;
19944 
19945 template<typename TSeq>
19946 class Tools;
19947 
19948 template<typename TSeq>
19949 class Tools_const;
19950 
19951 template<typename TSeq>
19952 class Queue;
19953 
19954 template<typename TSeq>
19955 struct Event;
19956 
19957 template<typename TSeq>
19958 class Entity;
19959

19961 class Entities;

19964 inline void default_add_virus(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
19965

19967 inline void default_add_tool(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);

19974 
19975 template<typename TSeq>
19976 inline void default_rm_tool(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
19977 
19978 template<typename TSeq>
19979 inline void default_rm_entity(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
19980 
19981 template<typename TSeq>
19982 inline void default_change_state(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);

19991 template<typename TSeq>
19992 class Agent {
19993  friend class Model<TSeq>;
19994  friend class Virus<TSeq>;
19995  friend class Tool<TSeq>;
19996  friend class Tools<TSeq>;
19997  friend class Tools_const<TSeq>;
19998  friend class Queue<TSeq>;
19999  friend class Entities<TSeq>;
20000  friend class AgentsSample<TSeq>;
20001  friend void default_add_virus<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
20002  friend void default_add_tool<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
20003  friend void default_add_entity<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
20004  friend void default_rm_virus<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
20005  friend void default_rm_tool<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
20006  friend void default_rm_entity<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
20007  friend void default_change_state<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
20008 private:
20009 
20010  Model<TSeq> * model;
20011 
20012  std::vector< size_t > * neighbors = nullptr;
20013  std::vector< size_t > * neighbors_locations = nullptr;
20014  size_t n_neighbors = 0u;
20015 
20016  std::vector< size_t > entities;
20017  std::vector< size_t > entities_locations;
20018  size_t n_entities = 0u;
20019 
20020  unsigned int state = 0u;
20021  unsigned int state_prev = 0u; ///< For accounting, if need to undo a change.
20022 
20023  int state_last_changed = -1; ///< Last time the agent was updated.
20024  int id = -1;
20025 
20026  VirusPtr<TSeq> virus = nullptr;
20027 
20028  std::vector< ToolPtr<TSeq> > tools;
20029  unsigned int n_tools = 0u;
20030 
20031 public:
20032 
20033  Agent();
20034  Agent(Agent<TSeq> && p);
20035  Agent(const Agent<TSeq> & p);
20036  Agent<TSeq> & operator=(const Agent<TSeq> & other_agent);
20037  ~Agent();
20038 
20050  void add_tool(
20051  ToolPtr<TSeq> & tool,

20053  epiworld_fast_int state_new = -99,
20054  epiworld_fast_int queue = -99
20055  );

20062  );

20069  );

20210

20216 
20217  bool operator==(const Agent<TSeq> & other) const;
20218  bool operator!=(const Agent<TSeq> & other) const {return !operator==(other);};

20340 using MixerFun = std::function<epiworld_double(Agent<TSeq>*,VirusPtr<TSeq>,Model<TSeq>*)>;

20352 using UpdateFun = std::function<void(Agent<TSeq>*,Model<TSeq>*)>;

20355 using GlobalFun = std::function<void(Model<TSeq>*)>;

20358 struct Event;

20361 using EventFun = std::function<void(Event<TSeq>&,Model<TSeq>*)>;

20386 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
20387 struct Event {
20388  Agent<TSeq> * agent;
20389  VirusPtr<TSeq> virus;
20390  ToolPtr<TSeq> tool;
20391  Entity<TSeq> * entity;
20392  epiworld_fast_int new_state;
20393  epiworld_fast_int queue;
20394  EventFun<TSeq> call;
20395  int idx_agent;
20396  int idx_object;
20397 public:
20414  Event(
20415  Agent<TSeq> * agent_,
20416  VirusPtr<TSeq> & virus_,
20417  ToolPtr<TSeq> & tool_,
20418  Entity<TSeq> * entity_,
20419  epiworld_fast_int new_state_,
20420  epiworld_fast_int queue_,
20421  EventFun<TSeq> & call_,
20422  int idx_agent_,
20423  int idx_object_
20424  ) : agent(agent_), virus(virus_), tool(tool_), entity(entity_),
20425  new_state(new_state_),
20426  queue(queue_), call(call_), idx_agent(idx_agent_), idx_object(idx_object_) {
20427  return;
20428  };
20429 };

20471 #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
20472  #define EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF printf_epiworld
20473 
20474  #define EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(etype, msg) \
20475  (etype)("[[epi-debug]] (error) " + std::string(msg));
20476 
20477  #define EPI_DEBUG_NOTIFY_ACTIVE() \
20478  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("DEBUGGING ON (compiled with EPI_DEBUG defined)%s\n", "");
20479 
20480  #define EPI_DEBUG_ALL_NON_NEGATIVE(vect) \
20481  for (auto & v : vect) \
20482  if (static_cast<double>(v) < 0.0) \
20483  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "A negative value not allowed.");
20484 
20485  #define EPI_DEBUG_SUM_DBL(vect, num) \
20486  double _epi_debug_sum = 0.0; \
20487  for (auto & v : vect) \
20488  { \
20489  _epi_debug_sum += static_cast<double>(v);\
20490  if (_epi_debug_sum > static_cast<double>(num)) \
20491  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "The sum of elements not reached."); \
20492  }
20493 
20494  #define EPI_DEBUG_SUM_INT(vect, num) \
20495  int _epi_debug_sum = 0; \
20496  for (auto & v : vect) \
20497  { \
20498  _epi_debug_sum += static_cast<int>(v);\
20499  if (_epi_debug_sum > static_cast<int>(num)) \
20500  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "The sum of elements not reached."); \
20501  }
20502 
20503  #define EPI_DEBUG_VECTOR_MATCH_INT(a, b, c) \
20504  if (a.size() != b.size()) {\
20505  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("In '%s'", std::string(c).c_str()); \
20506  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("Size of vector a: %lu\n", (a).size());\
20507  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("Size of vector b: %lu\n", (b).size());\
20508  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::length_error, "The vectors do not match size."); \
20509  }\
20510  for (int _i = 0; _i < static_cast<int>(a.size()); ++_i) \
20511  if (a[_i] != b[_i]) {\
20512  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("In '%s'", std::string(c).c_str()); \
20513  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF("Iterating the last 5 values%s:\n", ""); \
20514  for (int _j = std::max(0, static_cast<int>(_i) - 4); _j <= _i; ++_j) \
20515  { \
20516  EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF( \
20517  "a[%i]: %i; b[%i]: %i\n", \
20518  _j, \
20519  static_cast<int>(a[_j]), \
20520  _j, static_cast<int>(b[_j])); \
20521  } \
20522  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, "The vectors do not match."); \
20523  }
20524 
20525  #define EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(a,b) \
20526  if (a) \
20527  {\
20528  throw EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(std::logic_error, b); \
20529  }
20530 
20531  #define epiexception(a) std::logic_error
20532 #else
20533  #define EPI_DEBUG_PRINTF(fmt, ...)
20534  #define EPI_DEBUG_ERROR(fmt, ...)
20535  #define EPI_DEBUG_NOTIFY_ACTIVE()
20536  #define EPI_DEBUG_ALL_NON_NEGATIVE(vect)
20537  #define EPI_DEBUG_SUM_DBL(vect, num)
20538  #define EPI_DEBUG_SUM_INT(vect, num)
20539  #define EPI_DEBUG_VECTOR_MATCH_INT(a, b, c)
20540  #define EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(a, b) \
20541  if (a) \
20542  return false;
20543  #define epiexception(a) a
20544 #endif
20545 
20546 #if defined(EPI_DEBUG_NO_THREAD_ID) || (!defined(__OPENMP) && !defined(_OPENMP))
20547  #define EPI_GET_THREAD_ID() 0
20548 #else
20549  #define EPI_GET_THREAD_ID() omp_get_thread_num()
20550 #endif
20551 
20552 #endif
20553 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
20555 
20556  End of -include/epiworld//config.hpp-

20580  epiworld::Tool< tseq > & t, \
20581  epiworld::Agent< tseq > * p, \
20582  std::shared_ptr<epiworld::Virus< tseq >> v, \
20583  epiworld::Model< tseq > * m\
20584  )
20585

20591  epiworld::ToolFun<tseq> funname = \
20592  [](epiworld::Tool<tseq> & t, \
20593  epiworld::Agent<tseq> * p, \
20594  std::shared_ptr<epiworld::Virus<tseq>> v, \
20595  epiworld::Model<tseq> * m) -> epiworld_double
20596 
20601 #define EPI_PARAMS(i) m->operator()(i)

20609  epiworld::Agent<tseq> * p, \
20610  epiworld::Virus<tseq> & v, \
20611  epiworld::Model<tseq> * m )
20612

20615  [](epiworld::Agent<tseq> * p, \
20616  epiworld::Virus<tseq> & v, \
20617  epiworld::Model<tseq> * m) -> void
20618

20624  )

20629  epiworld::Virus<tseq> & v , \

20636  epiworld::Model<tseq> * m\
20637  )

20640  epiworld::VirusFun<TSeq> funname = \
20641  [](epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p, \
20642  epiworld::Virus<TSeq> & v, \
20643  epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m) -> epiworld_double
20644 
20645 #define EPI_RUNIF() m->runif()
20646 
20647 #define EPIWORLD_RUN(a) \
20648  if (a.get_verbose()) \
20649  { \
20650  printf_epiworld("Running the model...\n");\
20651  } \
20652  for (epiworld_fast_uint niter = 0; niter < a.get_ndays(); ++niter)
20653 
20654 #define EPI_TOKENPASTE(a,b) a ## b
20655 #define MPAR(num) *(m->EPI_TOKENPASTE(p,num))
20656 
20657 #define EPI_NEW_UPDATEFUN(funname,tseq) inline void \
20658  (funname)(epiworld::Agent<tseq> * p, epiworld::Model<tseq> * m)
20659 
20660 #define EPI_NEW_UPDATEFUN_LAMBDA(funname,tseq) \
20661  epiworld::UpdateFun<tseq> funname = \
20662  [](epiworld::Agent<tseq> * p, epiworld::Model<tseq> * m) -> void
20663 
20664 #define EPI_NEW_GLOBALFUN(funname,tseq) inline void \
20665  (funname)(epiworld::Model<tseq>* m)
20666

20668  epiworld::GlobalFun<tseq> funname = \
20669  [](epiworld::Model<tseq>* m) -> void

20673  (funname)(epiworld::Entity<tseq> & e, epiworld::Model<tseq> * m)
20674 
20675 #define EPI_NEW_ENTITYTOAGENTFUN_LAMBDA(funname,tseq) \
20676  epiworld::EntityToAgentFun<tseq> funname = \
20677  [](epiworld::Entity<tseq> & e, epiworld::Model<tseq> * m) -> void
20678 
20679 // Use this to make it more efficient for storage if the type is small
20680 // and the pointer is not needed
20681 #define EPI_TYPENAME_TRAITS(tseq, bound) typename std::conditional< \
20682  sizeof( tseq ) <= sizeof( bound ), \
20683  tseq, \
20684  std::shared_ptr< tseq > \
20685  >::type
20686 
20687 #define EPI_IF_TSEQ_LESS_EQ_INT(tseq) \
20688  if constexpr (sizeof( tseq ) <= sizeof( int ))
20689 
20690 #define EPI_CHECK_COALESCE(proposed_, virus_tool_, alt_) \
20691  if (static_cast<int>(proposed_) == -99) {\
20692  if (static_cast<int>(virus_tool_) == -99) \
20693  (proposed_) = (alt_);\
20694  else (proposed_) = (virus_tool_);}
20695 
20696 #endif
20697 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
20699 
20700  End of -include/epiworld//epiworld-macros.hpp-
20701

20715 #ifndef EPIWORLD_ENTITIES_BONES_HPP
20716 #define EPIWORLD_ENTITIES_BONES_HPP
20717 
20718 template<typename TSeq>
20719 class Virus;
20720 
20721 template<typename TSeq>
20722 class Agent;
20723 
20724 
20730 template<typename TSeq>
20731 class Entities {
20732  friend class Entity<TSeq>;
20733  friend class Agent<TSeq>;
20734 private:
20735  std::vector< Entity<TSeq> * > dat;
20736  const size_t n_entities;
20737 
20738 public:
20739 
20740  Entities() = delete;
20741  Entities(Agent<TSeq> & p);
20742 
20743  typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq> * >::iterator begin();
20744  typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq> * >::iterator end();
20745 
20746  Entity<TSeq> & operator()(size_t i);
20747  Entity<TSeq> & operator[](size_t i);
20748 
20749  size_t size() const noexcept;
20750 
20751  bool operator==(const Entities<TSeq> & other) const;
20752 
20753 };
20754 
20755 template<typename TSeq>
20756 inline Entities<TSeq>::Entities(Agent<TSeq> & p) :
20757  n_entities(p.get_n_entities())
20758 {
20759 
20760  dat.reserve(n_entities);
20761  for (size_t i = 0u; i < n_entities; ++i)
20762  dat.push_back(&p.get_entity(i));
20763 
20764 }
20765 
20766 template<typename TSeq>
20767 inline typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq>* >::iterator Entities<TSeq>::begin()
20768 {
20769 
20770  if (n_entities == 0u)
20771  return dat.end();
20772 
20773  return dat.begin();
20774 }
20775 
20776 template<typename TSeq>
20777 inline typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq>* >::iterator Entities<TSeq>::end()
20778 {
20779 
20780  return begin() + n_entities;
20781 }
20782 
20783 template<typename TSeq>
20784 inline Entity<TSeq> & Entities<TSeq>::operator()(size_t i)
20785 {
20786 
20787  if (i >= n_entities)
20788  throw std::range_error("Entity index out of range.");
20789 
20790  return *dat[i];
20791 
20792 }
20793 
20794 template<typename TSeq>
20795 inline Entity<TSeq> & Entities<TSeq>::operator[](size_t i)
20796 {
20797 
20798  return *dat[i];
20799 
20800 }
20801 
20802 template<typename TSeq>
20803 inline size_t Entities<TSeq>::size() const noexcept
20804 {
20805  return n_entities;
20806 }
20807 
20808 template<typename TSeq>
20809 inline bool Entities<TSeq>::operator==(const Entities<TSeq> & other) const
20810 {
20811 
20812  if (n_entities != other.n_entities)
20813  return false;
20814 
20815  for (size_t i = 0u; i < dat.size(); ++i)
20816  {
20817  if (dat[i] != other.dat[i])
20818  return false;
20819  }
20820 
20821  return true;
20822 }
20823 
20829 template<typename TSeq>
20830 class Entities_const {
20831  friend class Virus<TSeq>;
20832  friend class Agent<TSeq>;
20833 private:
20834  const std::vector< Entity<TSeq>* > dat;
20835  const size_t n_entities;
20836 
20837 public:
20838 
20839  Entities_const() = delete;
20840  Entities_const(const Agent<TSeq> & p);
20841 
20842  typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq>* >::const_iterator begin();
20843  typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq>* >::const_iterator end();
20844 
20845  const Entity<TSeq> & operator()(size_t i);
20846  const Entity<TSeq> & operator[](size_t i);
20847 
20848  size_t size() const noexcept;
20849 
20850  bool operator==(const Entities_const<TSeq> & other) const;
20851 
20852 };
20853 
20854 template<typename TSeq>
20855 inline Entities_const<TSeq>::Entities_const(const Agent<TSeq> & p) :
20856  n_entities(p.get_n_entities())
20857 {
20858 
20859  dat.reserve(n_entities);
20860  for (size_t i = 0u; i < n_entities; ++i)
20861  dat.push_back(&p.get_entity(i));
20862 
20863 }
20864 
20865 template<typename TSeq>
20866 inline typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq>* >::const_iterator Entities_const<TSeq>::begin() {
20867 
20868  if (n_entities == 0u)
20869  return dat.end();
20870 
20871  return dat.begin();
20872 }
20873 
20874 template<typename TSeq>
20875 inline typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq>* >::const_iterator Entities_const<TSeq>::end() {
20876 
20877  return begin() + n_entities;
20878 }
20879 
20880 template<typename TSeq>
20881 inline const Entity<TSeq> & Entities_const<TSeq>::operator()(size_t i)
20882 {
20883 
20884  if (i >= n_entities)
20885  throw std::range_error("Entity index out of range.");
20886 
20887  return *dat[i];
20888 
20889 }
20890 
20891 template<typename TSeq>
20892 inline const Entity<TSeq> & Entities_const<TSeq>::operator[](size_t i)
20893 {
20894 
20895  return *dat[i];
20896 
20897 }
20898 
20899 template<typename TSeq>
20900 inline size_t Entities_const<TSeq>::size() const noexcept
20901 {
20902  return n_entities;
20903 }
20904 
20905 template<typename TSeq>
20906 inline bool Entities_const<TSeq>::operator==(const Entities_const<TSeq> & other) const
20907 {
20908 
20909  if (n_entities != other.n_entities)
20910  return false;
20911 
20912  for (size_t i = 0u; i < dat.size(); ++i)
20913  {
20914  if (dat[i] != other.dat[i])
20915  return false;
20916  }
20917 
20918  return true;
20919 }

21005 template<typename TSeq>
21006 class Agent {
21007  friend class Model<TSeq>;
21008  friend class Virus<TSeq>;
21009  friend class Tool<TSeq>;
21010  friend class Tools<TSeq>;
21011  friend class Tools_const<TSeq>;
21012  friend class Queue<TSeq>;
21013  friend class Entities<TSeq>;
21014  friend class AgentsSample<TSeq>;
21015  friend void default_add_virus<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
21016  friend void default_add_tool<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
21017  friend void default_add_entity<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
21018  friend void default_rm_virus<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
21019  friend void default_rm_tool<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
21020  friend void default_rm_entity<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
21021  friend void default_change_state<TSeq>(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
21022 private:
21023 
21024  Model<TSeq> * model;
21025 
21026  std::vector< size_t > * neighbors = nullptr;
21027  std::vector< size_t > * neighbors_locations = nullptr;
21028  size_t n_neighbors = 0u;
21029 
21030  std::vector< size_t > entities;
21031  std::vector< size_t > entities_locations;
21032  size_t n_entities = 0u;
21033 
21034  unsigned int state = 0u;
21035  unsigned int state_prev = 0u; ///< For accounting, if need to undo a change.
21036 
21037  int state_last_changed = -1; ///< Last time the agent was updated.
21038  int id = -1;
21039 
21040  VirusPtr<TSeq> virus = nullptr;
21041 
21042  std::vector< ToolPtr<TSeq> > tools;
21043  unsigned int n_tools = 0u;
21044 
21045 public:
21046 
21047  Agent();
21048  Agent(Agent<TSeq> && p);
21049  Agent(const Agent<TSeq> & p);
21050  Agent<TSeq> & operator=(const Agent<TSeq> & other_agent);
21051  ~Agent();
21052 
21064  void add_tool(
21065  ToolPtr<TSeq> & tool,
21066  Model<TSeq> * model,
21067  epiworld_fast_int state_new = -99,
21068  epiworld_fast_int queue = -99
21069  );

21072  const Tool<TSeq> & tool,
21073  Model<TSeq> * model,
21074  epiworld_fast_int state_new = -99,
21075  epiworld_fast_int queue = -99
21076  );

21246 
21247 
21248 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
21250 
21251  Start of -include/epiworld//agent-events-meat.hpp-
21252 
21255 
21256 
21257 #ifndef EPIWORLD_AGENT_EVENTS_MEAT_HPP
21258 #define EPIWORLD_AGENT_EVENTS_MEAT_HPP
21259 
21260 
21261 template<typename TSeq>
21262 inline void default_add_virus(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m)
21263 {
21264 
21265  Agent<TSeq> * p = a.agent;
21266  VirusPtr<TSeq> & v = a.virus;
21267 
21268  m->get_db().record_transmission(
21269  v->get_agent() ? v->get_agent()->get_id() : -1,
21270  p->get_id(),
21271  v->get_id(),
21272  v->get_date()
21273  );
21274 
21275  p->virus = std::move(v);
21276  p->virus->set_date(m->today());
21277  p->virus->set_agent(p);
21278 
21279  // Change of state needs to be recorded and updated on the
21280  // tools.
21281  if ((a.new_state != -99) && (static_cast<int>(p->state) != a.new_state))
21282  {
21283  auto & db = m->get_db();
21284  db.update_state(p->state_prev, a.new_state);
21285 
21286  for (size_t i = 0u; i < p->n_tools; ++i)
21287  db.update_tool(
21288  p->tools[i]->get_id(),
21289  p->state_prev,
21290  a.new_state
21291  );
21292  }
21293 
21294  // Lastly, we increase the daily count of the virus
21295  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
21296  m->get_db().today_virus.at(p->virus->get_id()).at(
21297  a.new_state != -99 ? a.new_state : p->state
21298  )++;
21299  #else
21300  m->get_db().today_virus[p->virus->get_id()][
21301  a.new_state != -99 ? a.new_state : p->state
21302  ]++;
21303  #endif
21304 
21305 }
21306 
21307 template<typename TSeq>
21308 inline void default_add_tool(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m)
21309 {
21310 
21311  Agent<TSeq> * p = a.agent;
21312  ToolPtr<TSeq> & t = a.tool;
21313 
21314  // Update tool accounting
21315  p->n_tools++;
21316  size_t n_tools = p->n_tools;
21317 
21318  if (n_tools <= p->tools.size())
21319  p->tools[n_tools - 1] = std::move(t);
21320  else
21321  p->tools.emplace_back(std::move(t));
21322 
21323  n_tools--;
21324 
21325  p->tools[n_tools]->set_date(m->today());
21326  p->tools[n_tools]->set_agent(p, n_tools);
21327 
21328  // Change of state needs to be recorded and updated on the
21329  // tools.
21330  if ((a.new_state != -99) && static_cast<int>(p->state) != a.new_state)
21331  {
21332  auto & db = m->get_db();
21333  db.update_state(p->state_prev, a.new_state);
21334 
21335  if (p->virus)
21336  db.update_virus(
21337  p->virus->get_id(),
21338  p->state_prev,
21339  a.new_state
21340  );
21341  }
21342 
21343  m->get_db().today_tool[p->tools.back()->get_id()][
21344  a.new_state != -99 ? a.new_state : p->state
21345  ]++;
21346 
21347 
21348 }
21349 
21350 template<typename TSeq>
21351 inline void default_rm_virus(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * model)
21352 {
21353 
21354  Agent<TSeq> * p = a.agent;
21355  VirusPtr<TSeq> & v = a.virus;
21356 
21357  // Calling the virus action over the removed virus
21358  v->post_recovery(model);
21359 
21360  p->virus = nullptr;
21361 
21362  // Change of state needs to be recorded and updated on the
21363  // tools.
21364  if ((a.new_state != -99) && (static_cast<int>(p->state) != a.new_state))
21365  {
21366  auto & db = model->get_db();
21367  db.update_state(p->state_prev, a.new_state);
21368 
21369  for (size_t i = 0u; i < p->n_tools; ++i)
21370  db.update_tool(
21371  p->tools[i]->get_id(),
21372  p->state_prev,
21373  a.new_state
21374  );
21375  }
21376 
21377  // The counters of the virus only needs to decrease.
21378  // We use the previous state of the agent as that was
21379  // the state when the virus was added.
21380  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
21381  model->get_db().today_virus.at(v->get_id()).at(p->state_prev)--;
21382  #else
21383  model->get_db().today_virus[v->get_id()][p->state_prev]--;
21384  #endif
21385 
21386 
21387  return;
21388 
21389 }
21390 
21391 template<typename TSeq>
21392 inline void default_rm_tool(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m)
21393 {
21394 
21395  Agent<TSeq> * p = a.agent;
21396  ToolPtr<TSeq> & t = a.agent->tools[a.tool->pos_in_agent];
21397 
21398  if (--p->n_tools > 0)
21399  {
21400  p->tools[p->n_tools]->pos_in_agent = t->pos_in_agent;
21401  std::swap(
21402  p->tools[t->pos_in_agent],
21403  p->tools[p->n_tools]
21404  );
21405  }
21406 
21407  // Change of state needs to be recorded and updated on the
21408  // tools.
21409  if ((a.new_state != -99) && (static_cast<int>(p->state) != a.new_state))
21410  {
21411  auto & db = m->get_db();
21412  db.update_state(p->state_prev, a.new_state);
21413 
21414  if (p->virus)
21415  db.update_virus(
21416  p->virus->get_id(),
21417  p->state_prev,
21418  a.new_state
21419  );
21420  }
21421 
21422  // Lastly, we increase the daily count of the tool.
21423  // Like rm_virus, we use the previous state of the agent
21424  // as that was the state when the tool was added.
21425  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
21426  m->get_db().today_tool.at(t->get_id()).at(p->state_prev)--;
21427  #else
21428  m->get_db().today_tool[t->get_id()][p->state_prev]--;
21429  #endif
21430 
21431  return;
21432 
21433 }
21434 
21435 template<typename TSeq>
21436 inline void default_change_state(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m)
21437 {
21438 
21439  Agent<TSeq> * p = a.agent;
21440 
21441  if ((a.new_state != -99) && (static_cast<int>(p->state) != a.new_state))
21442  {
21443  auto & db = m->get_db();
21444  db.update_state(p->state_prev, a.new_state);
21445 
21446  if (p->virus)
21447  db.update_virus(
21448  p->virus->get_id(), p->state_prev, a.new_state
21449  );
21450 
21451  for (size_t i = 0u; i < p->n_tools; ++i)
21452  db.update_tool(
21453  p->tools[i]->get_id(),
21454  p->state_prev,
21455  a.new_state
21456  );
21457 
21458  }
21459 
21460 }
21461 
21462 template<typename TSeq>
21463 inline void default_add_entity(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> *)
21464 {
21465 
21466  Agent<TSeq> * p = a.agent;
21467  Entity<TSeq> * e = a.entity;
21468 
21469  // Checking the agent and the entity are not linked
21470  if ((p->get_n_entities() > 0) && (e->size() > 0))
21471  {
21472 
21473  if (p->get_n_entities() > e->size()) // Slower search through the agent
21474  {
21475  for (size_t i = 0u; i < e->size(); ++i)
21476  if(static_cast<int>(e->operator[](i)) == p->get_id())
21477  throw std::logic_error("An entity cannot be reassigned to an agent.");
21478  }
21479  else // Slower search through the entity
21480  {
21481  for (size_t i = 0u; i < p->get_n_entities(); ++i)
21482  if(p->get_entity(i).get_id() == e->get_id())
21483  throw std::logic_error("An entity cannot be reassigned to an agent.");
21484  }
21485 
21486  // It means that agent and entity were not associated.
21487  }
21488 
21489  // Adding the entity to the agent
21490  if (++p->n_entities <= p->entities.size())
21491  {
21492 
21493  p->entities[p->n_entities - 1] = e->get_id();
21494  p->entities_locations[p->n_entities - 1] = e->n_agents;
21495 
21496  } else
21497  {
21498  p->entities.push_back(e->get_id());
21499  p->entities_locations.push_back(e->n_agents);
21500  }
21501 
21502  // Adding the agent to the entity
21503  // Adding the entity to the agent
21504  if (++e->n_agents <= e->agents.size())
21505  {
21506 
21507  e->agents[e->n_agents - 1] = p->get_id();
21508  // Adjusted by '-1' since the list of entities in the agent just grew.
21509  e->agents_location[e->n_agents - 1] = p->n_entities - 1;
21510 
21511  } else
21512  {
21513  e->agents.push_back(p->get_id());
21514  e->agents_location.push_back(p->n_entities - 1);
21515  }
21516 
21517  // Today was the last modification
21518  // e->date_last_add_or_remove = m->today();
21519 
21520 }
21521 
21522 template<typename TSeq>
21523 inline void default_rm_entity(Event<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m)
21524 {
21525 
21526  Agent<TSeq> * p = a.agent;
21527  Entity<TSeq> * e = a.entity;
21528  size_t idx_agent_in_entity = a.idx_agent;
21529  size_t idx_entity_in_agent = a.idx_object;
21530 
21531  if (--p->n_entities > 0)
21532  {
21533 
21534  // When we move the end entity to the new location, the
21535  // moved entity needs to reflect the change, i.e., where the
21536  // entity will now be located in the agent
21537  size_t agent_location_in_last_entity =
21538  p->entities_locations[p->n_entities];
21539 
21540  Entity<TSeq> * last_entity =
21541  &m->get_entity(p->entities[p->n_entities]); ///< Last entity of the agent
21542 
21543  // The end entity will be located where the removed was
21544  last_entity->agents_location[agent_location_in_last_entity] =
21545  idx_entity_in_agent;
21546 
21547  // We now make the swap
21548  std::swap(
21549  p->entities[p->n_entities],
21550  p->entities[idx_entity_in_agent]
21551  );
21552 
21553  }
21554 
21555  if (--e->n_agents > 0)
21556  {
21557 
21558  // When we move the end agent to the new location, the
21559  // moved agent needs to reflect the change, i.e., where the
21560  // agent will now be located in the entity
21561  size_t entity_location_in_last_agent = e->agents_location[e->n_agents];
21562 
21563  Agent<TSeq> * last_agent =
21564  &m->get_agents()[e->agents[e->n_agents]]; ///< Last agent of the entity
21565 
21566  // The end entity will be located where the removed was
21567  last_agent->entities_locations[entity_location_in_last_agent] =
21568  idx_agent_in_entity;
21569 
21570  // We now make the swap
21571  std::swap(
21572  e->agents[e->n_agents],
21573  e->agents[idx_agent_in_entity]
21574  );
21575 
21576  }
21577 
21578  // Setting the date of the last removal
21579  // e->date_last_add_or_remove = m->today();
21580 
21581  return;
21582 
21583 };
21584 
21585 #endif
21586 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
21588 
21589  End of -include/epiworld//agent-events-meat.hpp-
21590 
21593 
21594 
21595 
21596 // To large to add directly here
21597 
21598 template<typename TSeq>
21599 inline Agent<TSeq>::Agent() {}
21600 
21601 template<typename TSeq>
21602 inline Agent<TSeq>::Agent(Agent<TSeq> && p) :
21603  model(p.model),
21604  neighbors(std::move(p.neighbors)),
21605  neighbors_locations(std::move(p.neighbors_locations)),
21606  n_neighbors(p.n_neighbors),
21607  entities(std::move(p.entities)),
21608  entities_locations(std::move(p.entities_locations)),
21609  n_entities(p.n_entities),
21610  state(p.state),
21611  state_prev(p.state_prev),
21612  state_last_changed(p.state_last_changed),
21613  id(p.id),
21614  tools(std::move(p.tools)), /// Needs to be adjusted
21615  n_tools(p.n_tools)
21616 {
21617 
21618  state = p.state;
21619  id = p.id;
21620 
21621  // Dealing with the virus
21622  if (p.virus != nullptr)
21623  {
21624  virus = std::move(p.virus);
21625  virus->set_agent(this);
21626  }
21627 
21628  int loc = 0;
21629  for (auto & t : tools)
21630  {
21631 
21632  // Will create a copy of the virus, with the exeption of
21633  // the virus code
21634  t->agent = this;
21635  t->pos_in_agent = loc++;
21636 
21637  }
21638 
21639 }
21640 
21641 template<typename TSeq>
21642 inline Agent<TSeq>::Agent(const Agent<TSeq> & p) :
21643  model(p.model),
21644  neighbors(nullptr),
21645  neighbors_locations(nullptr),
21646  n_neighbors(p.n_neighbors),
21647  entities(p.entities),
21648  entities_locations(p.entities_locations),
21649  n_entities(p.n_entities)
21650 {
21651 
21652  if (n_neighbors > 0u)
21653  {
21654  neighbors = new std::vector< size_t >(*p.neighbors);
21655  neighbors_locations = new std::vector< size_t >(*p.neighbors_locations);
21656  }
21657 
21658  state = p.state;
21659  id = p.id;
21660 
21661  // Dealing with the virus
21662  if (p.virus != nullptr)
21663  {
21664  virus = std::make_shared<Virus<TSeq>>(*p.virus);
21665  virus->set_agent(this);
21666  }
21667 
21668 
21669  tools.reserve(p.get_n_tools());
21670  n_tools = tools.size();
21671  for (size_t i = 0u; i < n_tools; ++i)
21672  {
21673 
21674  // Will create a copy of the virus, with the exeption of
21675  // the virus code
21676  tools.emplace_back(std::make_shared<Tool<TSeq>>(*p.tools[i]));
21677  tools.back()->set_agent(this, i);
21678 
21679  }
21680 
21681 }
21682 
21683 template<typename TSeq>
21684 inline Agent<TSeq> & Agent<TSeq>::operator=(
21685  const Agent<TSeq> & other_agent
21686 )
21687 {
21688 
21689  model = other_agent.model;
21690 
21691  n_neighbors = other_agent.n_neighbors;
21692  if (neighbors != nullptr)
21693  {
21694  delete neighbors;
21695  delete neighbors_locations;
21696  }
21697 
21698  if (other_agent.n_neighbors > 0u)
21699  {
21700  neighbors = new std::vector< size_t >(*other_agent.neighbors);
21701  neighbors_locations = new std::vector< size_t >(*other_agent.neighbors_locations);
21702  }
21703  else
21704  {
21705  neighbors = nullptr;
21706  neighbors_locations = nullptr;
21707  }
21708 
21709  entities = other_agent.entities;
21710  entities_locations = other_agent.entities_locations;
21711  n_entities = other_agent.n_entities;
21712 
21713  state = other_agent.state;
21714  state_prev = other_agent.state_prev;
21715  state_last_changed = other_agent.state_last_changed;
21716  id = other_agent.id;
21717 
21718  if (other_agent.virus != nullptr)
21719  {
21720  virus = std::make_shared<Virus<TSeq>>(*other_agent.virus);
21721  virus->set_agent(this);
21722  } else
21723  virus = nullptr;
21724 
21725  n_tools = other_agent.n_tools;
21726  for (size_t i = 0u; i < n_tools; ++i)
21727  {
21728  tools[i] = std::make_shared<Tool<TSeq>>(*other_agent.tools[i]);
21729  tools[i]->set_agent(this, i);
21730  }
21731 
21732  return *this;
21733 
21734 }
21735 
21736 template<typename TSeq>
21737 inline Agent<TSeq>::~Agent()
21738 {
21739 
21740  if (neighbors != nullptr)
21741  {
21742  delete neighbors;
21743  delete neighbors_locations;
21744  }
21745 
21746 }
21747 
21748 template<typename TSeq>
21749 inline void Agent<TSeq>::add_tool(
21750  ToolPtr<TSeq> & tool,
21751  Model<TSeq> * model,
21752  epiworld_fast_int state_new,
21753  epiworld_fast_int queue
21754 ) {
21755 
21756  // Checking the virus exists
21757  if (tool->get_id() >= static_cast<int>(model->get_db().get_n_tools()))
21758  throw std::range_error("The tool with id: " + std::to_string(tool->get_id()) +
21759  " has not been registered. There are only " + std::to_string(model->get_n_tools()) +
21760  " included in the model.");
21761 
21762  model->events_add(
21763  this, nullptr, tool, nullptr, state_new, queue, default_add_tool<TSeq>, -1, -1
21764  );
21765 
21766 }
21767 
21768 template<typename TSeq>
21769 inline void Agent<TSeq>::add_tool(
21770  const Tool<TSeq> & tool,
21771  Model<TSeq> * model,
21772  epiworld_fast_int state_new,
21773  epiworld_fast_int queue
21774 )
21775 {
21776  ToolPtr<TSeq> tool_ptr = std::make_shared< Tool<TSeq> >(tool);
21777  add_tool(tool_ptr, model, state_new, queue);
21778 }
21779 
21780 template<typename TSeq>
21781 inline void Agent<TSeq>::set_virus(
21782  VirusPtr<TSeq> & virus,
21783  Model<TSeq> * model,
21784  epiworld_fast_int state_new,
21785  epiworld_fast_int queue
21786 )
21787 {
21788 
21789  // Checking the virus exists
21790  if (virus->get_id() >= static_cast<int>(model->get_db().get_n_viruses()))
21791  throw std::range_error("The virus with id: " + std::to_string(virus->get_id()) +
21792  " has not been registered. There are only " + std::to_string(model->get_n_viruses()) +
21793  " included in the model.");
21794 
21795  if (state_new == -99)
21796  virus->get_state(&state_new, nullptr, nullptr);
21797 
21798  if (queue == -99)
21799  virus->get_queue(&queue, nullptr, nullptr);
21800 
21801  model->events_add(
21802  this, virus, nullptr, nullptr, state_new, queue, default_add_virus<TSeq>, -1, -1
21803  );
21804 
21805 }
21806 
21807 template<typename TSeq>
21808 inline void Agent<TSeq>::set_virus(
21809  const Virus<TSeq> & virus,
21810  Model<TSeq> * model,
21811  epiworld_fast_int state_new,
21812  epiworld_fast_int queue
21813 )
21814 {
21815  VirusPtr<TSeq> virus_ptr = std::make_shared< Virus<TSeq> >(virus);
21816  set_virus(virus_ptr, model, state_new, queue);
21817 }
21818 
21819 template<typename TSeq>
21820 inline void Agent<TSeq>::add_entity(
21821  Entity<TSeq> & entity,
21822  Model<TSeq> * model,
21823  epiworld_fast_int state_new,
21824  epiworld_fast_int queue
21825 )
21826 {
21827 
21828  if (model != nullptr)
21829  {
21830 
21831  model->events_add(
21832  this, nullptr, nullptr, &entity, state_new, queue, default_add_entity<TSeq>, -1, -1
21833  );
21834 
21835  }
21836  else // If no model is passed, then we assume that we only need to add the
21837  // model entity
21838  {
21839 
21840  auto nullvirus = VirusPtr<TSeq>(nullptr);
21841  auto nulltool = ToolPtr<TSeq>(nullptr);
21842  auto call = EventFun<TSeq>(default_add_entity<TSeq>);
21843 
21844  Event<TSeq> a(
21845  this,
21846  nullvirus,
21847  nulltool,
21848  &entity, state_new, queue,
21849  call,
21850  -1, -1
21851  );
21852 
21853  default_add_entity(a, model); /* passing model makes nothing */
21854 
21855  }
21856 
21857 }
21858 
21859 template<typename TSeq>
21860 inline void Agent<TSeq>::rm_tool(
21861  epiworld_fast_uint tool_idx,
21862  Model<TSeq> * model,
21863  epiworld_fast_int state_new,
21864  epiworld_fast_int queue
21865 )
21866 {
21867 
21868  if (tool_idx >= n_tools)
21869  throw std::range_error(
21870  "The Tool you want to remove is out of range. This Agent only has " +
21871  std::to_string(n_tools) + " tools."
21872  );
21873 
21874  model->events_add(
21875  this, nullptr, tools[tool_idx], nullptr, state_new, queue, default_rm_tool<TSeq>, -1, -1
21876  );
21877 
21878 }
21879 
21880 template<typename TSeq>
21881 inline void Agent<TSeq>::rm_tool(
21882  ToolPtr<TSeq> & tool,
21883  Model<TSeq> * model,
21884  epiworld_fast_int state_new,
21885  epiworld_fast_int queue
21886 )
21887 {
21888 
21889  if (tool->agent != this)
21890  throw std::logic_error("Cannot remove a virus from another agent!");
21891 
21892  model->events_add(
21893  this, nullptr, tool, nullptr, state_new, queue, default_rm_tool<TSeq>, -1, -1
21894  );
21895 
21896 }
21897 
21898 template<typename TSeq>
21899 inline void Agent<TSeq>::rm_virus(
21900  Model<TSeq> * model,
21901  epiworld_fast_int state_new,
21902  epiworld_fast_int queue
21903 )
21904 {
21905 
21906  if (virus == nullptr)
21907  throw std::logic_error(
21908  "There is no virus to remove here!"
21909  );
21910 
21911  if (state_new == -99)
21912  virus->get_state(nullptr, &state_new, nullptr);
21913 
21914  if (queue == -99)
21915  virus->get_queue(nullptr, &queue, nullptr);
21916 
21917  model->events_add(
21918  this, virus, nullptr, nullptr,
21919  state_new,
21920  queue,
21921  default_rm_virus<TSeq>, -1, -1
21922  );
21923 
21924 }
21925 
21926 template<typename TSeq>
21927 inline void Agent<TSeq>::rm_entity(
21928  epiworld_fast_uint entity_idx,
21929  Model<TSeq> * model,
21930  epiworld_fast_int state_new,
21931  epiworld_fast_int queue
21932 )
21933 {
21934 
21935  if (entity_idx >= n_entities)
21936  throw std::range_error(
21937  "The Entity you want to remove is out of range. This Agent only has " +
21938  std::to_string(n_entities) + " entitites."
21939  );
21940  else if (n_entities == 0u)
21941  throw std::logic_error(
21942  "There is entity to remove here!"
21943  );
21944 
21945  model->events_add(
21946  this,
21947  nullptr,
21948  nullptr,
21949  &model->get_entity(entity_idx),
21950  state_new,
21951  queue,
21952  default_rm_entity<TSeq>,
21953  entities_locations[entity_idx],
21954  entity_idx
21955  );
21956 }
21957 
21958 template<typename TSeq>
21959 inline void Agent<TSeq>::rm_entity(
21960  Entity<TSeq> & entity,
21961  Model<TSeq> * model,
21962  epiworld_fast_int state_new,
21963  epiworld_fast_int queue
21964 )
21965 {
21966 
21967  // Looking for entity location in the agent
21968  int entity_idx = -1;
21969  for (size_t i = 0u; i < n_entities; ++i)
21970  {
21971  if (static_cast<int>(entities[i]) == entity.get_id())
21972  {
21973  entity_idx = i;
21974  break;
21975  }
21976  }
21977 
21978  if (entity_idx == -1)
21979  throw std::logic_error(
21980  std::string("The agent ") +
21981  std::to_string(id) +
21982  std::string(" is not associated with entity \"") +
21983  entity.get_name() +
21984  std::string("\".")
21985  );
21986 
21987  model->events_add(
21988  this,
21989  nullptr,
21990  nullptr,
21991  &model->entities[entity.get_id()],
21992  state_new,
21993  queue,
21994  default_rm_entity<TSeq>,
21995  entities_locations[entity_idx],
21996  entity_idx
21997  );
21998 }
21999 
22000 template<typename TSeq>
22001 inline void Agent<TSeq>::rm_agent_by_virus(
22002  Model<TSeq> * model
22003 )
22004 {
22005 
22006  model->events_add(
22007  this, virus, nullptr, nullptr,
22008  virus->state_removed,
22009  virus->queue_removed,
22010  default_rm_virus<TSeq>, -1, -1
22011  );
22012 
22013 }
22014 
22015 template<typename TSeq>
22016 inline epiworld_double Agent<TSeq>::get_susceptibility_reduction(
22017  VirusPtr<TSeq> v,
22018  Model<TSeq> * model
22019 ) {
22020 
22021  return model->susceptibility_reduction_mixer(this, v, model);
22022 }
22023

22025 inline epiworld_double Agent<TSeq>::get_transmission_reduction(
22026  VirusPtr<TSeq> v,
22027  Model<TSeq> * model
22028 ) {
22029  return model->transmission_reduction_mixer(this, v, model);
22030 }

22033 inline epiworld_double Agent<TSeq>::get_recovery_enhancer(
22034  VirusPtr<TSeq> v,
22035  Model<TSeq> * model
22036 ) {
22037  return model->recovery_enhancer_mixer(this, v, model);
22038 }
22039 
22040 template<typename TSeq>
22041 inline epiworld_double Agent<TSeq>::get_death_reduction(
22042  VirusPtr<TSeq> v,
22043  Model<TSeq> * model
22044 ) {
22045  return model->death_reduction_mixer(this, v, model);
22046 }
22047 
22048 template<typename TSeq>
22049 inline int Agent<TSeq>::get_id() const
22050 {
22051  return id;
22052 }
22053 
22054 template<typename TSeq>
22055 inline VirusPtr<TSeq> & Agent<TSeq>::get_virus() {
22056  return virus;
22057 }
22058 
22059 template<typename TSeq>
22060 inline const VirusPtr<TSeq> & Agent<TSeq>::get_virus() const {
22061  return virus;
22062 }

22065 template<typename TSeq>
22066 inline Tools<TSeq> Agent<TSeq>::get_tools() {
22067  return Tools<TSeq>(*this);
22068 }
22069
