22071 inline const Tools_const<TSeq> Agent<TSeq>::get_tools() const {
22072  return Tools_const<TSeq>(*this);
22073 }
22074 
22075 template<typename TSeq>
22076 inline ToolPtr<TSeq> & Agent<TSeq>::get_tool(int i)
22077 {
22078  return tools.at(i);
22079 }
22080 
22081 template<typename TSeq>
22082 inline size_t Agent<TSeq>::get_n_tools() const noexcept
22083 {
22084  return n_tools;
22085 }
22086 
22087 template<typename TSeq>
22088 inline void Agent<TSeq>::mutate_virus()
22089 {
22090 
22091  virus->mutate();
22092 
22093 }
22094 
22095 template<typename TSeq>
22096 inline void Agent<TSeq>::add_neighbor(
22097  Agent<TSeq> & p,
22098  bool check_source,
22099  bool check_target
22100 ) {
22101  // Can we find the neighbor?
22102  bool found = false;
22103 
22104  if (neighbors == nullptr)
22105  {
22106  neighbors = new std::vector< size_t >();
22107  neighbors_locations = new std::vector< size_t >();
22108  }
22109 
22110  if (check_source && neighbors)
22111  {
22112 
22113  for (auto & n: *neighbors)
22114  if (static_cast<int>(n) == p.get_id())
22115  {
22116  found = true;
22117  break;
22118  }
22119 
22120  }
22121 
22122  // Three things going on here:
22123  // - Where in the neighbor will this be
22124  // - What is the neighbor's id
22125  // - Increasing the number of neighbors
22126  if (!found)
22127  {
22128 
22129  neighbors_locations->push_back(p.get_n_neighbors());
22130  neighbors->push_back(p.get_id());
22131  n_neighbors++;
22132 
22133  }
22134 
22135 
22136  found = false;
22137  if (check_target && p.neighbors)
22138  {
22139 
22140  for (auto & n: *p.neighbors)
22141  if (static_cast<int>(n) == id)
22142  {
22143  found = true;
22144  break;
22145  }
22146 
22147  }
22148 
22149  if (!found)
22150  {
22151 
22152  if (p.neighbors == nullptr)
22153  {
22154  p.neighbors = new std::vector< size_t >();
22155  p.neighbors_locations = new std::vector< size_t >();
22156  }
22157 
22158  p.neighbors_locations->push_back(n_neighbors - 1);
22159  p.neighbors->push_back(id);
22160  p.n_neighbors++;
22161 
22162  }
22163 
22164 
22165 }
22166 
22167 template<typename TSeq>
22168 inline void Agent<TSeq>::swap_neighbors(
22169  Agent<TSeq> & other,
22170  size_t n_this,
22171  size_t n_other
22172 )
22173 {
22174 
22175  if (n_this >= n_neighbors)
22176  throw std::range_error(
22177  "The neighbor you want to swap is out of range. This Agent only has " +
22178  std::to_string(n_neighbors) + " neighbors."
22179  );
22180  if (n_other >= other.n_neighbors)
22181  throw std::range_error(
22182  "The neighbor you want to swap is out of range. This Agent only has " +
22183  std::to_string(other.n_neighbors) + " neighbors."
22184  );
22185 
22186  // Getting the agents
22187  auto & pop = model->population;
22188  auto & neigh_this = pop[(*neighbors)[n_this]];
22189  auto & neigh_other = pop[(*other.neighbors)[n_other]];
22190 
22191  // Getting the locations in the neighbors
22192  size_t loc_this_in_neigh = (*neighbors_locations)[n_this];
22193  size_t loc_other_in_neigh = (*other.neighbors_locations)[n_other];
22194 
22195  // Changing ids
22196  std::swap((*neighbors)[n_this], (*other.neighbors)[n_other]);
22197 
22198  if (!model->directed)
22199  {
22200  std::swap(
22201  (*neigh_this.neighbors)[loc_this_in_neigh],
22202  (*neigh_other.neighbors)[loc_other_in_neigh]
22203  );
22204 
22205  // Changing the locations
22206  std::swap((*neighbors_locations)[n_this], (*other.neighbors_locations)[n_other]);
22207 
22208  std::swap(
22209  (*neigh_this.neighbors_locations)[loc_this_in_neigh],
22210  (*neigh_other.neighbors_locations)[loc_other_in_neigh]
22211  );
22212  }
22213 
22214 }
22215 
22216 template<typename TSeq>
22217 inline std::vector< Agent<TSeq> *> Agent<TSeq>::get_neighbors()
22218 {
22219  std::vector< Agent<TSeq> * > res(n_neighbors, nullptr);
22220  for (size_t i = 0u; i < n_neighbors; ++i)
22221  res[i] = &model->population[(*neighbors)[i]];
22222 
22223  return res;
22224 }
22225 
22226 template<typename TSeq>
22227 inline size_t Agent<TSeq>::get_n_neighbors() const
22228 {
22229  return n_neighbors;
22230 }
22231 
22232 template<typename TSeq>
22233 inline void Agent<TSeq>::change_state(
22234  Model<TSeq> * model,
22235  epiworld_fast_uint new_state,
22236  epiworld_fast_int queue
22237  )
22238 {
22239 
22240  model->events_add(
22241  this, nullptr, nullptr, nullptr, new_state, queue,
22242  default_change_state<TSeq>, -1, -1
22243  );
22244 
22245  return;
22246 
22247 }
22248 
22249 template<typename TSeq>
22250 inline const unsigned int & Agent<TSeq>::get_state() const {
22251  return state;
22252 }
22253 
22254 template<typename TSeq>
22255 inline void Agent<TSeq>::reset()
22256 {
22257 
22258  this->virus = nullptr;
22259 
22260  this->tools.clear();
22261  n_tools = 0u;
22262 
22263  this->entities.clear();
22264  this->entities_locations.clear();
22265  this->n_entities = 0u;
22266 
22267  this->state = 0u;
22268  this->state_prev = 0u;
22269 
22270  this->state_last_changed = -1;
22271 
22272 }
22273 
22274 template<typename TSeq>
22275 inline bool Agent<TSeq>::has_tool(epiworld_fast_uint t) const
22276 {
22277 
22278  for (auto & tool : tools)
22279  if (tool->get_id() == static_cast<int>(t))
22280  return true;
22281 
22282  return false;
22283 
22284 }
22285 
22286 template<typename TSeq>
22287 inline bool Agent<TSeq>::has_tool(std::string name) const
22288 {
22289 
22290  for (auto & tool : tools)
22291  if (tool->get_name() == name)
22292  return true;
22293 
22294  return false;
22295 
22296 }
22297 
22298 template<typename TSeq>
22299 inline bool Agent<TSeq>::has_tool(const Tool<TSeq> & tool) const
22300 {
22301 
22302  return has_tool(tool.get_id());
22303 
22304 }
22305 
22306 template<typename TSeq>
22307 inline bool Agent<TSeq>::has_virus(epiworld_fast_uint t) const
22308 {
22309  if (virus->get_id() == static_cast<int>(t))
22310  return true;
22311 
22312  return false;
22313 }
22314 
22315 template<typename TSeq>
22316 inline bool Agent<TSeq>::has_virus(std::string name) const
22317 {
22318 
22319  if (virus->get_name() == name)
22320  return true;
22321 
22322  return false;
22323 
22324 }
22325 
22326 template<typename TSeq>
22327 inline bool Agent<TSeq>::has_virus(const Virus<TSeq> & virus) const
22328 {
22329 
22330  return has_virus(virus.get_id());
22331 
22332 }
22333 
22334 template<typename TSeq>
22335 inline bool Agent<TSeq>::has_entity(epiworld_fast_uint t) const
22336 {
22337 
22338  for (auto & entity : entities)
22339  if (entity == t)
22340  return true;
22341 
22342  return false;
22343 
22344 }
22345 
22346 template<typename TSeq>
22347 inline bool Agent<TSeq>::has_entity(std::string name) const
22348 {
22349 
22350  for (auto & entity : entities)
22351  if (model->get_entity(entity).get_name() == name)
22352  return true;
22353 
22354  return false;
22355 
22356 }
22357 
22358 template<typename TSeq>
22359 inline void Agent<TSeq>::print(
22360  bool compressed
22361  ) const
22362 {
22363 
22364  if (compressed)
22365  {
22366  printf_epiworld(
22367  "Agent: %i, state: %s (%i), Has virus: %s, NTools: %ii NNeigh: %i\n",
22368  static_cast<int>(id),
22369  model->states_labels[state].c_str(),
22370  static_cast<int>(state),
22371  virus == nullptr ? std::string("no").c_str() : std::string("yes").c_str(),
22372  static_cast<int>(n_tools),
22373  static_cast<int>(n_neighbors)
22374  );
22375  }
22376  else {
22377 
22378  printf_epiworld("Information about agent id %i\n",
22379  static_cast<int>(this->id));
22380  printf_epiworld(" State : %s (%i)\n",
22381  model->states_labels[state].c_str(), static_cast<int>(state));
22382  printf_epiworld(" Has virus : %s\n", virus == nullptr ?
22383  std::string("no").c_str() : std::string("yes").c_str());
22384  printf_epiworld(" Tool count : %i\n", static_cast<int>(n_tools));
22385  printf_epiworld(" Neigh. count : %i\n", static_cast<int>(n_neighbors));
22386 
22387  size_t nfeats = model->get_agents_data_ncols();
22388  if (nfeats > 0)
22389  {
22390 
22391  printf_epiworld(
22392  "This model includes features (%i): [ ",
22393  static_cast<int>(nfeats)
22394  );
22395 
22396  int max_to_show = static_cast<int>((nfeats > 10)? 10 : nfeats);
22397 
22398  for (int k = 0; k < max_to_show; ++k)
22399  {
22400  printf_epiworld("%.2f", this->operator[](k));
22401 
22402  if (k != (max_to_show - 1))
22403  {
22404  printf_epiworld(", ");
22405  } else {
22406  printf_epiworld(" ]\n");
22407  }
22408 
22409  }
22410 
22411  }
22412 
22413  }
22414 
22415  return;
22416 
22417 }
22418 
22419 template<typename TSeq>
22420 inline double & Agent<TSeq>::operator()(size_t j)
22421 {
22422 
22423  if (model->agents_data_ncols <= j)
22424  throw std::logic_error("The requested feature of the agent is out of range.");
22425 
22426  return *(model->agents_data + j * model->size() + id);
22427 
22428 }
22429 
22430 template<typename TSeq>
22431 inline double & Agent<TSeq>::operator[](size_t j)
22432 {
22433  return *(model->agents_data + j * model->size() + id);
22434 }
22435 
22436 template<typename TSeq>
22437 inline double Agent<TSeq>::operator()(size_t j) const
22438 {
22439 
22440  if (model->agents_data_ncols <= j)
22441  throw std::logic_error("The requested feature of the agent is out of range.");
22442 
22443  return *(model->agents_data + j * model->size() + id);
22444 
22445 }
22446 
22447 template<typename TSeq>
22448 inline double Agent<TSeq>::operator[](size_t j) const
22449 {
22450  return *(model->agents_data + j * model->size() + id);
22451 }
22452 
22453 template<typename TSeq>
22454 inline Entities<TSeq> Agent<TSeq>::get_entities()
22455 {
22456  return Entities<TSeq>(*this);
22457 }
22458 
22459 template<typename TSeq>
22460 inline const Entities_const<TSeq> Agent<TSeq>::get_entities() const
22461 {
22462  return Entities_const<TSeq>(*this);
22463 }
22464 
22465 template<typename TSeq>
22466 inline const Entity<TSeq> & Agent<TSeq>::get_entity(size_t i) const
22467 {
22468  if (n_entities == 0)
22469  throw std::range_error("Agent id " + std::to_string(id) + " has no entities.");
22470 
22471  if (i >= n_entities)
22472  throw std::range_error("Trying to get to an agent's entity outside of the range.");
22473 
22474  return model->get_entity(entities[i]);
22475 }
22476 
22477 template<typename TSeq>
22478 inline Entity<TSeq> & Agent<TSeq>::get_entity(size_t i)
22479 {
22480  if (n_entities == 0)
22481  throw std::range_error("Agent id " + std::to_string(id) + " has no entities.");
22482 
22483  if (i >= n_entities)
22484  throw std::range_error("Trying to get to an agent's entity outside of the range.");
22485 
22486  return model->get_entity(entities[i]);
22487 }
22488 
22489 template<typename TSeq>
22490 inline size_t Agent<TSeq>::get_n_entities() const
22491 {
22492  return n_entities;
22493 }
22494 
22495 template<typename TSeq>
22496 inline bool Agent<TSeq>::operator==(const Agent<TSeq> & other) const
22497 {
22498 
22499  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
22500  n_neighbors != other.n_neighbors,
22501  "Agent:: n_eighbors don't match"
22502  )
22503 
22504 
22505  for (size_t i = 0u; i < n_neighbors; ++i)
22506  {
22507  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
22508  (*neighbors)[i] != (*other.neighbors)[i],
22509  "Agent:: neighbor[i] don't match"
22510  )
22511  }
22512 
22513  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
22514  n_entities != other.n_entities,
22515  "Agent:: n_entities don't match"
22516  )
22517 
22518 
22519  for (size_t i = 0u; i < n_entities; ++i)
22520  {
22521  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
22522  entities[i] != other.entities[i],
22523  "Agent:: entities[i] don't match"
22524  )
22525  }
22526 
22527  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
22528  state != other.state,
22529  "Agent:: state don't match"
22530  )
22531 
22532 
22533  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
22534  state_prev != other.state_prev,
22535  "Agent:: state_prev don't match"
22536  )
22537 
22538 
22539  // EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
22540  // state_last_changed != other.state_last_changed,
22541  // "Agent:: state_last_changed don't match"
22542  // ) ///< Last time the agent was updated.
22543 
22544  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
22545  ((virus == nullptr) && (other.virus != nullptr)) ||
22546  ((virus != nullptr) && (other.virus == nullptr)),
22547  "Agent:: virus don't match"
22548  )
22549 
22550  if ((virus != nullptr) && (other.virus != nullptr))
22551  {
22552  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
22553  *virus != *other.virus,
22554  "Agent:: virus doesn't match"
22555  )
22556  }
22557 
22558  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(n_tools != other.n_tools, "Agent:: n_tools don't match")
22559 
22560  for (size_t i = 0u; i < n_tools; ++i)
22561  {
22562 
22563  EPI_DEBUG_FAIL_AT_TRUE(
22564  tools[i] != other.tools[i],
22565  "Agent:: tools[i] don't match"
22566  )
22567 
22568  }
22569 
22570  return true;
22571 
22572 }
22573 
22574 #endif
22575 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
22577 
22578  End of -include/epiworld/agent-meat.hpp-
22579 
22582 
22583 
22584 
22585 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
22587 
22588  Start of -include/epiworld/agentssample-bones.hpp-
22589 
22592 
22593 
22594 #ifndef EPIWORLD_AGENTS_BONES_HPP
22595 #define EPIWORLD_AGENTS_BONES_HPP
22596 
22597 class SAMPLETYPE {
22598 public:
22599  static const int MODEL = 0;
22600  static const int ENTITY = 1;
22601  static const int AGENT = 2;
22602 };
22603 
22604 // template<typename TSeq>
22605 // class Agent;
22606 
22607 // template<typename TSeq>
22608 // class Model;
22609 
22610 // template<typename TSeq>
22611 // class Entity;
22612 
22620 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
22621 class AgentsSample {
22622 private:
22623 
22624  size_t sample_size = 0u;
22625 
22626  std::vector< Agent<TSeq>* >* agents = nullptr; ///< Pointer to sample of agents
22627  size_t * agents_n = nullptr; ///< Size of sample of agents
22628 
22629  std::vector< size_t >* agents_left = nullptr; ///< Pointer to agents left (iota)
22630  size_t * agents_left_n = nullptr; ///< Size of agents left
22631 
22632  Model<TSeq> * model = nullptr; ///< Extracts runif() and (if the case) population.
22633  Entity<TSeq> * entity = nullptr; ///
22634  Agent<TSeq> * agent = nullptr;
22635 
22636  int sample_type = SAMPLETYPE::AGENT;
22637  std::vector< size_t > states = {};
22638 
22639  void sample_n(size_t n); ///< Backbone function for sampling
22640 
22641 
22642 public:
22643 
22644  // Not available (for now)
22645  AgentsSample() = delete; ///< Default constructor
22646  AgentsSample(const AgentsSample<TSeq> & a) = delete; ///< Copy constructor
22647  AgentsSample(AgentsSample<TSeq> && a) = delete; ///< Move constructor
22648 
22649  AgentsSample(
22650  Model<TSeq> & model_, size_t n,
22651  std::vector< size_t > states_ = {},
22652  bool truncate = false
22653  );
22654 
22655  AgentsSample(
22656  Model<TSeq> * model,
22657  Entity<TSeq> & entity_,
22658  size_t n,
22659  std::vector< size_t > states_ = {},
22660  bool truncate = false
22661  );
22662 
22663  AgentsSample(
22664  Model<TSeq> * model,
22665  Agent<TSeq> & agent_,
22666  size_t n,
22667  std::vector< size_t > states_ = {},
22668  bool truncate = false
22669  );
22670 
22671  ~AgentsSample();
22672 
22673  typename std::vector< Agent<TSeq> * >::iterator begin();
22674  typename std::vector< Agent<TSeq> * >::iterator end();
22675 
22676  Agent<TSeq> * operator[](size_t n);
22677  Agent<TSeq> * operator()(size_t n);
22678  size_t size() const noexcept;
22679 
22680 };
22681 
22682 template<typename TSeq>
22683 inline AgentsSample<TSeq>::AgentsSample(
22684  Model<TSeq> & model_,
22685  size_t n,
22686  std::vector< size_t > states_,
22687  bool truncate
22688  ) {
22689 
22690  states = states_;
22691 
22692  if (truncate)
22693  {
22694 
22695  if (n > model_.size())
22696  n = model_.size();
22697 
22698  } else if (n > model_.size())
22699  throw std::logic_error(
22700  "There are only " + std::to_string(model_.size()) + " agents. You cannot " +
22701  "sample " + std::to_string(n));
22702 
22703  sample_size = n;
22704  model = &model_;
22705  sample_type = SAMPLETYPE::MODEL;
22706 
22707  agents = &model_.sampled_population;
22708  agents_n = &model_.sampled_population_n;
22709 
22710  agents_left = &model_.population_left;
22711  agents_left_n = &model_.population_left_n;
22712 
22713  sample_n(n);
22714 
22715  return;
22716 
22717 }
22718 
22719 template<typename TSeq>
22720 inline AgentsSample<TSeq>::AgentsSample(
22721  Model<TSeq> * model,
22722  Entity<TSeq> & entity_,
22723  size_t n,
22724  std::vector< size_t > states_,
22725  bool truncate
22726  ) {
22727 
22728  states = states_;
22729 
22730  if (truncate)
22731  {
22732 
22733  if (n > entity_.size())
22734  n = entity_.size();
22735 
22736  } else if (n > entity_.size())
22737  throw std::logic_error(
22738  "There are only " + std::to_string(entity_.size()) + " agents. You cannot " +
22739  "sample " + std::to_string(n));
22740 
22741  sample_size = n;
22742  model = &entity_.model;
22743  sample_type = SAMPLETYPE::ENTITY;
22744 
22745  agents = &entity_.sampled_agents;
22746  agents_n = &entity_.sampled_agents_n;
22747 
22748  agents_left = &entity_.sampled_agents_left;
22749  agents_left_n = &entity_.sampled_agents_left_n;
22750 
22751  sample_n(n);
22752 
22753  return;
22754 
22755 }
22756 
22769 template<typename TSeq>
22770 inline AgentsSample<TSeq>::AgentsSample(
22771  Model<TSeq> * model,
22772  Agent<TSeq> & agent_,
22773  size_t n,
22774  std::vector< size_t > states_,
22775  bool truncate
22776  )
22777 {
22778 
22779  states = states_;
22780  sample_type = SAMPLETYPE::AGENT;
22781 
22782  agent = &agent_;
22783 
22784  agents = &agent_.sampled_agents;
22785  agents_n = &agent_.sampled_agents_n;
22786 
22787  // Computing the cumulative sum of counts across entities
22788  size_t agents_in_entities = 0;
22789  Entities<TSeq> entities_a = agent->get_entities();
22790 
22791  std::vector< size_t > cum_agents_count(entities_a.size(), 0);
22792  int idx = -1;
22793  for (auto & e : entities_a)
22794  {
22795  if (++idx == 0)
22796  cum_agents_count[idx] = (e->size() - 1u);
22797  else
22798  cum_agents_count[idx] = (
22799  (e->size() - 1u) +
22800  cum_agents_count[idx - 1]
22801  );
22802 
22803  agents_in_entities += (e->size() - 1u);
22804  }
22805 
22806  if (truncate)
22807  {
22808 
22809  if (n > agents_in_entities)
22810  n = agents_in_entities;
22811 
22812  } else if (n > agents_in_entities)
22813  throw std::logic_error(
22814  "There are only " + std::to_string(agents_in_entities) +
22815  " agents. You cannot " +
22816  "sample " + std::to_string(n)
22817  );
22818 
22819  sample_size = n;
22820 
22821  if (agents->size() < n)
22822  agents->resize(n);
22823 
22824  size_t i_obs = 0u;
22825  for (size_t i = 0u; i < sample_size; ++i)
22826  {
22827 
22828  // Sampling a single agent from the set of entities
22829  int jth = std::floor(model->runif() * agents_in_entities);
22830  for (size_t e = 0u; e < cum_agents_count.size(); ++e)
22831  {
22832 
22833  // Are we in the limit?
22834  if (jth <= cum_agents_count[e])
22835  {
22836  size_t agent_idx = 0u;
22837  if (e == 0) // From the first group
22838  agent_idx = entities_a[e][jth]->get_id();
22839  else
22840  agent_idx = entities_a[e][jth - cum_agents_count[e - 1]]->get_id();
22841 
22842 
22843  // Checking if states was specified
22844  if (states.size())
22845  {
22846 
22847  // Getting the state
22848  size_t state = model->population[agent_idx].get_state();
22849 
22850  if (std::find(states.begin(), states.end(), state) != states.end())
22851  continue;
22852 
22853  }
22854 
22855  agents->operator[](i_obs++) = &(model->population[agent_idx]);
22856 
22857  break;
22858  }
22859 
22860  }
22861  }
22862 
22863  return;
22864 
22865 }
22866 
22867 template<typename TSeq>
22868 inline AgentsSample<TSeq>::~AgentsSample() {}
22869 
22870 template<typename TSeq>
22871 inline size_t AgentsSample<TSeq>::size() const noexcept
22872 {
22873  return this->sample_size;
22874 }
22875 
22876 template<typename TSeq>
22877 inline Agent<TSeq> * AgentsSample<TSeq>::operator[](size_t i)
22878 {
22879 
22880  return agents->operator[](i);
22881 
22882 }
22883 
22884 template<typename TSeq>
22885 inline Agent<TSeq> * AgentsSample<TSeq>::operator()(size_t i)
22886 {
22887 
22888  if (i >= this->sample_size)
22889  throw std::range_error("The requested agent is out of range.");
22890 
22891  return agents->operator[](i);
22892 
22893 }
22894 
22895 template<typename TSeq>
22896 inline typename std::vector< Agent<TSeq> * >::iterator AgentsSample<TSeq>::begin()
22897 {
22898 
22899  if (sample_size > 0u)
22900  return agents->begin();
22901  else
22902  return agents->end();
22903 
22904 }
22905 
22906 template<typename TSeq>
22907 inline typename std::vector< Agent<TSeq> * >::iterator AgentsSample<TSeq>::end()
22908 {
22909 
22910  return agents->begin() + sample_size;
22911 
22912 }
22913 
22914 template<typename TSeq>
22915 inline void AgentsSample<TSeq>::sample_n(size_t n)
22916 {
22917 
22918  // Reducing size
22919  if (states.size())
22920  {
22921 
22922  // Getting the number of agents left
22923  agents_left->clear();
22924 
22925  if (sample_type == SAMPLETYPE::MODEL)
22926  {
22927 
22928  // Making some room
22929  agents_left->reserve(model->size());
22930 
22931  // Iterating through the agents in the population
22932  for (size_t a_i = 0u; a_i < model->population.size(); ++a_i)
22933  {
22934 
22935  // If the agent is within the selected set of states,
22936  // then we add it to the list of agents left
22937  size_t s = model->population[a_i].get_state();
22938  if (std::find(states.begin(), states.end(), s) != states.end())
22939  agents_left->push_back(a_i);
22940 
22941  }
22942 
22943  }
22944  else if (sample_type == SAMPLETYPE::ENTITY)
22945  {
22946 
22947  // Making room
22948  agents_left->reserve(entity->size());
22949 
22950  // Iterating through the agents in the entity
22951  for (size_t a_i = 0u; a_i < entity->size(); ++a_i)
22952  {
22953  size_t s = model->population[entity->agents[a_i]].get_state();
22954  if (std::find(states.begin(), states.end(), s) != states.end())
22955  agents_left->push_back(a_i);
22956 
22957  }
22958 
22959  }
22960 
22961  } else {
22962 
22963  // Checking if the size of the entity has changed (or hasn't been initialized)
22964  if (sample_type == SAMPLETYPE::MODEL)
22965  {
22966 
22967  if (model->size() != agents_left->size())
22968  {
22969  agents_left->resize(model->size(), 0u);
22970  std::iota(agents_left->begin(), agents_left->end(), 0u);
22971  }
22972 
22973  } else if (sample_type == SAMPLETYPE::ENTITY) {
22974 
22975  if (entity->size() != agents_left->size())
22976  {
22977 
22978  agents_left->resize(entity->size(), 0u);
22979  std::iota(agents_left->begin(), agents_left->end(), 0u);
22980 
22981  }
22982 
22983  }
22984 
22985  }
22986 
22987  // Restart the counter of agents left
22988  *agents_left_n = agents_left->size();
22989 
22990  // Making sure we have enough room for the sample of agents
22991  if (agents->size() < sample_size)
22992  agents->resize(sample_size, nullptr);
22993 
22994  if (sample_type == SAMPLETYPE::MODEL)
22995  {
22996 
22997  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
22998  std::vector< bool > __sampled(model->size(), true);
22999  for (auto & a_i: *agents_left)
23000  __sampled[a_i] = false;
23001  #endif
23002 
23003  for (size_t i = 0u; i < n; ++i)
23004  {
23005 
23006  // Sampling from 0 to (agents_left_n - 1)
23007  size_t ith_ = static_cast<size_t>(model->runif() * ((*agents_left_n)--));
23008 
23009  // Getting the id of the agent and adding it to the list of agents
23010  size_t ith = agents_left->operator[](ith_);
23011  agents->operator[](i) = &model->population[ith];
23012 
23013  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
23014  if (__sampled[ith])
23015  throw std::logic_error("The same agent was sampled twice.");
23016  else
23017  __sampled[ith] = true;
23018  #endif
23019 
23020  // Updating list
23021  std::swap(
23022  agents_left->operator[](ith_),
23023  agents_left->operator[](*agents_left_n)
23024  );
23025 
23026  }
23027 
23028 
23029  }
23030  else if (sample_type == SAMPLETYPE::ENTITY)
23031  {
23032 
23033  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
23034  std::vector< bool > __sampled(entity->size(), true);
23035  for (auto & a_i: *agents_left)
23036  __sampled[a_i] = false;
23037  #endif
23038 
23039  for (size_t i = 0u; i < n; ++i)
23040  {
23041 
23042  size_t ith_ = static_cast<size_t>(model->runif() * ((*agents_left_n)--));
23043  size_t ith = agents_left->operator[](ith_);
23044  agents->operator[](i) = &model->population[entity->agents[ith]];
23045 
23046  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
23047  if (__sampled[ith])
23048  throw std::logic_error("The same agent was sampled twice.");
23049  else
23050  __sampled[ith] = true;
23051  #endif
23052 
23053  // Updating list
23054  std::swap(agents_left->operator[](ith_), agents_left->operator[](*agents_left_n));
23055 
23056  }
23057 
23058  }
23059 
23060  return;
23061 
23062 }
23063 
23064 #endif
23065 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
23067 
23068  End of -include/epiworld/agentssample-bones.hpp-
23069 
23072 
23073 
23074 
23075 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
23077 
23078  Start of -include/epiworld/models/models.hpp-
23079 
23082 
23083 
23084 #ifndef EPIWORLD_MODELS_HPP
23085 #define EPIWORLD_MODELS_HPP
23086 
23087 namespace epimodels {
23088 
23089 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
23091 
23092  Start of -include/epiworld//models/init-functions.hpp-
23093 
23096 
23097 
23098 #ifndef EPIWORLD_MODELS_INIT_FUNCTIONS_HPP
23099 #define EPIWORLD_MODELS_INIT_FUNCTIONS_HPP
23100 
23105 template<typename TSeq>
23106 inline std::function<void(Model<TSeq>*)> create_init_function_sir(
23107  std::vector< double > proportions_
23108 ) {
23109 
23110  // Checking widths
23111  if (proportions_.size() != 1u)
23112  throw std::invalid_argument(
23113  "The vector of proportions must have a single element."
23114  );
23115 
23116  // Proportion should be within [0, 1]
23117  if ((proportions_[0] < 0.0) || (proportions_[0] > 1.0))
23118  throw std::invalid_argument(
23119  "The proportion must be within (0, 1)."
23120  );
23121 
23122  double prop = proportions_[0u];
23123 
23124  std::function<void(Model<TSeq>*)> fun =
23125  [prop] (Model<TSeq> * model) -> void {
23126 
23127  // Figuring out information about the viruses
23128  double tot = 0.0;
23129  double n = static_cast<double>(model->size());
23130  for (const auto & agent: model->get_agents())
23131  {
23132  if (agent.get_virus() != nullptr)
23133  tot += 1.0;
23134  }
23135  tot /= n;
23136 
23137  // Putting the total into context
23138  double tot_left = 1.0 - tot;
23139 
23140  // Since susceptible and infected are "fixed,"
23141  // we only need to change recovered
23142  size_t nrecovered = prop * tot_left * n;
23143 
23144  AgentsSample<TSeq> sample(
23145  *model,
23146  nrecovered,
23147  {0u},
23148  true
23149  );
23150 
23151  // Setting up the initial states
23152  for (auto & agent : sample)
23153  agent->change_state(model, 2, Queue<TSeq>::NoOne);
23154 
23155  // Running the events
23156  model->events_run();
23157 
23158  return;
23159 
23160  };
23161 
23162  return fun;
23163 
23164 }
23165 
23170 template<typename TSeq>
23171 inline std::function<void(Model<TSeq>*)> create_init_function_sird(
23172  std::vector< double > prop
23173 ) {
23174 
23175  // Check length of prop equals two
23176  if (prop.size() != 2u)
23177  throw std::invalid_argument(
23178  "The vector of proportions must have two elements."
23179  );
23180 
23181  // Check elements in prop are within [0, 1] and sum up to 1
23182  double tot = 0.0;
23183  for (auto & v : prop)
23184  {
23185  if ((v < 0.0) || (v > 1.0))
23186  throw std::invalid_argument(
23187  "The proportion must be within (0, 1)."
23188  );
23189  tot += v;
23190  }
23191 
23192  if (tot >= 1.0)
23193  throw std::invalid_argument(
23194  "The proportions must sum up to 1."
23195  );
23196 
23197  std::function<void(Model<TSeq>*)> fun =
23198  [prop] (Model<TSeq> * model) -> void {
23199 
23200  // Figuring out information about the viruses
23201  double tot = 0.0;
23202  double n = static_cast<double>(model->size());
23203  for (const auto & agent: model->get_agents())
23204  {
23205  if (agent.get_virus() != nullptr)
23206  tot += 1.0;
23207  }
23208  tot /= n;
23209 
23210  // Putting the total into context
23211  double tot_left = 1.0 - tot;
23212 
23213  // Since susceptible and infected are "fixed,"
23214  // we only need to change recovered
23215  size_t nrecovered = prop[0u] * tot_left * n;
23216  size_t ndeceased = prop[01] * tot_left * n;
23217 
23218  AgentsSample<TSeq> sample_recover(
23219  *model,
23220  nrecovered,
23221  {0u},
23222  true
23223  );
23224 
23225  // Setting up the initial states
23226  for (auto & agent : sample_recover)
23227  agent->change_state(model, 2, Queue<TSeq>::NoOne);
23228 
23229  AgentsSample<TSeq> sample_deceased(
23230  *model,
23231  ndeceased,
23232  {0u},
23233  true
23234  );
23235 
23236  // Setting up the initial states
23237  for (auto & agent : sample_deceased)
23238  agent->change_state(model, 3, Queue<TSeq>::NoOne);
23239 
23240  // Running the events
23241  model->events_run();
23242 
23243  return;
23244 
23245  };
23246 
23247  return fun;
23248 
23249 }
23250 
23251 
23256 template<typename TSeq>
23257 inline std::function<void(Model<TSeq>*)> create_init_function_seir(
23258  std::vector< double > proportions_
23259 ) {
23260 
23261  // Checking widths
23262  if (proportions_.size() != 2u) {
23263  throw std::invalid_argument("-proportions_- must have two entries.");
23264  }
23265 
23266  // proportions_ are values between 0 and 1, otherwise error
23267  for (auto & v : proportions_)
23268  if ((v < 0.0) || (v > 1.0))
23269  throw std::invalid_argument(
23270  "-proportions_- must have values between 0 and 1."
23271  );
23272 
23273 
23274  std::function<void(Model<TSeq>*)> fun =
23275  [proportions_] (Model<TSeq> * model) -> void {
23276 
23277  // Figuring out information about the viruses
23278  double tot = 0.0;
23279  double n = static_cast<double>(model->size());
23280  for (const auto & agent: model->get_agents())
23281  {
23282  if (agent.get_virus() != nullptr)
23283  tot += 1.0;
23284  }
23285  tot /= n;
23286 
23287  // Putting the total into context
23288  double tot_left = 1.0 - tot;
23289 
23290  // Since susceptible and infected are "fixed,"
23291  // we only need to change recovered
23292  size_t nexposed = proportions_[0u] * tot * n;
23293  size_t nrecovered = proportions_[1u] * tot_left * n;
23294 
23295  AgentsSample<TSeq> sample_suscept(
23296  *model,
23297  nrecovered,
23298  {0u},
23299  true
23300  );
23301 
23302  // Setting up the initial states
23303  for (auto & agent : sample_suscept)
23304  agent->change_state(model, 3, Queue<TSeq>::NoOne);
23305 
23306  AgentsSample<TSeq> sample_exposed(
23307  *model,
23308  nexposed,
23309  {1u},
23310  true
23311  );
23312 
23313  // Setting up the initial states
23314  for (auto & agent : sample_exposed)
23315  agent->change_state(model, 2, Queue<TSeq>::NoOne);
23316 
23317  // Running the events
23318  model->events_run();
23319 
23320  return;
23321 
23322  };
23323 
23324  return fun;
23325 
23326 }
23327 
23332 template<typename TSeq>
23333 inline std::function<void(Model<TSeq>*)> create_init_function_seird(
23334  std::vector< double > proportions_
23335 ) {
23336 
23337  // Checking widths
23338  if (proportions_.size() != 3u) {
23339  throw std::invalid_argument("-proportions_- must have three entries.");
23340  }
23341 
23342  // proportions_ are values between 0 and 1, otherwise error
23343  for (auto & v : proportions_)
23344  if ((v < 0.0) || (v > 1.0))
23345  throw std::invalid_argument(
23346  "-proportions_- must have values between 0 and 1."
23347  );
23348 
23349  // Last first two terms shouldn't add up to more than 1
23350  if ((proportions_[1u] + proportions_[2u]) > 1.0)
23351  throw std::invalid_argument(
23352  "The last two terms of -proportions_- must add up to less than 1."
23353  );
23354 
23355  std::function<void(Model<TSeq>*)> fun =
23356  [proportions_] (Model<TSeq> * model) -> void {
23357 
23358  // Figuring out information about the viruses
23359  double tot = 0.0;
23360  double n = static_cast<double>(model->size());
23361 
23362  for (const auto & agent: model->get_agents())
23363  {
23364  if (agent.get_virus() != nullptr)
23365  tot += 1.0;
23366  }
23367  tot /= n;
23368 
23369  // Putting the total into context
23370  double tot_left = 1.0 - tot;
23371 
23372  // Since susceptible and infected are "fixed,"
23373  // we only need to change recovered
23374  size_t nexposed = proportions_[0u] * tot * n;
23375  size_t nrecovered = proportions_[1u] * tot_left * n;
23376  size_t ndeceased = proportions_[2u] * tot_left * n;
23377 
23378  AgentsSample<TSeq> sample_suscept(
23379  *model,
23380  nrecovered,
23381  {0u},
23382  true
23383  );
23384 
23385  // Setting up the initial states
23386  for (auto & agent : sample_suscept)
23387  agent->change_state(model, 3, Queue<TSeq>::NoOne);
23388 
23389  AgentsSample<TSeq> sample_exposed(
23390  *model,
23391  nexposed,
23392  {1u},
23393  true
23394  );
23395 
23396  // Setting up the initial states
23397  for (auto & agent : sample_exposed)
23398  agent->change_state(model, 2, Queue<TSeq>::NoOne);
23399 
23400  // Running the events
23401  model->events_run();
23402 
23403  // Setting the initial states for the deceased
23404  AgentsSample<TSeq> sample_deceased(
23405  *model,
23406  ndeceased,
23407  {0u},
23408  true
23409  );
23410 
23411  // Setting up the initial states
23412  for (auto & agent : sample_deceased)
23413  agent->change_state(model, 4, Queue<TSeq>::NoOne);
23414 
23415  // Running the events
23416  model->events_run();
23417 
23418  return;
23419 
23420  };
23421 
23422  return fun;
23423 
23424 }
23425 
23426 
23427 #endif
23428 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
23430 
23431  End of -include/epiworld//models/init-functions.hpp-
23432 
23435 
23436 
23437 
23438 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
23440 
23441  Start of -include/epiworld//models/globalevents.hpp-
23442 
23445 
23446 
23447 #ifndef EPIWORLD_GLOBALEVENTS_HPP
23448 #define EPIWORLD_GLOBALEVENTS_HPP
23449 
23450 // This function creates a global action that distributes a tool
23451 // to agents with probability p.
23460 template<typename TSeq>
23461 inline std::function<void(Model<TSeq>*)> globalevent_tool(
23462  Tool<TSeq> & tool,
23463  double p
23464 ) {
23465 
23466  std::function<void(Model<TSeq>*)> fun = [p,&tool](
23467  Model<TSeq> * model
23468  ) -> void {
23469 
23470  for (auto & agent : model->get_agents())
23471  {
23472 
23473  // Check if the agent has the tool
23474  if (agent.has_tool(tool))
23475  continue;
23476 
23477  // Adding the tool
23478  if (model->runif() < p)
23479  agent.add_tool(tool, model);
23480 
23481 
23482  }
23483 
23484  #ifdef EPIWORLD_DEBUG
23485  tool.print();
23486  #endif
23487 
23488  return;
23489 
23490 
23491  };
23492 
23493  return fun;
23494 
23495 }
23496 
23497 // Same function as above, but p is now a function of a vector of coefficients
23498 // and a vector of variables.
23509 template<typename TSeq>
23510 inline std::function<void(Model<TSeq>*)> globalevent_tool_logit(
23511  Tool<TSeq> & tool,
23512  std::vector< size_t > vars,
23513  std::vector< double > coefs
23514 ) {
23515 
23516  std::function<void(Model<TSeq>*)> fun = [coefs,vars,&tool](
23517  Model<TSeq> * model
23518  ) -> void {
23519 
23520  for (auto & agent : model->get_agents())
23521  {
23522 
23523  // Check if the agent has the tool
23524  if (agent.has_tool(tool))
23525  continue;
23526 
23527  // Computing the probability using a logit. Uses OpenMP reduction
23528  // to sum the coefficients.
23529  double p = 0.0;
23530  #if defined(__OPENMP) || defined(_OPENMP)
23531  #pragma omp parallel for reduction(+:p)
23532  #endif
23533  for (size_t i = 0u; i < coefs.size(); ++i)
23534  p += coefs.at(i) * agent(vars[i]);
23535 
23536  p = 1.0 / (1.0 + std::exp(-p));
23537 
23538  // Adding the tool
23539  if (model->runif() < p)
23540  agent.add_tool(tool, model);
23541 
23542 
23543  }
23544 
23545  #ifdef EPIWORLD_DEBUG
23546  tool.print();
23547  #endif
23548 
23549  return;
23550 
23551 
23552  };
23553 
23554  return fun;
23555 
23556 }
23557 
23558 // A global action that updates a parameter in the model.
23567 template<typename TSeq>
23568 inline std::function<void(Model<TSeq>*)> globalevent_set_param(
23569  std::string param,
23570  double value
23571 ) {
23572 
23573  std::function<void(Model<TSeq>*)> fun = [value,param](
23574  Model<TSeq> * model
23575  ) -> void {
23576 
23577  model->set_param(param, value);
23578 
23579  return;
23580 
23581 
23582  };
23583 
23584  return fun;
23585 
23586 }
23587 #endif
23588 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
23590 
23591  End of -include/epiworld//models/globalevents.hpp-
23592 
23595 
23596 
23597 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
23599 
23600  Start of -include/epiworld//models/sis.hpp-
23601 
23604 
23605 
23606 #ifndef EPIWORLD_MODELS_SIS_HPP
23607 #define EPIWORLD_MODELS_SIS_HPP
23608 
23617 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
23618 class ModelSIS : public epiworld::Model<TSeq>
23619 {
23620 
23621 public:
23622 
23623  static const int SUSCEPTIBLE = 0;
23624  static const int INFECTED = 1;
23625 
23626  ModelSIS() {};
23627 
23628  ModelSIS(
23629  ModelSIS<TSeq> & model,
23630  const std::string & vname,
23631  epiworld_double prevalence,
23632  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
23633  epiworld_double recovery_rate
23634  );
23635 
23636  ModelSIS(
23637  const std::string & vname,
23638  epiworld_double prevalence,
23639  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
23640  epiworld_double recovery_rate
23641  );
23642 
23643 };
23644 
23645 template<typename TSeq>
23646 inline ModelSIS<TSeq>::ModelSIS(
23647  ModelSIS<TSeq> & model,
23648  const std::string & vname,
23649  epiworld_double prevalence,
23650  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
23651  epiworld_double recovery_rate
23652  )
23653 {
23654 
23655  model.set_name("Susceptible-Infected-Susceptible (SIS)");
23656 
23657  // Adding statuses
23658  model.add_state("Susceptible", epiworld::default_update_susceptible<TSeq>);
23659  model.add_state("Infected", epiworld::default_update_exposed<TSeq>);
23660 
23661  // Setting up parameters
23662  model.add_param(transmission_rate, "Transmission rate");
23663  model.add_param(recovery_rate, "Recovery rate");
23664 
23665  // Preparing the virus -------------------------------------------
23666  epiworld::Virus<TSeq> virus(vname, prevalence, true);
23667  virus.set_state(ModelSIS<TSeq>::INFECTED, ModelSIS<TSeq>::SUSCEPTIBLE, ModelSIS<TSeq>::SUSCEPTIBLE);
23668 
23669  virus.set_prob_infecting(&model("Transmission rate"));
23670  virus.set_prob_recovery(&model("Recovery rate"));
23671  virus.set_prob_death(0.0);
23672 
23673  model.add_virus(virus);
23674 
23675  return;
23676 
23677 }
23678 
23679 template<typename TSeq>
23680 inline ModelSIS<TSeq>::ModelSIS(
23681  const std::string & vname,
23682  epiworld_double prevalence,
23683  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
23684  epiworld_double recovery_rate
23685  )
23686 {
23687 
23688  ModelSIS<TSeq>(
23689  *this,
23690  vname,
23691  prevalence,
23692  transmission_rate,
23693  recovery_rate
23694  );
23695 
23696  return;
23697 
23698 }
23699 
23700 #endif

23703

23705
