23710 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
23712 
23713  Start of -include/epiworld//models/sir.hpp-
23714 
23717 
23718 
23719 #ifndef EPIWORLD_SIR_H
23720 #define EPIWORLD_SIR_H
23721 
23731 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
23732 class ModelSIR : public epiworld::Model<TSeq>
23733 {
23734 public:
23735 
23736  ModelSIR() {};
23737 
23738  ModelSIR(
23739  ModelSIR<TSeq> & model,
23740  const std::string & vname,
23741  epiworld_double prevalence,
23742  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
23743  epiworld_double recovery_rate
23744  );
23745 
23746  ModelSIR(
23747  const std::string & vname,
23748  epiworld_double prevalence,
23749  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
23750  epiworld_double recovery_rate
23751  );
23752 
23758  ModelSIR<TSeq> & initial_states(
23759  std::vector< double > proportions_,
23760  std::vector< int > queue_ = {}
23761  );
23762 
23763 };
23764 
23765 template<typename TSeq>
23766 inline ModelSIR<TSeq>::ModelSIR(
23767  ModelSIR<TSeq> & model,
23768  const std::string & vname,
23769  epiworld_double prevalence,
23770  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
23771  epiworld_double recovery_rate
23772  )
23773 {
23774 
23775  // Adding statuses
23776  model.add_state("Susceptible", epiworld::default_update_susceptible<TSeq>);
23777  model.add_state("Infected", epiworld::default_update_exposed<TSeq>);
23778  model.add_state("Recovered");
23779 
23780  // Setting up parameters
23781  model.add_param(recovery_rate, "Recovery rate");
23782  model.add_param(transmission_rate, "Transmission rate");
23783 
23784  // Preparing the virus -------------------------------------------
23785  epiworld::Virus<TSeq> virus(vname, prevalence, true);
23786  virus.set_state(1,2,2);
23787 
23788  virus.set_prob_recovery(&model("Recovery rate"));
23789  virus.set_prob_infecting(&model("Transmission rate"));
23790 
23791  model.add_virus(virus);
23792 
23793  model.set_name("Susceptible-Infected-Recovered (SIR)");
23794 
23795  return;
23796 
23797 }
23798 
23799 template<typename TSeq>
23800 inline ModelSIR<TSeq>::ModelSIR(
23801  const std::string & vname,
23802  epiworld_double prevalence,
23803  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
23804  epiworld_double recovery_rate
23805  )
23806 {
23807 
23808  ModelSIR<TSeq>(
23809  *this,
23810  vname,
23811  prevalence,
23812  transmission_rate,
23813  recovery_rate
23814  );
23815 
23816  return;
23817 
23818 }
23819 
23820 template<typename TSeq>
23821 inline ModelSIR<TSeq> & ModelSIR<TSeq>::initial_states(
23822  std::vector< double > proportions_,
23823  std::vector< int > /* queue_ */
23824 ) {
23825 
23826  Model<TSeq>::initial_states_fun =
23827  create_init_function_sir<TSeq>(proportions_)
23828  ;
23829 
23830  return *this;
23831 
23832 }
23833 
23834 #endif
23835 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
23837 
23838  End of -include/epiworld//models/sir.hpp-
23839 
23842 
23843 
23844 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
23846 
23847  Start of -include/epiworld//models/seir.hpp-
23848 
23851 
23852 
23853 #ifndef EPIWORLD_MODELS_SEIR_HPP
23854 #define EPIWORLD_MODELS_SEIR_HPP
23855 
23866 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
23867 class ModelSEIR : public epiworld::Model<TSeq>
23868 {
23869 
23870 public:
23871  static const int SUSCEPTIBLE = 0;
23872  static const int EXPOSED = 1;
23873  static const int INFECTED = 2;
23874  static const int REMOVED = 3;
23875 
23876  ModelSEIR() {};
23877 
23878  ModelSEIR(
23879  ModelSEIR<TSeq> & model,
23880  const std::string & vname,
23881  epiworld_double prevalence,
23882  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
23883  epiworld_double avg_incubation_days,
23884  epiworld_double recovery_rate
23885  );
23886 
23887  ModelSEIR(
23888  const std::string & vname,
23889  epiworld_double prevalence,
23890  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
23891  epiworld_double avg_incubation_days,
23892  epiworld_double recovery_rate
23893  );
23894 
23895  epiworld::UpdateFun<TSeq> update_exposed_seir = [](
23896  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p,
23897  epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m
23898  ) -> void {
23899 
23900  // Getting the virus
23901  auto v = p->get_virus();
23902 
23903  // Does the agent become infected?
23904  if (m->runif() < 1.0/(v->get_incubation(m)))
23905  p->change_state(m, ModelSEIR<TSeq>::INFECTED);
23906 
23907  return;
23908  };
23909 
23910 
23911  epiworld::UpdateFun<TSeq> update_infected_seir = [](
23912  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p,
23913  epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m
23914  ) -> void {
23915  // Does the agent recover?
23916  if (m->runif() < (m->par("Recovery rate")))
23917  p->rm_virus(m);
23918 
23919  return;
23920  };
23921 
23928  ModelSEIR<TSeq> & initial_states(
23929  std::vector< double > proportions_,
23930  std::vector< int > queue_ = {}
23931  );
23932 
23933 };
23934 
23935 
23936 template<typename TSeq>
23937 inline ModelSEIR<TSeq>::ModelSEIR(
23938  ModelSEIR<TSeq> & model,
23939  const std::string & vname,
23940  epiworld_double prevalence,
23941  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
23942  epiworld_double avg_incubation_days,
23943  epiworld_double recovery_rate
23944  )
23945 {
23946 
23947  // Adding statuses
23948  model.add_state("Susceptible", epiworld::default_update_susceptible<TSeq>);
23949  model.add_state("Exposed", model.update_exposed_seir);
23950  model.add_state("Infected", model.update_infected_seir);
23951  model.add_state("Removed");
23952 
23953  // Setting up parameters
23954  model.add_param(transmission_rate, "Transmission rate");
23955  model.add_param(avg_incubation_days, "Incubation days");
23956  model.add_param(recovery_rate, "Recovery rate");
23957 
23958  // Preparing the virus -------------------------------------------
23959  epiworld::Virus<TSeq> virus(vname, prevalence, true);
23960  virus.set_state(ModelSEIR<TSeq>::EXPOSED, ModelSEIR<TSeq>::REMOVED, ModelSEIR<TSeq>::REMOVED);
23961 
23962  virus.set_prob_infecting(&model("Transmission rate"));
23963  virus.set_incubation(&model("Incubation days"));
23964  virus.set_prob_recovery(&model("Recovery rate"));
23965 
23966  // Adding the tool and the virus
23967  model.add_virus(virus);
23968 
23969  model.set_name("Susceptible-Exposed-Infected-Removed (SEIR)");
23970 
23971  return;
23972 
23973 }
23974 
23975 template<typename TSeq>
23976 inline ModelSEIR<TSeq>::ModelSEIR(
23977  const std::string & vname,
23978  epiworld_double prevalence,
23979  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
23980  epiworld_double avg_incubation_days,
23981  epiworld_double recovery_rate
23982  )
23983 {
23984 
23985  ModelSEIR<TSeq>(
23986  *this,
23987  vname,
23988  prevalence,
23989  transmission_rate,
23990  avg_incubation_days,
23991  recovery_rate
23992  );
23993 
23994  return;
23995 
23996 }
23997 
23998 template<typename TSeq>
23999 inline ModelSEIR<TSeq> & ModelSEIR<TSeq>::initial_states(
24000  std::vector< double > proportions_,
24001  std::vector< int > /**/
24002 ) {
24003 
24004  Model<TSeq>::initial_states_fun =
24005  create_init_function_seir<TSeq>(proportions_)
24006  ;
24007 
24008  return *this;
24009 
24010 }
24011 
24012 #endif
24013 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
24015 
24016  End of -include/epiworld//models/seir.hpp-
24017 
24020 
24021 
24022 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
24024 
24025  Start of -include/epiworld//models/surveillance.hpp-
24026 
24029 
24030 
24031 #ifndef EPIWORLD_MODELS_SURVEILLANCE_HPP
24032 #define EPIWORLD_MODELS_SURVEILLANCE_HPP
24033 
24034 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
24035 class ModelSURV : public epiworld::Model<TSeq> {
24036 
24037 private:
24038  // state
24039  static const int SUSCEPTIBLE = 0;
24040  static const int LATENT = 1;
24041  static const int SYMPTOMATIC = 2;
24042  static const int SYMPTOMATIC_ISOLATED = 3; // sampled and discovered
24043  static const int ASYMPTOMATIC = 4;
24044  static const int ASYMPTOMATIC_ISOLATED = 5;
24045  static const int RECOVERED = 6;
24046  static const int REMOVED = 7;
24047 
24048 public:
24049 
24054  std::vector< epiworld_double > days_latent_and_infectious;
24055 
24097  ModelSURV() {};
24098 
24099  ModelSURV(
24100  ModelSURV<TSeq> & model,
24101  const std::string & vname,
24102  epiworld_fast_uint prevalence = 50,
24103  epiworld_double efficacy_vax = 0.9,
24104  epiworld_double latent_period = 3u,
24105  epiworld_double infect_period = 6u,
24106  epiworld_double prob_symptoms = 0.6,
24107  epiworld_double prop_vaccinated = 0.25,
24108  epiworld_double prop_vax_redux_transm = 0.5,
24109  epiworld_double prop_vax_redux_infect = 0.5,
24110  epiworld_double surveillance_prob = 0.001,
24111  epiworld_double prob_transmission = 1.0,
24112  epiworld_double prob_death = 0.001,
24113  epiworld_double prob_noreinfect = 0.9
24114  );
24115 
24116  ModelSURV(
24117  const std::string & vname,
24118  epiworld_fast_uint prevalence = 50,
24119  epiworld_double efficacy_vax = 0.9,
24120  epiworld_double latent_period = 3u,
24121  epiworld_double infect_period = 6u,
24122  epiworld_double prob_symptoms = 0.6,
24123  epiworld_double prop_vaccinated = 0.25,
24124  epiworld_double prop_vax_redux_transm = 0.5,
24125  epiworld_double prop_vax_redux_infect = 0.5,
24126  epiworld_double surveillance_prob = 0.001,
24127  epiworld_double prob_transmission = 1.0,
24128  epiworld_double prob_death = 0.001,
24129  epiworld_double prob_noreinfect = 0.9
24130  );
24132 
24133  void reset();
24134 
24135 };
24136 
24137 template<typename TSeq>
24138 inline void ModelSURV<TSeq>::reset()
24139 {
24140  epiworld::Model<TSeq>::reset();
24141 
24142  days_latent_and_infectious.clear();
24143  days_latent_and_infectious.resize(
24144  2u * epiworld::Model<TSeq>::size(),
24145  -1.0
24146  );
24147 }
24148 
24149 template<typename TSeq>
24150 inline ModelSURV<TSeq>::ModelSURV(
24151  ModelSURV<TSeq> & model,
24152  const std::string & vname,
24153  epiworld_fast_uint prevalence,
24154  epiworld_double efficacy_vax,
24155  epiworld_double latent_period,
24156  epiworld_double infect_period,
24157  epiworld_double prob_symptoms,
24158  epiworld_double prop_vaccinated,
24159  epiworld_double prop_vax_redux_transm,
24160  epiworld_double prop_vax_redux_infect,
24161  epiworld_double surveillance_prob,
24162  epiworld_double prob_transmission,
24163  epiworld_double prob_death,
24164  epiworld_double prob_noreinfect
24165  )
24166 {
24167 
24168  EPI_NEW_UPDATEFUN_LAMBDA(surveillance_update_susceptible, TSeq) {
24169 
24170  // This computes the prob of getting any neighbor variant
24171  epiworld_fast_uint nviruses_tmp = 0u;
24172  for (auto & neighbor: p->get_neighbors())
24173  {
24174 
24175  auto & v = neighbor->get_virus();
24176 
24177  if (v == nullptr)
24178  continue;
24179 
24180  /* And it is a function of susceptibility_reduction as well */
24181  epiworld_double tmp_transmission =
24182  (1.0 - p->get_susceptibility_reduction(v, m)) *
24183  v->get_prob_infecting(m) *
24184  (1.0 - neighbor->get_transmission_reduction(v, m))
24185  ;
24186 
24187  m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp] = tmp_transmission;
24188  m->array_virus_tmp[nviruses_tmp++] = &(*v);
24189  }
24190 
24191  // No virus to compute on
24192  if (nviruses_tmp == 0)
24193  return;
24194 
24195  // Running the roulette
24196  int which = roulette(nviruses_tmp, m);
24197 
24198  if (which < 0)
24199  return;
24200 
24201  p->set_virus(*m->array_virus_tmp[which], m);
24202  return;
24203 
24204  };
24205 
24206 
24207  epiworld::UpdateFun<TSeq> surveillance_update_exposed =
24208  [](epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p, epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m) -> void
24209  {
24210 
24211  // Dynamically getting the ModelSURV
24212  ModelSURV<TSeq> * model_surv = dynamic_cast<ModelSURV<TSeq> *>(m);
24213 
24214  epiworld::VirusPtr<TSeq> & v = p->get_virus();
24215  epiworld_double p_die = v->get_prob_death(m) * (1.0 - p->get_death_reduction(v, m));
24216 
24217  epiworld_fast_uint days_since_exposed = m->today() - v->get_date();
24218  epiworld_fast_uint state = p->get_state();
24219 
24220  // Figuring out latent period
24221  auto & dat = model_surv->days_latent_and_infectious;
24222  if (dat[p->get_id()] < 0)
24223  {
24224  epiworld_double latent_days = m->rgamma(
24225  m->par("Latent period"), 1.0
24226  );
24227 
24228  dat[p->get_id() * 2u] = latent_days;
24229 
24230  dat[p->get_id() * 2u + 1u] =
24231  m->rgamma(m->par("Infect period"), 1.0) +
24232  latent_days;
24233  }
24234 
24235  // If still latent, nothing happens
24236  if (days_since_exposed <= dat[p->get_id() * 2u])
24237  return;
24238 
24239  // If past days infected + latent, then bye.
24240  if (days_since_exposed >= dat[p->get_id() * 2u + 1u])
24241  {
24242  p->rm_virus(m);
24243  return;
24244  }
24245 
24246  // If it is infected, then it can be asymptomatic or symptomatic
24247  if (state == ModelSURV<TSeq>::LATENT)
24248  {
24249 
24250  // Will be symptomatic?
24251  if (EPI_RUNIF() < m->par("Prob of symptoms"))
24252  p->change_state(m, ModelSURV<TSeq>::SYMPTOMATIC);
24253  else
24254  p->change_state(m, ModelSURV<TSeq>::ASYMPTOMATIC);
24255 
24256  return;
24257 
24258  }
24259 
24260  // Otherwise, it can be removed
24261  if (EPI_RUNIF() < p_die)
24262  {
24263  p->change_state(m, ModelSURV<TSeq>::REMOVED, -1);
24264  return;
24265  }
24266 
24267  return;
24268 
24269  };
24270 
24271  std::vector< unsigned int > exposed_state = {
24272  SYMPTOMATIC,
24273  SYMPTOMATIC_ISOLATED,
24274  ASYMPTOMATIC,
24275  ASYMPTOMATIC_ISOLATED,
24276  LATENT
24277  };
24278 
24279  epiworld::GlobalFun<TSeq> surveillance_program =
24280  [exposed_state](
24281  epiworld::Model<TSeq>* m
24282  ) -> void
24283  {
24284 
24285  // How many will we find
24286  std::binomial_distribution<> bdist(m->size(), m->par("Surveilance prob."));
24287  int nsampled = bdist(*m->get_rand_endgine());
24288 
24289  int to_go = nsampled + 1;
24290 
24291  epiworld_double ndetected = 0.0;
24292  epiworld_double ndetected_asympt = 0.0;
24293 
24294  auto & pop = m->get_agents();
24295  std::vector< bool > sampled(m->size(), false);
24296 
24297  while (to_go-- > 0)
24298  {
24299 
24300  // Who is the lucky one
24301  epiworld_fast_uint i = static_cast<epiworld_fast_uint>(std::floor(EPI_RUNIF() * m->size()));
24302 
24303  if (sampled[i])
24304  continue;
24305 
24306  sampled[i] = true;
24307  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p = &pop[i];
24308 
24309  // If still exposed for the next term
24310  if (epiworld::IN(p->get_state(), exposed_state ))
24311  {
24312 
24313  ndetected += 1.0;
24314  if (p->get_state() == ModelSURV<TSeq>::ASYMPTOMATIC)
24315  {
24316  ndetected_asympt += 1.0;
24317  p->change_state(m, ModelSURV<TSeq>::ASYMPTOMATIC_ISOLATED);
24318  }
24319  else
24320  {
24321  p->change_state(m, ModelSURV<TSeq>::SYMPTOMATIC_ISOLATED);
24322  }
24323 
24324  }
24325 
24326  }
24327 
24328  // Writing the user data
24329  std::vector< int > totals;
24330  m->get_db().get_today_total(nullptr,&totals);
24331  m->add_user_data(
24332  {
24333  static_cast<epiworld_double>(nsampled),
24334  ndetected,
24335  ndetected_asympt,
24336  static_cast<epiworld_double>(totals[ModelSURV<TSeq>::ASYMPTOMATIC])
24337  }
24338  );
24339 
24340 
24341  };
24342 
24343  model.add_state("Susceptible", surveillance_update_susceptible);
24344  model.add_state("Latent", surveillance_update_exposed);
24345  model.add_state("Symptomatic", surveillance_update_exposed);
24346  model.add_state("Symptomatic isolated", surveillance_update_exposed);
24347  model.add_state("Asymptomatic", surveillance_update_exposed);
24348  model.add_state("Asymptomatic isolated", surveillance_update_exposed);
24349  model.add_state("Recovered");
24350  model.add_state("Removed");
24351 
24352  // General model parameters
24353  model.add_param(latent_period, "Latent period");
24354  model.add_param(infect_period, "Infect period");
24355  model.add_param(prob_symptoms, "Prob of symptoms");
24356  model.add_param(surveillance_prob, "Surveilance prob.");
24357  model.add_param(efficacy_vax, "Vax efficacy");
24358  model.add_param(prop_vax_redux_transm, "Vax redux transmission");
24359  model.add_param(prob_transmission, "Prob of transmission");
24360  model.add_param(prob_death, "Prob. death");
24361  model.add_param(prob_noreinfect, "Prob. no reinfect");
24362 
24363  // Virus ------------------------------------------------------------------
24364  epiworld::Virus<TSeq> covid("Covid19", prevalence, false);
24365  covid.set_state(LATENT, RECOVERED, REMOVED);
24366  covid.set_post_immunity(&model("Prob. no reinfect"));
24367  covid.set_prob_death(&model("Prob. death"));
24368 
24369  epiworld::VirusFun<TSeq> ptransmitfun = [](
24370  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p,
24371  epiworld::Virus<TSeq> &,
24372  epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m
24373  ) -> epiworld_double
24374  {
24375  // No chance of infecting
24376  epiworld_fast_uint s = p->get_state();
24377  if (s == ModelSURV<TSeq>::LATENT)
24378  return static_cast<epiworld_double>(0.0);
24379  else if (s == ModelSURV<TSeq>::SYMPTOMATIC_ISOLATED)
24380  return static_cast<epiworld_double>(0.0);
24381  else if (s == ModelSURV<TSeq>::ASYMPTOMATIC_ISOLATED)
24382  return static_cast<epiworld_double>(0.0);
24383 
24384  // Otherwise
24385  return m->par("Prob of transmission");
24386  };
24387 
24388  covid.set_prob_infecting_fun(ptransmitfun);
24389 
24390  model.add_virus(covid);
24391 
24392  model.set_user_data({"nsampled", "ndetected", "ndetected_asympt", "nasymptomatic"});
24393  model.add_globalevent(surveillance_program, "Surveilance program", -1);
24394 
24395  // Vaccine tool -----------------------------------------------------------
24396  epiworld::Tool<TSeq> vax("Vaccine", prop_vaccinated, true);
24397  vax.set_susceptibility_reduction(&model("Vax efficacy"));
24398  vax.set_transmission_reduction(&model("Vax redux transmission"));
24399 
24400  model.add_tool(vax);
24401 
24402  model.set_name("Surveillance");
24403 
24404  return;
24405 
24406 }
24407 
24408 template<typename TSeq>
24409 inline ModelSURV<TSeq>::ModelSURV(
24410  const std::string & vname,
24411  epiworld_fast_uint prevalence,
24412  epiworld_double efficacy_vax,
24413  epiworld_double latent_period,
24414  epiworld_double infect_period,
24415  epiworld_double prob_symptoms,
24416  epiworld_double prop_vaccinated,
24417  epiworld_double prop_vax_redux_transm,
24418  epiworld_double prop_vax_redux_infect,
24419  epiworld_double surveillance_prob,
24420  epiworld_double prob_transmission,
24421  epiworld_double prob_death,
24422  epiworld_double prob_noreinfect
24423  )
24424 {
24425 
24426  ModelSURV(
24427  *this,
24428  vname,
24429  prevalence,
24430  efficacy_vax,
24431  latent_period,
24432  infect_period,
24433  prob_symptoms,
24434  prop_vaccinated,
24435  prop_vax_redux_transm,
24436  prop_vax_redux_infect,
24437  surveillance_prob,
24438  prob_transmission,
24439  prob_death,
24440  prob_noreinfect
24441  );
24442 
24443  return;
24444 
24445 }
24446 
24447 #endif
24448 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
24450 
24451  End of -include/epiworld//models/surveillance.hpp-
24452 
24455 
24456 
24457 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
24459 
24460  Start of -include/epiworld//models/sirconnected.hpp-
24461 
24464 
24465 
24466 #ifndef EPIWORLD_MODELS_SIRCONNECTED_HPP
24467 #define EPIWORLD_MODELS_SIRCONNECTED_HPP
24468 
24469 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
24470 class ModelSIRCONN : public epiworld::Model<TSeq>
24471 {
24472 
24473 private:
24474 
24475  std::vector< epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * > infected;
24476  void update_infected();
24477 
24478 public:
24479 
24480  static const int SUSCEPTIBLE = 0;
24481  static const int INFECTED = 1;
24482  static const int RECOVERED = 2;
24483 
24484 
24485  ModelSIRCONN() {};
24486 
24487  ModelSIRCONN(
24488  ModelSIRCONN<TSeq> & model,
24489  const std::string & vname,
24490  epiworld_fast_uint n,
24491  epiworld_double prevalence,
24492  epiworld_double contact_rate,
24493  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
24494  epiworld_double recovery_rate
24495  );
24496 
24497  ModelSIRCONN(
24498  const std::string & vname,
24499  epiworld_fast_uint n,
24500  epiworld_double prevalence,
24501  epiworld_double contact_rate,
24502  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
24503  epiworld_double recovery_rate
24504  );
24505 
24506  ModelSIRCONN<TSeq> & run(
24507  epiworld_fast_uint ndays,
24508  int seed = -1
24509  );
24510 
24511  void reset();
24512 
24513  Model<TSeq> * clone_ptr();
24514 
24520  ModelSIRCONN<TSeq> & initial_states(
24521  std::vector< double > proportions_,
24522  std::vector< int > queue_ = {}
24523  );
24524 
24529  size_t get_n_infected() const
24530  {
24531  return infected.size();
24532  }
24533 
24534  /***
24535  * @brief Compute expected generation time
24536  * @param max_days Maximum number of days.
24537  * @param max_contacts Maximum number of contacts.
24538  */
24539  std::vector< double > generation_time_expected(
24540  int max_days = 200,
24541  int max_contacts = 200
24542  ) const;
24543 
24544 };
24545 
24546 template<typename TSeq>
24547 inline void ModelSIRCONN<TSeq>::update_infected()
24548 {
24549 
24550  infected.clear();
24551  infected.reserve(this->size());
24552 
24553  for (auto & p : this->get_agents())
24554  {
24555  if (p.get_state() == ModelSIRCONN<TSeq>::INFECTED)
24556  {
24557  infected.push_back(&p);
24558  }
24559  }
24560 
24561  Model<TSeq>::set_rand_binom(
24562  this->get_n_infected(),
24563  static_cast<double>(Model<TSeq>::par("Contact rate"))/
24564  static_cast<double>(Model<TSeq>::size())
24565  );
24566 
24567  return;
24568 
24569 }
24570 
24571 template<typename TSeq>
24572 inline ModelSIRCONN<TSeq> & ModelSIRCONN<TSeq>::run(
24573  epiworld_fast_uint ndays,
24574  int seed
24575 )
24576 {
24577 
24578  Model<TSeq>::run(ndays, seed);
24579  return *this;
24580 
24581 }
24582 
24583 template<typename TSeq>
24584 inline void ModelSIRCONN<TSeq>::reset()
24585 {
24586 
24587  Model<TSeq>::reset();
24588 
24589  this->update_infected();
24590 
24591  return;
24592 
24593 }
24594 
24595 template<typename TSeq>
24596 inline Model<TSeq> * ModelSIRCONN<TSeq>::clone_ptr()
24597 {
24598 
24599  ModelSIRCONN<TSeq> * ptr = new ModelSIRCONN<TSeq>(
24600  *dynamic_cast<const ModelSIRCONN<TSeq>*>(this)
24601  );
24602 
24603  return dynamic_cast< Model<TSeq> *>(ptr);
24604 
24605 }
24606 
24617 template<typename TSeq>
24618 inline ModelSIRCONN<TSeq>::ModelSIRCONN(
24619  ModelSIRCONN<TSeq> & model,
24620  const std::string & vname,
24621  epiworld_fast_uint n,
24622  epiworld_double prevalence,
24623  epiworld_double contact_rate,
24624  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
24625  epiworld_double recovery_rate
24626  // epiworld_double prob_reinfection
24627  )
24628 {
24629 
24630  epiworld::UpdateFun<TSeq> update_susceptible = [](
24631  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p, epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m
24632  ) -> void
24633  {
24634 
24635  int ndraw = m->rbinom();
24636 
24637  if (ndraw == 0)
24638  return;
24639 
24640  ModelSIRCONN<TSeq> * model = dynamic_cast<ModelSIRCONN<TSeq> *>(m);
24641  size_t ninfected = model->get_n_infected();
24642 
24643  // Drawing from the set
24644  int nviruses_tmp = 0;
24645  for (int i = 0; i < ndraw; ++i)
24646  {
24647  // Now selecting who is transmitting the disease
24648  int which = static_cast<int>(
24649  std::floor(ninfected * m->runif())
24650  );
24651 
24652  /* There is a bug in which runif() returns 1.0. It is rare, but
24653  * we saw it here. See the Notes section in the C++ manual
24654  * https://en.cppreference.com/mwiki/index.php?title=cpp/numeric/random/uniform_real_distribution&oldid=133329
24655  * And the reported bug in GCC:
24656  * https://gcc.gnu.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=63176
24657  *
24658  */
24659  if (which == static_cast<int>(ninfected))
24660  --which;
24661 
24662  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> & neighbor = *model->infected[which];
24663 
24664  // Can't sample itself
24665  if (neighbor.get_id() == p->get_id())
24666  continue;
24667 
24668  // The neighbor is infected because it is on the list!
24669  if (neighbor.get_virus() == nullptr)
24670  continue;
24671 
24672  auto & v = neighbor.get_virus();
24673 
24674  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
24675  if (nviruses_tmp >= static_cast<int>(m->array_virus_tmp.size()))
24676  throw std::logic_error("Trying to add an extra element to a temporal array outside of the range.");
24677  #endif
24678 
24679  /* And it is a function of susceptibility_reduction as well */
24680  m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp] =
24681  (1.0 - p->get_susceptibility_reduction(v, m)) *
24682  v->get_prob_infecting(m) *
24683  (1.0 - neighbor.get_transmission_reduction(v, m))
24684  ;
24685 
24686  m->array_virus_tmp[nviruses_tmp++] = &(*v);
24687 
24688  }
24689 
24690  // No virus to compute
24691  if (nviruses_tmp == 0u)
24692  return;
24693 
24694  // Running the roulette
24695  int which = roulette(nviruses_tmp, m);
24696 
24697  if (which < 0)
24698  return;
24699 
24700  p->set_virus(*m->array_virus_tmp[which], m);
24701 
24702  return;
24703 
24704  };
24705 
24706 
24707  epiworld::UpdateFun<TSeq> update_infected = [](
24708  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p, epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m
24709  ) -> void {
24710 
24711  auto state = p->get_state();
24712 
24713  if (state == ModelSIRCONN<TSeq>::INFECTED)
24714  {
24715 
24716 
24717  // Odd: Die, Even: Recover
24718  epiworld_fast_uint n_events = 0u;
24719  // Recover
24720  m->array_double_tmp[n_events++] =
24721  1.0 - (1.0 - p->get_virus()->get_prob_recovery(m)) *
24722  (1.0 - p->get_recovery_enhancer(p->get_virus(), m));
24723 
24724  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
24725  if (n_events == 0u)
24726  {
24727  printf_epiworld(
24728  "[epi-debug] agent %i has 0 possible events!!\n",
24729  static_cast<int>(p->get_id())
24730  );
24731  throw std::logic_error("Zero events in exposed.");
24732  }
24733  #else
24734  if (n_events == 0u)
24735  return;
24736  #endif
24737 
24738 
24739  // Running the roulette
24740  int which = roulette(n_events, m);
24741 
24742  if (which < 0)
24743  return;
24744 
24745  // Which roulette happen?
24746  p->rm_virus(m);
24747 
24748  return ;
24749 
24750  } else
24751  throw std::logic_error(
24752  "This function can only be applied to infected individuals. (SIR)"
24753  ) ;
24754 
24755  return;
24756 
24757  };
24758 
24759  // state
24760  model.add_state("Susceptible", update_susceptible);
24761  model.add_state("Infected", update_infected);
24762  model.add_state("Recovered");
24763 
24764  // Setting up parameters
24765  model.add_param(contact_rate, "Contact rate");
24766  model.add_param(transmission_rate, "Transmission rate");
24767  model.add_param(recovery_rate, "Recovery rate");
24768  // model.add_param(prob_reinfection, "Prob. Reinfection");
24769 
24770  // Adding update function
24771  epiworld::GlobalFun<TSeq> update = [](epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m) -> void
24772  {
24773  ModelSIRCONN<TSeq> * model = dynamic_cast<ModelSIRCONN<TSeq> *>(m);
24774  model->update_infected();
24775 
24776  return;
24777  };
24778 
24779  model.add_globalevent(update, "Update infected individuals");
24780 
24781  // Preparing the virus -------------------------------------------
24782  epiworld::Virus<TSeq> virus(vname, prevalence, true);
24783  virus.set_state(1, 2, 2);
24784  virus.set_prob_infecting(&model("Transmission rate"));
24785  virus.set_prob_recovery(&model("Recovery rate"));
24786 
24787  model.add_virus(virus);
24788 
24789  model.queuing_off(); // No queuing need
24790 
24791  model.agents_empty_graph(n);
24792 
24793  model.set_name("Susceptible-Infected-Removed (SIR) (connected)");
24794 
24795  return;
24796 
24797 }
24798 
24799 template<typename TSeq>
24800 inline ModelSIRCONN<TSeq>::ModelSIRCONN(
24801  const std::string & vname,
24802  epiworld_fast_uint n,
24803  epiworld_double prevalence,
24804  epiworld_double contact_rate,
24805  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
24806  epiworld_double recovery_rate
24807  )
24808 {
24809 
24810  ModelSIRCONN(
24811  *this,
24812  vname,
24813  n,
24814  prevalence,
24815  contact_rate,
24816  transmission_rate,
24817  recovery_rate
24818  );
24819 
24820  return;
24821 
24822 }
24823 
24824 template<typename TSeq>
24825 inline ModelSIRCONN<TSeq> & ModelSIRCONN<TSeq>::initial_states(
24826  std::vector< double > proportions_,
24827  std::vector< int >
24828 ) {
24829 
24830  Model<TSeq>::initial_states_fun =
24831  create_init_function_sir<TSeq>(proportions_)
24832  ;
24833 
24834  return *this;
24835 
24836 }
24837 
24838 template<typename TSeq>
24839 inline std::vector< double > ModelSIRCONN<TSeq>::generation_time_expected(
24840  int max_days,
24841  int max_contacts
24842 ) const
24843 {
24844 
24845  // Retrieving total counts
24846  std::vector< int > h_date;
24847  std::vector< std::string > h_state;
24848  std::vector< int > h_counts;
24849  const auto this_const = dynamic_cast<const ModelSIRCONN<TSeq> *>(this);
24850  this_const->get_db().get_hist_total(
24851  &h_date,
24852  &h_state,
24853  &h_counts
24854  );
24855 
24856  // Retrieving information on susceptibles
24857  std::vector< double > S(this_const->get_ndays(), 0.0);
24858  for (size_t i = 0; i < h_date.size(); ++i)
24859  {
24860  if (h_state[i] == "Susceptible")
24861  S[h_date[i]] += h_counts[i];
24862  }
24863 
24864  // The generation time in the SIR model starts from 1, as agents
24865  // spend at least one day in the infected state before starting
24866  // transmitting.
24867  std::vector< double > gen_times(this_const->get_ndays(), 1.0);
24868  double p_c = this_const->par("Contact rate")/this_const->size();
24869  double p_i = this_const->par("Transmission rate");
24870  double p_r = this_const->par("Recovery rate");
24871  for (size_t i = 0u; i < this_const->get_ndays(); ++i)
24872  {
24873  gen_times[i] = gen_int_mean(
24874  S[i],
24875  p_c,
24876  p_i,
24877  p_r,
24878  max_days,
24879  max_contacts
24880  );
24881 
24882  }
24883 
24884  return gen_times;
24885 
24886 }
24887 
24888 #endif
24889 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
24891 
24892  End of -include/epiworld//models/sirconnected.hpp-
24893 
24896 
24897 
24898 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
24900 
24901  Start of -include/epiworld//models/seirconnected.hpp-
24902 
24905 
24906 
24907 #ifndef EPIWORLD_MODELS_SEIRCONNECTED_HPP
24908 #define EPIWORLD_MODELS_SEIRCONNECTED_HPP
24909 
24910 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
24911 class ModelSEIRCONN : public epiworld::Model<TSeq>
24912 {
24913 private:
24914  std::vector< epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * > infected;
24915  void update_infected();
24916 
24917 public:
24918 
24919  static const int SUSCEPTIBLE = 0;
24920  static const int EXPOSED = 1;
24921  static const int INFECTED = 2;
24922  static const int RECOVERED = 3;
24923 
24924 
24925  ModelSEIRCONN() {};
24926 
24927  ModelSEIRCONN(
24928  ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq> & model,
24929  const std::string & vname,
24930  epiworld_fast_uint n,
24931  epiworld_double prevalence,
24932  epiworld_double contact_rate,
24933  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
24934  epiworld_double avg_incubation_days,
24935  epiworld_double recovery_rate
24936  );
24937 
24938  ModelSEIRCONN(
24939  const std::string & vname,
24940  epiworld_fast_uint n,
24941  epiworld_double prevalence,
24942  epiworld_double contact_rate,
24943  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
24944  epiworld_double avg_incubation_days,
24945  epiworld_double recovery_rate
24946  );
24947 
24948  ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq> & run(
24949  epiworld_fast_uint ndays,
24950  int seed = -1
24951  );
24952 
24953  void reset();
24954 
24955  Model<TSeq> * clone_ptr();
24956 
24962  ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq> & initial_states(
24963  std::vector< double > proportions_,
24964  std::vector< int > queue_ = {}
24965  );
24966 
24967  size_t get_n_infected() const { return infected.size(); }
24968 
24969  /***
24970  * @brief Compute expected generation time
24971  * @param max_days Maximum number of days.
24972  * @param max_contacts Maximum number of contacts.
24973  */
24974  std::vector< double > generation_time_expected(
24975  int max_days = 200,
24976  int max_contacts = 200
24977  ) const;
24978 
24979 };
24980 
24981 template<typename TSeq>
24982 inline void ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq>::update_infected()
24983 {
24984 
24985  infected.clear();
24986  infected.reserve(this->size());
24987 
24988  for (auto & p : this->get_agents())
24989  {
24990  if (p.get_state() == ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq>::INFECTED)
24991  {
24992  infected.push_back(&p);
24993  }
24994  }
24995 
24996  Model<TSeq>::set_rand_binom(
24997  this->get_n_infected(),
24998  static_cast<double>(Model<TSeq>::par("Contact rate"))/
24999  static_cast<double>(Model<TSeq>::size())
25000  );
25001 
25002  return;
25003 
25004 }
25005 
25006 template<typename TSeq>
25007 inline ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq> & ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq>::run(
25008  epiworld_fast_uint ndays,
25009  int seed
25010 )
25011 {
25012 
25013  Model<TSeq>::run(ndays, seed);
25014 
25015  return *this;
25016 
25017 }
25018 
25019 template<typename TSeq>
25020 inline void ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq>::reset()
25021 {
25022 
25023  Model<TSeq>::reset();
25024  this->update_infected();
25025 
25026  return;
25027 
25028 }
25029 
25030 template<typename TSeq>
25031 inline Model<TSeq> * ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq>::clone_ptr()
25032 {
25033 
25034  ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq> * ptr = new ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq>(
25035  *dynamic_cast<const ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq>*>(this)
25036  );
25037 
25038  return dynamic_cast< Model<TSeq> *>(ptr);
25039 
25040 }
25041 
25052 template<typename TSeq>
25053 inline ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq>::ModelSEIRCONN(
25054  ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq> & model,
25055  const std::string & vname,
25056  epiworld_fast_uint n,
25057  epiworld_double prevalence,
25058  epiworld_double contact_rate,
25059  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
25060  epiworld_double avg_incubation_days,
25061  epiworld_double recovery_rate
25062  // epiworld_double prob_reinfection
25063  )
25064 {
25065 
25066  epiworld::UpdateFun<TSeq> update_susceptible = [](
25067  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p, epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m
25068  ) -> void
25069  {
25070 
25071  // Sampling how many individuals
25072  int ndraw = m->rbinom();
25073 
25074  if (ndraw == 0)
25075  return;
25076 
25077  ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq> * model = dynamic_cast<ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq> *>(m);
25078  size_t ninfected = model->get_n_infected();
25079 
25080  // Drawing from the set
25081  int nviruses_tmp = 0;
25082  for (int i = 0; i < ndraw; ++i)
25083  {
25084  // Now selecting who is transmitting the disease
25085  int which = static_cast<int>(
25086  std::floor(ninfected * m->runif())
25087  );
25088 
25089  /* There is a bug in which runif() returns 1.0. It is rare, but
25090  * we saw it here. See the Notes section in the C++ manual
25091  * https://en.cppreference.com/mwiki/index.php?title=cpp/numeric/random/uniform_real_distribution&oldid=133329
25092  * And the reported bug in GCC:
25093  * https://gcc.gnu.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=63176
25094  *
25095  */
25096  if (which == static_cast<int>(ninfected))
25097  --which;
25098 
25099  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> & neighbor = *model->infected[which];
25100 
25101  // Can't sample itself
25102  if (neighbor.get_id() == p->get_id())
25103  continue;
25104 
25105  // The neighbor is infected by construction
25106  auto & v = neighbor.get_virus();
25107 
25108  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
25109  if (nviruses_tmp >= static_cast<int>(m->array_virus_tmp.size()))
25110  throw std::logic_error("Trying to add an extra element to a temporal array outside of the range.");
25111  #endif
25112 
25113  /* And it is a function of susceptibility_reduction as well */
25114  m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp] =
25115  (1.0 - p->get_susceptibility_reduction(v, m)) *
25116  v->get_prob_infecting(m) *
25117  (1.0 - neighbor.get_transmission_reduction(v, m))
25118  ;
25119 
25120  m->array_virus_tmp[nviruses_tmp++] = &(*v);
25121 
25122  }
25123 
25124  // No virus to compute
25125  if (nviruses_tmp == 0u)
25126  return;
25127 
25128  // Running the roulette
25129  int which = roulette(nviruses_tmp, m);
25130 
25131  if (which < 0)
25132  return;
25133 
25134  p->set_virus(
25135  *m->array_virus_tmp[which],
25136  m,
25137  ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq>::EXPOSED
25138  );
25139 
25140  return;
25141 
25142  };
25143 
25144  epiworld::UpdateFun<TSeq> update_infected = [](
25145  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p, epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m
25146  ) -> void {
25147 
25148  auto state = p->get_state();
25149 
25150  if (state == ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq>::EXPOSED)
25151  {
25152 
25153  // Getting the virus
25154  auto & v = p->get_virus();
25155 
25156  // Does the agent become infected?
25157  if (m->runif() < 1.0/(v->get_incubation(m)))
25158  {
25159 
25160  p->change_state(m, ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq>::INFECTED);
25161  return;
25162 
25163  }
25164 
25165 
25166  } else if (state == ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq>::INFECTED)
25167  {
25168 
25169 
25170  // Odd: Die, Even: Recover
25171  epiworld_fast_uint n_events = 0u;
25172  const auto & v = p->get_virus();
25173 
25174  // Recover
25175  m->array_double_tmp[n_events++] =
25176  1.0 - (1.0 - v->get_prob_recovery(m)) * (1.0 - p->get_recovery_enhancer(v, m));
25177 
25178  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
25179  if (n_events == 0u)
25180  {
25181  printf_epiworld(
25182  "[epi-debug] agent %i has 0 possible events!!\n",
25183  static_cast<int>(p->get_id())
25184  );
25185  throw std::logic_error("Zero events in exposed.");
25186  }
25187  #else
25188  if (n_events == 0u)
25189  return;
25190  #endif
25191 
25192 
25193  // Running the roulette
25194  int which = roulette(n_events, m);
25195 
25196  if (which < 0)
25197  return;
25198 
25199  // Which roulette happen?
25200  p->rm_virus(m);
25201 
25202  return ;
25203 
25204  } else
25205  throw std::logic_error("This function can only be applied to exposed or infected individuals. (SEIR)") ;
25206 
25207  return;
25208 
25209  };
25210 
25211  // Setting up parameters
25212  model.add_param(contact_rate, "Contact rate");
25213  model.add_param(transmission_rate, "Prob. Transmission");
25214  model.add_param(recovery_rate, "Prob. Recovery");
25215  model.add_param(avg_incubation_days, "Avg. Incubation days");
25216 
25217  // state
25218  model.add_state("Susceptible", update_susceptible);
25219  model.add_state("Exposed", update_infected);
25220  model.add_state("Infected", update_infected);
25221  model.add_state("Recovered");
25222 
25223  // Adding update function
25224  epiworld::GlobalFun<TSeq> update = [](
25225  epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m
25226  ) -> void
25227  {
25228 
25229  ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq> * model = dynamic_cast<ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq> *>(m);
25230 
25231  model->update_infected();
25232 
25233  return;
25234 
25235  };
25236 
25237  model.add_globalevent(update, "Update infected individuals");
25238 
25239 
25240  // Preparing the virus -------------------------------------------
25241  epiworld::Virus<TSeq> virus(vname, prevalence, true);
25242  virus.set_state(
25243  ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq>::EXPOSED,
25244  ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq>::RECOVERED,
25245  ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq>::RECOVERED
25246  );
25247 
25248  virus.set_prob_infecting(&model("Prob. Transmission"));
25249  virus.set_prob_recovery(&model("Prob. Recovery"));
25250  virus.set_incubation(&model("Avg. Incubation days"));
25251 
25252  model.add_virus(virus);
25253 
25254  model.queuing_off(); // No queuing need
25255 
25256  // Adding the empty population
25257  model.agents_empty_graph(n);
25258 
25259  model.set_name("Susceptible-Exposed-Infected-Removed (SEIR) (connected)");
25260 
25261  return;
25262 
25263 }
25264 
25265 template<typename TSeq>
25266 inline ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq>::ModelSEIRCONN(
25267  const std::string & vname,
25268  epiworld_fast_uint n,
25269  epiworld_double prevalence,
25270  epiworld_double contact_rate,
25271  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
25272  epiworld_double avg_incubation_days,
25273  epiworld_double recovery_rate
25274  )
25275 {
25276 
25277  ModelSEIRCONN(
25278  *this,
25279  vname,
25280  n,
25281  prevalence,
25282  contact_rate,
25283  transmission_rate,
25284  avg_incubation_days,
25285  recovery_rate
25286  );
25287 
25288  return;
25289 
25290 }
25291 
25292 template<typename TSeq>
25293 inline ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq> & ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq>::initial_states(
25294  std::vector< double > proportions_,
25295  std::vector< int > /* queue_ */
25296 )
25297 {
25298 
25299  Model<TSeq>::initial_states_fun =
25300  create_init_function_seir<TSeq>(proportions_)
25301  ;
25302 
25303  return *this;
25304 
25305 }
25306 
25307 template<typename TSeq>
25308 inline std::vector< double > ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq>::generation_time_expected(
25309  int max_days,
25310  int max_contacts
25311 ) const
25312 {
25313 
25314  // Retrieving total counts
25315  std::vector< int > h_date;
25316  std::vector< std::string > h_state;
25317  std::vector< int > h_counts;
25318  const auto this_const = dynamic_cast<const ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq> *>(this);
25319  this_const->get_db().get_hist_total(
25320  &h_date,
25321  &h_state,
25322  &h_counts
25323  );
25324 
25325  // Retrieving information on susceptibles
25326  std::vector< double > S(this_const->get_ndays(), 0.0);
25327  for (size_t i = 0; i < h_date.size(); ++i)
25328  {
25329  if (h_state[i] == "Susceptible")
25330  S[h_date[i]] += h_counts[i];
25331  }
25332 
25333  // Computing the expected number of days in exposed
25334  double days_exposed = this_const->par("Avg. Incubation days");
25335 
25336  // The generation time in the SEIR model starts from 2, as agents
25337  // spend at least one day in the exposed state, and 1 day in the
25338  // infectious state before starting transmitting.
25339  std::vector< double > gen_times(
25340  this_const->get_ndays(), 1.0 + days_exposed
25341  );
25342 
25343  double p_c = this_const->par("Contact rate")/this_const->size();
25344  double p_i = this_const->par("Prob. Transmission");
25345  double p_r = this_const->par("Prob. Recovery");
25346 
25347  for (size_t i = 0u; i < this_const->get_ndays(); ++i)
25348  {
25349  gen_times[i] += gen_int_mean(
25350  S[i],
25351  p_c,
25352  p_i,
25353  p_r,
25354  max_days,
25355  max_contacts
25356  );
25357 
25358  }
25359 
25360  return gen_times;
25361 
25362 }
25363 
25364 #endif
25365 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
25367 
25368  End of -include/epiworld//models/seirconnected.hpp-
25369 
25372 
25373 
25374 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
25376 
25377  Start of -include/epiworld//models/sird.hpp-
25378 
25381 
25382

25384 #define EPIWORLD_SIRD_H
25385 
25389 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
25390 class ModelSIRD : public epiworld::Model<TSeq>
25391 {
25392 public:
25393

25395 
25396 
25408  ModelSIRD(
25409  ModelSIRD<TSeq> & model,
25410  const std::string & vname,
25411  epiworld_double prevalence,
25412  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
25413  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
25414  epiworld_double death_rate
25415  );
25416 
25417  ModelSIRD(
25418  const std::string & vname,
25419  epiworld_double prevalence,
25420  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
25421  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
25422  epiworld_double death_rate
25423  );

25439 template<typename TSeq>
25440 inline ModelSIRD<TSeq>::ModelSIRD(
25441  ModelSIRD<TSeq> & model,
25442  const std::string & vname,
25443  epiworld_double prevalence,
25444  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
25445  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
25446  epiworld_double death_rate
25447  )
25448 {
25449 
25450  // Adding statuses
25451  model.add_state("Susceptible", epiworld::default_update_susceptible<TSeq>);
25452  model.add_state("Infected", epiworld::default_update_exposed<TSeq>);
25453  model.add_state("Recovered"),
25454  model.add_state("Deceased")
25455  ;
25456 
25457  // Setting up parameters
25458  model.add_param(recovery_rate, "Recovery rate");
25459  model.add_param(transmission_rate, "Transmission rate"),
25460  model.add_param(death_rate, "Death rate");
25461 
25462  // Preparing the virus -------------------------------------------
25463  epiworld::Virus<TSeq> virus(vname, prevalence, true);
25464  virus.set_state(1,2,3);
25465  virus.set_prob_recovery(&model("Recovery rate"));
25466  virus.set_prob_infecting(&model("Transmission rate"));
25467  virus.set_prob_death(&model("Death rate"));
25468 
25469  model.add_virus(virus);
25470 
25471  model.set_name("Susceptible-Infected-Recovered-Deceased (SIRD)");
25472 
25473  return;
25474 
25475 }
25476

25571 
25572 template<typename TSeq>
25573 inline ModelSISD<TSeq>::ModelSISD(
25574  ModelSISD<TSeq> & model,
25575  const std::string & vname,
25576  epiworld_double prevalence,
25577  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
25578  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
25579  epiworld_double death_rate
25580  )
25581 {
25582 
25583  model.set_name("Susceptible-Infected-Susceptible-Deceased (SISD)");
25584 
25585  // Adding statuses
25586  model.add_state("Susceptible", epiworld::default_update_susceptible<TSeq>);
25587  model.add_state("Infected", epiworld::default_update_exposed<TSeq>);
25588  model.add_state("Deceased");
25589 
25590  // Setting up parameters
25591  model.add_param(transmission_rate, "Transmission rate");
25592  model.add_param(recovery_rate, "Recovery rate");
25593  model.add_param(death_rate, "Death rate");
25594 
25595  // Preparing the virus -------------------------------------------
25596  epiworld::Virus<TSeq> virus(vname, prevalence, true);
25597  virus.set_state(1,0,2);
25598 
25599  virus.set_prob_infecting(&model("Transmission rate"));
25600  virus.set_prob_recovery(&model("Recovery rate"));
25601  virus.set_prob_death(0.01);
25602 
25603  model.add_virus(virus);
25604 
25605  return;
25606 
25607 }

25637 
25640 
25641 
25642 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
25644 
25645  Start of -include/epiworld//models/seird.hpp-
25646 
25649 
25650 
25651 #ifndef EPIWORLD_MODELS_SEIRD_HPP
25652 #define EPIWORLD_MODELS_SEIRD_HPP
25653 
25657 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
25658 class ModelSEIRD : public epiworld::Model<TSeq>
25659 {
25660 
25661 public:
25662  static const int SUSCEPTIBLE = 0;
25663  static const int EXPOSED = 1;
25664  static const int INFECTED = 2;
25665  static const int REMOVED = 3;
25666  static const int DECEASED = 4;
25667 
25668  ModelSEIRD() {};
25669 
25682  ModelSEIRD(
25683  ModelSEIRD<TSeq> & model,
25684  const std::string & vname,
25685  epiworld_double prevalence,
25686  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
25687  epiworld_double avg_incubation_days,
25688  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
25689  epiworld_double death_rate
25690  );
25691 
25702  ModelSEIRD(
25703  const std::string & vname,
25704  epiworld_double prevalence,
25705  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
25706  epiworld_double avg_incubation_days,
25707  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
25708  epiworld_double death_rate
25709  );
25710 
25711  epiworld::UpdateFun<TSeq> update_exposed_seir = [](
25712  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p,
25713  epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m
25714  ) -> void {
25715 
25716  // Getting the virus
25717  auto v = p->get_virus();
25718 
25719  // Does the agent become infected?
25720  if (m->runif() < 1.0/(v->get_incubation(m)))
25721  p->change_state(m, ModelSEIRD<TSeq>::INFECTED);
25722 
25723  return;
25724  };
25725 
25726 
25727  epiworld::UpdateFun<TSeq> update_infected = [](
25728  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p, epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m
25729  ) -> void {
25730 
25731  // Odd: Die, Even: Recover
25732  epiworld_fast_uint n_events = 0u;
25733 
25734  const auto & v = p->get_virus();
25735 
25736  // Die
25737  m->array_double_tmp[n_events++] =
25738  v->get_prob_death(m) * (1.0 - p->get_death_reduction(v, m));
25739 
25740  // Recover
25741  m->array_double_tmp[n_events++] =
25742  1.0 - (1.0 - v->get_prob_recovery(m)) * (1.0 - p->get_recovery_enhancer(v, m));
25743 
25744 
25745 #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
25746  if (n_events == 0u)
25747  {
25748  printf_epiworld(
25749  "[epi-debug] agent %i has 0 possible events!!\n",
25750  static_cast<int>(p->get_id())
25751  );
25752  throw std::logic_error("Zero events in exposed.");
25753  }
25754 #else
25755  if (n_events == 0u)
25756  return;
25757 #endif
25758 
25759 
25760  // Running the roulette
25761  int which = roulette(n_events, m);
25762 
25763  if (which < 0)
25764  return;
25765 
25766  // Which roulette happen?
25767  if ((which % 2) == 0) // If odd
25768  {
25769 
25770  p->rm_agent_by_virus(m);
25771 
25772  } else {
25773 
25774  p->rm_virus(m);
25775 
25776  }
25777 
25778  return ;
25779 
25780 
25781 
25782  return;
25783 
25784  };
25785 
25786  ModelSEIRD<TSeq> & initial_states(
25787  std::vector< double > proportions_,
25788  std::vector< int > queue_ = {}
25789  );
25790 
25791 };
25792 
25793 
25794 
25795 template<typename TSeq>
25796 inline ModelSEIRD<TSeq>::ModelSEIRD(
25797  ModelSEIRD<TSeq> & model,
25798  const std::string & vname,
25799  epiworld_double prevalence,
25800  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
25801  epiworld_double avg_incubation_days,
25802  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
25803  epiworld_double death_rate
25804 )
25805 {
25806 
25807  // Adding statuses
25808  model.add_state("Susceptible", epiworld::default_update_susceptible<TSeq>);
25809  model.add_state("Exposed", model.update_exposed_seir);
25810  model.add_state("Infected", model.update_infected);
25811  model.add_state("Removed");
25812  model.add_state("Deceased");
25813 
25814  // Setting up parameters
25815  model.add_param(transmission_rate, "Transmission rate");
25816  model.add_param(avg_incubation_days, "Incubation days");
25817  model.add_param(recovery_rate, "Recovery rate");
25818  model.add_param(death_rate, "Death rate");
25819 
25820  // Preparing the virus -------------------------------------------
25821  epiworld::Virus<TSeq> virus(vname, prevalence, true);
25822  virus.set_state(ModelSEIRD<TSeq>::EXPOSED, ModelSEIRD<TSeq>::REMOVED, ModelSEIRD<TSeq>::DECEASED);
25823 
25824  virus.set_prob_infecting(&model("Transmission rate"));
25825  virus.set_incubation(&model("Incubation days"));
25826  virus.set_prob_death(&model("Death rate"));
25827  virus.set_prob_recovery(&model("Recovery rate"));
25828 
25829  // Adding the tool and the virus
25830  model.add_virus(virus);
25831 
25832  model.set_name("Susceptible-Exposed-Infected-Removed-Deceased (SEIRD)");
25833 
25834  return;
25835 
25836 }
25837 
25838 template<typename TSeq>
25839 inline ModelSEIRD<TSeq>::ModelSEIRD(
25840  const std::string & vname,
25841  epiworld_double prevalence,
25842  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
25843  epiworld_double avg_incubation_days,
25844  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
25845  epiworld_double death_rate
25846 )
25847 {
25848 
25849  ModelSEIRD<TSeq>(
25850  *this,
25851  vname,
25852  prevalence,
25853  transmission_rate,
25854  avg_incubation_days,
25855  recovery_rate,
25856  death_rate
25857  );
25858 
25859  return;
25860 
25861 }
25862 
25863 template<typename TSeq>
25864 inline ModelSEIRD<TSeq> & ModelSEIRD<TSeq>::initial_states(
25865  std::vector< double > proportions_,
25866  std::vector< int > /**/
25867 ) {
25868 
25869  Model<TSeq>::initial_states_fun =
25870  create_init_function_seird<TSeq>(proportions_)
25871  ;

25874 
25875 }

25878 #endif

25883 
25886 
25887 
25888 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
25890 
25891  Start of -include/epiworld//models/sirdconnected.hpp-
25892 
25895 
25896 
25897 #ifndef EPIWORLD_MODELS_SIRDCONNECTED_HPP
25898 #define EPIWORLD_MODELS_SIRDCONNECTED_HPP
25899 
25900 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
25901 class ModelSIRDCONN : public epiworld::Model<TSeq>
25902 {
25903 public:
25904  static const int SUSCEPTIBLE = 0;
25905  static const int INFECTED = 1;
25906  static const int RECOVERED = 2;
25907  static const int DECEASED = 3;
25908 
25909  ModelSIRDCONN() {
25910 
25911  // tracked_agents_infected.reserve(1e4);
25912  // tracked_agents_infected_next.reserve(1e4);
25913 
25914  };
25915 
25916  ModelSIRDCONN(
25917  ModelSIRDCONN<TSeq> & model,
25918  const std::string & vname,
25919  epiworld_fast_uint n,
25920  epiworld_double prevalence,
25921  epiworld_double contact_rate,
25922  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
25923  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
25924  epiworld_double death_rate
25925  );
25926 
25927  ModelSIRDCONN(
25928  const std::string & vname,
25929  epiworld_fast_uint n,
25930  epiworld_double prevalence,
25931  epiworld_double contact_rate,
25932  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
25933  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
25934  epiworld_double death_rate
25935  );
25936 
25937  // Tracking who is infected and who is not
25938  // std::vector< epiworld::Agent<TSeq>* > tracked_agents_infected = {};
25939  // std::vector< epiworld::Agent<TSeq>* > tracked_agents_infected_next = {};
25940  // std::vector< epiworld_double > tracked_agents_weight = {};
25941  // std::vector< epiworld_double > tracked_agents_weight_next = {};
25942 
25943  // int tracked_ninfected = 0;
25944  // int tracked_ninfected_next = 0;
25945  // epiworld_double tracked_current_infect_prob = 0.0;
25946

25948  epiworld_fast_uint ndays,
25949  int seed = -1
25950  );
25951

25953

25955 
25956 
25957 };

25972 template<typename TSeq>
25973 inline void ModelSIRDCONN<TSeq>::reset()
25974 {
25975

25977 
25978  // Model<TSeq>::set_rand_binom(
25979  // Model<TSeq>::size(),
25980  // static_cast<double>(
25981  // Model<TSeq>::par("Contact rate"))/
25982  // static_cast<double>(Model<TSeq>::size())
25983  // );
25984 
25985  return;
25986 
25987 }
25988 
25989 template<typename TSeq>
25990 inline Model<TSeq> * ModelSIRDCONN<TSeq>::clone_ptr()
25991 {
25992 
25993  ModelSIRDCONN<TSeq> * ptr = new ModelSIRDCONN<TSeq>(
25994  *dynamic_cast<const ModelSIRDCONN<TSeq>*>(this)
25995  );
25996 
25997  return dynamic_cast< Model<TSeq> *>(ptr);
25998 
25999 }
26000 
26012 template<typename TSeq>
26013 inline ModelSIRDCONN<TSeq>::ModelSIRDCONN(
26014  ModelSIRDCONN<TSeq> & model,
26015  const std::string & vname,
26016  epiworld_fast_uint n,
26017  epiworld_double prevalence,
26018  epiworld_double contact_rate,
26019  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
26020  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
26021  epiworld_double death_rate
26022  // epiworld_double prob_reinfection
26023  )
26024 {
26025 
26026 
26027 
26028  epiworld::UpdateFun<TSeq> update_susceptible = [](
26029  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p, epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m
26030  ) -> void
26031  {
26032 
26033  // Sampling how many individuals
26034  m->set_rand_binom(
26035  m->size(),
26036  static_cast<double>(
26037  m->par("Contact rate"))/
26038  static_cast<double>(m->size())
26039  );
26040 
26041  int ndraw = m->rbinom();
26042 
26043  if (ndraw == 0)
26044  return;
26045 
26046  // Drawing from the set
26047  int nviruses_tmp = 0;
26048  for (int i = 0; i < ndraw; ++i)
26049  {
26050  // Now selecting who is transmitting the disease
26051  int which = static_cast<int>(
26052  std::floor(m->size() * m->runif())
26053  );
26054 
26055  /* There is a bug in which runif() returns 1.0. It is rare, but
26056  * we saw it here. See the Notes section in the C++ manual
26057  * https://en.cppreference.com/mwiki/index.php?title=cpp/numeric/random/uniform_real_distribution&oldid=133329
26058  * And the reported bug in GCC:
26059  * https://gcc.gnu.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=63176
26060  *
26061  */
26062  if (which == static_cast<int>(m->size()))
26063  --which;
26064 
26065  // Can't sample itself
26066  if (which == static_cast<int>(p->get_id()))
26067  continue;
26068 
26069  // If the neighbor is infected, then proceed
26070  auto & neighbor = m->get_agents()[which];
26071  if (neighbor.get_state() == ModelSIRDCONN<TSeq>::INFECTED)
26072  {
26073 
26074  const auto & v = neighbor.get_virus();
26075 
26076  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
26077  if (nviruses_tmp >= static_cast<int>(m->array_virus_tmp.size()))
26078  throw std::logic_error("Trying to add an extra element to a temporal array outside of the range.");
26079  #endif
26080 
26081  /* And it is a function of susceptibility_reduction as well */
26082  m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp] =
26083  (1.0 - p->get_susceptibility_reduction(v, m)) *
26084  v->get_prob_infecting(m) *
26085  (1.0 - neighbor.get_transmission_reduction(v, m))
26086  ;
26087 
26088  m->array_virus_tmp[nviruses_tmp++] = &(*v);
26089 
26090  }
26091  }
26092 
26093  // No virus to compute
26094  if (nviruses_tmp == 0u)
26095  return;
26096 
26097  // Running the roulette
26098  int which = roulette(nviruses_tmp, m);
26099 
26100  if (which < 0)
26101  return;
26102 
26103  p->set_virus(*m->array_virus_tmp[which], m);
26104 
26105  return;
26106 
26107  };
26108 
26109 
26110  epiworld::UpdateFun<TSeq> update_infected = [](
26111  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p, epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m
26112  ) -> void {
26113 
26114  auto state = p->get_state();
26115 
26116  if (state == ModelSIRDCONN<TSeq>::INFECTED)
26117  {
26118 
26119 
26120  // Odd: Die, Even: Recover
26121  epiworld_fast_uint n_events = 0u;
26122  const auto & v = p->get_virus();
26123 
26124  // Die
26125  m->array_double_tmp[n_events++] =
26126  v->get_prob_death(m) * (1.0 - p->get_death_reduction(v, m));
26127 
26128  // Recover
26129  m->array_double_tmp[n_events++] =
26130  1.0 - (1.0 - v->get_prob_recovery(m)) * (1.0 - p->get_recovery_enhancer(v, m));
26131 
26132  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
26133  if (n_events == 0u)
26134  {
26135  printf_epiworld(
26136  "[epi-debug] agent %i has 0 possible events!!\n",
26137  static_cast<int>(p->get_id())
26138  );
26139  throw std::logic_error("Zero events in exposed.");
26140  }
26141  #else
26142  if (n_events == 0u)
26143  return;
26144  #endif
26145 
26146 
26147  // Running the roulette
26148  int which = roulette(n_events, m);
26149 
26150  if (which < 0)
26151  return;
26152 
26153  // Which roulette happen?
26154  if ((which % 2) == 0) // If odd
26155  {
26156 
26157  p->rm_agent_by_virus(m);
26158 
26159  } else {
26160 
26161  p->rm_virus(m);
26162 
26163  }
26164 
26165  return ;
26166 
26167  } else
26168  throw std::logic_error("This function can only be applied to infected individuals. (SIR)") ;
26169 
26170  return;
26171 
26172  };
26173 
26174  // state
26175  model.add_state("Susceptible", update_susceptible);
26176  model.add_state("Infected", update_infected);
26177  model.add_state("Recovered");
26178  model.add_state("Deceased");
26179 
26180 
26181  // Setting up parameters
26182  model.add_param(contact_rate, "Contact rate");
26183  model.add_param(transmission_rate, "Transmission rate");
26184  model.add_param(recovery_rate, "Recovery rate");
26185  model.add_param(death_rate, "Death rate");
26186  // model.add_param(prob_reinfection, "Prob. Reinfection");
26187 
26188  // Preparing the virus -------------------------------------------
26189  epiworld::Virus<TSeq> virus(vname, prevalence, true);
26190  virus.set_state(1, 2, 3);
26191  virus.set_prob_infecting(&model("Transmission rate"));
26192  virus.set_prob_recovery(&model("Recovery rate"));
26193  virus.set_prob_death(&model("Death rate"));
26194 
26195  model.add_virus(virus);
26196 
26197  model.queuing_off(); // No queuing need
26198 
26199  model.agents_empty_graph(n);
26200 
26201  model.set_name("Susceptible-Infected-Removed-Deceased (SIRD) (connected)");
26202 
26203  return;
26204 
26205 }
26206 
26207 template<typename TSeq>
26208 inline ModelSIRDCONN<TSeq>::ModelSIRDCONN(
26209  const std::string & vname,
26210  epiworld_fast_uint n,
26211  epiworld_double prevalence,
26212  epiworld_double contact_rate,
26213  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
26214  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
26215  epiworld_double death_rate
26216  )
26217 {
26218 
26219  ModelSIRDCONN(
26220  *this,
26221  vname,
26222  n,
26223  prevalence,
26224  contact_rate,
26225  transmission_rate,
26226  recovery_rate,
26227  death_rate
26228  );
26229 
26230  return;
26231 
26232 }
26233 
26234 
26235 #endif
26236 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
26238 
26239  End of -include/epiworld//models/sirdconnected.hpp-
26240 
26243 
26244 
26245 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
26247 
26248  Start of -include/epiworld//models/seirdconnected.hpp-
26249 
26252 
26253 
26254 #ifndef EPIWORLD_MODELS_SEIRDCONNECTED_HPP
26255 #define EPIWORLD_MODELS_SEIRDCONNECTED_HPP
26256 
26257 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
26258 class ModelSEIRDCONN : public epiworld::Model<TSeq>
26259 {
26260 private:
26261  std::vector< epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * > infected;
26262  void update_infected();
26263 
26264 public:
26265 
26266  static const int SUSCEPTIBLE = 0;
26267  static const int EXPOSED = 1;
26268  static const int INFECTED = 2;
26269  static const int REMOVED = 3;
26270  static const int DECEASED = 4;
26271 
26272  ModelSEIRDCONN() {};
26273 
26274  ModelSEIRDCONN(
26275  ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq> & model,
26276  const std::string & vname,
26277  epiworld_fast_uint n,
26278  epiworld_double prevalence,
26279  epiworld_double contact_rate,
26280  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
26281  epiworld_double avg_incubation_days,
26282  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
26283  epiworld_double death_rate
26284  );
26285 
26286  ModelSEIRDCONN(
26287  const std::string & vname,
26288  epiworld_fast_uint n,
26289  epiworld_double prevalence,
26290  epiworld_double contact_rate,
26291  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
26292  epiworld_double avg_incubation_days,
26293  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
26294  epiworld_double death_rate
26295  );
26296 
26297  ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq> & run(
26298  epiworld_fast_uint ndays,
26299  int seed = -1
26300  );
26301 
26302  void reset();
26303 
26304  Model<TSeq> * clone_ptr();
26305 
26312  ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq> & initial_states(
26313  std::vector< double > proportions_,
26314  std::vector< int > queue_ = {}
26315  );
26316 
26317  size_t get_n_infected() const
26318  {
26319  return infected.size();
26320  }
26321 
26322 };
26323 
26324 template<typename TSeq>
26325 inline void ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq>::update_infected()
26326 {
26327  infected.clear();
26328  infected.reserve(this->size());
26329 
26330  for (auto & p : this->get_agents())
26331  {
26332  if (p.get_state() == ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq>::INFECTED)
26333  {
26334  infected.push_back(&p);
26335  }
26336  }
26337 
26338  Model<TSeq>::set_rand_binom(
26339  this->get_n_infected(),
26340  static_cast<double>(Model<TSeq>::par("Contact rate"))/
26341  static_cast<double>(Model<TSeq>::size())
26342  );
26343 
26344  return;
26345 }
26346 
26347 template<typename TSeq>
26348 inline ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq> & ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq>::run(
26349  epiworld_fast_uint ndays,
26350  int seed
26351 )
26352 {
26353 
26354  Model<TSeq>::run(ndays, seed);
26355 
26356  return *this;
26357 
26358 }
26359 
26360 template<typename TSeq>
26361 inline void ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq>::reset()
26362 {
26363 
26364  Model<TSeq>::reset();
26365 
26366  this->update_infected();
26367 
26368  return;
26369 
26370 }
26371 
26372 template<typename TSeq>
26373 inline Model<TSeq> * ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq>::clone_ptr()
26374 {
26375 
26376  ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq> * ptr = new ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq>(
26377  *dynamic_cast<const ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq>*>(this)
26378  );
26379 
26380  return dynamic_cast< Model<TSeq> *>(ptr);
26381 
26382 }
26383 
26395 template<typename TSeq>
26396 inline ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq>::ModelSEIRDCONN(
26397  ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq> & model,
26398  const std::string & vname,
26399  epiworld_fast_uint n,
26400  epiworld_double prevalence,
26401  epiworld_double contact_rate,
26402  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
26403  epiworld_double avg_incubation_days,
26404  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
26405  epiworld_double death_rate
26406  // epiworld_double prob_reinfection
26407  )
26408 {
26409 
26410  epiworld::UpdateFun<TSeq> update_susceptible = [](
26411  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p, epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m
26412  ) -> void
26413  {
26414 
26415  // Sampling how many individuals
26416  int ndraw = m->rbinom();
26417 
26418  if (ndraw == 0)
26419  return;
26420 
26421  ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq> * model = dynamic_cast<ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq> *>(
26422  m
26423  );
26424 
26425  size_t ninfected = model->get_n_infected();
26426 
26427  // Drawing from the set
26428  int nviruses_tmp = 0;
26429  for (int i = 0; i < ndraw; ++i)
26430  {
26431  // Now selecting who is transmitting the disease
26432  int which = static_cast<int>(
26433  std::floor(ninfected * m->runif())
26434  );
26435 
26436  /* There is a bug in which runif() returns 1.0. It is rare, but
26437  * we saw it here. See the Notes section in the C++ manual
26438  * https://en.cppreference.com/mwiki/index.php?title=cpp/numeric/random/uniform_real_distribution&oldid=133329
26439  * And the reported bug in GCC:
26440  * https://gcc.gnu.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=63176
26441  *
26442  */
26443  if (which == static_cast<int>(ninfected))
26444  --which;
26445 
26446  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> & neighbor = *model->infected[which];
26447 
26448  // Can't sample itself
26449  if (neighbor.get_id() == p->get_id())
26450  continue;
26451 
26452  // All neighbors in this set are infected by construction
26453  const auto & v = neighbor.get_virus();
26454 
26455  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
26456  if (nviruses_tmp >= static_cast<int>(m->array_virus_tmp.size()))
26457  throw std::logic_error("Trying to add an extra element to a temporal array outside of the range.");
26458  #endif
26459 
26460  /* And it is a function of susceptibility_reduction as well */
26461  m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp] =
26462  (1.0 - p->get_susceptibility_reduction(v, m)) *
26463  v->get_prob_infecting(m) *
26464  (1.0 - neighbor.get_transmission_reduction(v, m))
26465  ;
26466 
26467  m->array_virus_tmp[nviruses_tmp++] = &(*v);
26468  }
26469 
26470  // No virus to compute
26471  if (nviruses_tmp == 0u)
26472  return;
26473 
26474  // Running the roulette
26475  int which = roulette(nviruses_tmp, m);
26476 
26477  if (which < 0)
26478  return;
26479 
26480  p->set_virus(
26481  *m->array_virus_tmp[which],
26482  m,
26483  ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq>::EXPOSED
26484  );
26485 
26486  return;
26487 
26488  };
26489 
26490  epiworld::UpdateFun<TSeq> update_infected = [](
26491  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p, epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m
26492  ) -> void {
26493 
26494  auto state = p->get_state();
26495 
26496  if (state == ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq>::EXPOSED)
26497  {
26498 
26499  // Getting the virus
26500  auto & v = p->get_virus();
26501 
26502  // Does the agent become infected?
26503  if (m->runif() < 1.0/(v->get_incubation(m)))
26504  {
26505 
26506  p->change_state(m, ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq>::INFECTED);
26507  return;
26508 
26509  }
26510 
26511 
26512  } else if (state == ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq>::INFECTED)
26513  {
26514 
26515  // Odd: Die, Even: Recover
26516  epiworld_fast_uint n_events = 0u;
26517  const auto & v = p->get_virus();
26518 
26519  // Die
26520  m->array_double_tmp[n_events++] =
26521  v->get_prob_death(m) * (1.0 - p->get_death_reduction(v, m));
26522 
26523  // Recover
26524  m->array_double_tmp[n_events++] =
26525  1.0 - (1.0 - v->get_prob_recovery(m)) * (1.0 - p->get_recovery_enhancer(v, m));
26526 
26527  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
26528  if (n_events == 0u)
26529  {
26530  printf_epiworld(
26531  "[epi-debug] agent %i has 0 possible events!!\n",
26532  static_cast<int>(p->get_id())
26533  );
26534  throw std::logic_error("Zero events in exposed.");
26535  }
26536  #else
26537  if (n_events == 0u)
26538  return;
26539  #endif
26540 
26541 
26542  // Running the roulette
26543  int which = roulette(n_events, m);
26544 
26545  if (which < 0)
26546  return;
26547 
26548  // Which roulette happen?
26549  if ((which % 2) == 0) // If odd
26550  {
26551 
26552  p->rm_agent_by_virus(m);
26553 
26554  } else {
26555 
26556  p->rm_virus(m);
26557 
26558  }
26559 
26560  return ;
26561 
26562  } else
26563  throw std::logic_error("This function can only be applied to exposed or infected individuals. (SEIRD)") ;
26564 
26565  return;
26566 
26567  };
26568 
26569  // Setting up parameters
26570  model.add_param(contact_rate, "Contact rate");
26571  model.add_param(transmission_rate, "Prob. Transmission");
26572  model.add_param(recovery_rate, "Prob. Recovery");
26573  model.add_param(avg_incubation_days, "Avg. Incubation days");
26574  model.add_param(death_rate, "Death rate");
26575 
26576  // state
26577  model.add_state("Susceptible", update_susceptible);
26578  model.add_state("Exposed", update_infected);
26579  model.add_state("Infected", update_infected);
26580  model.add_state("Removed");
26581  model.add_state("Deceased");
26582 
26583 
26584  // Adding update function
26585  epiworld::GlobalFun<TSeq> update = [](epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m) -> void
26586  {
26587  ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq> * model = dynamic_cast<ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq> *>(m);
26588 
26589  if (model == nullptr)
26590  throw std::logic_error(
26591  std::string("Internal error in the ModelSEIRDCONN model: ") +
26592  std::string("The model returns a null pointer.")
26593  );
26594  else
26595  model->update_infected();
26596 
26597  return;
26598  };
26599 
26600  model.add_globalevent(update, "Update infected individuals");
26601 
26602 
26603  // Preparing the virus -------------------------------------------
26604  epiworld::Virus<TSeq> virus(vname, prevalence, true);
26605  virus.set_state(
26606  ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq>::EXPOSED,
26607  ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq>::REMOVED,
26608  ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq>::DECEASED
26609  );
26610 
26611  virus.set_prob_infecting(&model("Prob. Transmission"));
26612  virus.set_prob_recovery(&model("Prob. Recovery"));
26613  virus.set_incubation(&model("Avg. Incubation days"));
26614  virus.set_prob_death(&model("Death rate"));
26615  model.add_virus(virus);
26616 
26617  model.queuing_off(); // No queuing need
26618 
26619  // Adding the empty population
26620  model.agents_empty_graph(n);
26621 
26622  model.set_name("Susceptible-Exposed-Infected-Removed-Deceased (SEIRD) (connected)");
26623 
26624  return;
26625 
26626 }
26627 
26628 template<typename TSeq>
26629 inline ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq>::ModelSEIRDCONN(
26630  const std::string & vname,
26631  epiworld_fast_uint n,
26632  epiworld_double prevalence,
26633  epiworld_double contact_rate,
26634  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
26635  epiworld_double avg_incubation_days,
26636  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
26637  epiworld_double death_rate
26638  )
26639 {
26640 
26641  ModelSEIRDCONN(
26642  *this,
26643  vname,
26644  n,
26645  prevalence,
26646  contact_rate,
26647  transmission_rate,
26648  avg_incubation_days,
26649  recovery_rate,
26650  death_rate
26651  );
26652 
26653  return;
26654 
26655 }
26656 
26657 template<typename TSeq>
26658 inline ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq> & ModelSEIRDCONN<TSeq>::initial_states(
26659  std::vector< double > proportions_,
26660  std::vector< int >
26661 ) {
26662 
26663  Model<TSeq>::initial_states_fun =
26664  create_init_function_seird<TSeq>(proportions_)
26665  ;
26666 
26667  return *this;
26668 
26669 }
26670 
26671 #endif
26672 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
26674 
26675  End of -include/epiworld//models/seirdconnected.hpp-
26676 
26679 
26680 
26681 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
26683 
26684  Start of -include/epiworld//models/sirlogit.hpp-
26685 
26688 
26689 
26690 // #include "../epiworld.hpp"
26691 
26692 #ifndef EPIWORLD_MODELS_SIRLOGIT_HPP
26693 #define EPIWORLD_MODELS_SIRLOGIT_HPP
26694 
26695 
26723 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
26724 class ModelSIRLogit : public epiworld::Model<TSeq>
26725 {
26726 private:
26727  static const int SUSCEPTIBLE = 0;
26728  static const int INFECTED = 1;
26729  static const int RECOVERED = 2;
26730 
26731 public:
26732 
26733  ModelSIRLogit() {};
26734 
26744  ModelSIRLogit(
26745  ModelSIRLogit<TSeq> & model,
26746  const std::string & vname,
26747  double * data,
26748  size_t ncols,
26749  std::vector< double > coefs_infect,
26750  std::vector< double > coefs_recover,
26751  std::vector< size_t > coef_infect_cols,
26752  std::vector< size_t > coef_recover_cols,
26753  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
26754  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
26755  epiworld_double prevalence
26756  );
26757 
26758  ModelSIRLogit(
26759  const std::string & vname,
26760  double * data,
26761  size_t ncols,
26762  std::vector< double > coefs_infect,
26763  std::vector< double > coefs_recover,
26764  std::vector< size_t > coef_infect_cols,
26765  std::vector< size_t > coef_recover_cols,
26766  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
26767  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
26768  epiworld_double prevalence
26769  );
26770 
26771  ModelSIRLogit<TSeq> & run(
26772  epiworld_fast_uint ndays,
26773  int seed = -1
26774  );
26775 
26776  Model<TSeq> * clone_ptr();
26777 
26778  void reset();
26779 
26780  std::vector< double > coefs_infect;
26781  std::vector< double > coefs_recover;
26782  std::vector< size_t > coef_infect_cols;
26783  std::vector< size_t > coef_recover_cols;
26784 
26785 };
26786 
26787 
26788 
26789 template<typename TSeq>
26790 inline ModelSIRLogit<TSeq> & ModelSIRLogit<TSeq>::run(
26791  epiworld_fast_uint ndays,
26792  int seed
26793 )
26794 {
26795 
26796  Model<TSeq>::run(ndays, seed);
26797  return *this;
26798 
26799 }
26800 
26801 template<typename TSeq>
26802 inline Model<TSeq> * ModelSIRLogit<TSeq>::clone_ptr()
26803 {
26804 
26805  ModelSIRLogit<TSeq> * ptr = new ModelSIRLogit<TSeq>(
26806  *dynamic_cast<const ModelSIRLogit<TSeq>*>(this)
26807  );
26808 
26809  return dynamic_cast< Model<TSeq> *>(ptr);
26810 
26811 }
26812 
26813 template<typename TSeq>
26814 inline void ModelSIRLogit<TSeq>::reset()
26815 {
26816 
26817  /* Checking specified columns in the model */
26818  for (const auto & c : coef_infect_cols)
26819  {
26820  if (c >= Model<TSeq>::agents_data_ncols)
26821  throw std::range_error("Columns specified in coef_infect_cols out of range.");
26822  }
26823 
26824  for (const auto & c : coef_recover_cols)
26825  {
26826  if (c >= Model<TSeq>::agents_data_ncols)
26827  throw std::range_error("Columns specified in coef_recover_cols out of range.");
26828  }
26829 
26830  /* Checking attributes */
26831  if (coefs_infect.size() != (coef_infect_cols.size() + 1u))
26832  throw std::logic_error(
26833  "The number of coefficients (infection) doesn't match the number of features. It must be as many features of the agents plus 1 (exposure.)"
26834  );
26835 
26836  if (coefs_recover.size() != coef_recover_cols.size())
26837  throw std::logic_error(
26838  "The number of coefficients (recovery) doesn't match the number of features. It must be as many features of the agents."
26839  );
26840 
26841  Model<TSeq>::reset();
26842 
26843  return;
26844 
26845 }
26846 
26857 template<typename TSeq>
26858 inline ModelSIRLogit<TSeq>::ModelSIRLogit(
26859  ModelSIRLogit<TSeq> & model,
26860  const std::string & vname,
26861  double * data,
26862  size_t ncols,
26863  std::vector< double > coefs_infect,
26864  std::vector< double > coefs_recover,
26865  std::vector< size_t > coef_infect_cols,
26866  std::vector< size_t > coef_recover_cols,
26867  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
26868  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
26869  epiworld_double prevalence
26870  )
26871 {
26872 
26873  if (coef_infect_cols.size() == 0u)
26874  throw std::logic_error("No columns specified for coef_infect_cols.");
26875 
26876  if (coef_recover_cols.size() == 0u)
26877  throw std::logic_error("No columns specified for coef_recover_cols.");
26878 
26879  // Saving the variables
26880  model.set_agents_data(
26881  data, ncols
26882  );
26883 
26884  model.coefs_infect = coefs_infect;
26885  model.coefs_recover = coefs_recover;
26886  model.coef_infect_cols = coef_infect_cols;
26887  model.coef_recover_cols = coef_recover_cols;
26888 
26889  epiworld::UpdateFun<TSeq> update_susceptible = [](
26890  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p, epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m
26891  ) -> void
26892  {
26893 
26894  // Getting the right type
26895  ModelSIRLogit<TSeq> * _m = dynamic_cast<ModelSIRLogit<TSeq>*>(m);
26896 
26897  // Exposure coefficient
26898  const double coef_exposure = _m->coefs_infect[0u];
26899 
26900  // This computes the prob of getting any neighbor variant
26901  size_t nviruses_tmp = 0u;
26902 
26903  double baseline = 0.0;
26904  for (size_t k = 0u; k < _m->coef_infect_cols.size(); ++k)
26905  baseline += p->operator[](k) * _m->coefs_infect[k + 1u];
26906 
26907  for (auto & neighbor: p->get_neighbors())
26908  {
26909 
26910  if (neighbor->get_virus() == nullptr)
26911  continue;
26912 
26913  auto & v = neighbor->get_virus();
26914 
26915  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
26916  if (nviruses_tmp >= m->array_virus_tmp.size())
26917  throw std::logic_error("Trying to add an extra element to a temporal array outside of the range.");
26918  #endif
26919 
26920  /* And it is a function of susceptibility_reduction as well */
26921  m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp] =
26922  baseline +
26923  (1.0 - p->get_susceptibility_reduction(v, m)) *
26924  v->get_prob_infecting(m) *
26925  (1.0 - neighbor->get_transmission_reduction(v, m)) *
26926  coef_exposure
26927  ;
26928 
26929  // Applying the plogis function
26930  m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp] = 1.0/
26931  (1.0 + std::exp(-m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp]));
26932 
26933  m->array_virus_tmp[nviruses_tmp++] = &(*v);
26934 
26935  }
26936 
26937  // No virus to compute
26938  if (nviruses_tmp == 0u)
26939  return;
26940 
26941  // Running the roulette
26942  int which = roulette(nviruses_tmp, m);
26943 
26944  if (which < 0)
26945  return;
26946 
26947  p->set_virus(*m->array_virus_tmp[which], m);
26948 
26949  return;
26950 
26951  };
26952 
26953  epiworld::UpdateFun<TSeq> update_infected = [](
26954  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p, epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m
26955  ) -> void
26956  {
26957 
26958  // Getting the right type
26959  ModelSIRLogit<TSeq> * _m = dynamic_cast<ModelSIRLogit<TSeq>*>(m);
26960 
26961  // Computing recovery probability once
26962  double prob = 0.0;
26963  #if defined(__OPENMP) || defined(_OPENMP)
26964  #pragma omp simd reduction(+:prob)
26965  #endif
26966  for (size_t i = 0u; i < _m->coefs_recover.size(); ++i)
26967  prob += p->operator[](i) * _m->coefs_recover[i];
26968 
26969  // Computing logis
26970  prob = 1.0/(1.0 + std::exp(-prob));
26971 
26972  if (prob > m->runif())
26973  p->rm_virus(m);
26974 
26975  return;
26976 
26977  };
26978 
26979  // state
26980  model.add_state("Susceptible", update_susceptible);
26981  model.add_state("Infected", update_infected);
26982  model.add_state("Recovered");
26983 
26984  // Setting up parameters
26985  // model.add_param(contact_rate, "Contact rate");
26986  model.add_param(transmission_rate, "Transmission rate");
26987  model.add_param(recovery_rate, "Recovery rate");
26988  // model.add_param(prob_reinfection, "Prob. Reinfection");
26989 
26990  // Preparing the virus -------------------------------------------
26991  epiworld::Virus<TSeq> virus(vname, prevalence, true);
26992  virus.set_state(
26993  ModelSIRLogit<TSeq>::INFECTED,
26994  ModelSIRLogit<TSeq>::RECOVERED,
26995  ModelSIRLogit<TSeq>::RECOVERED
26996  );
26997 
26998  virus.set_prob_infecting(&model("Transmission rate"));
26999  virus.set_prob_recovery(&model("Recovery rate"));
27000 
27001  // virus.set_prob
27002 
27003  model.add_virus(virus);
27004 
27005  model.set_name("Susceptible-Infected-Removed (SIR) (logit)");
27006 
27007  return;
27008 
27009 }
27010 
27011 template<typename TSeq>
27012 inline ModelSIRLogit<TSeq>::ModelSIRLogit(
27013  const std::string & vname,
27014  double * data,
27015  size_t ncols,
