27016  std::vector< double > coefs_infect,
27017  std::vector< double > coefs_recover,
27018  std::vector< size_t > coef_infect_cols,
27019  std::vector< size_t > coef_recover_cols,
27020  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
27021  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
27022  epiworld_double prevalence
27023  )
27024 {
27025 
27026  ModelSIRLogit(
27027  *this,
27028  vname,
27029  data,
27030  ncols,
27031  coefs_infect,
27032  coefs_recover,
27033  coef_infect_cols,
27034  coef_recover_cols,
27035  transmission_rate,
27036  recovery_rate,
27037  prevalence
27038  );
27039 
27040  return;
27041 
27042 }
27043 
27044 
27045 #endif
27046 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
27048 
27049  End of -include/epiworld//models/sirlogit.hpp-
27050 
27053 
27054 
27055 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
27057 
27058  Start of -include/epiworld//models/diffnet.hpp-
27059 
27062 
27063 
27064 #ifndef EPIWORLD_DIFFNET_H
27065 #define EPIWORLD_DIFFNET_H
27066 
27076 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
27077 class ModelDiffNet : public epiworld::Model<TSeq>
27078 {
27079 private:
27080 public:
27081 
27082  ModelDiffNet() {};
27083 
27084  ModelDiffNet(
27085  ModelDiffNet<TSeq> & model,
27086  const std::string & innovation_name,
27087  epiworld_double prevalence,
27088  epiworld_double prob_adopt,
27089  bool normalize_exposure = true,
27090  double * agents_data = nullptr,
27091  size_t data_ncols = 0u,
27092  std::vector< size_t > data_cols = {},
27093  std::vector< double > params = {}
27094  );
27095 
27096  ModelDiffNet(
27097  const std::string & innovation_name,
27098  epiworld_double prevalence,
27099  epiworld_double prob_adopt,
27100  bool normalize_exposure = true,
27101  double * agents_data = nullptr,
27102  size_t data_ncols = 0u,
27103  std::vector< size_t > data_cols = {},
27104  std::vector< double > params = {}
27105  );
27106 
27107  static const int NONADOPTER = 0;
27108  static const int ADOPTER = 1;
27109 
27110  bool normalize_exposure = true;
27111  std::vector< size_t > data_cols;
27112  std::vector< double > params;
27113 };
27114 
27115 template<typename TSeq>
27116 inline ModelDiffNet<TSeq>::ModelDiffNet(
27117  ModelDiffNet<TSeq> & model,
27118  const std::string & innovation_name,
27119  epiworld_double prevalence,
27120  epiworld_double prob_adopt,
27121  bool normalize_exposure,
27122  double * agents_data,
27123  size_t data_ncols,
27124  std::vector< size_t > data_cols,
27125  std::vector< double > params
27126  )
27127 {
27128 
27129  // Adding additional parameters
27130  this->normalize_exposure = normalize_exposure;
27131  this->data_cols = data_cols;
27132  this->params = params;
27133 
27134  epiworld::UpdateFun<TSeq> update_non_adopters = [](
27135  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p, epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m
27136  ) -> void {
27137 
27138  // Measuring exposure
27139  // If the neighbor is infected, then proceed
27140  size_t nviruses = m->get_n_viruses();
27141  std::vector< Virus<TSeq>* > innovations(nviruses, {});
27142  std::vector< bool > stored(nviruses, false);
27143  std::vector< double > exposure(nviruses, 0.0);
27144 
27145  ModelDiffNet<TSeq> * diffmodel = dynamic_cast<ModelDiffNet<TSeq>*>(m);
27146 
27147  Agent<TSeq> & agent = *p;
27148 
27149  // For each one of the possible innovations, we have to compute
27150  // the adoption probability, which is a function of exposure
27151  for (auto & neighbor: agent.get_neighbors())
27152  {
27153 
27154  if (neighbor->get_state() == ModelDiffNet<TSeq>::ADOPTER)
27155  {
27156 
27157  auto & v = neighbor->get_virus();
27158 
27159  if (v == nullptr)
27160  continue;
27161 
27162  /* And it is a function of susceptibility_reduction as well */
27163  double p_i =
27164  (1.0 - agent.get_susceptibility_reduction(v, m)) *
27165  (1.0 - agent.get_transmission_reduction(v, m))
27166  ;
27167 
27168  size_t vid = v->get_id();
27169  if (!stored[vid])
27170  {
27171  stored[vid] = true;
27172  innovations[vid] = &(*v);
27173  }
27174  exposure[vid] += p_i;
27175 
27176 
27177  }
27178 
27179  }
27180 
27181  // Computing probability of adoption
27182  for (size_t i = 0u; i < nviruses; ++i)
27183  {
27184 
27185  if (diffmodel->normalize_exposure)
27186  exposure.at(i) /= agent.get_n_neighbors();
27187 
27188  for (auto & j: diffmodel->data_cols)
27189  exposure.at(i) += agent(j) * diffmodel->params.at(j);
27190 
27191  // Baseline probability of adoption
27192  double p = m->get_viruses()[i]->get_prob_infecting(m);
27193  exposure.at(i) += std::log(p) - std::log(1.0 - p);
27194 
27195  // Computing as log
27196  exposure.at(i) = 1.0/(1.0 + std::exp(-exposure.at(i)));
27197 
27198  }
27199 
27200  // Running the roulette to see is an innovation is adopted
27201  int which = roulette<int>(exposure, m);
27202 
27203  // No innovation was adopted
27204  if (which < 0)
27205  return;
27206 
27207  // Otherwise, it is adopted from any of the neighbors
27208  agent.set_virus(
27209  *innovations.at(which),
27210  m,
27211  ModelDiffNet::ADOPTER
27212  );
27213 
27214  return;
27215 
27216  };
27217 
27218  // Adding agents data
27219  model.set_agents_data(agents_data, data_ncols);
27220 
27221  // Adding statuses
27222  model.add_state("Non adopters", update_non_adopters);
27223  model.add_state("Adopters");
27224 
27225  // Adding parameters
27226  std::string parname = std::string("Prob. Adopting ") + innovation_name;
27227  model.add_param(prob_adopt, parname);
27228 
27229  // Preparing the virus -------------------------------------------
27230  epiworld::Virus<TSeq> innovation(innovation_name, prevalence, true);
27231  innovation.set_state(1,1,1);
27232 
27233  innovation.set_prob_infecting(&model(parname));
27234 
27235  model.add_virus(innovation);
27236 
27237  model.set_name(
27238  std::string("Diffusion of Innovations - ") + innovation_name);
27239 
27240  return;
27241 
27242 }
27243 
27244 template<typename TSeq>
27245 inline ModelDiffNet<TSeq>::ModelDiffNet(
27246  const std::string & innovation_name,
27247  epiworld_double prevalence,
27248  epiworld_double prob_adopt,
27249  bool normalize_exposure,
27250  double * agents_data,
27251  size_t data_ncols,
27252  std::vector< size_t > data_cols,
27253  std::vector< double > params
27254  )
27255 {
27256 
27257  ModelDiffNet<TSeq>(
27258  *this,
27259  innovation_name,
27260  prevalence,
27261  prob_adopt,
27262  normalize_exposure,
27263  agents_data,
27264  data_ncols,
27265  data_cols,
27266  params
27267  );
27268 
27269  return;
27270 
27271 }
27272 
27273 #endif
27274 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
27276 
27277  End of -include/epiworld//models/diffnet.hpp-
27278 
27281 
27282 
27283 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
27285 
27286  Start of -include/epiworld//models/seirmixing.hpp-
27287 
27290 
27291 
27292 #ifndef EPIWORLD_MODELS_SEIRMIXING_HPP
27293 #define EPIWORLD_MODELS_SEIRMIXING_HPP
27294 
27295 #define MM(i, j, n) \
27296  j * n + i
27297 
27298 #if __cplusplus >= 202302L
27299  // C++23 or later
27300  #define GET_MODEL(model, output) \
27301  auto * output = dynamic_cast< ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq> * >( (model) ); \
27302  /*Using the [[assume(...)]] to avoid the compiler warning \
27303  if the standard is C++23 or later */ \
27304  [[assume((output) != nullptr)]]
27305 #else
27306  // C++17 or C++20
27307  #define GET_MODEL(model, output) \
27308  auto * output = dynamic_cast< ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq> * >( (model) ); \
27309  assert((output) != nullptr); // Use assert for runtime checks
27310 #endif
27311 
27316 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
27317 class ModelSEIRMixing : public epiworld::Model<TSeq>
27318 {
27319 private:
27320 
27321  // Vector of vectors of infected agents
27322  std::vector< size_t > infected;
27323 
27324  // Number of infected agents in each group
27325  std::vector< size_t > n_infected_per_group;
27326 
27327  // Where the agents start in the `infected` vector
27328  std::vector< size_t > entity_indices;
27329 
27330  void update_infected_list();
27331  std::vector< size_t > sampled_agents;
27332  size_t sample_agents(
27333  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * agent,
27334  std::vector< size_t > & sampled_agents
27335  );
27336  std::vector< double > adjusted_contact_rate;
27337  std::vector< double > contact_matrix;
27338 
27339  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
27340  std::vector< int > sampled_sizes;
27341  #endif
27342 
27343 public:
27344 
27345  static const int SUSCEPTIBLE = 0;
27346  static const int EXPOSED = 1;
27347  static const int INFECTED = 2;
27348  static const int RECOVERED = 3;
27349 
27350  ModelSEIRMixing() {};
27351 
27366  ModelSEIRMixing(
27367  ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq> & model,
27368  const std::string & vname,
27369  epiworld_fast_uint n,
27370  epiworld_double prevalence,
27371  epiworld_double contact_rate,
27372  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
27373  epiworld_double avg_incubation_days,
27374  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
27375  std::vector< double > contact_matrix
27376  );
27377 
27390  ModelSEIRMixing(
27391  const std::string & vname,
27392  epiworld_fast_uint n,
27393  epiworld_double prevalence,
27394  epiworld_double contact_rate,
27395  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
27396  epiworld_double avg_incubation_days,
27397  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
27398  std::vector< double > contact_matrix
27399  );
27400 
27401  ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq> & run(
27402  epiworld_fast_uint ndays,
27403  int seed = -1
27404  );
27405 
27406  void reset();
27407 
27408  Model<TSeq> * clone_ptr();
27409 
27415  ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq> & initial_states(
27416  std::vector< double > proportions_,
27417  std::vector< int > queue_ = {}
27418  );
27419 
27420  void set_contact_matrix(std::vector< double > cmat)
27421  {
27422  contact_matrix = cmat;
27423  return;
27424  };
27425 
27426 };
27427 
27428 template<typename TSeq>
27429 inline void ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq>::update_infected_list()
27430 {
27431 
27432  auto & agents = Model<TSeq>::get_agents();
27433 
27434  std::fill(n_infected_per_group.begin(), n_infected_per_group.end(), 0u);
27435 
27436  for (auto & a : agents)
27437  {
27438 
27439  if (a.get_state() == ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq>::INFECTED)
27440  {
27441  if (a.get_n_entities() > 0u)
27442  {
27443  const auto & entity = a.get_entity(0u);
27444  infected[
27445  // Position of the group in the `infected` vector
27446  entity_indices[entity.get_id()] +
27447  // Position of the agent in the group
27448  n_infected_per_group[entity.get_id()]++
27449  ] = a.get_id();
27450 
27451  }
27452  }
27453 
27454  }
27455 
27456  return;
27457 
27458 }
27459 
27460 template<typename TSeq>
27461 inline size_t ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq>::sample_agents(
27462  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * agent,
27463  std::vector< size_t > & sampled_agents
27464  )
27465 {
27466 
27467  size_t agent_group_id = agent->get_entity(0u).get_id();
27468  size_t ngroups = this->entities.size();
27469 
27470  int samp_id = 0;
27471  for (size_t g = 0; g < ngroups; ++g)
27472  {
27473 
27474  size_t group_size = n_infected_per_group[g];
27475 
27476  // How many from this entity?
27477  int nsamples = epiworld::Model<TSeq>::rbinom(
27478  group_size,
27479  adjusted_contact_rate[g] * contact_matrix[
27480  MM(agent_group_id, g, ngroups)
27481  ]
27482  );
27483 
27484  if (nsamples == 0)
27485  continue;
27486 
27487  // Sampling from the entity
27488  for (int s = 0; s < nsamples; ++s)
27489  {
27490 
27491  // Randomly selecting an agent
27492  int which = epiworld::Model<TSeq>::runif() * group_size;
27493 
27494  // Correcting overflow error
27495  if (which >= static_cast<int>(group_size))
27496  which = static_cast<int>(group_size) - 1;
27497 
27498  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
27499  auto & a = this->population.at(infected.at(entity_indices[g] + which));
27500  #else
27501  auto & a = this->get_agent(infected[entity_indices[g] + which]);
27502  #endif
27503 
27504  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
27505  if (a.get_state() != ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq>::INFECTED)
27506  throw std::logic_error(
27507  "The agent is not infected, but it should be."
27508  );
27509  #endif
27510 
27511  // Can't sample itself
27512  if (a.get_id() == agent->get_id())
27513  continue;
27514 
27515  sampled_agents[samp_id++] = a.get_id();
27516 
27517  }
27518 
27519  }
27520 
27521  return samp_id;
27522 
27523 }
27524 
27525 template<typename TSeq>
27526 inline ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq> & ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq>::run(
27527  epiworld_fast_uint ndays,
27528  int seed
27529 )
27530 {
27531 
27532  Model<TSeq>::run(ndays, seed);
27533 
27534  return *this;
27535 
27536 }
27537 
27538 template<typename TSeq>
27539 inline void ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq>::reset()
27540 {
27541 
27542  Model<TSeq>::reset();
27543 
27544  // Checking contact matrix's rows add to one
27545  size_t nentities = this->entities.size();
27546  if (this->contact_matrix.size() != nentities*nentities)
27547  throw std::length_error(
27548  std::string("The contact matrix must be a square matrix of size ") +
27549  std::string("nentities x nentities. ") +
27550  std::to_string(this->contact_matrix.size()) +
27551  std::string(" != ") + std::to_string(nentities*nentities) +
27552  std::string(".")
27553  );
27554 
27555  for (size_t i = 0u; i < this->entities.size(); ++i)
27556  {
27557  double sum = 0.0;
27558  for (size_t j = 0u; j < this->entities.size(); ++j)
27559  {
27560  if (this->contact_matrix[MM(i, j, nentities)] < 0.0)
27561  throw std::range_error(
27562  std::string("The contact matrix must be non-negative. ") +
27563  std::to_string(this->contact_matrix[MM(i, j, nentities)]) +
27564  std::string(" < 0.")
27565  );
27566  sum += this->contact_matrix[MM(i, j, nentities)];
27567  }
27568  if (sum < 0.999 || sum > 1.001)
27569  throw std::range_error(
27570  std::string("The contact matrix must have rows that add to one. ") +
27571  std::to_string(sum) +
27572  std::string(" != 1.")
27573  );
27574  }
27575 
27576  // Do it the first time only
27577  sampled_agents.resize(Model<TSeq>::size());
27578 
27579  // We only do it once
27580  n_infected_per_group.resize(this->entities.size(), 0u);
27581  std::fill(n_infected_per_group.begin(), n_infected_per_group.end(), 0u);
27582 
27583  // We are assuming one agent per entity
27584  infected.resize(Model<TSeq>::size());
27585  std::fill(infected.begin(), infected.end(), 0u);
27586 
27587  // This will say when do the groups start in the `infected` vector
27588  entity_indices.resize(this->entities.size(), 0u);
27589  std::fill(entity_indices.begin(), entity_indices.end(), 0u);
27590  for (size_t i = 1u; i < this->entities.size(); ++i)
27591  {
27592 
27593  entity_indices[i] +=
27594  this->entities[i - 1].size() +
27595  entity_indices[i - 1]
27596  ;
27597 
27598  }
27599 
27600  // Adjusting contact rate
27601  adjusted_contact_rate.clear();
27602  adjusted_contact_rate.resize(this->entities.size(), 0.0);
27603 
27604  for (size_t i = 0u; i < this->entities.size(); ++i)
27605  {
27606 
27607  adjusted_contact_rate[i] =
27608  Model<TSeq>::get_param("Contact rate") /
27609  static_cast< epiworld_double > (this->get_entity(i).size());
27610 
27611 
27612  // Possibly correcting for a small number of agents
27613  if (adjusted_contact_rate[i] > 1.0)
27614  adjusted_contact_rate[i] = 1.0;
27615 
27616  }
27617 
27618  this->update_infected_list();
27619 
27620  return;
27621 
27622 }
27623 
27624 template<typename TSeq>
27625 inline Model<TSeq> * ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq>::clone_ptr()
27626 {
27627 
27628  ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq> * ptr = new ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq>(
27629  *dynamic_cast<const ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq>*>(this)
27630  );
27631 
27632  #if __cplusplus >= 202302L
27633  // C++23 or later
27634  [[assume(ptr != nullptr)]]
27635  #else
27636  // C++17 or C++20
27637  assert(ptr != nullptr); // Use assert for runtime checks
27638  #endif
27639 
27640  return dynamic_cast< Model<TSeq> *>(ptr);
27641 
27642 }
27643 
27644 
27655 template<typename TSeq>
27656 inline ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq>::ModelSEIRMixing(
27657  ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq> & model,
27658  const std::string & vname,
27659  epiworld_fast_uint n,
27660  epiworld_double prevalence,
27661  epiworld_double contact_rate,
27662  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
27663  epiworld_double avg_incubation_days,
27664  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
27665  std::vector< double > contact_matrix
27666  )
27667 {
27668 
27669  // Setting up the contact matrix
27670  this->contact_matrix = contact_matrix;
27671 
27672  epiworld::UpdateFun<TSeq> update_susceptible = [](
27673  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p, epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m
27674  ) -> void
27675  {
27676 
27677  if (p->get_n_entities() == 0)
27678  return;
27679 
27680  // Downcasting to retrieve the sampler attached to the
27681  // class
27682  GET_MODEL(m, m_down);
27683 
27684  size_t ndraws = m_down->sample_agents(p, m_down->sampled_agents);
27685 
27686  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
27687  m_down->sampled_sizes.push_back(static_cast<int>(ndraws));
27688  #endif
27689 
27690  if (ndraws == 0u)
27691  return;
27692 
27693  // Drawing from the set
27694  int nviruses_tmp = 0;
27695  for (size_t n = 0u; n < ndraws; ++n)
27696  {
27697 
27698  auto & neighbor = m->get_agent(m_down->sampled_agents[n]);
27699 
27700  auto & v = neighbor.get_virus();
27701 
27702  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
27703  if (nviruses_tmp >= static_cast<int>(m->array_virus_tmp.size()))
27704  throw std::logic_error(
27705  "Trying to add an extra element to a temporal array outside of the range."
27706  );
27707  #endif
27708 
27709  /* And it is a function of susceptibility_reduction as well */
27710  m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp] =
27711  (1.0 - p->get_susceptibility_reduction(v, m)) *
27712  v->get_prob_infecting(m) *
27713  (1.0 - neighbor.get_transmission_reduction(v, m))
27714  ;
27715 
27716  m->array_virus_tmp[nviruses_tmp++] = &(*v);
27717 
27718  }
27719 
27720  // Running the roulette
27721  int which = roulette(nviruses_tmp, m);
27722 
27723  if (which < 0)
27724  return;
27725 
27726  p->set_virus(
27727  *m->array_virus_tmp[which],
27728  m,
27729  ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq>::EXPOSED
27730  );
27731 
27732  return;
27733 
27734  };
27735 
27736  epiworld::UpdateFun<TSeq> update_exposed_and_infected = [](
27737  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p, epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m
27738  ) -> void {
27739 
27740  auto state = p->get_state();
27741 
27742  if (state == ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq>::EXPOSED)
27743  {
27744 
27745  // Getting the virus
27746  auto & v = p->get_virus();
27747 
27748  // Does the agent become infected?
27749  if (m->runif() < 1.0/(v->get_incubation(m)))
27750  {
27751 
27752  p->change_state(m, ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq>::INFECTED);
27753  return;
27754 
27755  }
27756 
27757 
27758  } else if (state == ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq>::INFECTED)
27759  {
27760 
27761 
27762  // Odd: Die, Even: Recover
27763  epiworld_fast_uint n_events = 0u;
27764  const auto & v = p->get_virus();
27765 
27766  // Recover
27767  m->array_double_tmp[n_events++] =
27768  1.0 - (1.0 - v->get_prob_recovery(m)) * (1.0 - p->get_recovery_enhancer(v, m));
27769 
27770  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
27771  if (n_events == 0u)
27772  {
27773  printf_epiworld(
27774  "[epi-debug] agent %i has 0 possible events!!\n",
27775  static_cast<int>(p->get_id())
27776  );
27777  throw std::logic_error("Zero events in exposed.");
27778  }
27779  #else
27780  if (n_events == 0u)
27781  return;
27782  #endif
27783 
27784 
27785  // Running the roulette
27786  int which = roulette(n_events, m);
27787 
27788  if (which < 0)
27789  return;
27790 
27791  // Which roulette happen?
27792  p->rm_virus(m);
27793 
27794  return ;
27795 
27796  } else
27797  throw std::logic_error("This function can only be applied to exposed or infected individuals. (SEIR)") ;
27798 
27799  return;
27800 
27801  };
27802 
27803  // Setting up parameters
27804  model.add_param(contact_rate, "Contact rate");
27805  model.add_param(transmission_rate, "Prob. Transmission");
27806  model.add_param(recovery_rate, "Prob. Recovery");
27807  model.add_param(avg_incubation_days, "Avg. Incubation days");
27808 
27809  // state
27810  model.add_state("Susceptible", update_susceptible);
27811  model.add_state("Exposed", update_exposed_and_infected);
27812  model.add_state("Infected", update_exposed_and_infected);
27813  model.add_state("Recovered");
27814 
27815  // Global function
27816  epiworld::GlobalFun<TSeq> update = [](epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m) -> void
27817  {
27818 
27819  GET_MODEL(m, m_down);
27820 
27821  m_down->update_infected_list();
27822 
27823  return;
27824 
27825  };
27826 
27827  model.add_globalevent(update, "Update infected individuals");
27828 
27829 
27830  // Preparing the virus -------------------------------------------
27831  epiworld::Virus<TSeq> virus(vname, prevalence, true);
27832  virus.set_state(
27833  ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq>::EXPOSED,
27834  ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq>::RECOVERED,
27835  ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq>::RECOVERED
27836  );
27837 
27838  virus.set_prob_infecting(&model("Prob. Transmission"));
27839  virus.set_prob_recovery(&model("Prob. Recovery"));
27840  virus.set_incubation(&model("Avg. Incubation days"));
27841 
27842  model.add_virus(virus);
27843 
27844  model.queuing_off(); // No queuing need
27845 
27846  // Adding the empty population
27847  model.agents_empty_graph(n);
27848 
27849  model.set_name("Susceptible-Exposed-Infected-Removed (SEIR) with Mixing");
27850 
27851  return;
27852 
27853 }
27854 
27855 template<typename TSeq>
27856 inline ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq>::ModelSEIRMixing(
27857  const std::string & vname,
27858  epiworld_fast_uint n,
27859  epiworld_double prevalence,
27860  epiworld_double contact_rate,
27861  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
27862  epiworld_double avg_incubation_days,
27863  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
27864  std::vector< double > contact_matrix
27865  )
27866 {
27867 
27868  this->contact_matrix = contact_matrix;
27869 
27870  ModelSEIRMixing(
27871  *this,
27872  vname,
27873  n,
27874  prevalence,
27875  contact_rate,
27876  transmission_rate,
27877  avg_incubation_days,
27878  recovery_rate,
27879  contact_matrix
27880  );
27881 
27882  return;
27883 
27884 }
27885 
27886 template<typename TSeq>
27887 inline ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq> & ModelSEIRMixing<TSeq>::initial_states(
27888  std::vector< double > proportions_,
27889  std::vector< int > /* queue_ */
27890 )
27891 {
27892 
27893  Model<TSeq>::initial_states_fun =
27894  create_init_function_seir<TSeq>(proportions_)
27895  ;
27896 
27897  return *this;
27898 
27899 }
27900 #undef MM
27901 #undef GET_MODEL
27902 #endif
27903 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
27905 
27906  End of -include/epiworld//models/seirmixing.hpp-
27907 
27910 
27911 
27912 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
27914 
27915  Start of -include/epiworld//models/sirmixing.hpp-
27916 
27919 
27920 
27921 #ifndef EPIWORLD_MODELS_SIRMIXING_HPP
27922 #define EPIWORLD_MODELS_SIRMIXING_HPP
27923 
27924 #if __cplusplus >= 202302L
27925  // C++23 or later
27926  #define GET_MODEL(model, output) \
27927  auto * output = dynamic_cast< ModelSIRMixing<TSeq> * >( (model) ); \
27928  /*Using the [[assume(...)]] to avoid the compiler warning \
27929  if the standard is C++23 or later */ \
27930  [[assume((output) != nullptr)]]
27931 #else
27932  // C++17 or C++20
27933  #define GET_MODEL(model, output) \
27934  auto * output = dynamic_cast< ModelSIRMixing<TSeq> * >( (model) ); \
27935  assert((output) != nullptr); // Use assert for runtime checks
27936 #endif
27937 
27942 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
27943 class ModelSIRMixing : public epiworld::Model<TSeq>
27944 {
27945 private:
27946 
27947  // Vector of infected agents
27948  std::vector< size_t > infected;
27949  size_t n_infected;
27950 
27951  // Number of infected agents in each group
27952  std::vector< size_t > n_infected_per_group;
27953 
27954  // Where the agents start in the `infected` vector
27955  std::vector< size_t > entity_indices;
27956 
27957  void update_infected_list();
27958  std::vector< size_t > sampled_agents;
27959  size_t sample_agents(
27960  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * agent,
27961  std::vector< size_t > & sampled_agents
27962  );
27963 
27964  std::vector< double > adjusted_contact_rate;
27965  std::vector< double > contact_matrix;
27966 
27967  size_t index(size_t i, size_t j, size_t n) {
27968  return j * n + i;
27969  }
27970 
27971 public:
27972 
27973  static const int SUSCEPTIBLE = 0;
27974  static const int INFECTED = 1;
27975  static const int RECOVERED = 2;
27976 
27977  ModelSIRMixing() {};
27978 
27991  ModelSIRMixing(
27992  ModelSIRMixing<TSeq> & model,
27993  const std::string & vname,
27994  epiworld_fast_uint n,
27995  epiworld_double prevalence,
27996  epiworld_double contact_rate,
27997  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
27998  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
27999  std::vector< double > contact_matrix
28000  );
28001 
28013  ModelSIRMixing(
28014  const std::string & vname,
28015  epiworld_fast_uint n,
28016  epiworld_double prevalence,
28017  epiworld_double contact_rate,
28018  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
28019  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
28020  std::vector< double > contact_matrix
28021  );
28022 
28023  ModelSIRMixing<TSeq> & run(
28024  epiworld_fast_uint ndays,
28025  int seed = -1
28026  );
28027 
28028  void reset();
28029 
28030  Model<TSeq> * clone_ptr();
28031 
28037  ModelSIRMixing<TSeq> & initial_states(
28038  std::vector< double > proportions_,
28039  std::vector< int > queue_ = {}
28040  );
28041 
28042  size_t get_n_infected(size_t group) const
28043  {
28044  return n_infected_per_group[group];
28045  }
28046 
28047  void set_contact_matrix(std::vector< double > cmat)
28048  {
28049  contact_matrix = cmat;
28050  return;
28051  };
28052 
28053 };
28054 
28055 template<typename TSeq>
28056 inline void ModelSIRMixing<TSeq>::update_infected_list()
28057 {
28058  auto & agents = Model<TSeq>::get_agents();
28059 
28060  std::fill(n_infected_per_group.begin(), n_infected_per_group.end(), 0u);
28061  n_infected = 0;
28062 
28063  for (auto & a : agents)
28064  {
28065  if (a.get_state() == ModelSIRMixing<TSeq>::INFECTED)
28066  {
28067  if (a.get_n_entities() > 0u)
28068  {
28069  const auto & entity = a.get_entity(0u);
28070  infected[
28071  // Position of the group in the `infected` vector
28072  entity_indices[entity.get_id()] +
28073  // Position of the agent in the group
28074  n_infected_per_group[entity.get_id()]++
28075  ] = a.get_id();
28076 
28077  // Incrementing the overall counter
28078  n_infected++;
28079  }
28080  }
28081  }
28082 
28083  return;
28084 }
28085 
28086 template<typename TSeq>
28087 inline size_t ModelSIRMixing<TSeq>::sample_agents(
28088  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * agent,
28089  std::vector< size_t > & sampled_agents
28090  )
28091 {
28092 
28093  size_t agent_group_id = agent->get_entity(0u).get_id();
28094  size_t ngroups = this->entities.size();
28095 
28096  int samp_id = 0;
28097  for (size_t g = 0; g < ngroups; ++g)
28098  {
28099 
28100  size_t group_size = n_infected_per_group[g];
28101 
28102  // How many from this entity?
28103  int nsamples = epiworld::Model<TSeq>::rbinom(
28104  group_size,
28105  adjusted_contact_rate[g] * contact_matrix[
28106  index(agent_group_id, g, ngroups)
28107  ]
28108  );
28109 
28110  if (nsamples == 0)
28111  continue;
28112 
28113  // Sampling from the entity
28114  for (int s = 0; s < nsamples; ++s)
28115  {
28116 
28117  // Randomly selecting an agent
28118  int which = epiworld::Model<TSeq>::runif() * group_size;
28119 
28120  // Correcting overflow error
28121  if (which >= static_cast<int>(group_size))
28122  which = static_cast<int>(group_size) - 1;
28123 
28124  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
28125  auto & a = this->population.at(infected.at(entity_indices[g] + which));
28126  #else
28127  auto & a = this->get_agent(infected[entity_indices[g] + which]);
28128  #endif
28129 
28130  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
28131  if (a.get_state() != ModelSIRMixing<TSeq>::INFECTED)
28132  throw std::logic_error(
28133  "The agent is not infected, but it should be."
28134  );
28135  #endif
28136 
28137  // Can't sample itself
28138  if (a.get_id() == agent->get_id())
28139  continue;
28140 
28141  sampled_agents[samp_id++] = a.get_id();
28142 
28143  }
28144 
28145  }
28146 
28147  return samp_id;
28148 
28149 }
28150 
28151 template<typename TSeq>
28152 inline ModelSIRMixing<TSeq> & ModelSIRMixing<TSeq>::run(
28153  epiworld_fast_uint ndays,
28154  int seed
28155 )
28156 {
28157 
28158  Model<TSeq>::run(ndays, seed);
28159  return *this;
28160 
28161 }
28162 
28163 template<typename TSeq>
28164 inline void ModelSIRMixing<TSeq>::reset()
28165 {
28166 
28167  Model<TSeq>::reset();
28168 
28169  // Checking contact matrix's rows add to one
28170  size_t nentities = this->entities.size();
28171  if (this->contact_matrix.size() != nentities*nentities)
28172  throw std::length_error(
28173  std::string("The contact matrix must be a square matrix of size ") +
28174  std::string("nentities x nentities. ") +
28175  std::to_string(this->contact_matrix.size()) +
28176  std::string(" != ") + std::to_string(nentities*nentities) +
28177  std::string(".")
28178  );
28179 
28180  for (size_t i = 0u; i < this->entities.size(); ++i)
28181  {
28182  double sum = 0.0;
28183  for (size_t j = 0u; j < this->entities.size(); ++j)
28184  {
28185  if (this->contact_matrix[index(i, j, nentities)] < 0.0)
28186  throw std::range_error(
28187  std::string("The contact matrix must be non-negative. ") +
28188  std::to_string(this->contact_matrix[index(i, j, nentities)]) +
28189  std::string(" < 0.")
28190  );
28191  sum += this->contact_matrix[index(i, j, nentities)];
28192  }
28193  if (sum < 0.999 || sum > 1.001)
28194  throw std::range_error(
28195  std::string("The contact matrix must have rows that add to one. ") +
28196  std::to_string(sum) +
28197  std::string(" != 1.")
28198  );
28199  }
28200 
28201  // Do it the first time only
28202  sampled_agents.resize(Model<TSeq>::size());
28203 
28204  // We only do it once
28205  n_infected_per_group.resize(this->entities.size(), 0u);
28206  std::fill(n_infected_per_group.begin(), n_infected_per_group.end(), 0u);
28207 
28208  // We are assuming one agent per entity
28209  infected.resize(Model<TSeq>::size());
28210  std::fill(infected.begin(), infected.end(), 0u);
28211 
28212  // This will say when do the groups start in the `infected` vector
28213  entity_indices.resize(this->entities.size(), 0u);
28214  std::fill(entity_indices.begin(), entity_indices.end(), 0u);
28215  for (size_t i = 1u; i < this->entities.size(); ++i)
28216  {
28217  entity_indices[i] +=
28218  this->entities[i - 1].size() +
28219  entity_indices[i - 1]
28220  ;
28221  }
28222 
28223  // Adjusting contact rate
28224  adjusted_contact_rate.clear();
28225  adjusted_contact_rate.resize(this->entities.size(), 0.0);
28226 
28227  for (size_t i = 0u; i < this->entities.size(); ++i)
28228  {
28229  adjusted_contact_rate[i] =
28230  Model<TSeq>::get_param("Contact rate") /
28231  static_cast< epiworld_double > (this->get_entity(i).size());
28232 
28233  // Possibly correcting for a small number of agents
28234  if (adjusted_contact_rate[i] > 1.0)
28235  adjusted_contact_rate[i] = 1.0;
28236  }
28237 
28238  this->update_infected_list();
28239 
28240  return;
28241 }
28242 
28243 template<typename TSeq>
28244 inline Model<TSeq> * ModelSIRMixing<TSeq>::clone_ptr()
28245 {
28246 
28247  ModelSIRMixing<TSeq> * ptr = new ModelSIRMixing<TSeq>(
28248  *dynamic_cast<const ModelSIRMixing<TSeq>*>(this)
28249  );
28250 
28251  return dynamic_cast< Model<TSeq> *>(ptr);
28252 
28253 }
28254 
28255 
28266 template<typename TSeq>
28267 inline ModelSIRMixing<TSeq>::ModelSIRMixing(
28268  ModelSIRMixing<TSeq> & model,
28269  const std::string & vname,
28270  epiworld_fast_uint n,
28271  epiworld_double prevalence,
28272  epiworld_double contact_rate,
28273  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
28274  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
28275  std::vector< double > contact_matrix
28276  )
28277 {
28278 
28279  // Setting up the contact matrix
28280  this->contact_matrix = contact_matrix;
28281 
28282  epiworld::UpdateFun<TSeq> update_susceptible = [](
28283  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p, epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m
28284  ) -> void
28285  {
28286 
28287  if (p->get_n_entities() == 0)
28288  return;
28289 
28290  // Downcasting to retrieve the sampler attached to the
28291  // class
28292  GET_MODEL(m, m_down);
28293 
28294  size_t ndraws = m_down->sample_agents(p, m_down->sampled_agents);
28295 
28296  if (ndraws == 0u)
28297  return;
28298 
28299 
28300  // Drawing from the set
28301  int nviruses_tmp = 0;
28302  for (size_t n = 0u; n < ndraws; ++n)
28303  {
28304 
28305  auto & neighbor = m->get_agent(m_down->sampled_agents[n]);
28306 
28307  auto & v = neighbor.get_virus();
28308 
28309  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
28310  if (nviruses_tmp >= static_cast<int>(m->array_virus_tmp.size()))
28311  throw std::logic_error("Trying to add an extra element to a temporal array outside of the range.");
28312  #endif
28313 
28314  /* And it is a function of susceptibility_reduction as well */
28315  m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp] =
28316  (1.0 - p->get_susceptibility_reduction(v, m)) *
28317  v->get_prob_infecting(m) *
28318  (1.0 - neighbor.get_transmission_reduction(v, m))
28319  ;
28320 
28321  m->array_virus_tmp[nviruses_tmp++] = &(*v);
28322 
28323  }
28324 
28325  // Running the roulette
28326  int which = roulette(nviruses_tmp, m);
28327 
28328  if (which < 0)
28329  return;
28330 
28331  p->set_virus(
28332  *m->array_virus_tmp[which],
28333  m,
28334  ModelSIRMixing<TSeq>::INFECTED
28335  );
28336 
28337  return;
28338 
28339  };
28340 
28341  epiworld::UpdateFun<TSeq> update_infected = [](
28342  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p, epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m
28343  ) -> void {
28344 
28345  auto state = p->get_state();
28346 
28347  if (state == ModelSIRMixing<TSeq>::INFECTED)
28348  {
28349 
28350 
28351  // Odd: Die, Even: Recover
28352  epiworld_fast_uint n_events = 0u;
28353  const auto & v = p->get_virus();
28354 
28355  // Recover
28356  m->array_double_tmp[n_events++] =
28357  1.0 - (1.0 - v->get_prob_recovery(m)) * (1.0 - p->get_recovery_enhancer(v, m));
28358 
28359  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
28360  if (n_events == 0u)
28361  {
28362  printf_epiworld(
28363  "[epi-debug] agent %i has 0 possible events!!\n",
28364  static_cast<int>(p->get_id())
28365  );
28366  throw std::logic_error("Zero events in infected.");
28367  }
28368  #else
28369  if (n_events == 0u)
28370  return;
28371  #endif
28372 
28373 
28374  // Running the roulette
28375  int which = roulette(n_events, m);
28376 
28377  if (which < 0)
28378  return;
28379 
28380  // Which roulette happen?
28381  p->rm_virus(m);
28382 
28383  return ;
28384 
28385  } else
28386  throw std::logic_error("This function can only be applied to infected individuals. (SIR)") ;
28387 
28388  return;
28389 
28390  };
28391 
28392  // Setting up parameters
28393  model.add_param(contact_rate, "Contact rate");
28394  model.add_param(transmission_rate, "Prob. Transmission");
28395  model.add_param(recovery_rate, "Prob. Recovery");
28396 
28397  // state
28398  model.add_state("Susceptible", update_susceptible);
28399  model.add_state("Infected", update_infected);
28400  model.add_state("Recovered");
28401 
28402  // Global function
28403  epiworld::GlobalFun<TSeq> update = [](epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m) -> void
28404  {
28405 
28406  GET_MODEL(m, m_down);
28407 
28408  m_down->update_infected_list();
28409 
28410  return;
28411 
28412  };
28413 
28414  model.add_globalevent(update, "Update infected individuals");
28415 
28416 
28417  // Preparing the virus -------------------------------------------
28418  epiworld::Virus<TSeq> virus(vname, prevalence, true);
28419  virus.set_state(
28420  ModelSIRMixing<TSeq>::INFECTED,
28421  ModelSIRMixing<TSeq>::RECOVERED,
28422  ModelSIRMixing<TSeq>::RECOVERED
28423  );
28424 
28425  virus.set_prob_infecting(&model("Prob. Transmission"));
28426  virus.set_prob_recovery(&model("Prob. Recovery"));
28427 
28428  model.add_virus(virus);
28429 
28430  model.queuing_off(); // No queuing need
28431 
28432  // Adding the empty population
28433  model.agents_empty_graph(n);
28434 
28435  model.set_name("Susceptible-Infected-Removed (SIR) with Mixing");
28436 
28437  return;
28438 
28439 }
28440 
28441 template<typename TSeq>
28442 inline ModelSIRMixing<TSeq>::ModelSIRMixing(
28443  const std::string & vname,
28444  epiworld_fast_uint n,
28445  epiworld_double prevalence,
28446  epiworld_double contact_rate,
28447  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
28448  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
28449  std::vector< double > contact_matrix
28450  )
28451 {
28452 
28453  this->contact_matrix = contact_matrix;
28454 
28455  ModelSIRMixing(
28456  *this,
28457  vname,
28458  n,
28459  prevalence,
28460  contact_rate,
28461  transmission_rate,
28462  recovery_rate,
28463  contact_matrix
28464  );
28465 
28466  return;
28467 
28468 }
28469 
28470 template<typename TSeq>
28471 inline ModelSIRMixing<TSeq> & ModelSIRMixing<TSeq>::initial_states(
28472  std::vector< double > proportions_,
28473  std::vector< int > /* queue_ */
28474 )
28475 {
28476 
28477  Model<TSeq>::initial_states_fun =
28478  create_init_function_sir<TSeq>(proportions_)
28479  ;
28480 
28481  return *this;
28482 
28483 }
28484 
28485 #undef GET_MODEL
28486 #endif
28487 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
28489 
28490  End of -include/epiworld//models/sirmixing.hpp-
28491 
28494 
28495 
28496 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
28498 
28499  Start of -include/epiworld//models/measlesquarantine.hpp-
28500 
28503 
28504 
28505 #ifndef MEASLESQUARANTINE_HPP
28506 #define MEASLESQUARANTINE_HPP
28507 
28508 #if __cplusplus >= 202302L
28509  // C++23 or later
28510  #define GET_MODEL(model, output) \
28511  ModelMeaslesSchool<TSeq> * output = \
28512  dynamic_cast<ModelMeaslesSchool<TSeq> *>(model); \
28513  [[assume(output != nullptr)]]
28514 #else
28515  // C++17 or C++20
28516  #define GET_MODEL(model, output) \
28517  ModelMeaslesSchool<TSeq> * output = \
28518  dynamic_cast<ModelMeaslesSchool<TSeq> *>(model); \
28519  assert(output != nullptr); // Use assert for runtime checks
28520 #endif
28521 
28522 #define LOCAL_UPDATE_FUN(name) \
28523  template<typename TSeq> \
28524  inline void ModelMeaslesSchool<TSeq>:: name \
28525  (epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p, epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m)
28526 
28527 #define SAMPLE_FROM_PROBS(n, ans) \
28528  size_t ans; \
28529  epiworld_double p_total = m->runif(); \
28530  for (ans = 0u; ans < n; ++ans) \
28531  { \
28532  if (p_total < m->array_double_tmp[ans]) \
28533  break; \
28534  m->array_double_tmp[ans + 1] += m->array_double_tmp[ans]; \
28535  }
28536 
28552 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
28553 class ModelMeaslesSchool: public Model<TSeq> {
28554 
28555 private:
28556 
28561  static void m_update_susceptible(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m);
28562  static void m_update_exposed(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m);
28563  static void m_update_prodromal(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m);
28564  static void m_update_rash(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m);
28565  static void m_update_isolated(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m);
28566  static void m_update_isolated_recovered(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m);
28567  static void m_update_q_exposed(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m);
28568  static void m_update_q_susceptible(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m);
28569  static void m_update_q_prodromal(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m);
28570  static void m_update_q_recovered(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m);
28571  static void m_update_hospitalized(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m);
28573 
28579  static void m_update_model(Model<TSeq> * m);
28580 
28581 public:
28582 
28583  static const epiworld_fast_uint SUSCEPTIBLE = 0u;
28584  static const epiworld_fast_uint EXPOSED = 1u;
28585  static const epiworld_fast_uint PRODROMAL = 2u;
28586  static const epiworld_fast_uint RASH = 3u;
28587  static const epiworld_fast_uint ISOLATED = 4u;
28588  static const epiworld_fast_uint ISOLATED_RECOVERED = 5u;
28589  static const epiworld_fast_uint DETECTED_HOSPITALIZED = 6u;
28590  static const epiworld_fast_uint QUARANTINED_EXPOSED = 7u;
28591  static const epiworld_fast_uint QUARANTINED_SUSCEPTIBLE = 8u;
28592  static const epiworld_fast_uint QUARANTINED_PRODROMAL = 9u;
28593  static const epiworld_fast_uint QUARANTINED_RECOVERED = 10u;
28594  static const epiworld_fast_uint HOSPITALIZED = 11u;
28595  static const epiworld_fast_uint RECOVERED = 12u;
28596 
28597  // Default constructor
28598  ModelMeaslesSchool() {};
28599 
28619  ModelMeaslesSchool(
28620  ModelMeaslesSchool<TSeq> & model,
28621  epiworld_fast_uint n,
28622  epiworld_fast_uint n_exposed,
28623  // Disease parameters
28624  epiworld_double contact_rate,
28625  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
28626  epiworld_double vax_efficacy,
28627  epiworld_double vax_reduction_recovery_rate,
28628  epiworld_double incubation_period,
28629  epiworld_double prodromal_period,
28630  epiworld_double rash_period,
28631  epiworld_double days_undetected,
28632  epiworld_double hospitalization_rate,
28633  epiworld_double hospitalization_period,
28634  // Policy parameters
28635  epiworld_double prop_vaccinated,
28636  epiworld_fast_int quarantine_period,
28637  epiworld_double quarantine_willingness,
28638  epiworld_fast_int isolation_period
28639  );
28640 
28641  ModelMeaslesSchool(
28642  epiworld_fast_uint n,
28643  epiworld_fast_uint n_exposed,
28644  // Disease parameters
28645  epiworld_double contact_rate,
28646  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
28647  epiworld_double vax_efficacy,
28648  epiworld_double vax_reduction_recovery_rate,
28649  epiworld_double incubation_period,
28650  epiworld_double prodromal_period,
28651  epiworld_double rash_period,
28652  epiworld_double days_undetected,
28653  epiworld_double hospitalization_rate,
28654  epiworld_double hospitalization_period,
28655  // Policy parameters
28656  epiworld_double prop_vaccinated,
28657  epiworld_fast_int quarantine_period,
28658  epiworld_double quarantine_willingness,
28659  epiworld_fast_int isolation_period
28660  );
28662 
28663  std::vector<Agent<TSeq> *> infectious; ///< Agents infectious for contact
28664 
28665  bool system_quarantine_triggered = false;
28666 
28667  std::vector< int > day_flagged; ///< Either detected or started quarantine
28668  std::vector< int > day_rash_onset; ///< Day of rash onset
28669 
28688  void quarantine_agents();
28689 
28690  void reset();
28691  void update_infectious();
28692 
28693  Model<TSeq> * clone_ptr();
28694 
28695 };
28696 
28697 template<typename TSeq>
28698 inline void ModelMeaslesSchool<TSeq>::quarantine_agents() {
28699 
28700  // Iterating through the new cases
28701  if (!system_quarantine_triggered)
28702  return;
28703 
28704  // Quarantine and isolation can be shut off if negative
28705  if (
28706  (this->par("Quarantine period") < 0) &&
28707  (this->par("Isolation period") < 0)
28708  )
28709  return;
28710 
28711  // Capturing the days that matter and the probability of success
28712  epiworld_double willingness = this->par("Quarantine willingness");
28713 
28714  // Iterating through the
28715  for (size_t i = 0u; i < this->size(); ++i) {
28716 
28717  auto agent_state = this->get_agent(i).get_state();
28718 
28719  // Already quarantined or isolated
28720  if (agent_state >= RASH)
28721  continue;
28722 
28723  // If the agent has a vaccine, then no need for quarantine
28724  if (this->get_agent(i).get_n_tools() != 0u)
28725  continue;
28726 
28727  // Quarantine will depend on the willingness of the agent
28728  // to be quarantined. If negative, then quarantine never happens.
28729  if (
28730  (this->par("Quarantine period") >= 0) &&
28731  (this->runif() < willingness)
28732  )
28733  {
28734 
28735  if (agent_state == SUSCEPTIBLE)
28736  this->get_agent(i).change_state(this, QUARANTINED_SUSCEPTIBLE);
28737  else if (agent_state == EXPOSED)
28738  this->get_agent(i).change_state(this, QUARANTINED_EXPOSED);
28739  else if (agent_state == PRODROMAL)
28740  this->get_agent(i).change_state(this, QUARANTINED_PRODROMAL);
28741 
28742  // And we add the day of quarantine
28743  this->day_flagged[i] = this->today();
28744 
28745  }
28746 
28747  }
28748 
28749  // Setting the quarantine process off
28750  this->system_quarantine_triggered = false;
28751 
28752  return;
28753 
28754 }
28755 
28756 
28757 template<typename TSeq>
28758 inline void ModelMeaslesSchool<TSeq>::m_update_model(Model<TSeq> * m) {
28759 
28760  GET_MODEL(m, model);
28761  model->quarantine_agents();
28762  model->events_run();
28763  model->update_infectious();
28764  return;
28765 
28766 }
28767 
28768 template<typename TSeq>
28769 inline void ModelMeaslesSchool<TSeq>::reset() {
28770 
28771  Model<TSeq>::reset();
28772 
28773  this->system_quarantine_triggered = false;
28774 
28775  this->day_flagged.resize(this->size(), 0);
28776  std::fill(
28777  day_flagged.begin(),
28778  day_flagged.end(),
28779  0);
28780 
28781  this->day_rash_onset.resize(this->size(), 0);
28782  std::fill(
28783  day_rash_onset.begin(),
28784  day_rash_onset.end(),
28785  0);
28786 
28787  this->m_update_model(dynamic_cast<Model<TSeq>*>(this));
28788  return;
28789 
28790 }
28791 
28792 template<typename TSeq>
28793 inline void ModelMeaslesSchool<TSeq>::update_infectious() {
28794 
28795  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
28796  // All agents with state >= EXPOSED should have a virus
28797  for (auto & agent: this->get_agents())
28798  {
28799  auto s = agent.get_state();
28800  if (IN(s, {EXPOSED, PRODROMAL, RASH, ISOLATED, DETECTED_HOSPITALIZED, QUARANTINED_EXPOSED, QUARANTINED_PRODROMAL, HOSPITALIZED}))
28801  {
28802  if (agent.get_virus() == nullptr)
28803  throw std::logic_error("The agent has no virus.");
28804  }
28805  }
28806  #endif
28807 
28808  this->infectious.clear();
28809  int n_available = 0;
28810  for (auto & agent: this->get_agents())
28811  {
28812  const auto & s = agent.get_state();
28813  if (s == PRODROMAL)
28814  this->infectious.push_back(&agent);
28815 
28816  if (s < RASH)
28817  ++n_available;
28818 
28819  }
28820 
28821  // Assumes fixed contact rate throughout the simulation
28822  double p_contact = this->par("Contact rate")/
28823  static_cast< epiworld_double >(n_available);
28824 
28825  this->set_rand_binom(
28826  static_cast<int>(this->infectious.size()),
28827  p_contact > 1.0 ? 1.0 : p_contact
28828  );
28829 
28830 }
28831 
28832 template<typename TSeq>
28833 inline Model<TSeq> * ModelMeaslesSchool<TSeq>::clone_ptr()
28834 {
28835 
28836  ModelMeaslesSchool<TSeq> * ptr = new ModelMeaslesSchool<TSeq>(
28837  *dynamic_cast<const ModelMeaslesSchool<TSeq>*>(this)
28838  );
28839 
28840  return dynamic_cast< Model<TSeq> *>(ptr);
28841 
28842 }
28843 
28844 LOCAL_UPDATE_FUN(m_update_susceptible) {
28845 
28846  // How many contacts to draw
28847  int ndraw = m->rbinom();
28848 
28849  if (ndraw == 0)
28850  return;
28851 
28852  GET_MODEL(m, model);
28853  size_t n_infectious = model->infectious.size();
28854 
28855  if (n_infectious == 0)
28856  return;
28857 
28858  // Drawing from the set
28859  int nviruses_tmp = 0;
28860  int i = 0;
28861  while (i < ndraw)
28862  {
28863  // Picking the actual contacts
28864  int which = static_cast<int>(std::floor(n_infectious * m->runif()));
28865 
28866  /* There is a bug in which runif() returns 1.0. It is rare, but
28867  * we saw it here. See the Notes section in the C++ manual
28868  * https://en.cppreference.com/mwiki/index.php?title=cpp/numeric/random/uniform_real_distribution&oldid=133329
28869  * And the reported bug in GCC:
28870  * https://gcc.gnu.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=63176
28871  *
28872  */
28873  if (which == static_cast<int>(n_infectious))
28874  --which;
28875 
28876  epiworld::Agent<> & neighbor = *model->infectious[which];
28877 
28878  // Can't sample itself
28879  if (neighbor.get_id() == p->get_id())
28880  continue;
28881 
28882  // We successfully drew a contact, so we increment the counter
28883  i++;
28884 
28885  // No virus, the error!!
28886  if (neighbor.get_virus() == nullptr)
28887  throw std::logic_error("The neighbor has no virus.");
28888 
28889  // Only prodomal individuals can transmit
28890  if (neighbor.get_state() != model->PRODROMAL)
28891  throw std::logic_error(
28892  "The neighbor is not in the prodromal state. The state is: " +
28893  std::to_string(neighbor.get_state())
28894  );
28895 
28896  auto & v = neighbor.get_virus();
28897 
28898  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
28899  if (nviruses_tmp >= static_cast<int>(m->array_virus_tmp.size()))
28900  throw std::logic_error("Trying to add an extra element to a temporal array outside of the range.");
28901  #endif
28902 
28903  /* And it is a function of susceptibility_reduction as well */
28904  m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp] =
28905  (1.0 - p->get_susceptibility_reduction(v, m)) *
28906  v->get_prob_infecting(m) *
28907  (1.0 - neighbor.get_transmission_reduction(v, m))
28908  ;
28909 
28910  m->array_virus_tmp[nviruses_tmp++] = &(*v);
28911 
28912  }
28913 
28914  // No virus to compute
28915  if (nviruses_tmp == 0u)
28916  return;
28917 
28918  // Running the roulette
28919  int which = roulette(nviruses_tmp, m);
28920 
28921  if (which < 0)
28922  return;
28923 
28924  p->set_virus(*m->array_virus_tmp[which], m);
28925 
28926  return;
28927 
28928 };
28929 
28930 LOCAL_UPDATE_FUN(m_update_exposed) {
28931 
28932  if (m->runif() < (1.0/p->get_virus()->get_incubation(m)))
28933  p->change_state(m, ModelMeaslesSchool<TSeq>::PRODROMAL);
28934 
28935  return;
28936 
28937 };
28938 
28939 LOCAL_UPDATE_FUN(m_update_prodromal) {
28940 
28941  if (m->runif() < (1.0/m->par("Prodromal period")))
28942  {
28943 
28944  GET_MODEL(m, model);
28945  model->day_rash_onset[p->get_id()] = m->today();
28946  p->change_state(m, ModelMeaslesSchool<TSeq>::RASH);
28947 
28948  }
28949 
28950  return;
28951 
28952 };
28953 
28954 LOCAL_UPDATE_FUN(m_update_rash) {
28955 
28956 
28957  GET_MODEL(m, model);
28958 
28959  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
28960  if (static_cast<int>(model->day_flagged.size()) <= p->get_id())
28961  throw std::logic_error(
28962  "The agent is not in the list of quarantined or isolated agents: " +
28963  std::to_string(p->get_id()) +
28964  " vs " +
28965  std::to_string(model->day_flagged.size()) +
28966  ". The model has " + std::to_string(model->size()) + " agents."
28967  );
28968  #endif
28969 
28970  // Checking if the agent will be detected or not
28971  // How many days since detected
28972  bool detected = false;
28973  if (
28974  (m->par("Isolation period") >= 0) &&
28975  (m->runif() < 1.0/m->par("Days undetected"))
28976  )
28977  {
28978  model->system_quarantine_triggered = true;
28979  detected = true;
28980 
28981  }
28982 
28983  // Probability of Staying in the rash period vs becoming
28984  // hospitalized
28985  m->array_double_tmp[0] = 1.0/m->par("Rash period");
28986  m->array_double_tmp[1] = m->par("Hospitalization rate");
28987 
28988  // Sampling from the probabilities
28989  SAMPLE_FROM_PROBS(2, which);
28990 
28991  // Recovers
28992  if (which == 2)
28993  {
28994  p->rm_virus(
28995  m,
28996  detected ?
28997  ModelMeaslesSchool::ISOLATED_RECOVERED:
28998  ModelMeaslesSchool::RECOVERED
28999  );
29000  }
29001  else if (which == 1)
29002  {
29003  // If hospitalized, then the agent is removed from the system
29004  // effectively
29005  p->change_state(
29006  m,
29007  detected ?
29008  ModelMeaslesSchool::DETECTED_HOSPITALIZED :
29009  ModelMeaslesSchool::HOSPITALIZED
29010  );
29011  }
29012  else if (which != 0)
29013  {
29014  throw std::logic_error("The roulette returned an unexpected value.");
29015  }
29016  else if ((which == 0u) && detected)
29017  {
29018  // If the agent is not hospitalized, then it is moved to
29019  // isolation.
29020  p->change_state(m, ModelMeaslesSchool::ISOLATED);
29021  }
29022 
29023 };
29024 
29025 LOCAL_UPDATE_FUN(m_update_isolated) {
29026 
29027  GET_MODEL(m, model);
29028 
29029  // Figuring out if the agent can be released from isolation
29030  // if the quarantine period is over.
29031  int days_since = m->today() - model->day_rash_onset[p->get_id()];
29032 
29033  bool unisolate =
29034  (m->par("Isolation period") <= days_since) ?
29035  true: false;
29036 
29037  // Probability of staying in the rash period vs becoming
29038  // hospitalized
29039  m->array_double_tmp[0] = 1.0/m->par("Rash period");
29040  m->array_double_tmp[1] = m->par("Hospitalization rate");
29041 
29042  // Sampling from the probabilities
29043  SAMPLE_FROM_PROBS(2, which);
29044 
29045  // Recovers
29046  if (which == 2u)
29047  {
29048  if (unisolate)
29049  {
29050  p->rm_virus(
29051  m,
29052  ModelMeaslesSchool::RECOVERED
29053  );
29054  }
29055  else
29056  p->rm_virus(
29057  m, ModelMeaslesSchool::ISOLATED_RECOVERED
29058  );
29059  }
29060 
29061  // If hospitalized, then the agent is removed from the system
29062  else if (which == 1u)
29063  {
29064  p->change_state(
29065  m,
29066  // HOSPITALIZED
29067  unisolate ?
29068  ModelMeaslesSchool::HOSPITALIZED :
29069  ModelMeaslesSchool::DETECTED_HOSPITALIZED
29070  );
29071  }
29072  // If neither hospitalized nor recovered, then the agent is
29073  // still under isolation, unless the quarantine period is over.
29074  else if ((which == 0u) && unisolate)
29075  {
29076  p->change_state(m, ModelMeaslesSchool::RASH);
29077  }
29078 
29079 }
29080 
29081 LOCAL_UPDATE_FUN(m_update_isolated_recovered) {
29082 
29083  GET_MODEL(m, model);
29084 
29085  // Figuring out if the agent can be released from isolation
29086  // if the quarantine period is over.
29087  int days_since = m->today() - model->day_rash_onset[p->get_id()];
29088 
29089  bool unisolate =
29090  (m->par("Isolation period") <= days_since) ?
29091  true: false;
29092 
29093  if (unisolate)
29094  p->change_state(m, ModelMeaslesSchool::RECOVERED);
29095 
29096 }
29097 
29098 LOCAL_UPDATE_FUN(m_update_q_exposed) {
29099 
29100  // How many days since quarantine started
29101  GET_MODEL(m, model);
29102  int days_since =
29103  m->today() - model->day_flagged[p->get_id()];
29104 
29105  bool unquarantine =
29106  (m->par("Quarantine period") <= days_since) ?
29107  true: false;
29108 
29109  // Will develop prodromal symptoms?
29110  if (m->runif() < (1.0/p->get_virus()->get_incubation(m)))
29111  {
29112  // If the quarantine period is over, then they are moved to
29113  // the prodromal period. Otherwise, they are moved to the
29114  // quarantined prodromal period.
29115  if (unquarantine)
29116  p-> change_state(
29117  m,
29118  ModelMeaslesSchool::PRODROMAL
29119  );
29120  else
29121  p->change_state(
29122  m,
29123  ModelMeaslesSchool::QUARANTINED_PRODROMAL
29124  );
29125 
29126  }
29127  else if (unquarantine)
29128  {
29129  p->change_state(
29130  m,
29131  ModelMeaslesSchool::EXPOSED
29132  );
29133  }
29134 
29135 }
29136 
29137 LOCAL_UPDATE_FUN(m_update_q_susceptible) {
29138 
29139  GET_MODEL(m, model);
29140  int days_since =
29141  m->today() - model->day_flagged[p->get_id()];
29142 
29143  if (days_since >= m->par("Quarantine period"))
29144  p->change_state(m, ModelMeaslesSchool::SUSCEPTIBLE);
29145 
29146 }
29147 
29148 LOCAL_UPDATE_FUN(m_update_q_prodromal) {
29149 
29150  GET_MODEL(m, model);
29151 
29152  // Otherwise, these are moved to the prodromal period, if
29153  // the quanrantine period is over.
29154  int days_since = m->today() - model->day_flagged[p->get_id()];
29155 
29156  bool unquarantine =
29157  (m->par("Quarantine period") <= days_since) ?
29158  true: false;
29159 
29160  // Develops rash?
29161  if (m->runif() < (1.0/m->par("Prodromal period")))
29162  {
29163  model->day_rash_onset[p->get_id()] = m->today();
29164  p->change_state(m, ModelMeaslesSchool::ISOLATED);
29165  }
29166  else
29167  {
29168 
29169  if (unquarantine)
29170  p->change_state(m, ModelMeaslesSchool::PRODROMAL);
29171 
29172  }
29173 
29174 }
29175 
29176 LOCAL_UPDATE_FUN(m_update_q_recovered) {
29177 
29178  GET_MODEL(m, model);
29179  int days_since = m->today() - model->day_flagged[p->get_id()];
29180 
29181  if (days_since >= m->par("Quarantine period"))
29182  p->change_state(m, ModelMeaslesSchool::RECOVERED);
29183 
29184 }
29185 
29186 LOCAL_UPDATE_FUN(m_update_hospitalized) {
29187 
29188  // The agent is removed from the system
29189  if (m->runif() < 1.0/m->par("Hospitalization period"))
29190  p->rm_virus(m, ModelMeaslesSchool::RECOVERED);
29191 
29192  return;
29193 
29194 }
29195 
29196 
29197 template<typename TSeq>
29198 inline ModelMeaslesSchool<TSeq>::ModelMeaslesSchool(
29199  ModelMeaslesSchool<TSeq> & model,
29200  epiworld_fast_uint n,
29201  epiworld_fast_uint n_exposed,
29202  // Disease parameters
29203  epiworld_double contact_rate,
29204  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
29205  epiworld_double vax_efficacy,
29206  epiworld_double vax_reduction_recovery_rate,
29207  epiworld_double incubation_period,
29208  epiworld_double prodromal_period,
29209  epiworld_double rash_period,
29210  epiworld_double days_undetected,
29211  epiworld_double hospitalization_rate,
29212  epiworld_double hospitalization_period,
29213  // Policy parameters
29214  epiworld_double prop_vaccinated,
29215  epiworld_fast_int quarantine_period,
29216  epiworld_double quarantine_willingness,
29217  epiworld_fast_int isolation_period
29218 ) {
29219 
29220  model.add_state("Susceptible", this->m_update_susceptible);
29221  model.add_state("Exposed", this->m_update_exposed);
29222  model.add_state("Prodromal", this->m_update_prodromal);
29223  model.add_state("Rash", this->m_update_rash);
29224  model.add_state("Isolated", this->m_update_isolated);
29225  model.add_state(
29226  "Isolated Recovered", this->m_update_isolated_recovered
29227  );
29228  model.add_state("Detected Hospitalized", this->m_update_hospitalized);
29229  model.add_state(
29230  "Quarantined Exposed", this->m_update_q_exposed
29231  );
29232 
29233  model.add_state(
29234  "Quarantined Susceptible", this->m_update_q_susceptible
29235  );
29236 
29237  model.add_state(
29238  "Quarantined Prodromal", this->m_update_q_prodromal
29239  );
29240 
29241  model.add_state(
29242  "Quarantined Recovered", this->m_update_q_recovered
29243  );
29244 
29245  model.add_state("Hospitalized", this->m_update_hospitalized);
29246 
29247  model.add_state("Recovered");
29248 
29249  // Adding the model parameters
29250  model.add_param(contact_rate, "Contact rate");
29251  model.add_param(transmission_rate, "Transmission rate");
29252  model.add_param(incubation_period, "Incubation period");
29253  model.add_param(prodromal_period, "Prodromal period");
29254  model.add_param(rash_period, "Rash period");
29255  model.add_param(days_undetected, "Days undetected");
29256  model.add_param(quarantine_period, "Quarantine period");
29257  model.add_param(
29258  quarantine_willingness, "Quarantine willingness"
29259  );
29260  model.add_param(isolation_period, "Isolation period");
29261  model.add_param(hospitalization_rate, "Hospitalization rate");
29262  model.add_param(hospitalization_period, "Hospitalization period");
29263  model.add_param(prop_vaccinated, "Vaccination rate");
29264  model.add_param(vax_efficacy, "Vax efficacy");
29265  model.add_param(vax_reduction_recovery_rate, "Vax improved recovery");
29266 
29267  // Designing the disease
29268  Virus<> measles("Measles");
29269  measles.set_state(EXPOSED, RECOVERED);
29270  measles.set_prob_infecting(&model("Transmission rate"));
29271  measles.set_prob_recovery(&model("Rash period"));
29272  measles.set_incubation(&model("Incubation period"));
29273  measles.set_distribution(
29274  distribute_virus_randomly(n_exposed, false)
29275  );
29276 
29277  model.add_virus(measles);
29278 
29279  // Designing the vaccine
29280  Tool<> vaccine("Vaccine");
29281  vaccine.set_susceptibility_reduction(&model("Vax efficacy"));
29282  vaccine.set_recovery_enhancer(&model("Vax improved recovery"));
29283  vaccine.set_distribution(
29284  distribute_tool_randomly(prop_vaccinated, true)
29285  );
29286 
29287  model.add_tool(vaccine);
29288 
29289  // Global actions
29290  model.add_globalevent(this->m_update_model, "Update model");
29291  model.queuing_off();
29292 
29293  // Setting the population
29294  model.agents_empty_graph(n);
29295 
29296  return;
29297 
29298 }
29299 
29300 template<typename TSeq>
29301 inline ModelMeaslesSchool<TSeq>::ModelMeaslesSchool(
29302  epiworld_fast_uint n,
29303  epiworld_fast_uint n_exposed,
29304  // Disease parameters
29305  epiworld_double contact_rate,
29306  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
29307  epiworld_double vax_efficacy,
29308  epiworld_double vax_reduction_recovery_rate,
29309  epiworld_double incubation_period,
29310  epiworld_double prodromal_period,
29311  epiworld_double rash_period,
29312  epiworld_double days_undetected,
29313  epiworld_double hospitalization_rate,
29314  epiworld_double hospitalization_period,
29315  // Policy parameters
29316  epiworld_double prop_vaccinated,
29317  epiworld_fast_int quarantine_period,
29318  epiworld_double quarantine_willingness,
29319  epiworld_fast_int isolation_period
29320 
29321 ) {
29322 
29323  ModelMeaslesSchool(
29324  *this,
29325  n,
29326  n_exposed,
29327  contact_rate,
29328  transmission_rate,
29329  vax_efficacy,
29330  vax_reduction_recovery_rate,
29331  incubation_period,
29332  prodromal_period,
29333  rash_period,
29334  days_undetected,
29335  hospitalization_rate,
29336  hospitalization_period,
29337  prop_vaccinated,
29338  quarantine_period,
29339  quarantine_willingness,
29340  isolation_period
29341  );
29342 
29343  return;
29344 
29345 }
29346 
29347 #undef SAMPLE_FROM_PROBS
29348 #undef LOCAL_UPDATE_FUN
29349 #undef GET_MODEL
29350 #endif
29351 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
29353 
29354  End of -include/epiworld//models/measlesquarantine.hpp-
29355 
29358 
29359 
29360 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
29362 
29363  Start of -include/epiworld//models/seirmixingquarantine.hpp-
29364 
29367 
29368 
29369 #ifndef EPIWORLD_MODELS_SEIRMIXINGQUARANTINE_HPP
29370 #define EPIWORLD_MODELS_SEIRMIXINGQUARANTINE_HPP
29371 
29372 using namespace epiworld;
29373 
29374 #define MM(i, j, n) \
29375  j * n + i
29376 
29377 #if __cplusplus >= 202302L
29378  // C++23 or later
29379  #define GET_MODEL(model, output) \
29380  auto * output = dynamic_cast< ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq> * >( (model) ); \
29381  /*Using the [[assume(...)]] to avoid the compiler warning \
29382  if the standard is C++23 or later */ \
29383  [[assume((output) != nullptr)]]
29384 #else
29385  // C++17 or C++20
29386  #define GET_MODEL(model, output) \
29387  auto * output = dynamic_cast< ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq> * >( (model) ); \
29388  assert((output) != nullptr); // Use assert for runtime checks
29389 #endif
29390 
29391 #define SAMPLE_FROM_PROBS(n, ans) \
29392  size_t ans; \
29393  epiworld_double p_total = m->runif(); \
29394  for (ans = 0u; ans < n; ++ans) \
29395  { \
29396  if (p_total < m->array_double_tmp[ans]) \
29397  break; \
29398  m->array_double_tmp[ans + 1] += m->array_double_tmp[ans]; \
29399  }
29400 
29432 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
29433 class ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine : public Model<TSeq>
29434 {
29435 private:
29436 
29437  // Vector of vectors of infected agents
29438  std::vector< size_t > infected;
29439 
29440  // Number of infected agents in each group
29441  std::vector< size_t > n_infected_per_group;
29442 
29443  // Where the agents start in the `infected` vector
29444  std::vector< size_t > entity_indices;
29445 
29446  void m_update_infected_list();
29447  std::vector< size_t > sampled_agents;
29448  size_t sample_agents(
29449  Agent<TSeq> * agent,
29450  std::vector< size_t > & sampled_agents
29451  );
29452  std::vector< double > adjusted_contact_rate;
29453  std::vector< double > contact_matrix;
29454 
29455  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
29456  std::vector< int > sampled_sizes;
29457  #endif
29458 
29459  // Update functions
29460  static void m_update_susceptible(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m);
29461  static void m_update_exposed(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m);
29462  static void m_update_infected(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m);
29463  static void m_update_isolated(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m);
29464  static void m_update_quarantine_suscep(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m);
29465  static void m_update_quarantine_exposed(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m);
29466  static void m_update_hospitalized(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m);
29467  static void m_update_isolated_recovered(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m);
29468 
29469  // Data about the quarantine process
29470  std::vector< bool > quarantine_willingness;
29471  std::vector< bool > isolation_willingness;
29472  std::vector< size_t > agent_quarantine_triggered;
29473  std::vector< int > day_flagged;
29474  std::vector< int > day_onset;
29475  std::vector< int > day_exposed;
29476 
29477  void m_quarantine_process();
29478  static void m_update_model(Model<TSeq> * m);
29479 
29480  // We will limit tracking to up to EPI_MAX_TRACKING
29481  std::vector< size_t > tracking_matrix;
29482  std::vector< size_t > tracking_matrix_size;
29483 
29484  void m_add_tracking(size_t infected_id, size_t agent_id);
29485 
29486 public:
29487 
29488  static const int SUSCEPTIBLE = 0;
29489  static const int EXPOSED = 1;
29490  static const int INFECTED = 2;
29491  static const int ISOLATED = 3;
29492  static const int DETECTED_HOSPITALIZED = 4;
29493  static const int QUARANTINED_SUSCEPTIBLE = 5;
29494  static const int QUARANTINED_EXPOSED = 6;
29495  static const int ISOLATED_RECOVERED = 7;
29496  static const int HOSPITALIZED = 8;
29497  static const int RECOVERED = 9;
29498 
29499  static const size_t QUARANTINE_PROCESS_INACTIVE = 0u;
29500  static const size_t QUARANTINE_PROCESS_ACTIVE = 1u;
29501  static const size_t QUARANTINE_PROCESS_DONE = 2u;
29502 
29503  ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine() {};
29504 
29528  ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine(
29529  ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq> & model,
29530  const std::string & vname,
29531  epiworld_fast_uint n,
29532  epiworld_double prevalence,
29533  epiworld_double contact_rate,
29534  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
29535  epiworld_double avg_incubation_days,
29536  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
29537  std::vector< double > contact_matrix,
29538  epiworld_double hospitalization_rate,
29539  epiworld_double hospitalization_period,
29540  // Policy parameters
29541  epiworld_double days_undetected,
29542  epiworld_fast_int quarantine_period,
29543  epiworld_double quarantine_willingness,
29544  epiworld_double isolation_willingness,
29545  epiworld_fast_int isolation_period,
29546  epiworld_double contact_tracing_success_rate = 1.0,
29547  epiworld_fast_uint contact_tracing_days_prior = 4u
29548  );
29549 
29571  ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine(
29572  const std::string & vname,
29573  epiworld_fast_uint n,
29574  epiworld_double prevalence,
29575  epiworld_double contact_rate,
29576  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
29577  epiworld_double avg_incubation_days,
29578  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
29579  std::vector< double > contact_matrix,
29580  epiworld_double hospitalization_rate,
29581  epiworld_double hospitalization_period,
29582  // Policy parameters
29583  epiworld_double days_undetected,
29584  epiworld_fast_int quarantine_period,
29585  epiworld_double quarantine_willingness,
29586  epiworld_double isolation_willingness,
29587  epiworld_fast_int isolation_period,
29588  epiworld_double contact_tracing_success_rate = 1.0,
29589  epiworld_fast_uint contact_tracing_days_prior = 4u
29590  );
29591 
29598  ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq> & run(
29599  epiworld_fast_uint ndays,
29600  int seed = -1
29601  );
29602 
29606  void reset();
29607 
29612  Model<TSeq> * clone_ptr();
29613 
29621  ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq> & initial_states(
29622  std::vector< double > proportions_,
29623  std::vector< int > queue_ = {}
29624  );
29625 
29630  void set_contact_matrix(std::vector< double > cmat)
29631  {
29632  contact_matrix = cmat;
29633  return;
29634  };
29635 
29640  std::vector< double > get_contact_matrix() const
29641  {
29642  return contact_matrix;
29643  };
29644 
29649  std::vector< size_t > get_agent_quarantine_triggered() const
29650  {
29651  return agent_quarantine_triggered;
29652  };
29653 
29658  std::vector< bool > get_quarantine_willingness() const
29659  {
29660  return quarantine_willingness;
29661  };
29662 
29667  std::vector< bool > get_isolation_willingness() const
29668  {
29669  return isolation_willingness;
29670  };
29671 
29672 };
29673 
29674 template<typename TSeq>
29675 inline void ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::m_update_model(Model<TSeq> * m)
29676 {
29677  GET_MODEL(m, model);
29678  model->m_quarantine_process();
29679  model->events_run();
29680  model->m_update_infected_list();
29681  return;
29682 }
29683 
29684 template<typename TSeq>
29685 inline void ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::m_add_tracking(
29686  size_t infected_id,
29687  size_t agent_id
29688 )
29689 {
29690 
29691  // We avoid the math if there's no point in tracking anymore
29692  if (
29693  agent_quarantine_triggered[infected_id] >=
29694  ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::QUARANTINE_PROCESS_DONE
29695  )
29696  return;
29697 
29698  // We avoid the math if the contact happened before
29699  // the lower bound of the contact tracing
29700  size_t days_since_onset = Model<TSeq>::today() - day_onset[infected_id];
29701  if (days_since_onset >
29702  Model<TSeq>::par("Contact tracing days prior")
29703  )
29704  return;
29705 
29706 
29707  // If we are overflow, we start from the beginning
29708  size_t loc = tracking_matrix_size[infected_id] % EPI_MAX_TRACKING;
29709  tracking_matrix[MM(infected_id, loc, Model<TSeq>::size())] = agent_id;
29710 
29711  // We increase the size of the tracking matrix
29712  tracking_matrix_size[infected_id]++;
29713 
29714  return;
29715 }
29716 
29717 
29718 template<typename TSeq>
29719 inline void ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::m_update_infected_list()
29720 {
29721 
29722  auto & agents = Model<TSeq>::get_agents();
29723 
29724  std::fill(n_infected_per_group.begin(), n_infected_per_group.end(), 0u);
29725 
29726  for (auto & a : agents)
29727  {
29728 
29729  if (a.get_state() == ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::INFECTED)
29730  {
29731  if (a.get_n_entities() > 0u)
29732  {
29733  const auto & entity = a.get_entity(0u);
29734  infected[
29735  // Position of the group in the `infected` vector
29736  entity_indices[entity.get_id()] +
29737  // Position of the agent in the group
29738  n_infected_per_group[entity.get_id()]++
29739  ] = a.get_id();
29740 
29741  }
29742  }
29743 
29744  }
29745 
29746  return;
29747 
29748 }
29749 
29750 template<typename TSeq>
29751 inline size_t ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::sample_agents(
29752  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * agent,
29753  std::vector< size_t > & sampled_agents
29754  )
29755 {
29756 
29757  size_t agent_group_id = agent->get_entity(0u).get_id();
29758  size_t ngroups = this->entities.size();
29759 
29760  int samp_id = 0;
29761  for (size_t g = 0; g < ngroups; ++g)
29762  {
29763 
29764  size_t group_size = n_infected_per_group[g];
29765 
29766  if (group_size == 0u)
29767  continue;
29768 
29769  // How many from this entity?
29770  int nsamples = epiworld::Model<TSeq>::rbinom(
29771  group_size,
29772  adjusted_contact_rate[g] * contact_matrix[
29773  MM(agent_group_id, g, ngroups)
29774  ]
29775  );
29776 
29777  if (nsamples == 0)
29778  continue;
29779 
29780  // Sampling from the entity
29781  for (int s = 0; s < nsamples; ++s)
29782  {
29783 
29784  // Randomly selecting an agent
29785  int which = epiworld::Model<TSeq>::runif() * group_size;
29786 
29787  // Correcting overflow error
29788  if (which >= static_cast<int>(group_size))
29789  which = static_cast<int>(group_size) - 1;
29790 
29791  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
29792  auto & a = this->population.at(infected.at(entity_indices[g] + which));
29793  #else
29794  auto & a = this->get_agent(infected[entity_indices[g] + which]);
29795  #endif
29796 
29797  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
29798  if (a.get_state() != ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::INFECTED)
29799  throw std::logic_error(
29800  "The agent is not infected, but it should be."
29801  );
29802  #endif
29803 
29804  // Can't sample itself
29805  if (a.get_id() == agent->get_id())
29806  continue;
29807 
29808  sampled_agents[samp_id++] = a.get_id();
29809 
29810  }
29811 
29812  }
29813 
29814  return samp_id;
29815 
29816 }
29817 
29818 template<typename TSeq>
29819 inline ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq> & ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::run(
29820  epiworld_fast_uint ndays,
29821  int seed
29822 )
29823 {
29824 
29825  Model<TSeq>::run(ndays, seed);
29826 
29827  return *this;
29828 
29829 }
29830 
29831 template<typename TSeq>
29832 inline void ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::reset()
29833 {
29834 
29835  Model<TSeq>::reset();
29836 
29837  // Checking contact matrix's rows add to one
29838  size_t nentities = this->entities.size();
29839  if (this->contact_matrix.size() != nentities*nentities)
29840  throw std::length_error(
29841  std::string("The contact matrix must be a square matrix of size ") +
29842  std::string("nentities x nentities. ") +
29843  std::to_string(this->contact_matrix.size()) +
29844  std::string(" != ") + std::to_string(nentities*nentities) +
29845  std::string(".")
29846  );
29847 
29848  for (size_t i = 0u; i < this->entities.size(); ++i)
29849  {
29850  double sum = 0.0;
29851  for (size_t j = 0u; j < this->entities.size(); ++j)
29852  {
29853  if (this->contact_matrix[MM(i, j, nentities)] < 0.0)
29854  throw std::range_error(
29855  std::string("The contact matrix must be non-negative. ") +
29856  std::to_string(this->contact_matrix[MM(i, j, nentities)]) +
29857  std::string(" < 0.")
29858  );
29859  sum += this->contact_matrix[MM(i, j, nentities)];
29860  }
29861  if (sum < 0.999 || sum > 1.001)
29862  throw std::range_error(
29863  std::string("The contact matrix must have rows that add to one. ") +
29864  std::to_string(sum) +
29865  std::string(" != 1.")
29866  );
29867  }
29868 
29869  // Do it the first time only
29870  sampled_agents.resize(Model<TSeq>::size());
29871 
29872  // We only do it once
29873  n_infected_per_group.resize(this->entities.size(), 0u);
29874  std::fill(n_infected_per_group.begin(), n_infected_per_group.end(), 0u);
29875 
29876  // We are assuming one agent per entity
29877  infected.resize(Model<TSeq>::size());
29878  std::fill(infected.begin(), infected.end(), 0u);
29879 
29880  // This will say when do the groups start in the `infected` vector
29881  entity_indices.resize(this->entities.size(), 0u);
29882  std::fill(entity_indices.begin(), entity_indices.end(), 0u);
29883  for (size_t i = 1u; i < this->entities.size(); ++i)
29884  {
29885 
29886  entity_indices[i] +=
29887  this->entities[i - 1].size() +
29888  entity_indices[i - 1]
29889  ;
29890 
29891  }
29892 
29893  // Adjusting contact rate
29894  adjusted_contact_rate.clear();
29895  adjusted_contact_rate.resize(this->entities.size(), 0.0);
29896 
29897  for (size_t i = 0u; i < this->entities.size(); ++i)
29898  {
29899 
29900  adjusted_contact_rate[i] =
29901  Model<TSeq>::get_param("Contact rate") /
29902  static_cast< epiworld_double > (this->get_entity(i).size());
29903 
29904 
29905  // Possibly correcting for a small number of agents
29906  if (adjusted_contact_rate[i] > 1.0)
29907  adjusted_contact_rate[i] = 1.0;
29908 
29909  }
29910 
29911  this->m_update_infected_list();
29912 
29913  // Setting up the quarantine parameters
29914  quarantine_willingness.resize(this->size(), false);
29915  isolation_willingness.resize(this->size(), false);
29916  for (size_t idx = 0; idx < quarantine_willingness.size(); ++idx)
29917  {
29918  quarantine_willingness[idx] =
29919  Model<TSeq>::runif() < this->par("Quarantine willingness");
29920  isolation_willingness[idx] =
29921  Model<TSeq>::runif() < this->par("Isolation willingness");
29922  }
29923 
29924  agent_quarantine_triggered.resize(this->size(), 0u);
29925  std::fill(
29926  agent_quarantine_triggered.begin(),
29927  agent_quarantine_triggered.end(),
29928  0u
29929  );
29930 
29931  day_flagged.resize(this->size(), 0);
29932  std::fill(
29933  day_flagged.begin(),
29934  day_flagged.end(),
29935  0
29936  );
29937 
29938  day_onset.resize(this->size(), 0);
29939  std::fill(
29940  day_onset.begin(),
29941  day_onset.end(),
29942  0
29943  );
29944 
29945  day_exposed.resize(this->size(), 0);
29946  std::fill(
29947  day_exposed.begin(),
29948  day_exposed.end(),
29949  0
29950  );
29951 
29952  // Tracking matrix
29953  tracking_matrix.resize(EPI_MAX_TRACKING * Model<TSeq>::size(), 0u);
29954  std::fill(tracking_matrix.begin(), tracking_matrix.end(), 0u);
29955 
29956  tracking_matrix_size.resize(Model<TSeq>::size(), 0u);
29957  std::fill(tracking_matrix_size.begin(), tracking_matrix_size.end(), 0u);
29958 
29959  return;
29960 
29961 }
29962 
29963 template<typename TSeq>
29964 inline Model<TSeq> * ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::clone_ptr()
29965 {
29966 
29967  ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq> * ptr = new ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>(
29968  *dynamic_cast<const ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>*>(this)
29969  );
29970 
29971  #if __cplusplus >= 202302L
29972  // C++23 or later
29973  [[assume(ptr != nullptr)]]
29974  #else
29975  // C++17 or C++20
29976  assert(ptr != nullptr); // Use assert for runtime checks
29977  #endif
29978 
29979  return dynamic_cast< Model<TSeq> *>(ptr);
29980 
29981 }
29982 
29983 template<typename TSeq>
29984 inline void ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::m_update_susceptible(
29985  Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m
29986 ) {
29987 
29988  if (p->get_n_entities() == 0)
29989  return;
29990 
29991  // Downcasting to retrieve the sampler attached to the
29992  // class
29993  GET_MODEL(m, m_down);
29994 
29995  size_t ndraws = m_down->sample_agents(p, m_down->sampled_agents);
29996 
29997  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
29998  m_down->sampled_sizes.push_back(static_cast<int>(ndraws));
29999  #endif
30000 
30001  if (ndraws == 0u)
30002  return;
30003 
30004  // Drawing from the set
30005  int nviruses_tmp = 0;
30006  for (size_t n = 0u; n < ndraws; ++n)
30007  {
30008 
30009  auto & neighbor = m->get_agent(m_down->sampled_agents[n]);
30010 
30011  auto & v = neighbor.get_virus();
30012 
30013  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
30014  if (nviruses_tmp >= static_cast<int>(m->array_virus_tmp.size()))
30015  throw std::logic_error(
30016  "Trying to add an extra element to a temporal array outside of the range."
30017  );
30018  #endif
30019 
30020  // Adding the current agent to the tracked interactions
30021  m_down->m_add_tracking(neighbor.get_id(), p->get_id());
30022 
30023  /* And it is a function of susceptibility_reduction as well */
30024  m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp] =
30025  (1.0 - p->get_susceptibility_reduction(v, m)) *
30026  v->get_prob_infecting(m) *
30027  (1.0 - neighbor.get_transmission_reduction(v, m))
30028  ;
30029 
30030  m->array_virus_tmp[nviruses_tmp++] = &(*v);
30031 
30032  }
30033 
30034  // Running the roulette
30035  int which = roulette(nviruses_tmp, m);
30036 
30037  if (which < 0)
30038  return;
30039 
30040  p->set_virus(
30041  *m->array_virus_tmp[which],
30042  m,
30043  ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::EXPOSED
30044  );
30045 
30046  return;
30047 
30048 };
30049 
30050 template<typename TSeq>
30051 inline void ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::m_update_exposed(
30052  Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m
30053 ) {
30054 
30055  // Getting the virus
