30056  auto & v = p->get_virus();
30057 
30058  // Does the agent become infected?
30059  if (m->runif() < 1.0/(v->get_incubation(m)))
30060  {
30061 
30062  p->change_state(m, ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::INFECTED);
30063 
30064  GET_MODEL(m, model);
30065  model->day_onset[p->get_id()] = m->today();
30066 
30067  return;
30068 
30069  }
30070 
30071  return;
30072 
30073 };
30074 
30075 template<typename TSeq>
30076 inline void ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::m_update_infected(
30077  Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m
30078 ) {
30079 
30080  GET_MODEL(m, model);
30081 
30082  // Sampling whether the agent is detected or not
30083  bool detected = m->runif() < 1.0/m->par("Days undetected");
30084 
30085  // If detected and the entity can quarantine, we start
30086  // the quarantine process
30087  if (detected)
30088  {
30089  model->agent_quarantine_triggered[p->get_id()] =
30090  ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::QUARANTINE_PROCESS_ACTIVE;
30091  }
30092 
30093  // Checking if the agent is willing to isolate individually
30094  // This is separate from quarantine and can happen even if agent cannot quarantine
30095  bool isolation_detected = (m->par("Isolation period") >= 0) &&
30096  detected &&
30097  (model->isolation_willingness[p->get_id()])
30098  ;
30099 
30100  // Recording the date of detection
30101  if (isolation_detected)
30102  model->day_flagged[p->get_id()] = m->today();
30103 
30104  // Computing probabilities for state change
30105  const auto & v = p->get_virus();
30106  m->array_double_tmp[0] = 1.0 - (1.0 - v->get_prob_recovery(m)) *
30107  (1.0 - p->get_recovery_enhancer(v, m));
30108  m->array_double_tmp[1] = m->par("Hospitalization rate");
30109 
30110  SAMPLE_FROM_PROBS(2, which);
30111 
30112  if (which == 0) // Recovers
30113  {
30114  if (isolation_detected)
30115  {
30116  p->change_state(
30117  m, ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::ISOLATED_RECOVERED
30118  );
30119  }
30120  else
30121  {
30122  p->rm_virus(
30123  m, ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::RECOVERED
30124  );
30125  }
30126 
30127  return;
30128  }
30129  else if (which == 1) // Hospitalized
30130  {
30131 
30132  if (detected)
30133  {
30134  p->change_state(
30135  m, ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::DETECTED_HOSPITALIZED
30136  );
30137  }
30138  else
30139  {
30140  p->change_state(
30141  m, ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::HOSPITALIZED
30142  );
30143  }
30144 
30145  }
30146  else if ((which == 2) && isolation_detected) // Nothing, but detected
30147  {
30148  // If the agent is detected, it goes to isolation
30149  p->change_state(
30150  m, ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::ISOLATED
30151  );
30152 
30153  }
30154 
30155  return ;
30156 
30157 };
30158 
30159 template<typename TSeq>
30160 inline void ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::m_update_isolated(
30161  Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m
30162 ) {
30163 
30164  GET_MODEL(m, model);
30165 
30166  // Figuring out if the agent can be released from isolation
30167  // if the quarantine period is over.
30168  int days_since = m->today() - model->day_onset[p->get_id()];
30169 
30170  bool unisolate =
30171  (m->par("Isolation period") <= days_since) ?
30172  true: false;
30173 
30174  // Sampling from the probabilities of recovery
30175  m->array_double_tmp[0] = 1.0 -
30176  (1.0 - p->get_virus()->get_prob_recovery(m)) *
30177  (1.0 - p->get_recovery_enhancer(p->get_virus(), m));
30178 
30179  // And hospitalization
30180  m->array_double_tmp[1] = m->par("Hospitalization rate");
30181 
30182  SAMPLE_FROM_PROBS(2, which);
30183 
30184  // Recovers
30185  if (which == 0)
30186  {
30187  if (unisolate)
30188  {
30189  p->rm_virus(
30190  m,
30191  ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::RECOVERED
30192  );
30193  }
30194  else
30195  p->rm_virus(
30196  m, ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::ISOLATED_RECOVERED
30197  );
30198  }
30199  else if (which == 1)
30200  {
30201 
30202  if (unisolate)
30203  {
30204  p->change_state(
30205  m, ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::HOSPITALIZED
30206  );
30207  }
30208  else
30209  {
30210  p->change_state(
30211  m, ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::DETECTED_HOSPITALIZED
30212  );
30213  }
30214  }
30215  else if ((which == 2) && unisolate)
30216  {
30217  p->change_state(
30218  m, ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::INFECTED
30219  );
30220  }
30221 
30222 
30223 };
30224 
30225 template<typename TSeq>
30226 inline void ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::m_update_quarantine_suscep(
30227  Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m
30228 ) {
30229 
30230  GET_MODEL(m, model);
30231 
30232  // Figuring out if the agent can be released from quarantine
30233  // if the quarantine period is over.
30234  int days_since = m->today() - model->day_flagged[p->get_id()];
30235 
30236  bool unquarantine =
30237  (m->par("Quarantine period") <= days_since) ?
30238  true: false;
30239 
30240  if (unquarantine)
30241  {
30242  p->change_state(
30243  m, ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::SUSCEPTIBLE
30244  );
30245  }
30246 
30247 };
30248 
30249 template<typename TSeq>
30250 inline void ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::m_update_quarantine_exposed(
30251  Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m
30252 ) {
30253 
30254  GET_MODEL(m, model);
30255 
30256  // Figuring out if the agent can be released from quarantine
30257  // if the quarantine period is over.
30258  int days_since = m->today() - model->day_flagged[p->get_id()];
30259 
30260  bool unquarantine =
30261  (m->par("Quarantine period") <= days_since) ?
30262  true: false;
30263 
30264  if (m->runif() < 1.0/(p->get_virus()->get_incubation(m)))
30265  {
30266 
30267  // Recording the day of onset
30268  model->day_onset[p->get_id()] = m->today();
30269 
30270  // If the agent is unquarantined, it becomes infected
30271  if (unquarantine)
30272  {
30273  p->change_state(
30274  m, ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::INFECTED
30275  );
30276  }
30277  else
30278  {
30279  p->change_state(
30280  m, ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::ISOLATED
30281  );
30282  }
30283 
30284  }
30285  else if (unquarantine)
30286  {
30287  p->change_state(
30288  m, ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::EXPOSED
30289  );
30290  }
30291 
30292 };
30293 
30294 template<typename TSeq>
30295 inline void ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::m_update_isolated_recovered(
30296  Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m
30297 ) {
30298 
30299  GET_MODEL(m, model);
30300 
30301  // Figuring out if the agent can be released from isolation
30302  // if the quarantine period is over.
30303  int days_since = m->today() - model->day_onset[p->get_id()];
30304 
30305  bool unisolate =
30306  (m->par("Isolation period") <= days_since) ?
30307  true: false;
30308 
30309  if (unisolate)
30310  {
30311  p->change_state(
30312  m, ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::RECOVERED
30313  );
30314  }
30315 
30316 };
30317 
30318 template<typename TSeq>
30319 inline void ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::m_update_hospitalized(
30320  Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m
30321 ) {
30322 
30323  // The agent is removed from the system
30324  if (m->runif() < 1.0/m->par("Hospitalization period"))
30325  p->rm_virus(m, ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::RECOVERED);
30326 
30327 };
30328 
30329 template<typename TSeq>
30330 inline void ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::m_quarantine_process() {
30331 
30332  // Process entity-level quarantine
30333  for (size_t agent_i = 0u; agent_i < Model<TSeq>::size(); ++agent_i)
30334  {
30335 
30336  // Checking if the quarantine in the agent was triggered
30337  // or not
30338  if (
30339  agent_quarantine_triggered[agent_i] !=
30340  ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::QUARANTINE_PROCESS_ACTIVE
30341  )
30342  continue;
30343 
30344  if (this->par("Quarantine period") < 0)
30345  continue;
30346 
30347  // Getting the number of contacts, if it is greater
30348  // than the maximum, it means that we overflowed, so
30349  // we will only quarantine the first EPI_MAX_TRACKING
30350  size_t n_contacts = this->tracking_matrix_size[agent_i];
30351  if (n_contacts >= EPI_MAX_TRACKING)
30352  n_contacts = EPI_MAX_TRACKING;
30353 
30354  for (size_t contact_i = 0u; contact_i < n_contacts; ++contact_i)
30355  {
30356 
30357  // Checking if we will detect the contact
30358  if (Model<TSeq>::runif() > Model<TSeq>::par("Contact tracing success rate"))
30359  continue;
30360 
30361  size_t contact_id = this->tracking_matrix[
30362  MM(agent_i, contact_i, Model<TSeq>::size())
30363  ];
30364 
30365  auto & agent = Model<TSeq>::get_agent(contact_id);
30366 
30367  if (agent.get_state() > INFECTED)
30368  continue;
30369 
30370  // Agents with some tool won't be quarantined
30371  if (agent.get_n_tools() != 0u)
30372  continue;
30373 
30374  if (
30375  quarantine_willingness[contact_id] &&
30376  (Model<TSeq>::par("Quarantine period") >= 0))
30377  {
30378 
30379  switch (agent.get_state())
30380  {
30381  case SUSCEPTIBLE:
30382  agent.change_state(this, QUARANTINED_SUSCEPTIBLE);
30383  day_flagged[contact_id] = Model<TSeq>::today();
30384  break;
30385  case EXPOSED:
30386  agent.change_state(this, QUARANTINED_EXPOSED);
30387  day_flagged[contact_id] = Model<TSeq>::today();
30388  break;
30389  case INFECTED:
30390  if (isolation_willingness[contact_id])
30391  {
30392  agent.change_state(this, ISOLATED);
30393  day_flagged[contact_id] = Model<TSeq>::today();
30394  }
30395  break;
30396  default:
30397  throw std::logic_error(
30398  "The agent is not in a state that can be quarantined."
30399  );
30400  }
30401 
30402  }
30403  }
30404 
30405  // Setting the quarantine process off
30406  agent_quarantine_triggered[agent_i] =
30407  ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::QUARANTINE_PROCESS_DONE;
30408  }
30409 
30410  return;
30411 }
30412 
30435 template<typename TSeq>
30436 inline ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine(
30437  ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq> & model,
30438  const std::string & vname,
30439  epiworld_fast_uint n,
30440  epiworld_double prevalence,
30441  epiworld_double contact_rate,
30442  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
30443  epiworld_double avg_incubation_days,
30444  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
30445  std::vector< double > contact_matrix,
30446  epiworld_double hospitalization_rate,
30447  epiworld_double hospitalization_period,
30448  // Policy parameters
30449  epiworld_double days_undetected,
30450  epiworld_fast_int quarantine_period,
30451  epiworld_double quarantine_willingness,
30452  epiworld_double isolation_willingness,
30453  epiworld_fast_int isolation_period,
30454  epiworld_double contact_tracing_success_rate,
30455  epiworld_fast_uint contact_tracing_days_prior
30456  )
30457 {
30458 
30459  // Setting up the contact matrix
30460  this->contact_matrix = contact_matrix;
30461 
30462  // Setting up parameters
30463  model.add_param(contact_rate, "Contact rate");
30464  model.add_param(transmission_rate, "Prob. Transmission");
30465  model.add_param(recovery_rate, "Prob. Recovery");
30466  model.add_param(avg_incubation_days, "Avg. Incubation days");
30467  model.add_param(hospitalization_rate, "Hospitalization rate");
30468  model.add_param(hospitalization_period, "Hospitalization period");
30469  model.add_param(days_undetected, "Days undetected");
30470  model.add_param(quarantine_period, "Quarantine period");
30471  model.add_param(
30472  quarantine_willingness, "Quarantine willingness"
30473  );
30474  model.add_param(
30475  isolation_willingness, "Isolation willingness"
30476  );
30477  model.add_param(isolation_period, "Isolation period");
30478  model.add_param(
30479  contact_tracing_success_rate, "Contact tracing success rate"
30480  );
30481  model.add_param(
30482  contact_tracing_days_prior, "Contact tracing days prior"
30483  );
30484 
30485  // state
30486  model.add_state("Susceptible", m_update_susceptible);
30487  model.add_state("Exposed", m_update_exposed);
30488  model.add_state("Infected", m_update_infected);
30489  model.add_state("Isolated", m_update_isolated);
30490  model.add_state("Detected Hospitalized", m_update_hospitalized);
30491  model.add_state("Quarantined Susceptible", m_update_quarantine_suscep);
30492  model.add_state("Quarantined Exposed", m_update_quarantine_exposed);
30493  model.add_state("Isolated Recovered", m_update_isolated_recovered);
30494  model.add_state("Hospitalized", m_update_hospitalized);
30495  model.add_state("Recovered");
30496 
30497  // Global function
30498  model.add_globalevent(this->m_update_model, "Update infected individuals");
30499  model.queuing_off();
30500 
30501  // Preparing the virus -------------------------------------------
30502  epiworld::Virus<TSeq> virus(vname, prevalence, true);
30503  virus.set_state(
30504  ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::EXPOSED,
30505  ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::RECOVERED,
30506  ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::RECOVERED
30507  );
30508 
30509  virus.set_prob_infecting(&model("Prob. Transmission"));
30510  virus.set_prob_recovery(&model("Prob. Recovery"));
30511  virus.set_incubation(&model("Avg. Incubation days"));
30512 
30513  model.add_virus(virus);
30514 
30515  model.queuing_off(); // No queuing need
30516 
30517  // Adding the empty population
30518  model.agents_empty_graph(n);
30519 
30520  model.set_name("SEIR with Mixing and Quarantine");
30521 
30522  return;
30523 
30524 }
30525 
30526 template<typename TSeq>
30527 inline ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine(
30528  const std::string & vname,
30529  epiworld_fast_uint n,
30530  epiworld_double prevalence,
30531  epiworld_double contact_rate,
30532  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
30533  epiworld_double avg_incubation_days,
30534  epiworld_double recovery_rate,
30535  std::vector< double > contact_matrix,
30536  epiworld_double hospitalization_rate,
30537  epiworld_double hospitalization_period,
30538  // Policy parameters
30539  epiworld_double days_undetected,
30540  epiworld_fast_int quarantine_period,
30541  epiworld_double quarantine_willingness,
30542  epiworld_double isolation_willingness,
30543  epiworld_fast_int isolation_period,
30544  epiworld_double contact_tracing_success_rate,
30545  epiworld_fast_uint contact_tracing_days_prior
30546  )
30547 {
30548 
30549  this->contact_matrix = contact_matrix;
30550 
30551  ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine(
30552  *this,
30553  vname,
30554  n,
30555  prevalence,
30556  contact_rate,
30557  transmission_rate,
30558  avg_incubation_days,
30559  recovery_rate,
30560  contact_matrix,
30561  hospitalization_rate,
30562  hospitalization_period,
30563  // Policy parameters
30564  days_undetected,
30565  quarantine_period,
30566  quarantine_willingness,
30567  isolation_willingness,
30568  isolation_period,
30569  contact_tracing_success_rate,
30570  contact_tracing_days_prior
30571  );
30572 
30573  return;
30574 
30575 }
30576 
30577 template<typename TSeq>
30578 inline ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq> & ModelSEIRMixingQuarantine<TSeq>::initial_states(
30579  std::vector< double > proportions_,
30580  std::vector< int > /* queue_ */
30581 )
30582 {
30583 
30584  Model<TSeq>::initial_states_fun =
30585  create_init_function_seir<TSeq>(proportions_)
30586  ;
30587 
30588  return *this;
30589 
30590 }
30591 #undef MM
30592 #undef GET_MODEL
30593 #endif
30594 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
30596 
30597  End of -include/epiworld//models/seirmixingquarantine.hpp-
30598 
30601 
30602 
30603 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
30605 
30606  Start of -include/epiworld//models/measlesmixing.hpp-
30607 
30610 
30611 
30612 #ifndef EPIWORLD_MODELS_MEASLESMIXING_HPP
30613 #define EPIWORLD_MODELS_MEASLESMIXING_HPP
30614 
30615 using namespace epiworld;
30616 
30617 #define MM(i, j, n) \
30618  j * n + i
30619 
30620 #if __cplusplus >= 202302L
30621  // C++23 or later
30622  #define GET_MODEL(model, output) \
30623  auto * output = dynamic_cast< ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq> * >( (model) ); \
30624  /*Using the [[assume(...)]] to avoid the compiler warning \
30625  if the standard is C++23 or later */ \
30626  [[assume((output) != nullptr)]]
30627 #else
30628  // C++17 or C++20
30629  #define GET_MODEL(model, output) \
30630  auto * output = dynamic_cast< ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq> * >( (model) ); \
30631  assert((output) != nullptr); // Use assert for runtime checks
30632 #endif
30633 
30634 #define SAMPLE_FROM_PROBS(n, ans) \
30635  size_t ans; \
30636  epiworld_double p_total = m->runif(); \
30637  for (ans = 0u; ans < n; ++ans) \
30638  { \
30639  if (p_total < m->array_double_tmp[ans]) \
30640  break; \
30641  m->array_double_tmp[ans + 1] += m->array_double_tmp[ans]; \
30642  }
30643 
30681 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
30682 class ModelMeaslesMixing : public Model<TSeq>
30683 {
30684 private:
30685 
30686  // Vector of vectors of infected agents (prodromal agents are infectious)
30687  std::vector< size_t > infectious;
30688 
30689  // Number of infectious agents in each group
30690  std::vector< size_t > n_infectious_per_group;
30691 
30692  // Where the agents start in the `infectious` vector
30693  std::vector< size_t > entity_indices;
30694 
30695  void m_update_infectious_list();
30696  std::vector< size_t > sampled_agents;
30697  size_t sample_agents(
30698  Agent<TSeq> * agent,
30699  std::vector< size_t > & sampled_agents
30700  );
30701  std::vector< double > adjusted_contact_rate;
30702  std::vector< double > contact_matrix;
30703 
30704  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
30705  std::vector< int > sampled_sizes;
30706  #endif
30707 
30708  // Update functions
30709  static void m_update_susceptible(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m);
30710  static void m_update_exposed(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m);
30711  static void m_update_prodromal(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m);
30712  static void m_update_rash(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m);
30713  static void m_update_isolated(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m);
30714  static void m_update_isolated_recovered(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m);
30715  static void m_update_quarantine_suscep(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m);
30716  static void m_update_quarantine_exposed(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m);
30717  static void m_update_quarantine_prodromal(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m);
30718  static void m_update_quarantine_recovered(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m);
30719  static void m_update_hospitalized(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m);
30720 
30721  // Data about the quarantine process
30722  std::vector< bool > quarantine_willingness;
30723  std::vector< bool > isolation_willingness;
30724  std::vector< size_t > agent_quarantine_triggered;
30725  std::vector< int > day_flagged;
30726  std::vector< int > day_rash_onset;
30727  std::vector< int > day_exposed;
30728 
30729  void m_quarantine_process();
30730  static void m_update_model(Model<TSeq> * m);
30731 
30732  // We will limit tracking to up to EPI_MAX_TRACKING
30733  std::vector< size_t > tracking_matrix;
30734  std::vector< size_t > tracking_matrix_size;
30735 
30736  void m_add_tracking(size_t infectious_id, size_t agent_id);
30737 
30738 public:
30739 
30740  static const int SUSCEPTIBLE = 0;
30741  static const int EXPOSED = 1;
30742  static const int PRODROMAL = 2;
30743  static const int RASH = 3;
30744  static const int ISOLATED = 4;
30745  static const int ISOLATED_RECOVERED = 5;
30746  static const int DETECTED_HOSPITALIZED = 6;
30747  static const int QUARANTINED_EXPOSED = 7;
30748  static const int QUARANTINED_SUSCEPTIBLE = 8;
30749  static const int QUARANTINED_PRODROMAL = 9;
30750  static const int QUARANTINED_RECOVERED = 10;
30751  static const int HOSPITALIZED = 11;
30752  static const int RECOVERED = 12;
30753 
30754  static const size_t QUARANTINE_PROCESS_INACTIVE = 0u;
30755  static const size_t QUARANTINE_PROCESS_ACTIVE = 1u;
30756  static const size_t QUARANTINE_PROCESS_DONE = 2u;
30757 
30758  ModelMeaslesMixing() {};
30759 
30786  ModelMeaslesMixing(
30787  ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq> & model,
30788  epiworld_fast_uint n,
30789  epiworld_double prevalence,
30790  epiworld_double contact_rate,
30791  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
30792  epiworld_double vax_efficacy,
30793  epiworld_double vax_reduction_recovery_rate,
30794  epiworld_double incubation_period,
30795  epiworld_double prodromal_period,
30796  epiworld_double rash_period,
30797  std::vector< double > contact_matrix,
30798  epiworld_double hospitalization_rate,
30799  epiworld_double hospitalization_period,
30800  // Policy parameters
30801  epiworld_double days_undetected,
30802  epiworld_fast_int quarantine_period,
30803  epiworld_double quarantine_willingness,
30804  epiworld_double isolation_willingness,
30805  epiworld_fast_int isolation_period,
30806  epiworld_double prop_vaccinated,
30807  epiworld_double contact_tracing_success_rate = 1.0,
30808  epiworld_fast_uint contact_tracing_days_prior = 4u
30809  );
30810 
30835  ModelMeaslesMixing(
30836  epiworld_fast_uint n,
30837  epiworld_double prevalence,
30838  epiworld_double contact_rate,
30839  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
30840  epiworld_double vax_efficacy,
30841  epiworld_double vax_reduction_recovery_rate,
30842  epiworld_double incubation_period,
30843  epiworld_double prodromal_period,
30844  epiworld_double rash_period,
30845  std::vector< double > contact_matrix,
30846  epiworld_double hospitalization_rate,
30847  epiworld_double hospitalization_period,
30848  // Policy parameters
30849  epiworld_double days_undetected,
30850  epiworld_fast_int quarantine_period,
30851  epiworld_double quarantine_willingness,
30852  epiworld_double isolation_willingness,
30853  epiworld_fast_int isolation_period,
30854  epiworld_double prop_vaccinated,
30855  epiworld_double contact_tracing_success_rate = 1.0,
30856  epiworld_fast_uint contact_tracing_days_prior = 4u
30857  );
30858 
30865  ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq> & run(
30866  epiworld_fast_uint ndays,
30867  int seed = -1
30868  );
30869 
30873  void reset();
30874 
30879  Model<TSeq> * clone_ptr();
30880 
30888  ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq> & initial_states(
30889  std::vector< double > proportions_,
30890  std::vector< int > queue_ = {}
30891  );
30892 
30897  void set_contact_matrix(std::vector< double > cmat)
30898  {
30899  contact_matrix = cmat;
30900  return;
30901  };
30902 
30907  std::vector< double > get_contact_matrix() const
30908  {
30909  return contact_matrix;
30910  };
30911 
30916  std::vector< size_t > get_agent_quarantine_triggered() const
30917  {
30918  return agent_quarantine_triggered;
30919  };
30920 
30925  std::vector< bool > get_quarantine_willingness() const
30926  {
30927  return quarantine_willingness;
30928  };
30929 
30934  std::vector< bool > get_isolation_willingness() const
30935  {
30936  return isolation_willingness;
30937  };
30938 
30939 };
30940 
30941 template<typename TSeq>
30942 inline void ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq>::m_update_model(Model<TSeq> * m)
30943 {
30944  GET_MODEL(m, model);
30945  model->m_quarantine_process();
30946  model->events_run();
30947  model->m_update_infectious_list();
30948  return;
30949 }
30950 
30951 template<typename TSeq>
30952 inline void ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq>::m_add_tracking(
30953  size_t infectious_id,
30954  size_t agent_id
30955 )
30956 {
30957 
30958  // We avoid the math if there's no point in tracking anymore
30959  if (
30960  agent_quarantine_triggered[infectious_id] >=
30961  ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq>::QUARANTINE_PROCESS_DONE
30962  )
30963  return;
30964 
30965  // We avoid the math if the contact happened before
30966  // the lower bound of the contact tracing
30967  size_t days_since_rash = Model<TSeq>::today() - day_rash_onset[infectious_id];
30968  if (days_since_rash >
30969  Model<TSeq>::par("Contact tracing days prior")
30970  )
30971  return;
30972 
30973 
30974  // If we are overflow, we start from the beginning
30975  size_t loc = tracking_matrix_size[infectious_id] % EPI_MAX_TRACKING;
30976  tracking_matrix[MM(infectious_id, loc, Model<TSeq>::size())] = agent_id;
30977 
30978  // We increase the size of the tracking matrix
30979  tracking_matrix_size[infectious_id]++;
30980 
30981  return;
30982 }
30983 
30984 
30985 template<typename TSeq>
30986 inline void ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq>::m_update_infectious_list()
30987 {
30988 
30989  auto & agents = Model<TSeq>::get_agents();
30990 
30991  std::fill(n_infectious_per_group.begin(), n_infectious_per_group.end(), 0u);
30992 
30993  for (const auto & a : agents)
30994  {
30995 
30996  if (a.get_state() == ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq>::PRODROMAL)
30997  {
30998  if (a.get_n_entities() > 0u)
30999  {
31000  const auto & entity = a.get_entity(0u);
31001  infectious[
31002  // Position of the group in the `infectious` vector
31003  entity_indices[entity.get_id()] +
31004  // Position of the agent in the group
31005  n_infectious_per_group[entity.get_id()]++
31006  ] = a.get_id();
31007 
31008  }
31009  }
31010 
31011  }
31012 
31013  return;
31014 
31015 }
31016 
31017 template<typename TSeq>
31018 inline size_t ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq>::sample_agents(
31019  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * agent,
31020  std::vector< size_t > & sampled_agents
31021  )
31022 {
31023 
31024  size_t agent_group_id = agent->get_entity(0u).get_id();
31025  size_t ngroups = this->entities.size();
31026 
31027  int samp_id = 0;
31028  for (size_t g = 0; g < ngroups; ++g)
31029  {
31030 
31031  size_t group_size = n_infectious_per_group[g];
31032 
31033  if (group_size == 0u)
31034  continue;
31035 
31036  // How many from this entity?
31037  int nsamples = epiworld::Model<TSeq>::rbinom(
31038  group_size,
31039  adjusted_contact_rate[g] * contact_matrix[
31040  MM(agent_group_id, g, ngroups)
31041  ]
31042  );
31043 
31044  if (nsamples == 0)
31045  continue;
31046 
31047  // Sampling from the entity
31048  for (int s = 0; s < nsamples; ++s)
31049  {
31050 
31051  // Randomly selecting an agent
31052  int which = epiworld::Model<TSeq>::runif() * group_size;
31053 
31054  // Correcting overflow error
31055  if (which >= static_cast<int>(group_size))
31056  which = static_cast<int>(group_size) - 1;
31057 
31058  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
31059  auto & a = this->population.at(infectious.at(entity_indices[g] + which));
31060  #else
31061  auto & a = this->get_agent(infectious[entity_indices[g] + which]);
31062  #endif
31063 
31064  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
31065  if (a.get_state() != ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq>::PRODROMAL)
31066  throw std::logic_error(
31067  "The agent is not in prodromal state, but it should be."
31068  );
31069  #endif
31070 
31071  // Can't sample itself
31072  if (a.get_id() == agent->get_id())
31073  continue;
31074 
31075  sampled_agents[samp_id++] = a.get_id();
31076 
31077  }
31078 
31079  }
31080 
31081  return samp_id;
31082 
31083 }
31084 
31085 template<typename TSeq>
31086 inline ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq> & ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq>::run(
31087  epiworld_fast_uint ndays,
31088  int seed
31089 )
31090 {
31091 
31092  Model<TSeq>::run(ndays, seed);
31093 
31094  return *this;
31095 
31096 }
31097 
31098 template<typename TSeq>
31099 inline void ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq>::reset()
31100 {
31101 
31102  Model<TSeq>::reset();
31103 
31104  // Checking contact matrix's rows add to one
31105  size_t nentities = this->entities.size();
31106  if (this->contact_matrix.size() != nentities*nentities)
31107  throw std::length_error(
31108  std::string("The contact matrix must be a square matrix of size ") +
31109  std::string("nentities x nentities. ") +
31110  std::to_string(this->contact_matrix.size()) +
31111  std::string(" != ") + std::to_string(nentities*nentities) +
31112  std::string(".")
31113  );
31114 
31115  for (size_t i = 0u; i < this->entities.size(); ++i)
31116  {
31117  double sum = 0.0;
31118  for (size_t j = 0u; j < this->entities.size(); ++j)
31119  {
31120  if (this->contact_matrix[MM(i, j, nentities)] < 0.0)
31121  throw std::range_error(
31122  std::string("The contact matrix must be non-negative. ") +
31123  std::to_string(this->contact_matrix[MM(i, j, nentities)]) +
31124  std::string(" < 0.")
31125  );
31126  sum += this->contact_matrix[MM(i, j, nentities)];
31127  }
31128  if (sum < 0.999 || sum > 1.001)
31129  throw std::range_error(
31130  std::string("The contact matrix must have rows that add to one. ") +
31131  std::to_string(sum) +
31132  std::string(" != 1.")
31133  );
31134  }
31135 
31136  // Do it the first time only
31137  sampled_agents.resize(Model<TSeq>::size());
31138 
31139  // We only do it once
31140  n_infectious_per_group.resize(this->entities.size(), 0u);
31141  std::fill(n_infectious_per_group.begin(), n_infectious_per_group.end(), 0u);
31142 
31143  // We are assuming one agent per entity
31144  infectious.resize(Model<TSeq>::size());
31145  std::fill(infectious.begin(), infectious.end(), 0u);
31146 
31147  // This will say when do the groups start in the `infectious` vector
31148  entity_indices.resize(this->entities.size(), 0u);
31149  std::fill(entity_indices.begin(), entity_indices.end(), 0u);
31150  for (size_t i = 1u; i < this->entities.size(); ++i)
31151  {
31152 
31153  entity_indices[i] +=
31154  this->entities[i - 1].size() +
31155  entity_indices[i - 1]
31156  ;
31157 
31158  }
31159 
31160  // Adjusting contact rate
31161  adjusted_contact_rate.clear();
31162  adjusted_contact_rate.resize(this->entities.size(), 0.0);
31163 
31164  for (size_t i = 0u; i < this->entities.size(); ++i)
31165  {
31166 
31167  adjusted_contact_rate[i] =
31168  Model<TSeq>::get_param("Contact rate") /
31169  static_cast< epiworld_double > (this->get_entity(i).size());
31170 
31171 
31172  // Possibly correcting for a small number of agents
31173  if (adjusted_contact_rate[i] > 1.0)
31174  adjusted_contact_rate[i] = 1.0;
31175 
31176  }
31177 
31178  this->m_update_infectious_list();
31179 
31180  // Setting up the quarantine parameters
31181  quarantine_willingness.resize(this->size(), false);
31182  isolation_willingness.resize(this->size(), false);
31183  for (size_t idx = 0; idx < quarantine_willingness.size(); ++idx)
31184  {
31185  quarantine_willingness[idx] =
31186  Model<TSeq>::runif() < this->par("Quarantine willingness");
31187  isolation_willingness[idx] =
31188  Model<TSeq>::runif() < this->par("Isolation willingness");
31189  }
31190 
31191  agent_quarantine_triggered.resize(this->size(), 0u);
31192  std::fill(
31193  agent_quarantine_triggered.begin(),
31194  agent_quarantine_triggered.end(),
31195  0u
31196  );
31197 
31198  day_flagged.resize(this->size(), 0);
31199  std::fill(
31200  day_flagged.begin(),
31201  day_flagged.end(),
31202  0
31203  );
31204 
31205  day_rash_onset.resize(this->size(), 0);
31206  std::fill(
31207  day_rash_onset.begin(),
31208  day_rash_onset.end(),
31209  0
31210  );
31211 
31212  day_exposed.resize(this->size(), 0);
31213  std::fill(
31214  day_exposed.begin(),
31215  day_exposed.end(),
31216  0
31217  );
31218 
31219  // Tracking matrix
31220  tracking_matrix.resize(EPI_MAX_TRACKING * Model<TSeq>::size(), 0u);
31221  std::fill(tracking_matrix.begin(), tracking_matrix.end(), 0u);
31222 
31223  tracking_matrix_size.resize(Model<TSeq>::size(), 0u);
31224  std::fill(tracking_matrix_size.begin(), tracking_matrix_size.end(), 0u);
31225 
31226  return;
31227 
31228 }
31229 
31230 template<typename TSeq>
31231 inline Model<TSeq> * ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq>::clone_ptr()
31232 {
31233 
31234  ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq> * ptr = new ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq>(
31235  *dynamic_cast<const ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq>*>(this)
31236  );
31237 
31238  #if __cplusplus >= 202302L
31239  // C++23 or later
31240  [[assume(ptr != nullptr)]]
31241  #else
31242  // C++17 or C++20
31243  assert(ptr != nullptr); // Use assert for runtime checks
31244  #endif
31245 
31246  return dynamic_cast< Model<TSeq> *>(ptr);
31247 
31248 }
31249 
31250 template<typename TSeq>
31251 inline void ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq>::m_update_susceptible(
31252  Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m
31253 ) {
31254 
31255  if (p->get_n_entities() == 0)
31256  return;
31257 
31258  // Downcasting to retrieve the sampler attached to the
31259  // class
31260  GET_MODEL(m, m_down);
31261 
31262  size_t ndraws = m_down->sample_agents(p, m_down->sampled_agents);
31263 
31264  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
31265  m_down->sampled_sizes.push_back(static_cast<int>(ndraws));
31266  #endif
31267 
31268  if (ndraws == 0u)
31269  return;
31270 
31271  // Drawing from the set
31272  int nviruses_tmp = 0;
31273  for (size_t n = 0u; n < ndraws; ++n)
31274  {
31275 
31276  auto & neighbor = m->get_agent(m_down->sampled_agents[n]);
31277 
31278  auto & v = neighbor.get_virus();
31279 
31280  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
31281  if (nviruses_tmp >= static_cast<int>(m->array_virus_tmp.size()))
31282  throw std::logic_error(
31283  "Trying to add an extra element to a temporal array outside of the range."
31284  );
31285  #endif
31286 
31287  // Adding the current agent to the tracked interactions
31288  m_down->m_add_tracking(neighbor.get_id(), p->get_id());
31289 
31290  /* And it is a function of susceptibility_reduction as well */
31291  m->array_double_tmp[nviruses_tmp] =
31292  (1.0 - p->get_susceptibility_reduction(v, m)) *
31293  v->get_prob_infecting(m) *
31294  (1.0 - neighbor.get_transmission_reduction(v, m))
31295  ;
31296 
31297  m->array_virus_tmp[nviruses_tmp++] = &(*v);
31298 
31299  }
31300 
31301  // Running the roulette
31302  int which = roulette(nviruses_tmp, m);
31303 
31304  if (which < 0)
31305  return;
31306 
31307  p->set_virus(
31308  *m->array_virus_tmp[which],
31309  m,
31310  ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq>::EXPOSED
31311  );
31312 
31313  return;
31314 
31315 };
31316 
31317 template<typename TSeq>
31318 inline void ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq>::m_update_exposed(
31319  Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m
31320 ) {
31321 
31322  // Getting the virus
31323  auto & v = p->get_virus();
31324 
31325  // Does the agent become prodromal (infectious)?
31326  if (m->runif() < 1.0/(v->get_incubation(m)))
31327  {
31328 
31329  p->change_state(m, ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq>::PRODROMAL);
31330 
31331  return;
31332 
31333  }
31334 
31335  return;
31336 
31337 };
31338 
31339 template<typename TSeq>
31340 inline void ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq>::m_update_prodromal(
31341  Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m
31342 ) {
31343 
31344  GET_MODEL(m, model);
31345 
31346  // Does the agent transition to rash?
31347  if (m->runif() < 1.0/m->par("Prodromal period"))
31348  {
31349  model->day_rash_onset[p->get_id()] = m->today();
31350  p->change_state(m, ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq>::RASH);
31351  }
31352 
31353  return ;
31354 
31355 };
31356 
31357 template<typename TSeq>
31358 inline void ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq>::m_update_rash(
31359  Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m
31360 ) {
31361 
31362  GET_MODEL(m, model);
31363 
31364  // Checking if the agent will be detected or not
31365  bool detected = false;
31366  if (
31367  (m->par("Isolation period") >= 0) &&
31368  (m->runif() < 1.0/m->par("Days undetected"))
31369  )
31370  {
31371  model->agent_quarantine_triggered[p->get_id()] =
31372  ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq>::QUARANTINE_PROCESS_ACTIVE;
31373  detected = true;
31374  }
31375 
31376  // Computing probabilities for state change
31377  m->array_double_tmp[0] = 1.0/m->par("Rash period"); // Recovery
31378  m->array_double_tmp[1] = m->par("Hospitalization rate"); // Hospitalization
31379 
31380  SAMPLE_FROM_PROBS(2, which);
31381 
31382  if (which == 2) // Recovers
31383  {
31384  p->rm_virus(
31385  m,
31386  detected ?
31387  ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq>::ISOLATED_RECOVERED:
31388  ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq>::RECOVERED
31389  );
31390  }
31391  else if (which == 1) // Hospitalized
31392  {
31393  p->change_state(
31394  m,
31395  detected ?
31396  ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq>::DETECTED_HOSPITALIZED :
31397  ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq>::HOSPITALIZED
31398  );
31399  }
31400  else if (which != 0)
31401  {
31402  throw std::logic_error("The roulette returned an unexpected value.");
31403  }
31404  else if ((which == 0u) && detected)
31405  {
31406  // If the agent is not hospitalized or recovered, then it is moved to
31407  // isolation.
31408  p->change_state(m, ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq>::ISOLATED);
31409  model->day_flagged[p->get_id()] = m->today();
31410  }
31411 
31412  return ;
31413 
31414 };
31415 
31416 template<typename TSeq>
31417 inline void ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq>::m_update_isolated(
31418  Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m
31419 ) {
31420 
31421  GET_MODEL(m, model);
31422 
31423  // Figuring out if the agent can be released from isolation
31424  // if the isolation period is over.
31425  int days_since = m->today() - model->day_rash_onset[p->get_id()];
31426 
31427  bool unisolate =
31428  (m->par("Isolation period") <= days_since) ?
31429  true: false;
31430 
31431  // Sampling from the probabilities of recovery
31432  m->array_double_tmp[0] = 1.0/m->par("Rash period");
31433 
31434  // And hospitalization
31435  m->array_double_tmp[1] = m->par("Hospitalization rate");
31436 
31437  SAMPLE_FROM_PROBS(2, which);
31438 
31439  // Recovers
31440  if (which == 2)
31441  {
31442  if (unisolate)
31443  {
31444  p->rm_virus(
31445  m,
31446  ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq>::RECOVERED
31447  );
31448  }
31449  else
31450  p->rm_virus(
31451  m, ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq>::ISOLATED_RECOVERED
31452  );
31453  }
31454  else if (which == 1)
31455  {
31456 
31457  if (unisolate)
31458  {
31459  p->change_state(
31460  m, ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq>::HOSPITALIZED
31461  );
31462  }
31463  else
31464  {
31465  p->change_state(
31466  m, ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq>::DETECTED_HOSPITALIZED
31467  );
31468  }
31469  }
31470  else if ((which == 0) && unisolate)
31471  {
31472  p->change_state(
31473  m, ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq>::RASH
31474  );
31475  }
31476 
31477 
31478 };
31479 
31480 template<typename TSeq>
31481 inline void ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq>::m_update_quarantine_suscep(
31482  Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m
31483 ) {
31484 
31485  GET_MODEL(m, model);
31486 
31487  // Figuring out if the agent can be released from quarantine
31488  // if the quarantine period is over.
31489  int days_since = m->today() - model->day_flagged[p->get_id()];
31490 
31491  bool unquarantine =
31492  (m->par("Quarantine period") <= days_since) ?
31493  true: false;
31494 
31495  if (unquarantine)
31496  {
31497  p->change_state(
31498  m, ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq>::SUSCEPTIBLE
31499  );
31500  }
31501 
31502 };
31503 
31504 template<typename TSeq>
31505 inline void ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq>::m_update_quarantine_exposed(
31506  Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m
31507 ) {
31508 
31509  GET_MODEL(m, model);
31510 
31511  // Figuring out if the agent can be released from quarantine
31512  // if the quarantine period is over.
31513  int days_since = m->today() - model->day_flagged[p->get_id()];
31514 
31515  bool unquarantine =
31516  (m->par("Quarantine period") <= days_since) ?
31517  true: false;
31518 
31519  if (m->runif() < 1.0/(p->get_virus()->get_incubation(m)))
31520  {
31521 
31522  // If the agent is unquarantined, it becomes prodromal
31523  if (unquarantine)
31524  {
31525  p->change_state(
31526  m, ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq>::PRODROMAL
31527  );
31528  }
31529  else
31530  {
31531  p->change_state(
31532  m, ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq>::QUARANTINED_PRODROMAL
31533  );
31534  }
31535 
31536  }
31537  else if (unquarantine)
31538  {
31539  p->change_state(
31540  m, ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq>::EXPOSED
31541  );
31542  }
31543 
31544 };
31545 
31546 template<typename TSeq>
31547 inline void ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq>::m_update_quarantine_prodromal(
31548  Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m
31549 ) {
31550 
31551  GET_MODEL(m, model);
31552 
31553  // Otherwise, these are moved to the prodromal period, if
31554  // the quarantine period is over.
31555  int days_since = m->today() - model->day_flagged[p->get_id()];
31556 
31557  bool unquarantine =
31558  (m->par("Quarantine period") <= days_since) ?
31559  true: false;
31560 
31561  // Develops rash?
31562  if (m->runif() < (1.0/m->par("Prodromal period")))
31563  {
31564  model->day_rash_onset[p->get_id()] = m->today();
31565  p->change_state(m, ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq>::ISOLATED);
31566  }
31567  else
31568  {
31569 
31570  if (unquarantine)
31571  p->change_state(m, ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq>::PRODROMAL);
31572 
31573  }
31574 
31575 };
31576 
31577 template<typename TSeq>
31578 inline void ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq>::m_update_quarantine_recovered(
31579  Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m
31580 ) {
31581 
31582  GET_MODEL(m, model);
31583  int days_since = m->today() - model->day_flagged[p->get_id()];
31584 
31585  if (days_since >= m->par("Quarantine period"))
31586  p->change_state(m, ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq>::RECOVERED);
31587 
31588 };
31589 
31590 template<typename TSeq>
31591 inline void ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq>::m_update_isolated_recovered(
31592  Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m
31593 ) {
31594 
31595  GET_MODEL(m, model);
31596 
31597  // Figuring out if the agent can be released from isolation
31598  // if the isolation period is over.
31599  int days_since = m->today() - model->day_rash_onset[p->get_id()];
31600 
31601  bool unisolate =
31602  (m->par("Isolation period") <= days_since) ?
31603  true: false;
31604 
31605  if (unisolate)
31606  {
31607  p->change_state(
31608  m, ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq>::RECOVERED
31609  );
31610  }
31611 
31612 };
31613 
31614 template<typename TSeq>
31615 inline void ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq>::m_update_hospitalized(
31616  Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m
31617 ) {
31618 
31619  // The agent is removed from the system
31620  if (m->runif() < 1.0/m->par("Hospitalization period"))
31621  p->rm_virus(m, ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq>::RECOVERED);
31622 
31623 };
31624 
31625 template<typename TSeq>
31626 inline void ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq>::m_quarantine_process() {
31627 
31628  // Process entity-level quarantine
31629  for (size_t agent_i = 0u; agent_i < Model<TSeq>::size(); ++agent_i)
31630  {
31631 
31632  // Checking if the quarantine in the agent was triggered
31633  // or not
31634  if (
31635  agent_quarantine_triggered[agent_i] !=
31636  ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq>::QUARANTINE_PROCESS_ACTIVE
31637  )
31638  continue;
31639 
31640  if (this->par("Quarantine period") < 0)
31641  continue;
31642 
31643  // Getting the number of contacts, if it is greater
31644  // than the maximum, it means that we overflowed, so
31645  // we will only quarantine the first EPI_MAX_TRACKING
31646  size_t n_contacts = this->tracking_matrix_size[agent_i];
31647  if (n_contacts >= EPI_MAX_TRACKING)
31648  n_contacts = EPI_MAX_TRACKING;
31649 
31650  for (size_t contact_i = 0u; contact_i < n_contacts; ++contact_i)
31651  {
31652 
31653  // Checking if we will detect the contact
31654  if (Model<TSeq>::runif() > Model<TSeq>::par("Contact tracing success rate"))
31655  continue;
31656 
31657  size_t contact_id = this->tracking_matrix[
31658  MM(agent_i, contact_i, Model<TSeq>::size())
31659  ];
31660 
31661  auto & agent = Model<TSeq>::get_agent(contact_id);
31662 
31663  if (agent.get_state() > RASH)
31664  continue;
31665 
31666  // Agents with some tool won't be quarantined
31667  if (agent.get_n_tools() != 0u)
31668  continue;
31669 
31670  if (
31671  quarantine_willingness[contact_id] &&
31672  (Model<TSeq>::par("Quarantine period") >= 0))
31673  {
31674 
31675  switch (agent.get_state())
31676  {
31677  case SUSCEPTIBLE:
31678  agent.change_state(this, QUARANTINED_SUSCEPTIBLE);
31679  day_flagged[contact_id] = Model<TSeq>::today();
31680  break;
31681  case EXPOSED:
31682  agent.change_state(this, QUARANTINED_EXPOSED);
31683  day_flagged[contact_id] = Model<TSeq>::today();
31684  break;
31685  case PRODROMAL:
31686  agent.change_state(this, QUARANTINED_PRODROMAL);
31687  day_flagged[contact_id] = Model<TSeq>::today();
31688  break;
31689  case RASH:
31690  if (isolation_willingness[contact_id])
31691  {
31692  agent.change_state(this, ISOLATED);
31693  day_flagged[contact_id] = Model<TSeq>::today();
31694  }
31695  break;
31696  default:
31697  throw std::logic_error(
31698  "The agent is not in a state that can be quarantined."
31699  );
31700  }
31701 
31702  }
31703  }
31704 
31705  // Setting the quarantine process off
31706  agent_quarantine_triggered[agent_i] =
31707  ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq>::QUARANTINE_PROCESS_DONE;
31708  }
31709 
31710  return;
31711 }
31712 
31738 template<typename TSeq>
31739 inline ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq>::ModelMeaslesMixing(
31740  ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq> & model,
31741  epiworld_fast_uint n,
31742  epiworld_double prevalence,
31743  epiworld_double contact_rate,
31744  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
31745  epiworld_double vax_efficacy,
31746  epiworld_double vax_reduction_recovery_rate,
31747  epiworld_double incubation_period,
31748  epiworld_double prodromal_period,
31749  epiworld_double rash_period,
31750  std::vector< double > contact_matrix,
31751  epiworld_double hospitalization_rate,
31752  epiworld_double hospitalization_period,
31753  // Policy parameters
31754  epiworld_double days_undetected,
31755  epiworld_fast_int quarantine_period,
31756  epiworld_double quarantine_willingness,
31757  epiworld_double isolation_willingness,
31758  epiworld_fast_int isolation_period,
31759  epiworld_double prop_vaccinated,
31760  epiworld_double contact_tracing_success_rate,
31761  epiworld_fast_uint contact_tracing_days_prior
31762  )
31763 {
31764 
31765  // Setting up the contact matrix
31766  this->contact_matrix = contact_matrix;
31767 
31768  // Setting up parameters
31769  model.add_param(contact_rate, "Contact rate");
31770  model.add_param(transmission_rate, "Transmission rate");
31771  model.add_param(incubation_period, "Incubation period");
31772  model.add_param(prodromal_period, "Prodromal period");
31773  model.add_param(rash_period, "Rash period");
31774  model.add_param(hospitalization_rate, "Hospitalization rate");
31775  model.add_param(hospitalization_period, "Hospitalization period");
31776  model.add_param(days_undetected, "Days undetected");
31777  model.add_param(quarantine_period, "Quarantine period");
31778  model.add_param(
31779  quarantine_willingness, "Quarantine willingness"
31780  );
31781  model.add_param(
31782  isolation_willingness, "Isolation willingness"
31783  );
31784  model.add_param(isolation_period, "Isolation period");
31785  model.add_param(
31786  contact_tracing_success_rate, "Contact tracing success rate"
31787  );
31788  model.add_param(
31789  contact_tracing_days_prior, "Contact tracing days prior"
31790  );
31791  model.add_param(prop_vaccinated, "Vaccination rate");
31792  model.add_param(vax_efficacy, "Vax efficacy");
31793  model.add_param(vax_reduction_recovery_rate, "Vax improved recovery");
31794 
31795  // state
31796  model.add_state("Susceptible", m_update_susceptible);
31797  model.add_state("Exposed", m_update_exposed);
31798  model.add_state("Prodromal", m_update_prodromal);
31799  model.add_state("Rash", m_update_rash);
31800  model.add_state("Isolated", m_update_isolated);
31801  model.add_state("Isolated Recovered", m_update_isolated_recovered);
31802  model.add_state("Detected Hospitalized", m_update_hospitalized);
31803  model.add_state("Quarantined Exposed", m_update_quarantine_exposed);
31804  model.add_state("Quarantined Susceptible", m_update_quarantine_suscep);
31805  model.add_state("Quarantined Prodromal", m_update_quarantine_prodromal);
31806  model.add_state("Quarantined Recovered", m_update_quarantine_recovered);
31807  model.add_state("Hospitalized", m_update_hospitalized);
31808  model.add_state("Recovered");
31809 
31810  // Global function
31811  model.add_globalevent(this->m_update_model, "Update infected individuals");
31812  model.queuing_off();
31813 
31814  // Preparing the virus -------------------------------------------
31815  epiworld::Virus<TSeq> virus("Measles", prevalence, true);
31816  virus.set_state(
31817  ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq>::EXPOSED,
31818  ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq>::RECOVERED,
31819  ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq>::RECOVERED
31820  );
31821 
31822  virus.set_prob_infecting(&model("Transmission rate"));
31823  virus.set_prob_recovery(&model("Rash period"));
31824  virus.set_incubation(&model("Incubation period"));
31825 
31826  model.add_virus(virus);
31827 
31828  // Designing the vaccine
31829  Tool<> vaccine("Vaccine");
31830  vaccine.set_susceptibility_reduction(&model("Vax efficacy"));
31831  vaccine.set_recovery_enhancer(&model("Vax improved recovery"));
31832  vaccine.set_distribution(
31833  distribute_tool_randomly(prop_vaccinated, true)
31834  );
31835 
31836  model.add_tool(vaccine);
31837 
31838  model.queuing_off(); // No queuing need
31839 
31840  // Adding the empty population
31841  model.agents_empty_graph(n);
31842 
31843  model.set_name("Measles with Mixing and Quarantine");
31844 
31845  return;
31846 
31847 }
31848 
31849 template<typename TSeq>
31850 inline ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq>::ModelMeaslesMixing(
31851  epiworld_fast_uint n,
31852  epiworld_double prevalence,
31853  epiworld_double contact_rate,
31854  epiworld_double transmission_rate,
31855  epiworld_double vax_efficacy,
31856  epiworld_double vax_reduction_recovery_rate,
31857  epiworld_double incubation_period,
31858  epiworld_double prodromal_period,
31859  epiworld_double rash_period,
31860  std::vector< double > contact_matrix,
31861  epiworld_double hospitalization_rate,
31862  epiworld_double hospitalization_period,
31863  // Policy parameters
31864  epiworld_double days_undetected,
31865  epiworld_fast_int quarantine_period,
31866  epiworld_double quarantine_willingness,
31867  epiworld_double isolation_willingness,
31868  epiworld_fast_int isolation_period,
31869  epiworld_double prop_vaccinated,
31870  epiworld_double contact_tracing_success_rate,
31871  epiworld_fast_uint contact_tracing_days_prior
31872  )
31873 {
31874 
31875  this->contact_matrix = contact_matrix;
31876 
31877  ModelMeaslesMixing(
31878  *this,
31879  n,
31880  prevalence,
31881  contact_rate,
31882  transmission_rate,
31883  vax_efficacy,
31884  vax_reduction_recovery_rate,
31885  incubation_period,
31886  prodromal_period,
31887  rash_period,
31888  contact_matrix,
31889  hospitalization_rate,
31890  hospitalization_period,
31891  // Policy parameters
31892  days_undetected,
31893  quarantine_period,
31894  quarantine_willingness,
31895  isolation_willingness,
31896  isolation_period,
31897  prop_vaccinated,
31898  contact_tracing_success_rate,
31899  contact_tracing_days_prior
31900  );
31901 
31902  return;
31903 
31904 }
31905 
31906 template<typename TSeq>
31907 inline ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq> & ModelMeaslesMixing<TSeq>::initial_states(
31908  std::vector< double > proportions_,
31909  std::vector< int > /* queue_ */
31910 )
31911 {
31912 
31913  Model<TSeq>::initial_states_fun =
31914  create_init_function_seir<TSeq>(proportions_)
31915  ;
31916 
31917  return *this;
31918 
31919 }
